Author: Filippo Casati
Review: AGGIORNAMENTO Rivedo verso il basso la mia valutazione, perché sono venuto a conoscenza di una caratteristica dell'app a mio parere insensata: essa provvede a fornire segnalazioni SOLO in caso di contatti avvenuti entro il limite di 2 metri con l'ulteriore vincolo che tale contatto superi la durata di 15 minuti! Questa circostanza, unitamente alla scarsa adesione raccolta dall'iniziativa, mi sta inducendo a cestinare Immuni definitivamente. Come molti hanno osservato, la non obbligatorietà rende effimera la efficacia del processo di monitoraggio. Riporto dal sito ufficiale Immuni:.....Immuni usa la tecnologia per le notifiche di esposizione messa a disposizione da Apple e Google. Questa tecnologia determina i requisiti di sistema per scaricare e usare Immuni, e non è compatibile con versioni precedenti di iOS, Android e Google Play Services. Questa tecnologia è usata da tanti altri Paesi (per esempio, Austria, Germania, Irlanda e Svizzera). Senza di essa, ci sarebbero importanti limitazioni tecniche, come l'impossibilità di rilevare in modo affidabile i contatti tra due iPhone. Abbiamo ritenuto preferibile sviluppare un sistema che funzionasse efficacemente sulla maggioranza degli smartphone, invece di uno che funzionasse su ancora più smartphone, ma che fosse molto meno affidabile........Il sistema di notifiche di esposizione si basa su Bluetooth Low Energy. È necessario, quindi, che il Bluetooth sia sempre attivo affinché il sistema possa rilevare i tuoi contatti con gli altri utenti........Tengo spesso il mio smartphone in modalità aereo. Posso continuare a farlo? Sì, l’importante è che tu mantenga il Bluetooth attivo. In questo modo, Immuni continuerà a funzionare come previsto........Posso usare l’app senza connessione a Internet? Immuni non richiede una connessione a Internet continuativa. Tuttavia, l’app ha bisogno di connettersi almeno una volta al giorno per scaricare le informazioni necessarie a controllare se sei stato esposto a utenti potenzialmente contagiosi. Pertanto, assicurati che il tuo smartphone sia connesso a Internet almeno una volta al giorno........Cosa è e come funziona il codice OTP? OTP sta per "password valida una sola volta". Viene anche detto "password usa e getta". Quando un utente risulta positivo al virus, può decidere di caricare sul server di Immuni le chiavi crittografiche associate al suo dispositivo. Questo processo richiede che l’utente detti il codice OTP che si trova nell'apposita sezione dell'app all’operatore sanitario che gli ha comunicato l’esito del tampone. Il codice verrà validato e l’utente potrà quindi procedere al caricamento. Il codice OTP viene utilizzato soltanto in caso di positività al virus.…….Quali condizioni si devono verificare perché l'app mi avverta di un'esposizione a rischio? Per esempio, a che distanza e per quanto tempo devo essere stato esposto a un utente che poi risulta positivo al virus? Quando due smartphone su cui è installata l’app sono a distanza di qualche metro tra loro iniziano a scambiarsi codici casuali per registrare l’avvenuto contatto. Perché tu riceva una notifica di un'esposizionea rischio non è però sufficiente che il tuo smartphone abbia registrato un contatto con un utente in seguito risultato positivo. Si devono verificare le seguenti condizioni: • L’utente positivo deve aver caricato le sue chiavi crittografiche sul server di Immuni per consentire di avvertire gli utenti a cui è stato esposto • Come stabilito dal Ministero della Salute, l'esposizione deve essere avvenuta a una distanza inferiore ai 2 metri per un tempo superiore ai 15 minuti. Gli smartphone non possono misurare direttamente la distanza a cui avviene un contatto. Quindi, Immuni usa l'attenuazione del segnale Bluetooth Low Energy per ricavarne una stima. Sono stati eseguiti test di calibrazione per rendere questa stima la più affidabile possibile. Tuttavia, la stima non può essere precisa a causa di una serie di fattori di disturbo
Title Review: UPDATE I review my evaluation downwards  because I became aware of a feature of the app in my opinion senseless: it provides reports ONLY in case of contacts made within the limit of 2 meters with the further constraint that such contact exceed the duration of 15 minutes! This circumstance  together with the low adhesion collected by the initiative  is leading me to trash Immuni definitively. As many have observed  the non-mandatory nature makes the effectiveness of the monitoring process ephemeral. Report from the official Immuni website: ..... Immuni uses the technology for exposure notifications made available by Apple and Google. This technology determines the system requirements for downloading and using Immuni  and is not compatible with older versions of iOS  Android  and Google Play Services. This technology is used by many other countries (for example  Austria  Germany  Ireland and Switzerland). Without it  there would be major technical limitations  such as the inability to reliably detect contacts between two iPhones. We considered it preferable to develop a system that worked effectively on most smartphones  rather than one that worked on even more smartphones  but which was much less reliable ........ The exposure notification system is based on Bluetooth Low Energy . It is therefore necessary that Bluetooth is always active for the system to detect your contacts with other users ........ I often keep my smartphone in airplane mode. Can I continue to do this? Yes  the important thing is that you keep Bluetooth active. In this way  Immuni will continue to function as expected ........ Can I use the app without an Internet connection? Immuni does not require a continuous Internet connection. However  the app needs to connect at least once a day to download the information necessary to check if you have been exposed to potentially contagious users. Therefore  make sure that your smartphone is connected to the Internet at least once a day ........ What is the OTP code and how does it work? OTP stands for "one-time password". It is also called a "disposable password". When a user tests positive for the virus  they can decide to upload the cryptographic keys associated with their device to the Immuni server. This process requires the user to give the OTP code found in the appropriate section of the app to the health worker who communicated the result of the swab. The code will be validated and the user can then proceed with the upload. The OTP code is used only in case of positive virus. ....... What conditions must be met for the app to warn me of exposure to risk? For example  at what distance and for how long must I have been exposed to a user who then tests positive for the virus? When two smartphones on which the app is installed are at a distance of a few meters from each other  they begin to exchange random codes to record the contact. For you to receive a notification of a risk exposure  however  it is not sufficient that your smartphone has registered a contact with a user who subsequently tested positive. The following conditions must be met: • The positive user must have uploaded his cryptographic keys to the Immuni server to allow it to warn the users to whom he has been exposed • As established by the Ministry of Health  the exposure must have occurred to a distance of less than 2 meters for more than 15 minutes. Smartphones cannot directly measure the distance at which contact occurs. Then  Immuni uses Bluetooth Low Energy signal attenuation to derive an estimate. Calibration tests were performed to make this estimate as reliable as possible. However  the estimate cannot be accurate due to a number of disturbing factors

to detect your contacts with other users          I often keep my smartphone in airplane mode  Can I continue to do this  Yes  the important thing is that you keep Bluetooth active  In this way  Immuni will continue to function as expected          Can I use the app without an Internet connection  Immuni does not require a continuous Internet connection  However  the app needs to connect at least once a day to download the information necessary to check if you have been exposed to potentially contagious users  Therefore  make sure that your smartphone is connected to the Internet at least once a day          What is the OTP code and how does it work  OTP stands for  one time password   It is also called a  disposable password   When a user tests positive for the virus  they can decide to upload the cryptographic keys associated with their device to the Immuni server  This process requires the user to give the OTP code found in the appropriate section of the app to the health worker who communicated the result of the swab  The code will be validated and the user can then proceed with the upload  The OTP code is used only in case of positive virus          What conditions must be met for the app to warn me of exposure to risk  For example  at what distance and for how long must I have been exposed to a user who then tests positive for the virus  When two smartphones on which the app is installed are at a distance of a few meters from each other  they begin to exchange random codes to record the contact  For you to receive a notification of a risk exposure  however  it is not sufficient that your smartphone has registered a contact with a user who subsequently tested positive  The following conditions must be met    The positive user must have uploaded his cryptographic keys to the Immuni server to allow it to warn the users to whom he has been exposed   As established by the Ministry of Health  the exposure must have occurred to a distance of less than   meters for more than    minutes  Smartphones cannot directly measure the distance at which contact occurs  Then  Immuni uses Bluetooth Low Energy signal attenuation to derive an estimate  Calibration tests were performed to make this estimate as reliable as possible  However  the estimate cannot be accurate due to a number of disturbing factors

Author: mariangela zona
Review: Non funziona. Non si apre proprio. E l'unica volta che si è aperta, sì e bloccato sulla configurazione bluetooth e poi si è bloccata di nuovo. Voglio essere utile, voglio aiutare. Ma se il sistema è inutilizzabile, diventa impossibile. Dovete renderla utilizzabile anche per i sistemi più vecchi o economici. Altrimenti resta solo una stupida trovata pubblicitaria del governo. Cosa importante c'è qualcuno che risponde a chi ha avuto problemi? O non avete il coraggio di confrontarvi?
Title Review: Does not work. It just doesn't open. And the only time it opened  yes it stuck on bluetooth setup and then it stuck again. I want to be useful  I want to help. But if the system is unusable  it becomes impossible. You must also make it usable for older or cheaper systems. Otherwise it's just a stupid government publicity stunt. What's important is someone who responds to those who have had problems? Or don't you have the courage to confront yourself?
content: Does not work  It just doesn t open  And the only time it opened  yes it stuck on bluetooth setup and then it stuck again  I want to be useful  I want to help  But if the system is unusable  it becomes impossible  You must also make it usable for older or cheaper systems  Otherwise it s just a stupid government publicity stunt  What s important is someone who responds to those who have had problems  Or don t you have the courage to confront yourself

Author: G. Carofano
Review: Per favorire il download dell'app suggerisco di inserire altre funzionalità come ad esempio le info sulle disposizioni sindacali sull'uso delle maschere all'aperto nei singoli comuni italiani. Aggiungere funzionalità relative alle disposizioni e norme di legge tempo per tempo vigenti può essere utile per invogliare le persone a scaricare questa app potenzialmente utilissima ma per ora inefficace.
Title Review: To facilitate the download of the app  I suggest adding other features such as information on trade union provisions on the use of outdoor masks in individual Italian municipalities. Adding features related to the provisions and legal regulations in force from time to time can be useful to entice people to download this potentially very useful app but for now ineffective.

Review: L' app è importante, ovviamente il coronavirus è sottovalutato quindi l'app è poco usate ed è effettivamente utile quando si ha l'effetto gregge ( cioè la usano più persone possibili). Avrei fatto un sistema design più semplice tipo On,Off e in cui ti dicevano che avevi attivo internet,gps e bluetooth ma va bene.

I would have done a simpler design system like On  Off and in which they told you that you had internet  gps and bluetooth active but that's okay.

Review: App hat auf meinem alten Smartphone gar nicht funktioniert (gabs nicht zum runterladen). Auf dem neuen Smartphone muss das GPS eingeschalten sein, obwohl offiziell keine Standortdaten verwendet werden. Schon komisch! Kein Wunder, dass die App kaum verwendet wird.

Author: Paolo Paoli
Review: 5 stelle alla iniziativa, ma 1 stella alla utenza per la scarsa partecipazione! La app in sé invece mi sembra scarsa per via del sistema di notifiche abbastanza volatile, ma soprattutto perché queste scattano SOLO SE si è verificato un contatto a una distanza <= ai 2 metri e addirittura di durata superiore ai 15 minuti! Cioè, se io ho avuto un contatto con un tizio positivo per esempio per 14 minuti, oppure a una distanza di 3 metri, la app non mi avviserà! Vedere sulla pagina ufficiale Immuni per credere! Ad oggi i download segnati dal Play Store Google ammontano ad appena 1 milione! Capisco impossibilità di obbligare la popolazione (mica tutti hanno smartphone, soggetti un po' impediti, anziani refrattari a novità e modernità...), ma credo si dovrebbe pressare mediaticamente molto di più l'utilizzo della applicazione! Altrimenti che senso ha investire per svilupparla se efficacia e utilità tendono a zero? Io la attivo, e la probabilità che in un ambiente affollato le persone intorno a me l'abbiano pure attiva si aggira intorno al 2%... l'idea rimane buona solo sulla carta! Invito a leggere questo interessante articolo online su Zeusnews intitolato: «No, non serve il 60% per rendere utili le app anti-coronavirus» sulla fatidica soglia minima utile del 60%. Personalmente nutro qualche dubbio: in Italia, stando alle stime, non arriviamo neanche al 7%! In Francia addirittura nemmeno al 3%! Di quel 7%, considerando smemorati, menefreghisti noncuranti e rinunciatari, non so poi quanto rimanga.. Per cui, a questo punto, credo si debba intervenire più drasticamente, in barba a quanto avevo scritto in precedenza, adottando una politica sanzionatoria severa tipo quella usata per impedire spostamenti fisici nei mesi scorsi. Ovviamente, tale misura dovrà valere solo per chi avrà disponibilità di uno smartphone adeguato alla app; chi invece non ne sarà in possesso, dovrà autocertificarlo, non subendo alcuna sanzione fino a prova contraria (proprio come si faceva in fase lockdown per gli spostamenti ammessi); per la Autorità l'accertamento è semplice: basta verificare se il dichiarante ha un piano dati mobile in essere, e nel database di Google per esempio sono registrati tutti i dispositivi collegati a eventuale account (ma in realtà mica occorre andare a scomodare Google..). Concludendo: imporre dunque per legge la app, controllare casualmente in luoghi pubblici che chi dispone di uno smartphone compatibile abbia Immuni installata E in esecuzione, pena 400€ di multa, perché è inutile, l'essere umano (mediamente) capisce la sola regola del bastone e della carota! Ah! Dimenticavo.. parimenti importante: la app dovrebbe disporre internamente di un record in cui memorizzare i dati anagrafici di Tizio in modo da renderli disponibili sul server del Ministero della Salute, così che qualora Tizio risultasse positivo gli operatori sanitari potrebbero immediatamente registrare il fatto su detto database, il quale poi provvederebbe a notificare anonimamente i soggetti entrati in contatto con Tizio nei giorni precedenti. Semplice, no? Dove starebbe la fantomatica violazione della privacy? A livelllo di settore pubblico (pubblica amministrazione) un sacco di dati di ogni cittadino sono gelosamente custoditi da che mondo è mondo! dati anagrafici, catastali, civili, fiscali, clinici.... Per giunta, ora, in una contingenza di emergenza sanitaria! Dov'è il problema?
Title Review: 5 stars for the initiative  but 1 star for users due to low participation! The app itself  on the other hand  seems scarce to me due to the fairly volatile notification system  but above all because these are triggered ONLY IF there has been a contact at a distance <= 2 meters and even lasting more than 15 minutes! That is  if I have had contact with a positive guy for example for 14 minutes  or at a distance of 3 meters  the app will not warn me! See on the official Immuni page to believe! To date  the downloads scored from the Google Play Store amount to just 1 million! I understand the impossibility of obliging the population (not everyone has smartphones  subjects who are a little impeded  elderly people who are refractory to novelty and modernity ...)  but I think the use of the application should be pressured much more by the media! Otherwise  what sense does it make to invest to develop it if effectiveness and utility tend to zero? I activate it  and the probability that in a crowded environment people around me also have it active is around 2% ... the idea remains good only on paper! I invite you to read this interesting article online on Zeusnews entitled: "No  you don't need 60% to make anti-coronavirus apps useful" on the fateful minimum useful threshold of 60%. Personally I have some doubts: in Italy  according to estimates  we do not even reach 7%! In France  not even 3%! Of that 7%  considering forgetful  indifferent careless and renouncing  I do not know how much remains .. So  at this point  I think we should intervene more drastically  in spite of what I had written previously  adopting a severe sanction policy such as that used to prevent physical travel in recent months. Obviously  this measure should only apply to those who have the availability of a smartphone suitable for the app; those who do not have it  will have to self-certify it  not undergoing any sanction until proven otherwise (just as it was done in the lockdown phase for admitted journeys); for the Authority  the assessment is simple: just check if the declarant has a mobile data plan in place  and in the Google database  for example  all the devices connected to any account are registered (but in reality it is not necessary to go to bother Google .. ). In conclusion: therefore  impose the app by law  randomly check in public places that those who have a compatible smartphone have Immuni installed AND running  under penalty of a € 400 fine  because it is useless  the human being (on average) understands the only rule of carrot and stick! Ah! I forgot ... equally important: the app should have a record internally in which to store Tizio's personal data in order to make them available on the server of the Ministry of Health  so that if Tizio is positive  health workers could immediately record the fact on said database  which would then anonymously notify the subjects who came into contact with Tizio in the previous days. Simple  isn't it? Where would the phantom invasion of privacy lie? At the level of the public sector (public administration) a lot of data of every citizen are jealously guarded from what a world is the world! personal  cadastral  civil  fiscal  clinical data .... Moreover  now  in a contingency of health emergency! Where is the problem?
content: stars for the initiative  but   star for users due to low participation  The app itself  on the other hand  seems scarce to me due to the fairly volatile notification system  but above all because these are triggered ONLY IF there has been a contact at a distance      meters and even lasting more than    minutes  That is  if I have had contact with a positive guy for example for devices connected to any account are registered  but in reality it is not necessary to go to bother Google       In conclusion  therefore  impose the app by law  randomly check in public places that those who have a compatible smartphone have Immuni installed AND running  under penalty of a       fine  because it is useless  the human being  on average  understands the only rule of carrot and stick  Ah  I forgot     equally important  the app should have a record internally in which to store Tizio s personal data in order to make them available on the server of the Ministry of Health  so that if Tizio is positive  health workers could immediately record the fact on said database  which would then anonymously notify the subjects who came into contact with Tizio in the previous days  Simple  isn t it  Where would the phantom invasion of privacy lie  At the level of the public sector  public administration  a lot of data of every citizen are jealously guarded from what a world is the world  personal  cadastral  civil  fiscal  clinical data      Moreover  now  in a contingency of health emergency  Where is the problem

Author: Lucio Sampaolo
Review: Non capisco chi dice che non serve a niente. È di sicuro una app che può dare una mano. Non consuma affatto tutta questa batteria. Non manda in crash il cellulare. Non richiede nome, numero di telefono o altro dati dati sensibili. L'installazione è a prova di fesso, non ci vuole un genio. Se togli il GPS (solo su android) ti avvisa subito. Il GPS è richiesto solo per Android ma NON per sapere dove sei. Preoccupatevi per maps o Facebook non per immuni! L'ignoranza è una brutta bestia!
Title Review: I don't understand who says it's useless. It is certainly an app that can help out. It doesn't consume all this battery at all. It does not crash the cellphone. Requires no name  phone number or other sensitive data. The installation is foolproof  it doesn't take a genius. If you remove the GPS (only on android) it warns you immediately. GPS is only required for Android but NOT to know where you are. Worry about maps or Facebook  not immune! Ignorance is an ugly beast!
content: I don t understand who says it s useless  It is certainly an app that can help out  It doesn t consume all this battery at all  It does not crash the cellphone  Requires no name  phone number or other sensitive data  The installation is foolproof  it doesn t take a genius  If you remove the GPS  only on android  it warns you immediately  GPS is only required for Android but NOT to know where you are  Worry about maps or Facebook  not immune  Ignorance is an ugly beast

Author: Dario Galeandro
Review: L'applicazione richiedete l'uso del GPS con due gravi conseguenze: violazione dalla privacy poiché deve conoscere nostra posizione, consumo eccessivo della batteria per la conseguente attività del GPS. Sconsiglio a tutti l'installazione fino alla correzione dei detti problemi. Edit.Considerando l'uso eccessivo della batteria dovuto all'obbligo dell'uso del GPS, nonché l'evidente peso in termini di memoria RAM che l'applicazione richiede alla chiusura forzata del GPS. Disinstallo l'applicazione
Title Review: The application requires the use of GPS with two serious consequences: violation of privacy since it must know our position  excessive consumption of the battery for the consequent activity of the GPS. I do not recommend the installation until the correction of these problems. Edit Considering the excessive use of the battery due to the obligation to use the GPS  as well as the obvious weight in terms of RAM memory that the application requires when the GPS is forced to close. Uninstall the application
content: The application requires the use of GPS with two serious consequences  violation of privacy since it must know our position  excessive consumption of the battery for the consequent activity of the GPS  I do not recommend the installation until the correction of these problems  Edit Considering the excessive use of the battery due to the obligation to use the GPS  as well as the obvious weight in terms of RAM memory that the application requires when the GPS is forced to close  Uninstall the application

Author: Letmeexplain
Review: Ottima app mi aspettavo di peggio sinceramente. La trovo davvero veloce oltre che essenziale per tutti noi. Qui si parla di salute e spero che questa app diventi ancora più leggera e con un consumo di batteria e memoria ancora più ottimizzato. Le premesse son tutte buone vedremo un po' i prossimi giorni. Continuate così..
Title Review: Great app I was expecting worse honestly. I find it really fast as well as essential for all of us. Here we talk about health and I hope this app becomes even lighter and with an even more optimized battery and memory consumption. The premises are all good we will see a little in the next few days. Keep it up..
content: Great app I was expecting worse honestly  I find it really fast as well as essential for all of us  Here we talk about health and I hope this app becomes even lighter and with an even more optimized battery and memory consumption  The premises are all good we will see a little in the next few days  Keep it up

Title Review: Simple application to use  but the problem is that it is not very widespread and it is voluntary. Ergo  it is not exploited as it was conceived.
content: Simple application to use  but the problem is that it is not very widespread and it is voluntary  Ergo  it is not exploited as it was conceived

Author: Giacomo Langfelder
Review: Sarebbe utile renderla più intrigante, in modo che più gente la possa scaricare (anche coloro che hanno meno senso civico). Ad esempio aggiungendo informazioni quali il rischio di contagio nella zona dove mi trovo attualmente, la distanza minima da un caso confermato a cui mi sono trovato, e statistiche di evoluzione della diffusione della malattia. Complimenti in ogni caso per lo sforzo fatto a beneficio del paese, speriamo che sempre più gente la scarichi e la usi.
Title Review: It would be useful to make it more intriguing  so that more people can download it (even those who have less civic sense). For example by adding information such as the risk of contagion in the area where I am currently  the minimum distance from a confirmed case that I have been in  and statistics on the evolution of the spread of the disease. Congratulations in any case for the effort made to benefit the country  we hope that more and more people download and use it.
content: It would be useful to make it more intriguing  so that more people can download it  even those who have less civic sense   For example by adding information such as the risk of contagion in the area where I am currently  the minimum distance from a confirmed case that I have been in  and statistics on the evolution of the spread of the disease  Congratulations in any case for the effort made to benefit the country  we hope that more and more people download and use it

Author: Fiorangela Grieco
Review: Devo essere sincera l'avevo installata E poi l'avevo disinstallata perché con bluetooth sempre aperto mi dava l'idea che mi consumasse la batteria in fretta e dovevo ricaricare più spesso e poi io non esco molto poi invece ho pensato di reinstallarla per i seguenti motivi: primo perché mia figlia esce tutti i giorni e quindi è bene averla così posso controllare i suoi contatti e di conseguenza essere tranquilla per me per cui Ritengo che sia utile averla tutti un minimo di tranquillità la dà
Title Review: I have to be honest I had installed it AND then I had uninstalled it because with bluetooth always open it gave me the idea that it consumed my battery quickly and I had to recharge more often and then I don't go out much then instead I thought about reinstalling it for the following reasons: first because my daughter goes out every day and therefore it is good to have her so I can check her contacts and consequently be calm for me so I think it is useful to have her all a minimum of tranquility gives her
content: I have to be honest I had installed it AND then I had uninstalled it because with bluetooth always open it gave me the idea that it consumed my battery quickly and I had to recharge more often and then I don t go out much then instead I thought about reinstalling it for the following reasons  first because my daughter goes out every day and therefore it is good to have her so I can check her contacts and consequently be calm for me so I think it is useful to have her all a minimum of tranquility gives her

Author: Valerio Monaci
Review: Ho installato l'app sul mio honor 9x e la terrò, tuttavia nutro alcuni dubbi sulla sua reale efficacia: ogni volta che apro l'app, il servizio risulta attivo, ma non ho MAI ricevuto alcuna notifica, il che porta a 3 possibilità: 1) gli italiani sono diventati campioni di buonsenso 2) sono incredibilmente fortunato e nei miei spostamenti (tra cui anche aeroporto) non ho mai incontrato nessun positivo 3) l'app è poco utilizzata o non funziona come dovrebbe. A voi la scelta.
Title Review: I have installed the app on my honor 9x and will keep it  however I have some doubts about its real effectiveness: every time I open the app  the service is active  but I have NEVER received any notification  which leads to 3 possibilities: 1) Italians have become champions of common sense 2) I am incredibly lucky and in my travels (including the airport) I have never met any positive 3) the app is little used or does not work as it should. To you the choice.
content: I have installed the app on my honor  x and will keep it  however I have some doubts about its real effectiveness  every time I open the app  the service is active  but I have NEVER received any notification  which leads to   possibilities     Italians have become champions of common sense    I am incredibly lucky and in my travels  including the airport  I have never met any positive    the app is little used or does not work as it should  To you the choice

Author: Laura Carretta
Review: Giudizio positivo, solo un paio di note. Sarebbe utile far comparire una notifica ogni mattina che dice di aprire l'app, dal momento che per alcuni modelli di Android tende a bloccarsi se l'app rimane chiusa, e non è così scontato ricordarsi sempre di farlo. Sarebbe anche utile mettere in evidenza, nella schermata iniziale, il pulsante "segnala positività" in modo che chi è positivo lo trovi facilmente e si ricordi di segnalarlo.
Title Review: Positive judgment  just a couple of notes. It would be useful to pop up a notification every morning that says to open the app  since for some Android models it tends to freeze if the app is closed  and it is not so obvious to always remember to do so. It would also be useful to highlight  on the home screen  the "report positivity" button so that those who are positive find it easily and remember to report it.
content: Positive judgment  just a couple of notes  It would be useful to pop up a notification every morning that says to open the app  since for some Android models it tends to freeze if the app is closed  and it is not so obvious to always remember to do so  It would also be useful to highlight  on the home screen  the  report positivity  button so that those who are positive find it easily and remember to report it

Un italiano che ama veramente l'Italia si informa e segue le persone competenti. Questo è il modo più semplice per essere un buon cittadino

Author: Alessandro Soresini
Review: App è funzionata fino a poco tempo fa. Penso dopo aggiornamento Android10 a patch sicurezza 1 Luglio 2020. In seguito, non capisco se app è attiva: cliccando app non si apre, popup di Android "applicazione si interrompe continuamente". Attivazione forzata BT e GPS non cambia la situazione. Rimozione e reinstallazione non cambia la situazione.
Title Review: App worked until recently. I think after update Android10 to security patch July 1  2020. Review: L'app non è male, ma trovo fastidioso dover avere la geolocalizzazione attivata per farla funzionare. So che probabilmente dipende più da Android che non dall'app, ma per me che attivo il GPS solo quando mi serve sarebbe molto più utile un'app sempre funzionante

I don't think GPS is needed either  as I am not asking for permission for the location. I know it probably depends more on Android than on the app  but for me that I only activate the GPS when I need it  an always-working app would be much more useful.

Author: Matteo Mogno
Review: L'app funziona, ho avuto l'accortezza di verificare e disabilitare la chiusura forzata del gestore di batteria. Metto tre stelle perché secondo me manca un parametro importante, ossia le hit totali di chi altro aveva l'app intorno a me ( magari solo giornaliere). Nel senso che se vado al supermercato, per esempio, non ho il paragone di quante persone ho incotrato che a loro volta avevano l'app. Per cui una eventuale mancata segnalazione è più significativa.
Title Review: The app works  I had the foresight to check and disable the forced closing of the battery manager. I put three stars because in my opinion an important parameter is missing  that is the total hits of who else had the app around me (maybe only daily). In the sense that if I go to the supermarket  for example  I don't have the comparison of how many people I have come across who also had the app. Therefore  any failure to report is more significant.
content: The app works  I had the foresight to check and disable the forced closing of the battery manager  I put three stars because in my opinion an important parameter is missing  that is the total hits of who else had the app around me  maybe only daily   In the sense that if I go to the supermarket  for example  I don t have the comparison of how many people I have come across who also had the app  Therefore  any failure to report is more significant

Parte tecnica: cellulare S10e, a me pare funzionare bene, no crash o altro; per quel che mi riguarda avrei voluto avere piu informazioni (quanti contatti ha rilevato ecc ecc) ma evidentemente x la privacy è stato ridotto tutto all'osso: servizio attivo e zero notifiche, e vabbè... mi accontenterò di sapere solo quello.
Title Review: Install it ... and what the heck! Maybe it's not perfect (on the other hand there are updates)  but it will certainly be of little use if there are few installations. Technical part: S10e cell phone  to me it seems to work well  no crash or other; as far as I'm concerned I would have liked to have more information (how many contacts has detected etc etc) but obviously x privacy has been reduced to the bone: active service and zero notifications  and oh well ... I'll be content to know only that.
content: Install it     and what the heck  Maybe it s not perfect  on the other hand there are updates   but it will certainly be of little use if there are few installations  Technical part  S  e cell phone  to me it seems to work well  no crash or other  as far as I m concerned I would have liked to have more information  how many contacts has detected etc etc  but obviously x privacy has been reduced to the bone  active service and zero notifications  and oh well     I ll be content to know only that

Author: Giacomo Millino
Review: Avevo scaricato questa app sia sulla fiducia sia per senso civico... ma mi devo ricredere!!! Continua a dirmi che le notifiche non sono attive, entro nell'app ed effettivamente non è attiva. L'attivo e due popup mi avvertono che verrà usato solo il Bluetooth e che non verrà utilizzato il gps. Date le conferme e invece mi attiva il gps. Se disattivo il gps l'app mi avverte che le notifiche non sono attive!!! NON ATTIVERÒ NAI IL GPS NON VOGLIO CHE IL CELL MI DURI SOLO POCHE ORE!!!
Title Review: I had downloaded this app on both trust and civic sense ... but I have to change my mind !!! Keep telling me that notifications are not active  I enter the app and it is actually not active. The active and two popups warn me that only Bluetooth will be used and that GPS will not be used. Give the confirmations and instead I activate the gps. If I deactivate the GPS the app warns me that the notifications are not active !!! I WILL NOT ACTIVATE THE GPS NAI I DON'T WANT THE CELL TO LAST FOR ME ONLY A FEW HOURS !!!
content: I had downloaded this app on both trust and civic sense     but I have to change my mind     Keep telling me that notifications are not active  I enter the app and it is actually not active  The active and two popups warn me that only Bluetooth will be used and that GPS will not be used  Give the confirmations and instead I activate the gps  If I deactivate the GPS the app warns me that the notifications are not active     I WILL NOT ACTIVATE THE GPS NAI I DON T WANT THE CELL TO LAST FOR ME ONLY A FEW HOURS

Author: Andrea Leganza
Review: 1) l'applicazione sarebbe dovuta essere obbligatoria per entrare in qualunque luogo pubblico o privato e obbligatoria per spostarsi fuori dal comune 3) le Asl e gli ospedali dovrebbero inserire il cf del positivo e la app informare i parenti prossimi 4) tracciamento degli spostamenti con qrcode esposti fuori da negozi, luoghi pubblici, caselli, trasporti per fornire il luogo dell'evento 5) se positivo: tracciamento GPS con obbligo di video ad orario casuale con dichiarazione del giorno e ora.
Title Review: 1) the application should have been mandatory to enter any public or private place and mandatory to move out of the ordinary 3) the local health authorities and hospitals should insert the cf of the positive and the app inform next relatives 4) tracking of movements with qrcode displayed outside shops  public places  toll booths  transport to provide the place of the event 5) if positive: GPS tracking with obligation to video at random times with declaration of the day and time.
content: the application should have been mandatory to enter any public or private place and mandatory to move out of the ordinary    the local health authorities and hospitals should insert the cf of the positive and the app inform next relatives    tracking of movements with qrcode displayed outside shops  public places  toll booths  transport to provide the place of the event    if positive  GPS tracking with obligation to video at random times with declaration of the day and time

Author: Pina Pini
Review: Con Android dalla versione 6 in sù (Immuni app FUNZIONA SOLO con Android almeno versione 6; se per esempio avete Android 5 non dovrebbe andare e nemmeno installarsi) DOVETE METTERE L'APP IMMUNI TRA QUELLE PROTETTE da Doze, altrimenti l'app verrà interrotta ad ogni spegnimento schermo. Quindi cercate nel menu Batteria delle Impostazioni Android le 2 voci tipo "mantieni attiva dopo blocco schermo" (questa impostazione è quella per proteggere dal meccanismo Doze, e in genere è già impostata quando si installa una app, ma è bene comunque controllare) e "ignora ottimizzazione batteria" (questa seconda impostazione invece non è già attiva, per cui occorre inserire manualmente la app Immuni tra quelle "consentite" nella lista delle app presente in tale menù); i nomi di queste due voci del menu Impostazioni Android possono variare in base al dispositivo e alla versione Android, quindi cercatele attentamente con pazienza, magari facendovi aiutare da chi più esperto di voi. NON OCCORRE TENERE IMMUNI SEMPRE AL MASSIMO REGIME con inutile consumo energetico: solo in luoghi pubblici ha senso! Dopo potete ridurre impatto semplicemente disattivando bluetooth e/o GPS oppure più drasticamente terminando la app da Impostazioni Android --> App --> Immuni ************************************************************************************** aprite Immuni app e attivate il servizio comunque per una mezz'oretta almeno un paio di volte al giorno con connessione dati attiva (Wi-Fi o rete dati mobili) anche se non capitate in luoghi affollati, per verificare se ci sono notifiche relative a contatti a rischio con soggetti ammalati avvenuti nei giorni precedenti***************************************************************************. Sarebbe inoltre opportuno non avere installati o quantomeno in esecuzione task killer, perché questi fermano le app in esecuzione in background; se si hanno app del tipo task killer, allora inserire Immuni nella lista bianca (whitelist) in modo da impedirne la chiusura da parte del task killer. Infine, quando si sta in luoghi pubblici, è opportuno tenere la app in primo piano (la scheda della app Immuni dovrebbe risultare al primo posto nella lista App recenti) e tenere chiusa ogni altra app (perlomeno quelle a elevato assorbimento energetico), perché certi modelli (Huawei e Samsung, per citarne un paio) montano sistemi proprietari di ottimizzazione energetica (una sorta di task killer extra Android) che senza farsi troppi scrupoli interrompono temporaneamente certe app in caso di intenso utilizzo della CPU del dispositivo
Title Review: With Android version 6 and up (Immune app ONLY WORKS with Android at least version 6; if for example you have Android 5 it shouldn't go or install) YOU MUST PUT THE IMMUNE APP BETWEEN THOSE PROTECTED by Doze  otherwise the app will be stopped for every screen shutdown. Then look in the Battery menu of the Android Settings for the 2 items such as "keep active after screen lock" (this setting is the one to protect from the Doze mechanism  and it is usually already set when you install an app  but it is good to check anyway) and " ignore battery optimization "(this second setting  on the other hand  is not already active  so you need to manually enter the Immuni app among those" allowed "in the list of apps in this menu); the names of these two items in the Android Settings menu may vary depending on the device and the Android version  so look for them carefully with patience  perhaps with the help of someone more experienced than you. YOU DO NOT NEED TO KEEP IMMUNE ALWAYS AT THE MAXIMUM REGIME with unnecessary energy consumption: only in public places makes sense! After you can reduce the impact simply by deactivating bluetooth and / or GPS or more drastically terminating the app from Android Settings -> App -> Immune ********************** ************************************************** ************** open Immune app and activate the service anyway for half an hour at least a couple of times a day with active data connection (Wi-Fi or mobile data network) even if not happened in crowded places  to check if there are notifications relating to risky contacts with sick people in the previous days *************************** ************************************************. It would also be advisable not to have task killer installed or at least running  because these stop apps running in the background; if you have task killer apps  then whitelist Immuni in order to prevent it from being closed by the task killer. Finally  when you are in public places  it is advisable to keep the app in the foreground (the Immuni app tab should be at the first place in the Recent Apps list) and keep every other app closed (at least those with high energy absorption)  because certain models (Huawei and Samsung  to name a couple) are equipped with proprietary energy optimization systems (a sort of extra Android task killer) that without too many scruples temporarily interrupt certain apps in case of intense use of the device's CPU
content: With Android version   and up  Immune app ONLY WORKS with Android at least version    if for example you have Android   it shouldn t go or install  YOU MUST PUT THE IMMUNE APP BETWEEN THOSE PROTECTED by Doze  otherwise the app will be stopped for every screen shutdown  Then look in the Battery menu of the Android Settings for the   items such as  keep active after screen lock   this setting is the one to protect from the Doze mechanism  and it is usually already set when you install an app  but it is good to check anyway  and   ignore battery optimization   this second setting  on the other hand  is not already active  so you need to manually enter the Immuni app among those  allowed  in the list of apps in this menu   the names of these two items in the Android Settings menu may vary depending on the device and the Android version  so look for them carefully with patience  perhaps with the help of someone more experienced than you  YOU DO NOT NEED TO KEEP IMMUNE ALWAYS AT THE MAXIMUM REGIME with unnecessary energy consumption  only in public places makes sense  After you can reduce the impact simply by deactivating bluetooth and   or GPS or more drastically terminating the app from Android Settings    App    Immune                                                                                          open Immune app and activate the service anyway for half an hour at least a couple of times a day with active data connection  Wi Fi or mobile data network  even if not happened in crowded places  to check if there are notifications relating to risky contacts with sick people in the previous days                                                                               It would also be advisable not to have task killer installed or at least running  because these stop apps running in the background  if you have task killer apps  then whitelist Immuni in order to prevent it from being closed by the task killer  Finally  when you are in public places  it is advisable to keep the app in the foreground  the Immuni app tab should be at the first place in the Recent Apps list  and keep every other app closed  at least those with high energy absorption   because certain models  Huawei and Samsung  to name a couple  are equipped with proprietary energy optimization systems  a sort of extra Android task killer  that without too many scruples temporarily interrupt certain apps in case of intense use of the device s CPU
syn: sick, data, protect, gps, servic, servic, reduc, enter, optim, model, killer, run, order, network

Unico problema? Il pallino rosso che compare settimanalmente per avvertirti che il servizio è attivo: ottimo per farti prendere un colpo quando sblocchi lo smartphone. per favore... mettetelo verde. Comunque, sinceri complimenti ;)

Anyway  sincere congratulations;)

Author: thomas posadinu
Review: Adesso speriamo che tutti abbiano il buonsenso di installarla. App utile al 100%. Leggo recensioni fatte solo per depistare. La App non traccia ne tantomeno ti comunica l'ora il giorno ne la persona positiva con la quale sei entrato in contatto. Come funziona: Se oggi divento positivo ricevo un codice che inserisco nella app (quindi lo dichiaro volontariamente). Contestualmente arriva un avviso alle persone con le quali sono entrato in contatto nei gg precedenti di un possibile contatto anonimo
Title Review: Now let's hope everyone has the sense to install it. 100% useful app. I read reviews made just to sidetrack. The App does not track  nor does it tell you the time  the day  nor the positive person with whom you came into contact. How it works: If I become positive today I receive a code that I enter in the app (so I declare it voluntarily). At the same time  a notice arrives to the people with whom I came into contact in the previous days of a possible anonymous contact
content: Now let s hope everyone has the sense to install it       useful app  I read reviews made just to sidetrack  The App does not track  nor does it tell you the time  the day  nor the positive person with whom you came into contact  How it works  If I become positive today I receive a code that I enter in the app  so I declare it voluntarily   At the same time  a notice arrives to the people with whom I came into contact in the previous days of a possible anonymous contact

Title Review: Simple and minimally invasive app  I did not detect a significantly higher consumption of giga or battery. Title Review: Very complicated and not very functional  I don't like it is that it does not tell me WHERE I come in contact with a possible positive  else  who has been affected by the virus should be OBLIGED TO DOWNLOAD AND ACTIVATE IT  privacy is not affected by this system  and however  my privacy cannot be more important than the health of others  moreover it is rather cumbersome and impractical that to register you have to have the code entered by hypothetical persons in charge  so everything is more complicated!

Author: Simo B
Review: Stavo cercando delle informazioni su come vengano gestiti i possibili positivi segnalati da Immuni (che per ora ho installato) e sono perplesso. Se l'applicazione mi notificasse un possibile contatto cosa succede? Ho capito che devo contattare il medico, ma poi mi buttano in quarantena volontaria senza farmi il tampone, o è prevista una procedura snella che mi dia una corsia privilegiata per fare il test in maniera tale da non finire recluso per una ipotesi di contagio? So che questo non riguarda strettamente l'app, ma senza un buon servizio ed una buona informazione il servizio è dannoso per chi altruisticamente decide di installare l'app.
Title Review: I was looking for information on how the possible positives reported by Immuni (which I have installed for now) are managed and I am perplexed. If the application notifies me of a possible contact  what happens? I understand that I have to contact the doctor  but then they throw me into voluntary quarantine without swabing me  or is there a streamlined procedure that gives me a privileged lane to take the test in such a way as not to end up in prison for a hypothesis of contagion? I know that this does not strictly concern the app  but without good service and good information the service is harmful for those who selflessly decide to install the app.
content: I was looking for information on how the possible positives reported by Immuni  which I have installed for now  are managed and I am perplexed  If the application notifies me of a possible contact  what happens  I understand that I have to contact the doctor  but then they throw me into voluntary quarantine without swabing me  or is there a streamlined procedure that gives me a privileged lane to take the test in such a way as not to end up in prison for a hypothesis of contagion  I know that this does not strictly concern the app  but without good service and good information the service is harmful for those who selflessly decide to install the app
syn: concern, servic, servic, manag, manag, applic

Author: rP arte
Review: Forse in molti non hanno capito la gravità della situazione, il coronavirus è invalidante o peggio ancora mortale anche su pazienti giovani e in assenza di pregresse patologie, quindi non per forza anziani. Chi adotta tutte le misure necessarie sicuramente riduce ma non azzera l'eventualità di contagio. Tutti quelli che non adottano l'app ne tanto meno le misure di contenimento, mettono a repentaglio la qualità della loro vita e di chi li circonda. Non siate egoisti, ma altruisti!
Title Review: Perhaps many have not understood the gravity of the situation  the coronavirus is disabling or worse still deadly even on young patients and in the absence of previous pathologies  therefore not necessarily elderly. Whoever adopts all the necessary measures certainly reduces but does not eliminate the possibility of contagion. All those who do not adopt the app nor the containment measures  jeopardize the quality of their life and those around them. Don't be selfish  but selfless!
content: Perhaps many have not understood the gravity of the situation  the coronavirus is disabling or worse still deadly even on young patients and in the absence of previous pathologies  therefore not necessarily elderly  Whoever adopts all the necessary measures certainly reduces but does not eliminate the possibility of contagion  All those who do not adopt the app nor the containment measures  jeopardize the quality of their life and those around them  Don t be selfish  but selfless

Author: Pier Paolo Galiani
Review: Contrariamente a quanto dichiarato pubblicamente, con il mio dispositivo (Android 10) richiede di tenere la POSIZIONE ATTIVA. 1 con il GPS attivo la carica della batteria si consuma molto rapidamente. 2 dichiarato da immuni: tutte app installate hanno accesso alla posizione. In questo modo tutti quelli che non dovrebbero sapere dove sei lo sanno, mentre immuni, alla quale forse darei il consenso a sapere dove sono, non lo sa! Complimenti allo sviluppatore, o incapace, o in malafede!
Title Review: Contrary to what has been publicly stated  with my device (Android 10) it requires to keep the ACTIVE LOCATION. 1 with GPS active  the battery charge is consumed very quickly. 2 declared by immuni: all installed apps have access to the location. In this way all those who should not know where you are know it  while immune  to whom I would perhaps give consent to know where they are  does not know! Kudos to the developer  either inept  or in bad faith!
content: Contrary to what has been publicly stated  with my device  Android     it requires to keep the ACTIVE LOCATION    with GPS active  the battery charge is consumed very quickly    declared by immuni  all installed apps have access to the location  In this way all those who should not know where you are know it  while immune  to whom I would perhaps give consent to know where they are  does not know  Kudos to the developer  either inept  or in bad faith

Author: Lorenzo Fantoni
Review: Che funzioni o no quello è un mistero, comunque se solo il 15% della popolazione la installa la vedo dura. Il problema che ridcontro è sulle notifiche. Se disattivo gps e bluetooth di notte per non gravare batteria e inquinamento elettromagnetico, immuni mi notifica che non è attivo con un messaggio sonoro alle prime ore dell'alba neanche fosse un gallo. Non va bene.
Title Review: Whether it works or not that is a mystery  however if only 15% of the population installs it I see it hard. The problem I face is with notifications. If I turn off gps and bluetooth at night to avoid burdening the battery and electromagnetic pollution  immuni notifies me that it is not active with a sound message in the early hours of dawn even if it was a rooster. That's no good.

Author: Alessandro Pace
Review: App scaricata fin dalla sua uscita (03/07) nonostante in alcune regioni d'Italia il servizio non era disponibile, nel mio caso funziona perfettamente. Il problema sorge unicamente per chi non la vuole scaricare (anche se non è obbligatorio rimane un gesto utile alla comunità). La mia sensazione - poi suffragata - è che nella mia zona è poco diffusa. Sarebbe utile soprattutto a chi ha avuto i sintomi, e ridurre il possibile contagio che con questa applicazione le notifiche possono aiutare.
Title Review: App downloaded since its release (03/07) although in some regions of Italy the service was not available  in my case it works perfectly. The problem arises only for those who do not want to download it (even if it is not mandatory  it remains a useful gesture for the community). My feeling - later supported - is that in my area it is not very common. It would be especially useful to those who have had symptoms  and to reduce the possible contagion that notifications can help with this application.
content: App downloaded since its release         although in some regions of Italy the service was not available  in my case it works perfectly  The problem arises only for those who do not want to download it  even if it is not mandatory  it remains a useful gesture for the community   My feeling   later supported   is that in my area it is not very common  It would be especially useful to those who have had symptoms  and to reduce the possible contagion that notifications can help with this application
syn: area, itali, region, servic, servic, reduc, applic

Author: Roby Rasi
Review: Samsung A3 2016. L'ho installata appena è stata resa disponibile. Non ho riscontrato nessuno dei problemi i dei limiti segnalati da altri utenti: non aumento dei consumi della batteria né forme di violazione della privacy. L'unica perplessità riguarda il fatto che non ho mai ricevuto report settimanali. Credo, come già altri hanno scritto, che sarebbe necessario da parte del Governo maggiore impegno per incentivare l'installazione.
Title Review: Samsung A3 2016. I installed it as soon as it became available. I have not encountered any of the problems or limits reported by other users: no increase in battery consumption or forms of privacy violation. The only concern is that I have never received weekly reports. I believe  as others have already written  that a greater commitment on the part of the Government would be necessary to encourage the installation.
content: Samsung A        I installed it as soon as it became available  I have not encountered any of the problems or limits reported by other users  no increase in battery consumption or forms of privacy violation  The only concern is that I have never received weekly reports  I believe  as others have already written  that a greater commitment on the part of the Government would be necessary to encourage the installation

Author: Steel Computer
Review: La app funziona. L adesione è bassa quindi il suo meccanismo di base non viene sfruttato come pensato. Questione hardware: nonostante gli sforzi per la privacy l implementazione abusa di un uso intenso di bluetooth e GPS (non ti segue ma registra dove può essere avvenuto il contagio per tracciare i focolai) e ne risulta un battery drain notevole, pesante su device recenti ma insostenibile su smartphone più datati (come quelli degli anziani che dovrebbero invece essere meglio tutelati )
Title Review: The app works. Adhesion is low so its basic mechanism is not being exploited as intended. Hardware issue: despite the efforts for privacy  the implementation abuses an intense use of bluetooth and GPS (it does not follow you but records where the infection may have occurred to track the outbreaks) and the result is a significant battery drain  heavy on recent devices but unsustainable on older smartphones (such as those of the elderly who should instead be better protected)
content: The app works  Adhesion is low so its basic mechanism is not being exploited as intended  Hardware issue  despite the efforts for privacy  the implementation abuses an intense use of bluetooth and GPS  it does not follow you but records where the infection may have occurred to track the outbreaks  and the result is a significant battery drain  heavy on recent devices but unsustainable on older smartphones  such as those of the elderly who should instead be better protected
syn: older, elder, abus, track, privaci, protect, gps, record, elder, follow

Author: Danilo Attolino
Review: Principio semplice e sensato. Peccato che debba scontrarsi con l'idiozia dei potenziali utilizzatori. Quanti cellulari ci sono in Italia? Quante app sono state scaricate? Quante realmente sono utilizzate? Quanto più questi numeri non coincidono, tanto più l'app e il principio alla base perdono di efficacia. Provo vergogna ad essere italiano
Title Review: Simple and sensible principle. Too bad it has to clash with the idiocy of potential users. How many cell phones are there in Italy? How many apps have been downloaded? How many are actually used? The more these numbers do not coincide  the more the app and the underlying principle lose effectiveness. I am ashamed to be Italian
content: Simple and sensible principle  Too bad it has to clash with the idiocy of potential users  How many cell phones are there in Italy  How many apps have been downloaded  How many are actually used  The more these numbers do not coincide  the more the app and the underlying principle lose effectiveness  I am ashamed to be Italian

Title Review: Good app. Even if there are various problems  for example the fact that the distances calculated by the Bluetooth are not managed in an optimal way  or to name another  the notification of exposure to a positive subject does not always arrive so that it cannot give and guarantee a greater security for immune installers. Nonetheless  as already mentioned  it must be installed for the security that comuqnue holds if installed  it only needs to be improved in certain parts  otherwise an excellent app.

E qui lo Stato può intervenire: pubblicità, precedenza a fare il tampone a chi ha l'app e riceve un allert, contributi per comprare nuovo cell (con Immuni preinstallata) per chi lo ha non compatibile. Se tutti avvessimo l'app si riuscirebbe a isolare subito i focalai. Altrimenti prepariamoci ad un autunno in lockdown.
Title Review: Great app and respect privacy. Wrong writer who does not respect it .. okay not everyone understands technical issues. Too bad it won't be useful… 60% of the population is far away. And here the State can intervene: advertising  priority to swab those who have the app and receive an alert  contributions to buy a new cell (with Immuni pre-installed) for those who have it not compatible. If we all started the app we would be able to isolate the foci immediately. Otherwise  let's get ready for an autumn in lockdown.
content: Great app and respect privacy  Wrong writer who does not respect it    okay not everyone understands technical issues  Too bad it won t be useful      of the population is far away  And here the State can intervene  advertising  priority to swab those who have the app and receive an alert  contributions to buy a new cell  with Immuni pre installed  for those who have it not compatible  If we all started the app we would be able to isolate the foci immediately  Otherwise  let s get ready for an autumn in lockdown

Author: Carlo Piramide
Review: Questa App è una fesseria madornale appena spengo il telefonino si deve attivare di nuovo. Secondo me non serve a nulla, fatta in questa maniera. Non capisco perché lo stato Italiano che dovrebbe tutelare la salute e la mia incolumità non può seguire i miei spostamenti in nome della privacy, non mi può allertare riguardo un mio fortuito e possibile contagio. Non capisco però perché, un ente privato come Google Map , può seguire i miei spostamenti e tutti quelli che hanno uno smartphone, in nome della privacy vattelappesca può sapere quando vado in quale meccanico, in quale ristorante e ti chiede la recezione, può pure controllare se ho frequentato una prostituta o un'amante, se frequento la chiesa cattolica,evangelista o la moschea o altro! Dopo anche diversi anni, ognuno di noi può sapere il tragitto fatto in un dato giorno e in una data ora. Lo stato sovrano dovrebbe avere di diritto il potere di informare ogni suo cittadino di un possibile pericolo per se e per i propri congiunti.Se una persona è malata di covid 19 e non rispetta la quarantena mi spigate perché lo stato non dovrebbe intervenire per evitare dei possibili decessi? Una persona è libera sempre, tranne quando viola la libertà degli altri!
Title Review: This App is a huge nonsense as soon as I turn off the phone it has to be activated again. In my opinion it is useless  done this way. I do not understand why the Italian state  which should protect my health and safety  cannot follow my movements in the name of privacy  it cannot alert me about my fortuitous and possible contagion. I do not understand  however  why  a private body like Google Map  can follow my movements and all those who have a smartphone  in the name of privacy vattelappesca can know when I go to which mechanic  which restaurant and asks you for reception  can also check if I went to a prostitute or a mistress  if I go to the catholic church  evangelist or mosque or whatever! Even after several years  each of us can know the journey made on a given day and at a given hour. The sovereign state should have the right to inform each citizen of a possible danger to himself and his relatives.If a person is sick with covid 19 and does not respect the quarantine  please explain why the state should not intervene to avoid possible deaths? A person is always free  except when he violates the freedom of others!
content: This App is a huge nonsense as soon as I turn off the phone it has to be activated again  In my opinion it is useless  done this way  I do not understand why the Italian state  which should protect my health and safety  cannot follow my movements in the name of privacy  it cannot alert me about my fortuitous and possible contagion  I do not understand  however  why  a private body like Google Map  can follow my movements and all those who have a smartphone  in the name of privacy vattelappesca can know when I go to which mechanic  which restaurant and asks you for reception  can also check if I went to a prostitute or a mistress  if I go to the catholic church  evangelist or mosque or whatever  Even after several years  each of us can know the journey made on a given day and at a given hour  The sovereign state should have the right to inform each citizen of a possible danger to himself and his relatives If a person is sick with covid    and does not respect the quarantine  please explain why the state should not intervene to avoid possible deaths  A person is always free  except when he violates the freedom of others
syn: sick, italian, free, privaci, protect, follow, mistress, evangelist

Ci sono altre app o social network che violano sicuramente la privacy e sono quotidianamente utilizzate dalla maggior parte delle persone!

There are other apps or social networks that definitely violate privacy and are used daily by most of the people!

Author: Dario Fusco
Review: Tutti si lamentano del lato privacy. Vedo gente che non se la installa perché ha paura che il governo tracci la sua posizione. Innanzitutto l'app non traccia la posizione, cosa che io avrei messo, poiché senza non è molto utile. Infine dopo che qualcuno inizia a pubblicare sui social la sua vita continuamente non credo perché si debba preoccupare della privacy in un app come questa. Comunque è inutile perché in settimane di utilizzo non mi è mai arrivata nessuna notifica.
Title Review: Everyone complains about the privacy side. I see people who don't install it because they are afraid that the government will trace its position. First of all the app does not track the location  which I would have put  since without it it is not very useful. Finally  after someone starts posting their life on social media  I don't think why they should worry about privacy in an app like this. However it is useless because in weeks of use I have never received any notification.
content: Everyone complains about the privacy side  I see people who don t install it because they are afraid that the government will trace its position  First of all the app does not track the location  which I would have put  since without it it is not very useful  Finally  after someone starts posting their life on social media  I don t think why they should worry about privacy in an app like this  However it is useless because in weeks of use I have never received any notification

Author: MARCO DANIA
Review: Buongiorno, la mia non è una recensione, ma una richiesta rivolta agli sviluppatori. Mettete un contatore in tempo reale all'interno dell'applicazione, ben in vista che indichi quante persone in quel momento hanno Immuni attiva, potrebbe essere un incentivo gratificante sapere che se siamo in tanti, l'app è operativa. Se no fra non molto, non avendo sentore di un reale utilizzo verrà disinstallata.
Title Review: Hello  mine is not a review  but a request addressed to the developers. Put a real-time counter inside the application  clearly visible that indicates how many people at that moment have Immuni active  it could be a gratifying incentive to know that if we are many  the app is operational. If not before long  having no inkling of real use it will be uninstalled.

Author: Alberto Ferrante
Review: "Il festival della notifica", questo è il nome che darei a questa app. Metti il telefono in modalità aereo? Notifica. Sei in modalità aereo da un po' di tempo? Notifica ancora che non si sa mai! Disabiliti il tracciamento? Periodicamente notifica che ti ricorda che hai il tracciamento disabilitato. Vuoi uscire dalla app? Ti chiede conferma (ma perché?? È una app che deve funzionare in background!). Chiaro sia importante ricordare all'utente di tenere abilitato BLE e la localizzazione, ma così tante notifiche sono il modo migliore per indurre a mettere il dito su "rimuovi app". Per di più la app usa un solo canale di notifica, per cui disabilitando le notifiche della app per evitare di essere continuamente disturbati si disabilitano anche le eventuali notifiche utili ed importanti. Per il resto la app è graficamente accattivante e pare svolgere il compito per cui è stata progettata... Nella speranza che a breve ci sia un'integrazione con le altre app simili, almeno a livello europeo.
Title Review: "The notification festival"  this is the name I would give to this app. Put your phone in airplane mode? Notification. Have you been in airplane mode for some time? Notify again that you never know! Disable tracking? Periodically notifies you that you have tracking disabled. Do you want to exit the app? It asks you for confirmation (but why? It's an app that has to run in the background!). Of course it's important to remind the user to keep BLE and localization enabled  but so many notifications are the best way to get them to put their finger on "remove app". Furthermore  the app uses only one notification channel  so disabling the app notifications to avoid being continually disturbed also disables any useful and important notifications. For the rest  the app is graphically appealing and seems to perform the task for which it was designed ... In the hope that soon there will be an integration with other similar apps  at least at a European level.
content: The notification festival   this is the name I would give to this app  Put your phone in airplane mode  Notification  Have you been in airplane mode for some time  Notify again that you never know  Disable tracking  Periodically notifies you that you have tracking disabled  Do you want to exit the app  It asks you for confirmation  but why  It s an app that has to run in the background    Of course it s important to remind the user to keep BLE and localization enabled  but so many notifications are the best way to get them to put their finger on  remove app   Furthermore  the app uses only one notification channel  so disabling the app notifications to avoid being continually disturbed also disables any useful and important notifications  For the rest  the app is graphically appealing and seems to perform the task for which it was designed     In the hope that soon there will be an integration with other similar apps  at least at a European level
syn: local, track, disabl, perform, remov, channel, import, run, level

Author: Giuseppe Gualtieri

L'unica criticità sta nel fatto che è a discrezione di chi ha contratto il virus, segnalare nell'app di essere infetto. Ma forse non si poteva fare altrimenti proprio per i problemi relativi alla privacy.
Title Review: The app looks well done. So far no reports. I see no privacy issues as everything remains anonymous. Obviously the system works if everyone downloads it. The only criticality lies in the fact that it is at the discretion of those who contracted the virus to report in the app that they are infected. But perhaps it could not have been done otherwise because of privacy issues.

Author: Massimo Giussani
Review: Non è vero che usi il GPS per rilevare la posizione "al centimetro" come qualcuno, in malafede, ha scritto. L'applicazione usa solo il Bluetooth. App utile, nei limiti delle leggi sulla privacy. Sarebbe opportuno che tutti la usassero e che vi fosse una unica app a livello europeo. Con l'estate potremmo infettarci, o infettare, un cittadino straniero in vacanza in Italia ed in questo caso l'app sarebbe inutile dato che non scambierebbe dati con l'app del paese di origine del turista. Peccato.
Title Review: It is not true that you use the GPS to detect the position "to the centimeter" as someone  in bad faith  wrote. The application uses only Bluetooth. Useful app  within the limits of privacy laws. It would be advisable for everyone to use it and for there to be a single app at European level. With the summer we could infect  or infect  a foreign citizen on holiday in Italy and in this case the app would be useless since it would not exchange data with the app of the tourist's country of origin. Sin.
content: It is not true that you use the GPS to detect the position  to the centimeter  as someone  in bad faith  wrote  The application uses only Bluetooth  Useful app  within the limits of privacy laws  It would be advisable for everyone to use it and for there to be a single app at European level  With the summer we could infect  or infect  a foreign citizen on holiday in Italy and in this case the app would be useless since it would not exchange data with the app of the tourist s country of origin  Sin

Author: Stefano Gallotta
Review: All'inizio non riuscivo a collegarmi all'API Google e mi riportava sempre il messaggio di attivare le notifiche. Il giorno seguente ha iniziato a funzionare e zero errori. Lavora in background e non da alcun fastidio. Una piccola precisazione per tutti. Non chiede alcuna autorizzazione se non per l'uso del Bluetooth. Nonostante Android necessita del GPS per funzionare, non preleva alcun dato e la riprova è la quantità irrisoria di batteria consumata. Giusto aiutare nel contact tracking.
Title Review: At first I could not connect to the Google API and it always returned the message to activate notifications. The next day it started working and zero errors. It works in the background and does not give any annoyance. A small clarification for everyone. It does not ask for any authorization except for the use of Bluetooth. Although Android needs GPS to work  it does not collect any data and the proof is the negligible amount of battery consumed. Just help in contact tracking.
content: At first I could not connect to the Google API and it always returned the message to activate notifications  The next day it started working and zero errors  It works in the background and does not give any annoyance  A small clarification for everyone  It does not ask for any authorization except for the use of Bluetooth  Although Android needs GPS to work  it does not collect any data and the proof is the negligible amount of battery consumed  Just help in contact tracking

Review: È da idioti vedere questo come uno strumento di potere e direttamente figlio del "malefico intelletto" del Governo. Ci sono categorie intere di ligi controllori della sicurezza di questo prodotto, dei quali non possiamo fare altro che fidarci. Entro i vincoli della privacy e della nostra burocrazia questa app è stata sviluppata in tempi contenuti ed è un importante strumento e dimostrazione della serietà con cui viene affrontata la crisi sanitaria.
Title Review: It is idiotic to see this as an instrument of power and a direct child of the government's "evil intellect". There are whole categories of loyal safety controllers for this product  which we cannot help but trust. Within the constraints of privacy and our bureaucracy  this app was developed in a short time and is an important tool and demonstration of the seriousness with which the health crisis is addressed.
content: It is idiotic to see this as an instrument of power and a direct child of the government s  evil intellect   There are whole categories of loyal safety controllers for this product  which we cannot help but trust  Within the constraints of privacy and our bureaucracy  this app was developed in a short time and is an important tool and demonstration of the seriousness with which the health crisis is addressed

Sarebbe davvero utile se la scaricassero tutti, ma è molto improbabile che accada. Le immagini sessiste inserite alla prima apertura non sono state rimosse.
Title Review: You don't need to do almost anything other than install it. The app works by itself  just activate the bloothoot and declare the area where you live. It would be really helpful if everyone dumped it  but it's very unlikely to happen. Sexist images posted on first opening have not been removed.
content: You don t need to do almost anything other than install it  The app works by itself  just activate the bloothoot and declare the area where you live  It would be really helpful if everyone dumped it  but it s very unlikely to happen  Sexist images posted on first opening have not been removed

Review: L'ho installata subito ero e sono favorevole a questa idea...però mi costringeva tenere connessione dati, Bluetooth e gps accesi...se si ha un telefono non nuovissimo questo incide molto sulla carica della batteria. Disinstallata Lo so voi dite che non è vero che è tutto ottimizzato, che il consumo in più è minimo ma di fatto è così ...peccato ...bisognava pensarla diversamente.
Title Review: I installed it immediately  I was and am in favor of this idea ... but it forced me to keep data connection  Bluetooth and GPS on ... if you have a phone that is not brand new this affects a lot on the battery charge. Uninstalled I know you say that it is not true that everything is optimized  that the extra consumption is minimal but in fact it is so ... pity ... we had to think differently.
content: I installed it immediately  I was and am in favor of this idea     but it forced me to keep data connection  Bluetooth and GPS on     if you have a phone that is not brand new this affects a lot on the battery charge  Uninstalled I know you say that it is not true that everything is optimized  that the extra consumption is minimal but in fact it is so     pity     we had to think differently

Author: Giovanni Venturella
Review: Non ci fidiamo di chi ci governa, hanno detto e fatto una marea di sciocchezze da quando siedono sulle poltrone. Sinceramente per come è descritta, quest'app sembra utile: privacy e geolocalizzazione ,sembrano realmete tutelati. Ma proprio perchè non vengono registrati i dati personali, e vengono invece creati dei codici casuali, chi ci dice che i contagi registrati e le notifiche di contagio siano vere e non inventate da questi bugiardi che vogliono alimentare il terrore per stare al potere?..
Title Review: We do not trust those who govern us  they have said and done a lot of nonsense since they sit in the chairs. Honestly  for how it is described  this app seems useful: privacy and geolocation seem really protected. But precisely because personal data are not recorded  and random codes are created instead  who tells us that the recorded infections and notifications of contagion are true and not invented by these liars who want to feed terror to stay in power? ..
content: We do not trust those who govern us  they have said and done a lot of nonsense since they sit in the chairs  Honestly  for how it is described  this app seems useful  privacy and geolocation seem really protected  But precisely because personal data are not recorded  and random codes are created instead  who tells us that the recorded infections and notifications of contagion are true and not invented by these liars who want to feed terror to stay in power

content: I m sorry but to get it to work I had to uninstall and reinstall it  Useless app  if no one installs it including those who have already contracted the virus  explain to me what it is for  The usual Italian crap
