Review: Ovviamente chi è positivo dovrebbe mettersi in quarantena a casa, o se con sintomi e complicanze, ricovero. Quindi l'utilità dell'app? È suggerirmi che vengo a contatto con un positivo che viola la quarantena e gira liberamente dopo aver istallato app ed essersi dichiarato positivo?. Un app figlia della legislazione italiana... Liberamente interpretabile...
Title Review: Obviously  those who are positive should quarantine themselves at home  or if with symptoms and complications  hospitalization. So the usefulness of the app? Is it to suggest that I come in contact with a positive who violates the quarantine and runs freely after installing apps and declaring themselves positive ?. An app derived from Italian legislation ... Freely interpretable ...
content: Obviously  those who are positive should quarantine themselves at home  or if with symptoms and complications  hospitalization  So the usefulness of the app  Is it to suggest that I come in contact with a positive who violates the quarantine and runs freely after installing apps and declaring themselves positive    An app derived from Italian legislation     Freely interpretable

In più inizialmente per le notifiche bastava il bluetooth attivo d'improvviso adesso mi chiede anche il GPS attivo ( cosa che prima non chiedeva) quindi ho smesso di usarla in quanto non è vero che serve il GPS il Bluetooth è sufficiente per rilevare la prossimità!! Se si vuole che la gente lo usi disattivate l'opzione GPS.
Title Review: Unclear information and doubts remain about the privacy and security of the servers. In addition  initially for notifications  the active bluetooth was enough suddenly now it also asks me for the active GPS (which it did not ask before) so I stopped using it as it is not true that GPS is needed  Bluetooth is sufficient to detect proximity! ! If you want people to use it turn off the GPS option.
content: Unclear information and doubts remain about the privacy and security of the servers  In addition  initially for notifications  the active bluetooth was enough suddenly now it also asks me for the active GPS  which it did not ask before  so I stopped using it as it is not true that GPS is needed  Bluetooth is sufficient to detect proximity    If you want people to use it turn off the GPS option

Author: Manuela Polese
Review: La app. in sè è semplice e funzionale. I dubbi sono: 1- perchè devo lasciare attivo il gps dato che agisce via bluetooth (con conseguente maggior dispendio di energia), non si potrebbe superare questo problema? 2- se ricevessi notifica di aver avuto contatti con contagiato le tempistiche del tampone; 3- Creare una modalitá tipo "sospendi" per es. quando si è a casa e non si è ovviamente a contatto con nessuno.
Title Review: The app. in itself it is simple and functional. The doubts are: 1- why do I have to leave the GPS active since it works via bluetooth (with consequent greater expenditure of energy)  could this problem not be overcome? 2- if I received notification of having had contact with infected  the timing of the tampon; 3- Create a "suspend" mode eg. when you are at home and obviously not in contact with anyone.
content: The app  in itself it is simple and functional  The doubts are     why do I have to leave the GPS active since it works via bluetooth  with consequent greater expenditure of energy   could this problem not be overcome     if I received notification of having had contact with infected  the timing of the tampon     Create a  suspend  mode eg  when you are at home and obviously not in contact with anyone

Author: Davide Chiarello
Review: Intelligente e per niente invasivo della privacy. Va spiegata perché molti diffidenti rifiutano di installarla: ogni installazione è legata ad un codice anonimo; Con il bluetooth che si usa x gli smartwatch, vengono scambiati i codici anonimi che si incrociano e salvata sul server. Nel caso in cui qualcuno, dotato di app, venisse trovato positivo, il suo codice (sempre in via anonima) serve a segnalare a chi nei giorni ANTECEDENTI avesse avuto contatti di effettuare tampone x sicurezza.
Title Review: Intelligent and not at all invasive of privacy. It should be explained why many suspicious refuse to install it: each installation is linked to an anonymous code; With the bluetooth that you use x smartwatches  anonymous codes are exchanged that cross each other and saved on the server. In the event that someone  with an app  is found positive  his code (always anonymously) is used to report to those who in the PREVIOUS days had had contacts to carry out a security swab.
content: Intelligent and not at all invasive of privacy  It should be explained why many suspicious refuse to install it  each installation is linked to an anonymous code  With the bluetooth that you use x smartwatches  anonymous codes are exchanged that cross each other and saved on the server  In the event that someone  with an app  is found positive  his code  always anonymously  is used to report to those who in the PREVIOUS days had had contacts to carry out a security swab

Author: Antonio Conte
Review: Scaricatelo perché è fondamentale se vogliamo fermare la pandemia. Non abbiate nessuna paura per quanto riguarda la privacy, tutte le app che usate quotidianamente hanno un tracciamento dei dati decisamente peggiore. Il software di questa app è addirittura open source, quindi chi se ne intende un minimo può verificare in piena autonomia che questa app non registra alcun spostamento con il GPS, anche se viene chiesta l'autorizzazione all'uso per questioni tecniche.
Title Review: Download it because it is essential if we want to stop the pandemic. Don't be afraid of privacy  all the apps you use on a daily basis have much worse data tracking. The software of this app is even open source  so those who know a minimum of it can independently verify that this app does not record any movement with the GPS  even if authorization for use is requested for technical reasons.
content: Download it because it is essential if we want to stop the pandemic  Don t be afraid of privacy  all the apps you use on a daily basis have much worse data tracking  The software of this app is even open source  so those who know a minimum of it can independently verify that this app does not record any movement with the GPS  even if authorization for use is requested for technical reasons
syn: technic, data, track, privaci, gps, author, record, author

Title Review: The App is well made  privacy is guaranteed (certainly more than our google or facebook accounts) but it requires that geolocation is also active beyond bluetooth  with a considerable waste of battery. Is it the Google API that requires GPS? In this case it is Google that has found a way to know our facts even more.
content: The App is well made  privacy is guaranteed  certainly more than our google or facebook accounts  but it requires that geolocation is also active beyond bluetooth  with a considerable waste of battery  Is it the Google API that requires GPS  In this case it is Google that has found a way to know our facts even more

Author: Emanuele Ranocchio
Review: Quest'app é praticamente quasi inutile. In effetti installare l'app ed eventualmente segnalare una positività sono OPZIONALI. Il risultato é che la probabilità che questa app ti serva veramente sia minore del 5%. Inoltre non ha alcun senso mantenere la privacy quando Google e alcune altre applicazioni sanno sempre dove sono, con chi sono e cosa faccio. Lo scopo di questa app é giusto ma alla fine risulta la solita cosa fatta a metà dallo stato
Title Review: This app is practically almost useless. In fact  installing the app and possibly reporting a positivity are OPTIONAL. The result is that the probability that this app will really serve you is less than 5%. It also makes no sense to maintain privacy when Google and some other applications always know where I am  who I am with and what I do. The purpose of this app is right but in the end it turns out to be the usual half-done thing by the state
content: This app is practically almost useless  In fact  installing the app and possibly reporting a positivity are OPTIONAL  The result is that the probability that this app will really serve you is less than     It also makes no sense to maintain privacy when Google and some other applications always know where I am  who I am with and what I do  The purpose of this app is right but in the end it turns out to be the usual half done thing by the state

Author: Giuseppe Rizzo
Review: Finché rimane "facoltativo" il dovere di comunicare all'app la positività, serve a poco. Rispettare il diritto alla salute (mia e altrui) è prioritario rispetto alla "facoltà". Perché possa sentire tutelata la mia salute, la segnalazione di eventuale positività (con tutto il rispetto di chi ha passato questa pena) deve essere effettuata d'ufficio dalle ASL. Se ho inteso male la policy di quest'app, illuminatemi
Title Review: As long as the duty to communicate positivity to the app remains "optional"  it is of little use. Respecting the right to health (mine and others) is a priority over the "faculty". In order for my health to be protected  the reporting of any positivity (with all due respect to those who have passed this sentence) must be made ex officio by the ASL. If I misunderstood the policy of this app  enlighten me
content: As long as the duty to communicate positivity to the app remains  optional   it is of little use  Respecting the right to health  mine and others  is a priority over the  faculty   In order for my health to be protected  the reporting of any positivity  with all due respect to those who have passed this sentence  must be made ex officio by the ASL  If I misunderstood the policy of this app  enlighten me

Author: Marco Caragnano
Review: App semplice nell'utilizzo, oltre che indispensabile per il tracciamento di eventuali casi. I nostri dati sono già nelle mani di tutte le altre applicazioni che abbiamo usato, che useremo e che continueremo a usare a prescindere da Immuni. Per favore, scaricate l'app e non mandiamo all'aria tre mesi di chiusura totale.
Title Review: Simple app to use  as well as essential for tracking any cases. Our data is already in the hands of all the other applications we have used  will use and will continue to use regardless of Immuni. Please download the app and we don't screw up three months of total closure.
content: Simple app to use  as well as essential for tracking any cases  Our data is already in the hands of all the other applications we have used  will use and will continue to use regardless of Immuni  Please download the app and we don t screw up three months of total closure

Title Review: Privacy protection  app stability and practically zero battery consumption. In practice no cost to defend ourselves from Sars-CoV-2. I hope that the app will be installed by as many Italians as possible  so as to always be ready to face the threat of Covid-19 by mapping the opportunities for contact at risk of contagion.
content: Privacy protection  app stability and practically zero battery consumption  In practice no cost to defend ourselves from Sars CoV    I hope that the app will be installed by as many Italians as possible  so as to always be ready to face the threat of Covid    by mapping the opportunities for contact at risk of contagion

Author: Giuseppe T
Review: App molto semplice ed untuitiva, per niente invasiva. Essendo l'installazione, ma anche l'utilizzo, su base volontaria sta al buon senso delle persone farne buon uso. Infatti è possibile disattivare il servizio quando si vuole. È possibile ignorare gli avvisi di avvenuta esposizione. In caso di contagio, è possibile non comunicare all'operatore sanitario che si utilizza l'app.
Title Review: Very simple and untuitive app  not invasive at all. Being the installation  but also the use  on a voluntary basis it is up to the common sense of people to make good use of it. In fact  you can deactivate the service whenever you want. Exposure warnings can be ignored. In case of contagion  it is possible not to communicate to the healthcare professional that you are using the app.
content: Very simple and untuitive app  not invasive at all  Being the installation  but also the use  on a voluntary basis it is up to the common sense of people to make good use of it  In fact  you can deactivate the service whenever you want  Exposure warnings can be ignored  In case of contagion  it is possible not to communicate to the healthcare professional that you are using the app

Author: Olaf Jorin
Review: Installato il 4/7 funzionante. Il 5/7 già dice che devo riprovare più tardi perché dà errore 39501 (Google Play è aggiornato ma non può abilitare le notifiche di esposizione, riprovare più tardi). In sole 24 ore si è disabilitato da solo con GPS e Bluetooth attivi (7 ore dall'ultimo stato attivo). 06/07:dopo vari tentativi personali, forse ho risolto.Perché Immuni funzioni ancora dopo le prime 24h controllate se è attivo gps di: tel. , Google Services E Huawei Services. Supporto: inesistente.

The 5/7 already says I have to try again later because it gives error 39501 (Google Play is up to date but can't enable exposure notifications  try again later). In just 24 hours it disabled itself with GPS and Bluetooth active (7 hours from the last active state). 06/07: after various personal attempts  perhaps I have solved it. Because Immuni still works after the first 24 hours  check if gps is active: tel.   Google Services And Huawei Services. Support: nonexistent.

I don't have to be the one to enter my positivity  but it must happen automatically once the swab is done.

Author: Sara Sally
Review: Consiglio a tutti di leggere la sezione FAQ che chiarisce molti aspetti su cui ora circola una generale disinformazione oltre a molte fantasiose teorie! L'unico difetto dell'app è la necessità di attivare anche il GPS (oltre al Bluetooth) sui dispositivi Android e questo consuma più batteria. (Immuni non geolocalizza, ma Google sì se siete preoccupati per la privacy)
Title Review: I recommend everyone to read the FAQ section which clarifies many aspects about which a general misinformation is now circulating as well as many imaginative theories! The only flaw of the app is the need to also activate GPS (in addition to Bluetooth) on Android devices and this consumes more battery. (Immuni doesn't geolocate  but Google does if you're concerned about privacy)
content: I recommend everyone to read the FAQ section which clarifies many aspects about which a general misinformation is now circulating as well as many imaginative theories  The only flaw of the app is the need to also activate GPS  in addition to Bluetooth  on Android devices and this consumes more battery   Immuni doesn t geolocate  but Google does if you re concerned about privacy
syn: concern, privaci, gps, clarifi, section, circul

Title Review: App for monitoring possible infections. It is a must to install it and activate it in the world that the contagion can be stopped if you have come into contact with the virus. For all those who have privacy concerns  this app is much more respectful of your privacy than all the social networking apps and games that you have installed on your mobile and whose conditions you have accepted without reading.

Author: Alessio Montagner
Review: "pensavo fosse una applicazione che permette di individuare quelli che hanno contratto il virus e non lo sanno" E come farebbe, scusa? Che senso avrebbe fare i tamponi se basta una app? All'interno dell'app è spiegato il funzionamento. Se uno risulta positivo, lo segnala, e le persone che sono state per un tempo sufficientemente lungo a contatto ricevono questa segnalazione. Non si segnalano persone che sono state positive in passato, che non avrebbe senso. Comunque, dovrebbe essere obbligatoria
Title Review: "I thought it was an application that allows you to identify those who have contracted the virus and don't know it" And how would you do it  sorry? What is the point of swabbing if an app is enough? Inside the app the operation is explained. If one is positive  it reports it  and people who have been in contact for a long enough time receive this report. There are no reports of people who have been positive in the past  which would not make sense. However  it should be mandatory
content: I thought it was an application that allows you to identify those who have contracted the virus and don t know it  And how would you do it  sorry  What is the point of swabbing if an app is enough  Inside the app the operation is explained  If one is positive  it reports it  and people who have been in contact for a long enough time receive this report  There are no reports of people who have been positive in the past  which would not make sense  However  it should be mandatory

Author: Francesca Libanori
Review: Finalmente anche io ho potuto attivare le notifiche ed iniziare ad usare la app. La app non usa la posizione del GPS (è richiesto che sia attivo dal. Bluetooth, non dalla app). Ho cambiato le impostazioni della app, per evitare che venga chiusa dal sistema per risparmiare batteria. Vedrò in questi giorni il livello dei consumi. Per il resto, fa quello che promette, e non richiede autorizzazioni inutili.
Title Review: Finally  I too was able to activate notifications and start using the app. The app does not use the GPS position (it needs to be active from the. Bluetooth  not the app). I changed the settings of the app  to prevent it from being closed by the system to save battery. I will see in these days the level of consumption. For the rest  it does what it promises  and doesn't ask for unnecessary permissions.
content: Finally  I too was able to activate notifications and start using the app  The app does not use the GPS position  it needs to be active from the  Bluetooth  not the app   I changed the settings of the app  to prevent it from being closed by the system to save battery  I will see in these days the level of consumption  For the rest  it does what it promises  and doesn t ask for unnecessary permissions

Author: Andrea Ambrosi
Review: Bella l'interfaccia, semplice e funzionale. Dovremmo installarla tutti per prevenire il ritorno della pandemia. Per quanto riguarda la privacy il GPS serve per avere più precisione sul bluetooth, non si viene tracciati da immuni! In caso sono altre app (facebook/Google maps/whatsapp...) che accedono alla nostra posizione per tracciare i nostri spostamenti, controllate i permessi delle app nelle impostazioni per capire quali applicazioni utilizzano la posizione e disattivate se è un problema.
Title Review: Beautiful interface  simple and functional. We should all install it to prevent the pandemic from returning. As for privacy  the GPS is used to have more precision on the bluetooth  you are not tracked by immune! In case there are other apps (facebook / Google maps / whatsapp ...) that access our position to track our movements  check the app permissions in the settings to understand which applications use the position and deactivate if it is a problem.
content: Beautiful interface  simple and functional  We should all install it to prevent the pandemic from returning  As for privacy  the GPS is used to have more precision on the bluetooth  you are not tracked by immune  In case there are other apps  facebook   Google maps   whatsapp      that access our position to track our movements  check the app permissions in the settings to understand which applications use the position and deactivate if it is a problem

Author: Emiliano Giuseppe Pratici
Review: Perdonate ma state denotando un'incompetenza deleteria. Vi chiedo se è possibile che l'app non funzioni su modelli dodgee riproponendo l'errore 39507 già riscontrato su huawei (ovvero la maggior parte dei telefoni posseduti di fascia medio bassa). Ho comprato questo modello per mio padre che a 78 anni vuole seguire i protocolli non sapendo che purtroppo nella vita si deve cozzare contro l'incompetenza altrui. 1 stella. Imparate a lavorare quando si tratta di salute pubblica. Imparate a testare un'applicazione, dopo che Google e IOS vi hanno fornito le linee guida, prima di fare queste figure. Domandatevi infine perché l'integrazione di Google Maps funziona senza problemi e questa cosa, che molti chiamano applicazione salvavita, da errori su errori. Ovviamente ho espresso solo il mio pensiero.
Title Review: Forgive but you are denoting a deleterious incompetence. I ask you if it is possible that the app does not work on dodgee models reproposing the error 39507 already encountered on huawei (ie most of the phones owned in the medium-low range). I bought this model for my father who at 78 wants to follow the protocols not knowing that unfortunately in life you have to clash with the incompetence of others. 1 star. Learn to work when it comes to public health. Learn to test an application  after Google and IOS have provided you with the guidelines  before making these figures. Finally  ask yourself why the integration of Google Maps works without problems and this thing  which many call a lifesaving application  gives error after error. Obviously I only expressed my thoughts.
content: Forgive but you are denoting a deleterious incompetence  I ask you if it is possible that the app does not work on dodgee models reproposing the error       already encountered on huawei  ie most of the phones owned in the medium low range   I bought this model for my father who at    wants to follow the protocols not knowing that unfortunately in life you have to clash with the incompetence of others    star  Learn to work when it comes to public health  Learn to test an application  after Google and IOS have provided you with the guidelines  before making these figures  Finally  ask yourself why the integration of Google Maps works without problems and this thing  which many call a lifesaving application  gives error after error  Obviously I only expressed my thoughts

Author: Talebian
Review: Spiego i permessi per i meno avvezzi: Questi sono i permessi di Immuni: "android.permission.INTERNET" "android.permission.BLUETOOTH" Questo è il permesso che serve per il GPS, senza questo non usi il GPS "android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION" La posizione ha un motivo però, questo è perché android utilizza in questo caso il Bluetooth LE come funzione Nearby Location, quindi serve il permesso localizzazione per l'uso in background. Questo dalla documentazione ufficiale di Android.
Title Review: I explain the permissions for the less accustomed: These are the permissions of Immuni: "android.permission.INTERNET" "android.permission.BLUETOOTH" This is the permission you need for the GPS  without this you don't use the GPS "android.permission. ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION "The location has a reason though  this is because android uses Bluetooth LE as the Nearby Location feature in this case  so it needs the location permission for background use. This from the official Android documentation.
content: I explain the permissions for the less accustomed  These are the permissions of Immuni   android permission INTERNET   android permission BLUETOOTH  This is the permission you need for the GPS  without this you don t use the GPS  android permission  ACCESS FINE LOCATION  The location has a reason though  this is because android uses Bluetooth LE as the Nearby Location feature in this case  so it needs the location permission for background use  This from the official Android documentation

Author: Tonino Galia
Review: Zero problemi, installata e configurata in meno di due minuti. Vedo purtroppo che molti, nonostante l'abbiano scaricata, continuano a non capire nulla. Ma le leggete le (chiarissime) indicazioni? Il gps non serve a nulla, può stare disattivato. Serve solo il bluetooth, tralaltro quando uscite di casa. A casa vostra potete tenerlo tranquillamente spento, non correte il rischio di essere contagiati. Bah....
Title Review: Zero hassle  installed and configured in less than two minutes. Unfortunately I see that many  despite having downloaded it  continue to understand nothing. But do you read the (very clear) indications? The GPS is useless  it can be deactivated. All you need is bluetooth  by the way when you leave the house. At home you can safely keep it off  you do not run the risk of being infected. Bah....
content: Zero hassle  installed and configured in less than two minutes  Unfortunately I see that many  despite having downloaded it  continue to understand nothing  But do you read the  very clear  indications  The GPS is useless  it can be deactivated  All you need is bluetooth  by the way when you leave the house  At home you can safely keep it off  you do not run the risk of being infected  Bah

Author: Alessandro Zanetti
Review: Credo sia un'ottima iniziativa e un ottimo modo per monitorare i contagi. Per rispondere a coloro che criticano l'app quando vanno a disattivare il GPS, GPS serve al bluetooth per migliorare notevolmente la precisione per l'identificazione di altri dispositivi nelle vicinanze(Basta andare nella sezione del GPS nelle impostazioni). Immuni, chiaramente, richiede un'alta precisione e, di conseguenza, il bluetooth deve avere accesso al gps per monitorare meglio la vicinanza dei dispositivi.
Title Review: I think it's an excellent initiative and a great way to monitor infections. To respond to those who criticize the app when they turn off the GPS  GPS is used by bluetooth to greatly improve the accuracy for identifying other devices nearby (Just go to the GPS section in the settings). Immuni  of course  requires high precision and  consequently  bluetooth must have access to the GPS to better monitor the proximity of the devices.
content: I think it s an excellent initiative and a great way to monitor infections  To respond to those who criticize the app when they turn off the GPS  GPS is used by bluetooth to greatly improve the accuracy for identifying other devices nearby  Just go to the GPS section in the settings   Immuni  of course  requires high precision and  consequently  bluetooth must have access to the GPS to better monitor the proximity of the devices

Author: Piero Puntarello
Review: L'applicazione funziona perfettamente. Non è vero che consuma molta batteria. È una app del ministero che tutti dovremmo usare. Non nasconde nulla (i sorgenti sono disponibili) e non capisco le preoccupazioni di certe persone che si creano problemi sulla privacy che non la installano quando poi hanno sui loro cellulari immondizie di social app. Infine, lamentarsi che non è compatibile con android 5 o inferiori è veramente assurdo nel 2020! È che proprio ci dobbiamo lamentare sempre!
Title Review: The application works perfectly. It is not true that it consumes a lot of battery. It is a ministry app that we should all use. It does not hide anything (the sources are available) and I do not understand the concerns of some people who create privacy problems who do not install it when they then have garbage from social apps on their mobile phones. Finally  complaining that it is not compatible with android 5 or lower is truly absurd in 2020! We just have to complain all the time!
content: The application works perfectly  It is not true that it consumes a lot of battery  It is a ministry app that we should all use  It does not hide anything  the sources are available  and I do not understand the concerns of some people who create privacy problems who do not install it when they then have garbage from social apps on their mobile phones  Finally  complaining that it is not compatible with android   or lower is truly absurd in       We just have to complain all the time

Author: emaildiservizio emaildiservizio
Review: Io non istallo questa m....a! È pericolosissima per la sicurezza e la privacy delle informazioni contenute negli smartphone. Dovendo poi tenere accesa la connessione bt per dialogare con i telefoni circostanti, permette a qualunque hacker di "sniffare" i dati sensibili. Evitate !
Title Review: I don't install this m .... a! It is extremely dangerous for the security and privacy of the information contained in smartphones. Having to keep the BT connection on to communicate with the surrounding phones  it allows any hacker to "sniff" sensitive data. Avoid!

Author: Behaviour Lycan
Review: Installata molto velocemente, basta soffermarsi sulla lettura dei termini e su "come funziona" per accorgersi che il GPS non viene usato. Oltretutto utilizza dei canali si comunicazione e scambio codici a bassissimo consumo, per cui la batteria mantiene la durata abituale. La trovo indispensabile per il contenimento dei contagi e auspico che molti decidano di installarla.
Title Review: Installed very quickly  just pause on reading the terms and "how it works" to realize that the GPS is not used. Moreover  it uses very low consumption communication and code exchange channels  so the battery maintains its usual duration. I find it essential for the containment of infections and I hope that many decide to install it.
content: Installed very quickly  just pause on reading the terms and  how it works  to realize that the GPS is not used  Moreover  it uses very low consumption communication and code exchange channels  so the battery maintains its usual duration  I find it essential for the containment of infections and I hope that many decide to install it

Author: Anastasia Amatruda
Review: L' app sembra precisa e intuitiva ma l'unica pecca è la sua inutilità. Sono poche le persone che la usano e che sanno a cosa serve. Probabilmente per avere una giusta funzionalità e sicurezza sarebbe quello di far sì che ogni cittadino la usi e la tenga attiva ma così come stanno andando le cose questa app resta ancora un punto interrogativo per quando la intelleró e userò di nuovo.
Title Review: The app seems precise and intuitive but the only flaw is its uselessness. There are few people who use it and who know what it is for. Probably to have the right functionality and security it would be to make every citizen use it and keep it active but as things are going this app still remains a question mark for when I will understand and use it again.
content: The app seems precise and intuitive but the only flaw is its uselessness  There are few people who use it and who know what it is for  Probably to have the right functionality and security it would be to make every citizen use it and keep it active but as things are going this app still remains a question mark for when I will understand and use it again

Author: Vincenzo Aiello
Review: Secondo me, visto che non è obbligatoria per tutti non serve assolutamente a niente e a nessuno. Mettiamo il caso che io sappia di essere positivo asintomatico e non voglio restare in quarantena, preferisco continuare ad andare in giro, cosa faccio? Per paura di essere comunque individuato non installo l'App o comunque non inserisco la mia positività nell'App. Succederà che anche stando molto attento potrà capitare di contagiare qualcuno e quel qualcuno non saprà mai che è stato contagiato
Title Review: In my opinion  since it is not mandatory for everyone  it is of no use to anyone or anything. Let's say I know I'm positive asymptomatic and I don't want to stay in quarantine  I prefer to keep walking around  what do I do? For fear of being identified  I do not install the App or in any case I do not enter my positivity in the App. It will happen that even if you are very careful it may happen to infect someone and that someone will never know that it has been infected
content: In my opinion  since it is not mandatory for everyone  it is of no use to anyone or anything  Let s say I know I m positive asymptomatic and I don t want to stay in quarantine  I prefer to keep walking around  what do I do  For fear of being identified  I do not install the App or in any case I do not enter my positivity in the App  It will happen that even if you are very careful it may happen to infect someone and that someone will never know that it has been infected

Author: Alessia Notarantonio
Review: Funziona perfettamente con il bluetooth attivato, senza dispendio di batteria a differenza di quel che lamenta qualcuno visto che il tracciamento di prossimità di Immuni si basa su bluetooth low energy. Ovviamente se il bluetooth è disattivato l'app sospende il tracciamento. E per chi crede che con questa app sia violata la privacy pensi a tutte le volte che accetta i cookies per navigare sul web, o utilizza i social più comuni...
Title Review: It works perfectly with bluetooth activated  without wasting battery unlike what some people complain about since Immuni's proximity tracking is based on bluetooth low energy. Obviously if the bluetooth is deactivated the app suspends the tracking. And for those who believe that privacy is violated with this app  think about all the times they accept cookies to browse the web  or use the most common social networks ...
content: It works perfectly with bluetooth activated  without wasting battery unlike what some people complain about since Immuni s proximity tracking is based on bluetooth low energy  Obviously if the bluetooth is deactivated the app suspends the tracking  And for those who believe that privacy is violated with this app  think about all the times they accept cookies to browse the web  or use the most common social networks

Author: Luca Giuffrida
Review: Semplice ed intuitiva,ma perché funzioni dobbiamo essere in tanti!! certo ha bisogno del gps e del BT sempre attivo, ciò a discapito della batteria, ma facendo qualche sacrificio ed attenzione a munirsi di un powerbank, il problema è risolto! Ho sentito che ci sono utenti contrari ad installarla per motivi di privacy...bhe' a mio avviso Il solo possedere uno smartphone con Android o ios e batteria saldata o essere iscritti ad un qualsiasi social network, aimé, pone fine alla privacy... Imho..
Title Review: Simple and intuitive  but for it to work we have to be many !! of course it needs the gps and the BT always active  this at the expense of the battery  but by making some sacrifices and attention to get a powerbank  the problem is solved! I heard that there are users opposed to installing it for privacy reasons ... well in my opinion Just owning a smartphone with Android or ios and a soldered battery or being subscribed to any social network  alas  puts an end to privacy .. . Imho ..
content: Simple and intuitive  but for it to work we have to be many    of course it needs the gps and the BT always active  this at the expense of the battery  but by making some sacrifices and attention to get a powerbank  the problem is solved  I heard that there are users opposed to installing it for privacy reasons     well in my opinion Just owning a smartphone with Android or ios and a soldered battery or being subscribed to any social network  alas  puts an end to privacy      Imho

If you want to communicate that you have the coronavirus it is better to go to a hospital to a doctor rather than rely on the internet. Poor Italy

Author: Angelo Antona
Review: Avete Facebook, Instagram, i servizi Google inclusi nello smartphone che vi ciucciano dati ogni giorno, per cui la vostra idea di privacy è un'illusione, per averla dovreste usare un sasso al posto dello smartphone. IMMUNI sarebbe l'app più sicura e meno invadente che avreste sullo smartphone. Inoltre il tutore dei minimi ed anonimi dati raccolti è il vostro Stato invece che un ente privato che può avere interessi secondari, gli unici a giovare della diffusione di IMMUNI sono gli Italiani.
Title Review: You have Facebook  Instagram  Google services included in your smartphone that suck data from you every day  so your idea of ​​privacy is an illusion  to get it you should use a stone instead of a smartphone. IMMUNI would be the safest and least intrusive app you would have on your smartphone. Furthermore  the guardian of the minimal and anonymous data collected is your State instead of a private entity that may have secondary interests  the only ones to benefit from the diffusion of IMMUNI are the Italians.
content: You have Facebook  Instagram  Google services included in your smartphone that suck data from you every day  so your idea of   privacy is an illusion  to get it you should use a stone instead of a smartphone  IMMUNI would be the safest and least intrusive app you would have on your smartphone  Furthermore  the guardian of the minimal and anonymous data collected is your State instead of a private entity that may have secondary interests  the only ones to benefit from the diffusion of IMMUNI are the Italians

L'unico problema è che se le persone non lo scaricano, per paranoie varie sulla violazione della privacy, l'applicazione diventa totalmente inutile!!!

Title Review: Useless app.We should all have smartphones in our pockets with geolocation always active and bluetooth always on ... Maybe some people do it but think of the elderly and you are young. It will be a sensational flop paid by the Italians for me.

Author: Luca Valvassori
Review: L'app non richiede alcuna autorizzazione, diversamente da quanto scritto in certi commenti. Fa quel che deve. E, di base, se veniste a scoprire di essere stati nelle vicinanze di un infetto COVID, non lo vorreste sapere? Anche e soprattutto per il rispetto delle persone a voi care? Io direi che non c'è neanche da pensarci. L'app inoltre è stata analizzata ed è programmata in maniera semplice, non ci sono violazioni di privacy o funzioni nascoste. Installatela per voi e per chi vi sta vicino.
Title Review: The app does not require any permission  unlike what is written in certain comments. Do what it should. And  basically  if you find out you've been in the vicinity of a COVID infection  wouldn't you want to know? Also and above all for the respect of your loved ones? I would say that there is no need to even think about it. The app has also been analyzed and programmed in a simple way  there are no privacy violations or hidden functions. Install it for yourself and for those around you.
content: The app does not require any permission  unlike what is written in certain comments  Do what it should  And  basically  if you find out you ve been in the vicinity of a COVID infection  wouldn t you want to know  Also and above all for the respect of your loved ones  I would say that there is no need to even think about it  The app has also been analyzed and programmed in a simple way  there are no privacy violations or hidden functions  Install it for yourself and for those around you

Author: Giorgio Caldini

Title Review: Great. Someone wrote that you need to have GPS on but that's not true. The app does not track the location and does not take personal data. It just keeps track of all contacts that occurred between devices. So there is no privacy concern.
content: Great  Someone wrote that you need to have GPS on but that s not true  The app does not track the location and does not take personal data  It just keeps track of all contacts that occurred between devices  So there is no privacy concern

Author: Gia Mma
Review: Quando sono a casa devo chiudere il bluetooth altrimenti non funziona bene il WiFi. L'app si disattiva, riattivando il Bluetooth si riattiva. Peccato che indipendentemente da tutto questo ogni tanto perda completamente la configurazione: la apro per controllare e mi richiede regione e provincia, se anche tutto il tracciamento fatto precedentemente è andato perso, l'app risulta completamente inutile. Inoltre l'APP spesso si rifiuta di aprirsi, fa come un flash bianco e si richiude.
Title Review: When I am at home I have to turn off the bluetooth otherwise the WiFi does not work well. The app is deactivated  reactivating the Bluetooth reactivates. Too bad that regardless of all this every now and then it completely loses the configuration: I open it to check and it asks me for the region and province  even if all the tracking done previously has been lost  the app is completely useless. In addition  the APP often refuses to open  acts as a white flash and closes.
content: When I am at home I have to turn off the bluetooth otherwise the WiFi does not work well  The app is deactivated  reactivating the Bluetooth reactivates  Too bad that regardless of all this every now and then it completely loses the configuration  I open it to check and it asks me for the region and province  even if all the tracking done previously has been lost  the app is completely useless  In addition  the APP often refuses to open  acts as a white flash and closes

Author: Chiara De Marchi
Review: App che tutti i cittadini italiani con smartphone dovrebbero scaricare per la loro salute pubblica, senza timori di veder lesa la loro privacy. È semplice intuitiva e soprattutto preziosa. Viene chiarito qualsiasi dubbio sull'utilizzo nel link sulla privacy, mentre nel menu delle impostazioni compaiono le faq con tutti gli approfondimenti utili. Motivo per installarla sono senso di responsabilità e solidarietà.
Title Review: App that all Italian citizens with smartphones should download for their public health  without fear of their privacy being harmed. It is simple intuitive and above all precious. Any doubts about use are clarified in the privacy link  while the faqs with all the useful insights appear in the settings menu. The reason for installing it is a sense of responsibility and solidarity.
content: App that all Italian citizens with smartphones should download for their public health  without fear of their privacy being harmed  It is simple intuitive and above all precious  Any doubts about use are clarified in the privacy link  while the faqs with all the useful insights appear in the settings menu  The reason for installing it is a sense of responsibility and solidarity

Author: Dr. Phil
Review: Adesso sono stati risolti i problemi di compatibilità con il mio telefono. Finalmente posso usarlo e non si disattiva come molti scrivono. Adesso il servizio con di rilevamento di esposizione in collaborazione con Google funziona e la app può essere finalmente aperta e usata. Fino a pochi giorni fa era impossibile usarla. Adesso nessuno ha più giustificazioni a non usarla. Scaricatela :)
Title Review: The compatibility issues with my phone have now been fixed. I can finally use it and it doesn't turn off like many write. Now the service with exposure detection in collaboration with Google works and the app can finally be opened and used. Until a few days ago it was impossible to use it. Now no one has any more justifications for not using it. Download it :)
content: The compatibility issues with my phone have now been fixed  I can finally use it and it doesn t turn off like many write  Now the service with exposure detection in collaboration with Google works and the app can finally be opened and used  Until a few days ago it was impossible to use it  Now no one has any more justifications for not using it  Download it

Author: Andrea Dolfi
Review: Adesso finalmente funziona. Bene sono felice di poter contribuire. Scaricatela! È importante. Come vedete stanno via via risolvendo i problemi tecnici e aumentando l'universalità su tutti gli apparecchi. Chi come me aveva problemi con Google non ancora pronto con il sensore di esposizione ecco che per lo XIAOMI POCO F1 è stato risolto il problema. Adesso va. Provate con tutti gli XIAOMI che hanno MIUI 11. Vedrete che ora funziona. Buon utilizzo.
Title Review: Now it finally works. Well I'm happy to be able to contribute. Download it! It's important. As you can see  they are gradually solving technical problems and increasing universality on all devices. Who like me had problems with Google not yet ready with the exposure sensor  here is the problem for the XIAOMI POCO F1. Now go. Try all the XIAOMI that have MIUI 11. You will see that it now works. Good use.
content: Now it finally works  Well I m happy to be able to contribute  Download it  It s important  As you can see  they are gradually solving technical problems and increasing universality on all devices  Who like me had problems with Google not yet ready with the exposure sensor  here is the problem for the XIAOMI POCO F   Now go  Try all the XIAOMI that have MIUI     You will see that it now works  Good use

Author: Ilio Viviani
Review: Non do 5 stelle perché sui cellulari più vecchi non è installabile. Per il resto c'è da vedere se funziona. Spero di non trovarmi nella situazione di verificarlo! Piuttosto alla segnalazione di positività, l'ASL competente me lo fa subito il tampone o mi mette in quarantena? Questo aspetto, che non dipende dall'app ma dal SSN, sarebbe importante saperlo! Comunque dovrebbe essere installata da TUTTI perché poi la segnalazione all'ASL è comunque una scelta soggettiva. Ma questo pochi lo capiscono.
Title Review: I do not give 5 stars because it is not installable on older phones. For the rest we have to see if it works. I hope I am not in a position to verify it! Rather on the positive report  the competent ASL swabs me immediately or puts me in quarantine? This aspect  which does not depend on the app but on the SSN  it would be important to know! However it should be installed by EVERYONE because then reporting to the ASL is still a subjective choice. But few understand this.
content: I do not give   stars because it is not installable on older phones  For the rest we have to see if it works  I hope I am not in a position to verify it  Rather on the positive report  the competent ASL swabs me immediately or puts me in quarantine  This aspect  which does not depend on the app but on the SSN  it would be important to know  However it should be installed by EVERYONE because then reporting to the ASL is still a subjective choice  But few understand this

Author: Mauro Cagnin
Review: Pare fatta bene, semplice e con informazioni molto chiare e dettagliate, potrebbe essere utile ma non lo sarà per un semplice motivo: per essere attiva ha bisogno della geolocalizzazione attiva. Non é un problema di privacy, anche se molti non la installeranno pensando a questo, ma vorrei sapere chi sta con il GPS sempre attivo perdendo almeno il 50% della batteria... oppure bisognerebbe ricordarsi sempre di attivarlo quando ti rechi in un luogo pubblico... ma dai non può funzionare...
Title Review: It seems well done  simple and with very clear and detailed information  it could be useful but it will not be for a simple reason: to be active it needs geolocation active. It is not a privacy problem  even if many will not install it with this in mind  but I would like to know who is with the GPS always on and losing at least 50% of the battery ... or you should always remember to activate it when you go to a public place ... but come on  it can't work ...
content: It seems well done  simple and with very clear and detailed information  it could be useful but it will not be for a simple reason  to be active it needs geolocation active  It is not a privacy problem  even if many will not install it with this in mind  but I would like to know who is with the GPS always on and losing at least     of the battery     or you should always remember to activate it when you go to a public place     but come on  it can t work

Author: Daniele Piergiovanni
Review: L'app chiede di attivare la localizzazione gps e dice di dover dare il permesso a Immuni a utilizzarla accedendo alla lista delle autorizzazioni. 1 - la localizzazione è attiva. 2 - l'app non mi chiede autorizzazioni come tutte le altre app, ma mi dice che semplicemente devo andare nella lista delle autorizzazioni... Mi immagino un utente 60enne che per far funzionare una app debba fare tutto questo giro... 3 - vado nella lista delle autorizzazioni... Immuni non c'è. Come lo autorizzo? Non si sa.
Title Review: The app asks to activate GPS tracking and says it needs to give Immuni permission to use it by accessing the permissions list. 1 - the localization is active. 2 - the app doesn't ask me for permissions like all the other apps  but tells me that I simply have to go to the permissions list ... I imagine a 60-year-old user who has to do all this to make an app work ... 3 - I go to the list of authorizations ... Immune is not there. How do I authorize it? It is not known.
content: The app asks to activate GPS tracking and says it needs to give Immuni permission to use it by accessing the permissions list      the localization is active      the app doesn t ask me for permissions like all the other apps  but tells me that I simply have to go to the permissions list     I imagine a    year old user who has to do all this to make an app work         I go to the list of authorizations     Immune is not there  How do I authorize it  It is not known

Non capisco però perché per mantenere attivo il servizio, devo attivare anche la posizione GPS (che consuma molta batteria) quando, è scritto, lo scambio tra smartphone avviene via Bluetooth Low Energy. Qualcuno di Bending Spoons o del Ministero me lo può spiegare? Grazie. Agg. 27.6.2020 BENDING SPOONS PERCHE' NON RISPONDETE? Ho scritto una Pec al Garante della Privacy.
Title Review: The installation on my Samsung S7 Edge went without problems as well as the parameterization  which was very simple. However  I do not understand why to keep the service active  I must also activate the GPS position (which consumes a lot of battery) when  it is written  the exchange between smartphones takes place via Bluetooth Low Energy. Can anyone from Bending Spoons or the Ministry explain it to me? Thank you. Agg. 27.6.2020 BENDING SPOONS WHY DO YOU NOT RESPOND? I wrote a Pec to the Privacy Guarantor.
content: The installation on my Samsung S  Edge went without problems as well as the parameterization  which was very simple  However  I do not understand why to keep the service active  I must also activate the GPS position  which consumes a lot of battery  when  it is written  the exchange between smartphones takes place via Bluetooth Low Energy  Can anyone from Bending Spoons or the Ministry explain it to me  Thank you  Agg            BENDING SPOONS WHY DO YOU NOT RESPOND  I wrote a Pec to the Privacy Guarantor

Title Review: Contemplating Privacy with the usefulness of a personal health app is difficult and requires courageous decisions to achieve the goal. Author: Alessandro Modica
Review: Applicazione realizzata bene, ho consultato i sorgenti e sono riuscito a compilarla e avviarla in debug sul mio cellulare in pochissimo tempo. Indice di grande professionalità. Si appoggia al protocollo di google e apple e gestisce i codici in una base dati (ndr blockchain ?) in modo egregio. L'app non richiede autorizzazioni (ottima cosa) e con il solo bt, potrebbe risultare un efficiente strumento per contenere l'infezione. Confido in un utilizzo dal piu alto numero possibile di cittadini
Title Review: Application done well  I consulted the sources and I was able to compile and debug it on my mobile in no time. Index of great professionalism. It relies on the google and apple protocol and manages the codes in a database (blockchain editor's note?) In an excellent way. The app does not require permissions (excellent thing) and with only the bt  it could be an efficient tool to contain the infection. I trust in use by the highest possible number of citizens
content: Application done well  I consulted the sources and I was able to compile and debug it on my mobile in no time  Index of great professionalism  It relies on the google and apple protocol and manages the codes in a database  blockchain editor s note   In an excellent way  The app does not require permissions  excellent thing  and with only the bt  it could be an efficient tool to contain the infection  I trust in use by the highest possible number of citizens
syn: trust, manag, compil, manag, index, applic

Author: Luca P
Review: Per favore, scaricatela. Serve davvero a tutti e non è da sottovalutare! Non mettiamo la politica in questo contesto: chi si iscrive a Tik Tok e posta filmati ha dato il pieno potere agli sviluppatori e proprietari cinesi!!! Mi piace, intuitiva e ben strutturata. Reputo giusti i tanti limiti imposti dalla legge sulla privacy, ma credo che di fronte ad emergenze di questo tipo si dovrebbe avere un potere assoluto limitato al tempo della pandemia. Complimenti agli sviluppatori.
Title Review: Please download it. It really serves everyone and should not be underestimated! Let's not put politics in this context: whoever signs up with Tik Tok and posts videos has given full power to Chinese developers and owners !!! I like it  intuitive and well structured. I believe that the many limits imposed by the privacy law are right  but I believe that in the face of emergencies of this type  absolute power should be limited to the time of the pandemic. Kudos to the developers.
content: Please download it  It really serves everyone and should not be underestimated  Let s not put politics in this context  whoever signs up with Tik Tok and posts videos has given full power to Chinese developers and owners     I like it  intuitive and well structured  I believe that the many limits imposed by the privacy law are right  but I believe that in the face of emergencies of this type  absolute power should be limited to the time of the pandemic  Kudos to the developers

Author: Jacopo Lattaro
Review: Parto dall'aspetto visivo. Personalmente mi piace veramente tanto lo stile grafico dell'interfaccia che risulta semplice ed intuitiva. L'app pesa poco e sulla carta il suo funzionamento è molto interessante. Peccato che sia poco utilizzata, potrebbe essere un'ottimo strumento non solo relegato al Covid19. Non capisco come mai ci sia questa forte e insensata repulsione per IMMUNI, dopo tutto non costa nulla attivarla quando si è in giro. Pensare che sia inutile la rende effettivamente inutile =)
Title Review: I start from the visual aspect. Personally I really like the graphic style of the interface which is simple and intuitive. The app weighs little and on paper its functioning is very interesting. Too bad it is little used  it could be an excellent tool not only relegated to Covid19. I don't understand why there is this strong and senseless repulsion for IMMUNI  after all it costs nothing to activate it when you are out and about. Thinking it's useless actually makes it useless =)
content: I start from the visual aspect  Personally I really like the graphic style of the interface which is simple and intuitive  The app weighs little and on paper its functioning is very interesting  Too bad it is little used  it could be an excellent tool not only relegated to Covid    I don t understand why there is this strong and senseless repulsion for IMMUNI  after all it costs nothing to activate it when you are out and about  Thinking it s useless actually makes it useless

Author: Alexandar Fusè
Review: Non c'è modo di sapere se il contact tracing funzioni perché non fornisce alcun feedback all'utente. Sarebbe bello poter vedere qualche dato circa le persone incontrate (codice, durata e potenza segnale). Permetterebbe di verificare se il proprio smartphone sta effettivamente registrando i contatti tramite bluetooth.
Title Review: There is no way to know if contact tracing is working because it doesn't provide any feedback to the user. It would be nice to be able to see some data about the people met (code  duration and signal strength). It would allow you to check if your smartphone is actually recording contacts via bluetooth.
content: There is no way to know if contact tracing is working because it doesn t provide any feedback to the user  It would be nice to be able to see some data about the people met  code  duration and signal strength   It would allow you to check if your smartphone is actually recording contacts via bluetooth

Author: Ermanno Miranda
Review: Assolutamente impossibile capire come funziona e che cosa accadrà se mi capitasse di incrociare una persona infettiva. Ridicola la tutela della privacy, visto che il mio cellulare registra tutti i passi che faccio, tutti i luoghi che visito (e quelli a cui passo vicino) e tutti i respiri da quando lo accendo al mattino fino a sera. Incomprensibile la non obbligatorietà dell'installazione. Se serve,deve essere obbligatoria come la segregazione in casa che abbiamo avuto. La Meloni già la boicotta.
Title Review: It is absolutely impossible to understand how it works and what will happen if I happen to come across an infectious person. The protection of privacy is ridiculous  since my cell phone records all the steps I take  all the places I visit (and those I pass by) and all the breaths from when I turn it on in the morning until the evening. The non-compulsory installation is incomprehensible. If necessary  it must be mandatory like the segregation in the house we have had. The Meloni already boycott.
content: It is absolutely impossible to understand how it works and what will happen if I happen to come across an infectious person  The protection of privacy is ridiculous  since my cell phone records all the steps I take  all the places I visit  and those I pass by  and all the breaths from when I turn it on in the morning until the evening  The non compulsory installation is incomprehensible  If necessary  it must be mandatory like the segregation in the house we have had  The Meloni already boycott

Author: Freljord
Review: Ho visto un sacco di recensioni ad 1 stella con discorsi insensati, fatte principalmente da boomer di età superiore ai 50 anni. Ricordatevi che questo virus uccide con maggiore probabilità persone anziane e quest'app è fatta per cercare di limitare i contagi. Inoltre consiglio di informarvi seriamente tramite più fonti riguardo ai dati che tanto avete paura vi vengano tracciati da quest'applicazione, prima di lasciare una recensione negativa. Io ancora non gli ho trovato lati negativi.
Title Review: I've seen a lot of 1-star reviews with nonsense talk  mostly made by boomers over the age of 50. Remember that this virus is more likely to kill elderly people and this app is made to try to limit infections. I also recommend that you get serious information through multiple sources about the data that you are so afraid of being tracked by this application  before leaving a negative review. I still haven't found negative sides.
content: I ve seen a lot of   star reviews with nonsense talk  mostly made by boomers over the age of     Remember that this virus is more likely to kill elderly people and this app is made to try to limit infections  I also recommend that you get serious information through multiple sources about the data that you are so afraid of being tracked by this application  before leaving a negative review  I still haven t found negative sides
syn: elder, age, data, track, elder, boomer, applic

Author: Denis Calchera
Review: App fatta molto bene, semplice, si installa e poi praticamente si dimentica. Per chi come me ha comunque il BT sempre attivo, il consumo energetico di Immuni è assolutamente trascurabile. Dispone di una esaustiva faq per chi vuole saperne di più su come funziona e qual è il suo scopo. Al singolo attualmente forse serve a poco o nulla, ma installarla non costa nulla e contribuisce ad aumentare l'efficacia del sistema.
Title Review: App done very well  simple  you install and then practically forget. For those like me who still have the BT always active  the energy consumption of Immuni is absolutely negligible. It has an exhaustive faq for those who want to know more about how it works and what its purpose is. Currently  the individual is of little or no use  but installing it costs nothing and contributes to increasing the effectiveness of the system.
content: App done very well  simple  you install and then practically forget  For those like me who still have the BT always active  the energy consumption of Immuni is absolutely negligible  It has an exhaustive faq for those who want to know more about how it works and what its purpose is  Currently  the individual is of little or no use  but installing it costs nothing and contributes to increasing the effectiveness of the system

Author: Henry Lord
Review: L' idea sembra buona ma inutile se non la utilizzano tutti. Per cui penso di disinstallare l' applicazione a breve dopo averla provata. Sono in contatto con tante persone nel quotidiano, nel metrò e in luoghi chiusi. O sono tutti sani o nessuno ha scaricato l'applicazione. Spero siano tutti sani, come me, ma non mi fido. O si rende l'applicazione obbligatoria o non serve a niente.
Title Review: The idea seems good but useless if not everyone uses it. So I plan to uninstall the application shortly after trying it. I am in contact with many people in everyday life  in the subway and in closed places. Either they are all healthy or no one has downloaded the application. I hope they are all healthy  like me  but I don't trust them. Either the application is made mandatory or it is useless.
content: The idea seems good but useless if not everyone uses it  So I plan to uninstall the application shortly after trying it  I am in contact with many people in everyday life  in the subway and in closed places  Either they are all healthy or no one has downloaded the application  I hope they are all healthy  like me  but I don t trust them  Either the application is made mandatory or it is useless

Title Review: Two stars but not to the app and its functionality. The criticism goes to those who fail to explain what happens in the event of a positive contact: Is the quarantine imposed? Is a tampon made? Is a serological examination done? What are the operating times of the health facilities? Answer these questions and you will have a higher rating.
content: Two stars but not to the app and its functionality  The criticism goes to those who fail to explain what happens in the event of a positive contact  Is the quarantine imposed  Is a tampon made  Is a serological examination done  What are the operating times of the health facilities  Answer these questions and you will have a higher rating

Author: Luigi Cortese
Review: È molto utile per tracciare i casi e prevenire l'eccessiva diffusione del virus, ma i limiti principali sono che: 1. Sei tu a dover avvisare l'applicazione di essere positivo (e cosi il tuo "telefono"). 2. Chi non è stato ancora esposto al virus ha lo stesso rischio di esposizione entro i 7 - 14 gg di incubazione del virus in un soggetto precedentemente esposto. 3. chi risulta positivo è automaticamente messo in quarantena. Quindi, l'app è utile, ma solo a limitare l'eccessiva diffusione
Title Review: It is very useful for tracking cases and preventing excessive spread of the virus  but the main limitations are that: 1. You have to warn the application to be positive (and so is your "phone"). 2. Who has not yet been exposed to the virus has the same risk of exposure within 7 - 14 days of incubation of the virus in a subject previously exposed. 3. those who test positive are automatically quarantined. Hence  the app is useful  but only to limit the excessive spread
content: It is very useful for tracking cases and preventing excessive spread of the virus  but the main limitations are that     You have to warn the application to be positive  and so is your  phone       Who has not yet been exposed to the virus has the same risk of exposure within        days of incubation of the virus in a subject previously exposed     those who test positive are automatically quarantined  Hence  the app is useful  but only to limit the excessive spread

Title Review: Unfortunately it requires the GPS always active because otherwise my phone cannot take advantage of the geolocation. I wanted to use it but if I leave the GPS on all the time the battery dies every 2 hours.
content: Unfortunately it requires the GPS always active because otherwise my phone cannot take advantage of the geolocation  I wanted to use it but if I leave the GPS on all the time the battery dies every   hours

Poi il virus si sa che: 1)è una balla. 2) colpisce gli anziani (sempre che sia contagioso sul serio)..e gli anziani non usano 'app'!! Per favore levatela... grazie per la comprensione! (o prenderò seri provvedimenti)
Title Review: STOP publishing fraudulent apps to take the data of the poor people who install it !!! It works just as badly as all apps like that .. then if you don't want to be left on foot practically no one leaves Bluetooth and GPS on except specifically to drain the battery. Then the virus is known that: 1) it is a lie. 2) it affects the elderly (as long as it is seriously contagious) .. and the elderly do not use 'apps' !! Please take it off ... thanks for understanding! (or I'll take serious action)

Author: Κiefao
Review: 5 stelle all'applicazione, 1 stella agli italiani. L'applicazione è stata approvata dalla Comunità Europea, non richiede l'inserimento di alcun dato ed è interamente ANONIMA, non dovrebbero esserci paranoie. Poi l'applicazione richiede l'accesso alla posizione, ovviamente, cosa vi aspettavate, che riuscisse con qualche marchingegno magico a dedurre la posizione del telefono senza GPS? A mio parere è una bell'idea, ma più persone devono scaricarla assolutamente, altrimenti non servirà mai a nulla
Title Review: 5 stars to the application  1 star to the Italians. The application has been approved by the European Community  does not require the entry of any data and is entirely ANONYMOUS  there should be no paranoia. Then the application requests access to the location  obviously  what did you expect  that it could with some magical device to deduce the position of the phone without GPS? In my opinion it's a great idea  but more people have to download it absolutely  otherwise it will never help
content: stars to the application    star to the Italians  The application has been approved by the European Community  does not require the entry of any data and is entirely ANONYMOUS  there should be no paranoia  Then the application requests access to the location  obviously  what did you expect  that it could with some magical device to deduce the position of the phone without GPS  In my opinion it s a great idea  but more people have to download it absolutely  otherwise it will never help

Author: Commare Lorre
Review: Mi aspettavo un'altra cacata stile il sito dell'INPS invece è un capolavoro dell'informatica italiana. Sono un programmatore ed è stato un piacere studiare questo codice su gitHub. Suggerisco ai colleghi di fare altrettanto, l'app è perfino a prova di hacker. Ad esempio, dato che solo i positivi possono inviare dati al server, un malintenzionato potrebbe solo rilevare se avviene o meno un flusso di dati per scovare i positivi, quindi l'app fa inviare ai negativi dei dati randomici e insensati.
Title Review: I was expecting another style shit  the INPS site instead is a masterpiece of Italian IT. I am a programmer and it was a pleasure to study this code on gitHub. I suggest colleagues to do the same  the app is even hacker proof. For example  since only positives can send data to the server  an attacker could only detect whether or not there is a flow of data to find the positives  so the app has the negatives send random and senseless data.
content: I was expecting another style shit  the INPS site instead is a masterpiece of Italian IT  I am a programmer and it was a pleasure to study this code on gitHub  I suggest colleagues to do the same  the app is even hacker proof  For example  since only positives can send data to the server  an attacker could only detect whether or not there is a flow of data to find the positives  so the app has the negatives send random and senseless data

Author: Federica Chiarucci
Review: Al contrario di quanto sostiene l'app, DEVI AVERE LA LOCALIZZAZIONE ATTIVA OLTRE IL BLUETOOTH. Con il solo Bluetooth dice "Servizio non attivo". Il danno oltre la beffa è che, con la localizzazione attiva, le altre applicazioni possono acquisire la tua posizione - Immuni no. Sono delusa per la contraddittorietà con cui spiegano il corretto funzionamento dell'app. Spero che tolgano l'uso obbligatorio del GPS, anche per la carità della batteria del mio cellulare.
Title Review: Contrary to what the app claims  you MUST HAVE ACTIVE LOCATION BEYOND BLUETOOTH. With only Bluetooth it says "Service not active". The damage beyond insult is that  with localization on  other applications can acquire your location - Immune no. I am disappointed at the contradiction with which they explain the correct functioning of the app. I hope they take away the mandatory use of GPS  also for the charity of my cell phone battery.
content: Contrary to what the app claims  you MUST HAVE ACTIVE LOCATION BEYOND BLUETOOTH  With only Bluetooth it says  Service not active   The damage beyond insult is that  with localization on  other applications can acquire your location   Immune no  I am disappointed at the contradiction with which they explain the correct functioning of the app  I hope they take away the mandatory use of GPS  also for the charity of my cell phone battery

Author: Silvana Bravi
Review: Vorrei capire come si può essere sicuri con questa app. Se una persona è asintomatica e non sa di essere contagiosa e nei giorni a seguire non ha manifestazioni da dover fare il test, però ha installato come me immuni, questa app non sarà in grado di avvisarmi e io magari potrei correre ugualmente il rischio di essere contagiata. Quindi o si fa un test di gregge(tutti) e si registra su immuni il risultato se positivo, sennò non ha nessun senso. Posso sempre e cque contaggiarmi con asintomatici.
Title Review: I would like to understand how you can be safe with this app. If a person is asymptomatic and does not know that he is contagious and in the following days he has no manifestations to be tested  but he has installed immune like me  this app will not be able to warn me and maybe I could still run the risk of being infected. So either you do a herd test (all) and the result is recorded on immune if positive  otherwise it makes no sense. I can always and cque contagiarmi with asymptomatic.
content: I would like to understand how you can be safe with this app  If a person is asymptomatic and does not know that he is contagious and in the following days he has no manifestations to be tested  but he has installed immune like me  this app will not be able to warn me and maybe I could still run the risk of being infected  So either you do a herd test  all  and the result is recorded on immune if positive  otherwise it makes no sense  I can always and cque contagiarmi with asymptomatic

Author: David Gruber
Review: Die App ist datenschutztechnisch sicher. Wer nach wie vor Bedenken bzgl. der Aktivierung der Ortungsdienste hat: seit Android 6 muss jede App, die Zugang zu Bluetooth haben möchte, um Zugriff auf die Ortungsdienste anfragen, weil sich Bluetooth im selben Perimeter wie GPS befindet. Im Quellcode ist ersichtlich, dass keine GPS Datenpunkte geteilt werden.
Title Review: The app is secure in terms of data protection. If you still have concerns about the activation of the location services: since Android 6  every app that wants access to Bluetooth has to request access to the location services  because Bluetooth is in the same perimeter as GPS. The source code shows that no GPS data points are shared.
content: The app is secure in terms of data protection  If you still have concerns about the activation of the location services  since Android    every app that wants access to Bluetooth has to request access to the location services  because Bluetooth is in the same perimeter as GPS  The source code shows that no GPS data points are shared

Author: Claudio Zito
Review: Scarsa chiarezza.Per la privacy basta la sezione informativa, è inutile ripetere le stesse cose in un sacco di voci del menu togliendo spazio a info più pratiche. Servono più esempi concreti, non sommersi in info non utili per la massa degli utenti. Sarebbe utile la conferma che il bluetooth è attivo o istruzioni per attivarlo coi vari sistemi operativi. Fondamentale indicare chi è l'operatore sanitario che deve segnalare la positività (chi ha eseguito il tampone? Il medico di base? Il 112?).
Title Review: Lack of clarity. For privacy  the information section is enough  it is useless to repeat the same things in a lot of menu items  taking away space for more practical information. We need more concrete examples  not submerged in information that is not useful for the mass of users. It would be useful to confirm that bluetooth is active or instructions to activate it with the various operating systems. It is essential to indicate who is the health worker who must report positivity (who performed the swab? The general practitioner? 112?).
content: Lack of clarity  For privacy  the information section is enough  it is useless to repeat the same things in a lot of menu items  taking away space for more practical information  We need more concrete examples  not submerged in information that is not useful for the mass of users  It would be useful to confirm that bluetooth is active or instructions to activate it with the various operating systems  It is essential to indicate who is the health worker who must report positivity  who performed the swab  The general practitioner

Author: Maurizio DF
Review: Casus belli: due persone con la mascherina si incontrano, entrambe con l'applicazione Immuni (forse si dovrebbe chiamarla Contagiati!), una delle due è risultata positiva al tampone ma è stata a casa già per due settimane (e chi decide quando finisce il contagio, l'app.?). L'altra riceve la segnalazione che si è beccata il contagio solo perché la distanza era ridotta (e la mascherina allora a che è servita?) e quindi le viene suggerito di andare a fare il tampone (che si paga!)? Ma siamo matti ?
Title Review: Casus belli: two people with masks meet  both with the Immune application (perhaps it should be called Contagiati!)  One of the two tested positive for the swab but has already been home for two weeks (and who decides when the contagion  the app.?). The other receives the report that she has caught the infection only because the distance was reduced (and then what was the use of the mask?) And then she is suggested to go for the swab (what you pay for!)? Are we crazy?
content: Casus belli  two people with masks meet  both with the Immune application  perhaps it should be called Contagiati    One of the two tested positive for the swab but has already been home for two weeks  and who decides when the contagion  the app     The other receives the report that she has caught the infection only because the distance was reduced  and then what was the use of the mask   And then she is suggested to go for the swab  what you pay for    Are we crazy

Author: Matteo Romeo
Review: L'app sembra buona, ma la vera soluzione corretta siano dei braccialetti o indossabili, se non i chip sottopelle, che si ricarichino in modo automatico. Questo perché i minori non sono tracciati, gli anziani non sanno usare bene la tecnologia e molte volte si dimentica lo smartphone proprio quando serve. Inoltre non tutti hanno uno smartphone adatto. Credo nel restringere il campo in caso di focolaio sarebbe utile adottare un sistema alternativo RINUNCIANDO ad un pezzo di libertà.
Title Review: The app looks good  but the real correct solution are bracelets or wearables  if not the chips under the skin  which recharge automatically. This is because minors are not tracked  the elderly do not know how to use technology well and many times the smartphone is forgotten just when needed. Furthermore  not everyone has a suitable smartphone. I believe in narrowing down the field in the event of an outbreak it would be useful to adopt an alternative system by WAIVING a piece of freedom.
content: The app looks good  but the real correct solution are bracelets or wearables  if not the chips under the skin  which recharge automatically  This is because minors are not tracked  the elderly do not know how to use technology well and many times the smartphone is forgotten just when needed  Furthermore  not everyone has a suitable smartphone  I believe in narrowing down the field in the event of an outbreak it would be useful to adopt an alternative system by WAIVING a piece of freedom

Author: Tobia paternò
Review: Se volete capire se l'app è attiva o meno, provate a disabilitare il bluetooth, e vedrete garbate proteste... Una app così essenziale nel futuro deve essere integrata nel sistema operativo, o quantomeno installata via Google services che si aggiorna continuamente per sopperire alle esigenze che mutano nel tempo, compensando in buona parte il fatto che i produttori di telefonini aggiornano molto saltuariamente i rispettivi prodotti.
Title Review: If you want to understand if the app is active or not  try to disable the bluetooth  and you will see polite protests ... An app so essential in the future must be integrated into the operating system  or at least installed via Google services that is continuously updated to compensate to needs that change over time  largely offsetting the fact that mobile phone manufacturers update their respective products very occasionally.
content: If you want to understand if the app is active or not  try to disable the bluetooth  and you will see polite protests     An app so essential in the future must be integrated into the operating system  or at least installed via Google services that is continuously updated to compensate to needs that change over time  largely offsetting the fact that mobile phone manufacturers update their respective products very occasionally

Author: Fabrizio Apuzzo
Review: Ottima app, per chi è preoccupato della privacy non c'è problema, l'app non usa dati importanti e il codice sorgente è visibile online a chiunque sia un po' pratico di programmazione mobile, tutto molto trasparente. Richiede bluetooth e gps, ma se avete problemi di batteria potete disattivarli quando non siete esposti, come quando siete a casa. Se il servizio risulta disattivato basta attivare gps e bluetooth (solo se siete in contatto con qualcuno).
Title Review: Excellent app  for those concerned about privacy there is no problem  the app does not use important data and the source code is visible online to anyone who is familiar with mobile programming  all very transparent. It requires bluetooth and gps  but if you have battery problems you can turn them off when you are not exposed  such as when you are at home. If the service is disabled  just activate gps and bluetooth (only if you are in contact with someone).
content: Excellent app  for those concerned about privacy there is no problem  the app does not use important data and the source code is visible online to anyone who is familiar with mobile programming  all very transparent  It requires bluetooth and gps  but if you have battery problems you can turn them off when you are not exposed  such as when you are at home  If the service is disabled  just activate gps and bluetooth  only if you are in contact with someone
syn: concern, data, transpar, privaci, gps, disabl, servic, servic, import

No geolocates people No records names  but assigns an encrypted identifier to each user that changes automatically every minute. Respect the privacy regulations. I highly recommend it.
