Author: Max Mustermann
Review: Es ist ja schön, dass Immuni selbst keine Standortverläufe aufzeichnet und auch sonst höchste Standards beim Datenschutz einhält. Dies wird aber dadurch kontakariert, dass Immuni eine Einstellung (Globaler Standortverlauf zulassen) erfordert, die dazu führt, dass nun alle ANDEREN Apps auf dem Gerät fleißig spionieren und jede Bewegung mitverfolgen können! Bitte korrigieren!!!!
Title Review: It's nice that Immuni doesn't record any location history itself and that it also adheres to the highest standards of data protection. But this is contacted by the fact that Immuni requires a setting (allow global location history)  which means that all OTHER apps on the device can now spy diligently and track every movement! Please correct!!!!
content: It s nice that Immuni doesn t record any location history itself and that it also adheres to the highest standards of data protection  But this is contacted by the fact that Immuni requires a setting  allow global location history   which means that all OTHER apps on the device can now spy diligently and track every movement  Please correct

Author: Stefano Scartozzi
Review: L'idea è buona, non utilizza il GPS (quindi oltre la privacy si risparmia molta batteria) ma il bluetooth. Il concetto è che se sei stato ad una distanza utile per il contagio, allora il tuo telefono è riuscito a vedere anche il bluetooth dell'altra persona, visto che parliamo di qualche metro di distanza. Io credo si basi su questa logica, e la trovo ottima!
Title Review: The idea is good  it doesn't use GPS (so besides privacy it saves a lot of battery) but bluetooth. The concept is that if you have been within a useful distance for the infection  then your phone has managed to see the other person's bluetooth too  since we are talking about a few meters away. I believe it is based on this logic  and I find it excellent!
content: The idea is good  it doesn t use GPS  so besides privacy it saves a lot of battery  but bluetooth  The concept is that if you have been within a useful distance for the infection  then your phone has managed to see the other person s bluetooth too  since we are talking about a few meters away  I believe it is based on this logic  and I find it excellent

Review: la questione secondo me è di stabilire criteri precisi, ancora non individuati di come inserire i positivi. Le persone positive sono identificate tutte da tampone? Io che ho aderito farò un tampone? Oppure ho solo trasmesso i miei dati sensibili? Come si sono organizzati per far fronte alle richieste di tamponi di tutti quelli che hanno aderito? Si... Ho delle incertezze ma voglio avere fiducia del sistema.
Title Review: in my opinion the question is to establish precise criteria  not yet identified  of how to insert the positives. Are positive people all identified by swabs? I who joined will I make a swab? Or did I just pass on my sensitive data? How did they organize themselves to meet the swab requests of all those who joined? Yes ... I have uncertainties but I want to trust the system.
content: in my opinion the question is to establish precise criteria  not yet identified  of how to insert the positives  Are positive people all identified by swabs  I who joined will I make a swab  Or did I just pass on my sensitive data  How did they organize themselves to meet the swab requests of all those who joined  Yes     I have uncertainties but I want to trust the system

Il tempo per il contagio è fissato in 15 minuti.... ma se sono passato accanto a un malato che ha appena tossito non è più grave??? Non dovrei comunque essere informato?

The time for the infection is fixed in 15 minutes .... but if I passed by a patient who has just coughed  isn't it more serious ??? Shouldn't I still be informed?

Review: L'app di per sé "potrebbe" essere utile a limitare il contagio. Potrebbe, in quanto, oltre a diversi bug riscontrati come il servizio che si autodisattiva, su molti dispositivi è pressoché impossibile farla partire (Huawei e alcuni modelli Xiaomi in primis, più ovviamente tutti i device senza le API). Aggiungo inoltre che ho notato un battery drain abbastanza elevato per via della geolocalizzazione sempre attiva (anche se alla fine non la usa) L'unico problema però era la foto introduttiva...
Title Review: The app itself "could" be useful in limiting the infection. It could  as  in addition to several bugs found such as the service that self-deactivates  on many devices it is almost impossible to start it (Huawei and some Xiaomi models in the first place  more obviously all devices without APIs). I also add that I noticed a fairly high battery drain due to the geolocation always active (even if in the end it does not use it) The only problem  however  was the introductory photo ...
content: The app itself  could  be useful in limiting the infection  It could  as  in addition to several bugs found such as the service that self deactivates  on many devices it is almost impossible to start it  Huawei and some Xiaomi models in the first place  more obviously all devices without APIs   I also add that I noticed a fairly high battery drain due to the geolocation always active  even if in the end it does not use it  The only problem  however  was the introductory photo

Author: Lincoln Phipps
Review: The app is an ingenious approach to the track and notification problem and requires no personal data (except regione) and no app permissions. It doesn't use GPS but you must have location turned on as the app build Google framework has location as a dependency. It uses Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) so very low power consumption and essential to the anonymity as it uses a random private non resolvable device address. This anonymity was built into Bluetooth LE many years ago.
Title Review: The app is an ingenious approach to the track and notification problem and requires no personal data (except regione) and no app permissions. It doesn't use GPS but you must have location turned on as the app build Google framework has location as a dependency. It uses Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) so very low power consumption and essential to the anonymity as it uses a random private non resolvable device address. This anonymity was built into Bluetooth LE many years ago.
content: The app is an ingenious approach to the track and notification problem and requires no personal data  except regione  and no app permissions  It doesn t use GPS but you must have location turned on as the app build Google framework has location as a dependency  It uses Bluetooth Low Energy  BLE  so very low power consumption and essential to the anonymity as it uses a random private non resolvable device address  This anonymity was built into Bluetooth LE many years ago
syn: region, data, locat, track, gps, locat, address

Author: Ceciĺia Marteddu
Review: App semplice da utilizzare e assolutamente sicura per la privacy. L'utilizzo del GPS serve solo ad individuare i segnali bluetooth intorno a noi, non certo a tracciare la nostra posizione, così come chiaramente indicato nelle spiegazioni di funzionamento di quest'app che compaiono durante la configurazione, e che nessuno legge. Per verificarlo, basta andare in Impostazioni e vedere quali autorizzazioni ha l'app: si vedrà che NON ha accesso alla nostra posizione. Il Garante Privacy ha dato l'ok!
Title Review: Simple to use and absolutely safe for privacy app. The use of GPS is only used to identify the bluetooth signals around us  certainly not to track our position  as clearly indicated in the operating explanations of this app that appear during configuration  and that nobody reads. To check this  just go to Settings and see what permissions the app has: you will see that it does NOT have access to our location. The Privacy Guarantor has given the ok!
content: Simple to use and absolutely safe for privacy app  The use of GPS is only used to identify the bluetooth signals around us  certainly not to track our position  as clearly indicated in the operating explanations of this app that appear during configuration  and that nobody reads  To check this  just go to Settings and see what permissions the app has  you will see that it does NOT have access to our location  The Privacy Guarantor has given the ok
syn: locat, track, privaci, gps, identifi, locat, signal

Author: Marco Sansone
Review: App ben realizzata e immagino molto utile, anche se per apprezzarne l'efficacia dovrebbe essere installata da milioni di utenti in tutta Italia. Ritengo che la privacy sia rispettata, quindi non esiste un solo motivo per non scaricarla. Mi sembra che faccia diminuire un po' l'autonomia dello smartphone, ma in fondo si può utilizzare con parsimonia attivandola solo quando ci si trova fuori casa. Piacevole anche la grafica in perfetto stile minimal. Bravi.
Title Review: Well made app and I imagine very useful  even if to appreciate its effectiveness it should be installed by millions of users throughout Italy. I believe privacy is respected  so there's no single reason not to download it. It seems to me that it decreases the autonomy of the smartphone a bit  but in the end it can be used sparingly by activating it only when you are away from home. The graphics in perfect minimal style are also pleasant. Well done.
content: Well made app and I imagine very useful  even if to appreciate its effectiveness it should be installed by millions of users throughout Italy  I believe privacy is respected  so there s no single reason not to download it  It seems to me that it decreases the autonomy of the smartphone a bit  but in the end it can be used sparingly by activating it only when you are away from home  The graphics in perfect minimal style are also pleasant  Well done

Purtroppo la disinformazione che invade il nostro paese non ci permette di avere un reale sistema di controllo.... peccato! Riguardo gli asintomatici, la campagna di controllo che si sta svolgendo in questo periodo aiuta ad aumentare numero dei rilevamenti. Quindi diventa ancora più importante Immuni.
Title Review: Finally they align us with the most advanced countries in the technological field. The security of the Italian platform even surpasses the others. Unfortunately  the disinformation that invades our country does not allow us to have a real system of control .... too bad! Regarding the asymptomatic  the control campaign that is taking place in this period helps to increase the number of detections. So Immune becomes even more important.
content: Finally they align us with the most advanced countries in the technological field  The security of the Italian platform even surpasses the others  Unfortunately  the disinformation that invades our country does not allow us to have a real system of control      too bad  Regarding the asymptomatic  the control campaign that is taking place in this period helps to increase the number of detections  So Immune becomes even more important

Author: Z. Samuel
Review: Primi giorni di disponibilità dell'app e già nei giornali si legge di persone che hanno ricevuto la notifica di rischio dall'app e poi vengono obbligate all'isolamento dalle AST che si rifiutano di fare il tampone... pessima gestione, il solito paese delle banane. Il governo deve fare SUBITO un decreto garantendo il tempone entro 48 ore dalla notifica dell'app, e tamponi successivi entro una settimana in caso di tampone positivo, così l'app avrà un senso e sarà consigliabile.
Title Review: First days of availability of the app and already in the newspapers we read of people who have received the risk notification from the app and then are forced to be isolated from the ASTs who refuse to swab ... bad management  the usual country some bananas. The government must IMMEDIATELY make a decree guaranteeing the timing within 48 hours of the app notification  and subsequent swabs within a week in the event of a positive swab  so the app will make sense and be advisable.
content: First days of availability of the app and already in the newspapers we read of people who have received the risk notification from the app and then are forced to be isolated from the ASTs who refuse to swab     bad management  the usual country some bananas  The government must IMMEDIATELY make a decree guaranteeing the timing within    hours of the app notification  and subsequent swabs within a week in the event of a positive swab  so the app will make sense and be advisable

Author: Massimino il Trace
Review: Innovazione etica! Questa app ci dimostra che si può usare la tecnologia in maniera rispettosa della nostra privacy e delle nostre libertà democratiche, ma al contempo anche innovativa. Vorrei ci fossero più app open, trasparenti e sicure per i nostri dati e la privacy come questa! L'interfaccia è di semplice utilizzo e curata visivamente. Il fatto che richiede gps attivo consente a tutte le altre app di fare ciò che vogliono. Questo è un punto negativo non da poco.
Title Review: Ethical innovation! This app shows us that technology can be used in a way that is respectful of our privacy and democratic freedoms  but at the same time also innovative. I wish there were more open  transparent and secure apps for our data and privacy like this one! The interface is easy to use and visually cared for. The fact that it requires active gps allows all other apps to do what they want. This is a significant negative point.
content: Ethical innovation  This app shows us that technology can be used in a way that is respectful of our privacy and democratic freedoms  but at the same time also innovative  I wish there were more open  transparent and secure apps for our data and privacy like this one  The interface is easy to use and visually cared for  The fact that it requires active gps allows all other apps to do what they want  This is a significant negative point

Author: Giovanni Iezzi
Review: Risposta ad alcune domande che escono fuori dalla lettura delle recensioni: 1) Non è il gps ad essere attivo, ma i servizi di geolocalizzazione che servono per far funzionare il Bluetooth su Android; Immuni non attiverà mai il gps, quindi non usa più batteria, nè geolocalizza gli utenti. 2) Vi arrivano le notifiche se, qualcuno che vi è stato vicino nei giorni precedenti e non stava male, si ammala e viene diagnosticato con covid-19. 3) NON DOVETE CARICARE NESSUN DATO, la sezione "Caricamento dati" lasciatela stare; vi serve solamente nel malaugurato caso VOI doveste risultare contagiati dal coronavirus. Allora il personale medico autorizzato (il vostro medico, la asl ecc...) vi guiderebbe nell'inserimento dati per poter inviare gli avvisi alle persone che vi sono state vicine nei giorni precedenti. Non utilizza molta batteria, si installa, si attiva e fa il suo lavoro. Nessun problema rilevato su Samsung S10e.
Title Review: Answers to some questions that come out of reading the reviews: 1) It is not the GPS that is active  but the geolocation services that are used to make Bluetooth work on Android; Immuni will never activate the gps  so it no longer uses battery  nor geolocates users. 2) You receive notifications if someone who was close to you in the previous days and was not sick  gets sick and is diagnosed with covid-19. 3) YOU DO NOT HAVE TO UPLOAD ANY DATA  leave the "Upload data" section alone; you need it only in the unfortunate case YOU should be infected with the coronavirus. Then the authorized medical staff (your doctor  the ASL etc ...) would guide you in entering data in order to send the alerts to the people who were close to you in the previous days. It doesn't use a lot of battery  it installs  activates and does its job. No issues detected on Samsung S10e.
content: Answers to some questions that come out of reading the reviews     It is not the GPS that is active  but the geolocation services that are used to make Bluetooth work on Android  Immuni will never activate the gps  so it no longer uses battery  nor geolocates users     You receive notifications if someone who was close to you in the previous days and was not sick  gets sick and is diagnosed with covid        YOU DO NOT HAVE TO UPLOAD ANY DATA  leave the  Upload data  section alone  you need it only in the unfortunate case YOU should be infected with the coronavirus  Then the authorized medical staff  your doctor  the ASL etc      would guide you in entering data in order to send the alerts to the people who were close to you in the previous days  It doesn t use a lot of battery  it installs  activates and does its job  No issues detected on Samsung S  e
syn: sick, data, gps, author, servic, servic, section, enter, receiv, staff, author, guid, answer, medic, order

Review: Ho ricevuto una notifica. Non ho letto bene il messaggio ma ho immediatamente aperto l'app, per capire di che si trattava. La notifica è scomparsa e nell'app non c'era scritto niente. Se sono entrata in contatto con una persona positiva non lo saprò mai. Non saprò mai quali tipi di notifiche possiamo ricevere. Perché il testo della notifica non si può leggere entrando nell'app? La semplice notifica è un fatto volatile che si cancella senza lasciare traccia.
Title Review: I have received a notification. I did not read the message correctly but I immediately opened the app  to understand what it was. The notification disappeared and there was nothing written in the app. If I came into contact with a positive person  I will never know. I will never know what types of notifications we can receive. Why can't the notification text be read by entering the app? The simple notification is a volatile fact that is canceled without a trace.
content: I have received a notification  I did not read the message correctly but I immediately opened the app  to understand what it was  The notification disappeared and there was nothing written in the app  If I came into contact with a positive person  I will never know  I will never know what types of notifications we can receive  Why can t the notification text be read by entering the app  The simple notification is a volatile fact that is canceled without a trace

Author: trofio
Review: premetto che sono un programmatore con 20 anni di esperienza. ottimo strumento, attento alla privacy. non usa il gps e non lega in nessun modo un nome o numero telefonico all'ID. i server sono in Italia, gestiti dallo stato e non da privati. Inoltre i sorgenti sono opensource, quindi liberamente ispezionabili da chiunque voglia/sappia analizzarli. Non ho mai visto un'app di tracciamento tanto attenta alla privacy.
Title Review: I state that I am a programmer with 20 years of experience. great tool  attentive to privacy. does not use GPS and does not in any way link a name or telephone number to the ID. the servers are in Italy  managed by the state and not by private individuals. Furthermore  the sources are opensource  therefore freely inspectable by anyone who wants / knows how to analyze them. I've never seen such a privacy-conscious tracking app.

Quindi questo inverno dovremmo stare tutti con la paranoia per uno starnuto... Tutti dovrebbero avere un telefonino ultima generazione, é tutti i bambini e gli anziani. È assurdo. Hanno bloccato il paese intero per una patologia sempre esistita. E tutte le altre malattie ancora in giro?
Title Review: I don't install it. But how can an app know if you have a virus? Among other things  it is a bronchopneumonia  which has always existed  only they call it coronavirus ... So this winter we should all be paranoid about a sneeze ... Everyone should have a latest generation mobile phone  it's all children and the elderly. Is absurd. They blocked the whole country for a disease that has always existed. What about all the other diseases still around?
content: I don t install it  But how can an app know if you have a virus  Among other things  it is a bronchopneumonia  which has always existed  only they call it coronavirus     So this winter we should all be paranoid about a sneeze     Everyone should have a latest generation mobile phone  it s all children and the elderly  Is absurd  They blocked the whole country for a disease that has always existed  What about all the other diseases still around
syn: children, elder, countri, countri, winter, elder

Author: Rukia
Review: Applicazione ottima che con pochi semplici paragrafi riesce a rendere chiarissimo il suo funzionamento. Molto utile soprattutto per chi viaggia spesso, dal momento che non ha bisogno di sapere dove sei stato per capire se hai avuto contatti con un positivo. Ovviamente la sua utilità dipende da quante persone la useranno, perché se nessuno la attiva è impossibile sapere se hai incontrato un positivo.
Title Review: Excellent application that with a few simple paragraphs manages to make its operation very clear. Very useful especially for those who travel often  since they do not need to know where you have been to understand if you have had contact with a positive. Obviously its usefulness depends on how many people will use it  because if no one activates it it is impossible to know if you have met a positive.
content: Excellent application that with a few simple paragraphs manages to make its operation very clear  Very useful especially for those who travel often  since they do not need to know where you have been to understand if you have had contact with a positive  Obviously its usefulness depends on how many people will use it  because if no one activates it it is impossible to know if you have met a positive

Author: mario secondulfo
Review: Leggo molte recensioni poco soddisfacenti relative al funzionamento Bluetooth anziché GPS. Volevo ricordare che l'intento di questa applicazione non è essere sicuri di un posizionamento sulla mappa. L'intento di questa applicazione è scoprire con quanti utenti ci siamo incontrati anche casualmente che siano risultati positivi.
Title Review: I read a lot of unsatisfactory reviews related to Bluetooth rather than GPS operation. I wanted to mention that the intent of this application is not to be sure of a location on the map. The intent of this application is to find out with how many users we have met even by chance that have positive results.
content: I read a lot of unsatisfactory reviews related to Bluetooth rather than GPS operation  I wanted to mention that the intent of this application is not to be sure of a location on the map  The intent of this application is to find out with how many users we have met even by chance that have positive results

Author: Andrea Porro
Review: L'installazione e la costante attivazione della app, che richiede uno sforzo minimo, è un gesto di civiltà che tutti i cittadini dovrebbero compiere. Avendola attivata dal primo giorno, ho notato solo una marginale riduzione di durata della batteria. Ridicole e pretestuose le considerazioni sui rischi in materia di privacy avanzate da taluni politici che trascorrono le proprie giornate su vari social network (inclusi quelli di proprietà notoriamente cinese, come TikTok).
Title Review: The installation and constant activation of the app  which requires minimal effort  is a gesture of civility that all citizens should make. Having activated it from day one  I only noticed a marginal reduction in battery life. The considerations on privacy risks made by some politicians who spend their days on various social networks (including those notoriously Chinese-owned  such as TikTok) are ridiculous and specious.
content: The installation and constant activation of the app  which requires minimal effort  is a gesture of civility that all citizens should make  Having activated it from day one  I only noticed a marginal reduction in battery life  The considerations on privacy risks made by some politicians who spend their days on various social networks  including those notoriously Chinese owned  such as TikTok  are ridiculous and specious

Title Review: Let's install it and keep it active .... it is a fundamental tool for our health and those around us. It doesn't put our privacy at risk  any more than the other dozens or hundreds of apps we use on a daily basis.

Vorrei che fosse collegata ai dati dei fascicoli sanitari elettronici per poter ricevere autonomamente le positività, anziché basarsi solo sul senso civico delle persone che, lo si vede dai comportamenti in strada, è molto carente.

Author: Debora Mizzoni
Review: Ottimo il sistema usato per individuare i contatti con positivi e poi le eventuali segnalazioni senza tracciare posizioni e dati personali. Ovvio che funzionerebbe al meglio se tutti la scaricassero. L'unica cosa che posso segnalare è il pulsante CARICA DATI che non è immediato cosa significhi ed anche il contattare un operatore non è chiaro cosa si debba fare. Migliorato questo punto penso sia perfetto.
Title Review: The system used to identify contacts with positives and then any reports without tracking positions and personal data is excellent. Of course it would work best if everyone downloaded it. The only thing I can point out is the LOAD DATA button which is not immediate what it means and even contacting an operator is not clear what should be done. Improved this point I think it's perfect.
content: The system used to identify contacts with positives and then any reports without tracking positions and personal data is excellent  Of course it would work best if everyone downloaded it  The only thing I can point out is the LOAD DATA button which is not immediate what it means and even contacting an operator is not clear what should be done  Improved this point I think it s perfect

Author: Crim
Review: Mi fanno ridere le persone che si lamentano degli operatori sanitari che non rispondono al telefono, dando però colpa all'applicazione. Quest'ultima è semplicemente uno strumento UTILE per cercare di arginare il virus. E per chi si preoccupa della sicurezza informatica: esistono degli sniffer, ma non se ne fanno niente di avere la posizione di un anonimo. E per la questione privacy: usando google l'avete già mandata a quel paese. E no, è semplice come app, basta tenere il bluetooth acceso, stop
Title Review: People who complain about health workers not answering the phone make me laugh  but blaming the application. The latter is simply a USEFUL tool to try to stem the virus. And for those who care about cybersecurity: there are sniffers  but they don't do anything about having the location of an anonymous. And for the privacy issue: using google you have already sent it to that country. And no  it's as simple as an app  just keep the bluetooth on  stop
content: People who complain about health workers not answering the phone make me laugh  but blaming the application  The latter is simply a USEFUL tool to try to stem the virus  And for those who care about cybersecurity  there are sniffers  but they don t do anything about having the location of an anonymous  And for the privacy issue  using google you have already sent it to that country  And no  it s as simple as an app  just keep the bluetooth on  stop
syn: countri, countri, locat, privaci, locat, answer, applic

Author: GIUSEPPE T
Review: Semplice e intuitivo ma soprattutto salvaguarda la tua privacy: Non traccia la tua posizione con il gps. Non ti identifica in nessun modo ma solo con un codice anonimo. Alla registrazione chiede solo pochi dati: regione e provincia. Nient'altro. Se sei entrato in contatto con un contagiato avvisa solo te e nessun altro lasciandoti libero di decidere cosa fare. Il software della app Immuni è pubblico ed è quindi verificabile da chiunque che non contenga 'trucchi'. What else? ;-)
Title Review: Simple and intuitive but above all it safeguards your privacy: It does not track your position with the GPS. It does not identify you in any way but only with an anonymous code. When registering  it asks for only a few data: region and province. Nothing else. If you have come into contact with an infected person  notify only you and no one else  leaving you free to decide what to do. The Immuni app software is public and therefore verifiable by anyone that does not contain 'cheats'. What else? ;-)
content: Simple and intuitive but above all it safeguards your privacy  It does not track your position with the GPS  It does not identify you in any way but only with an anonymous code  When registering  it asks for only a few data  region and province  Nothing else  If you have come into contact with an infected person  notify only you and no one else  leaving you free to decide what to do  The Immuni app software is public and therefore verifiable by anyone that does not contain  cheats   What else
syn: free, region, provinc, data, track, privaci, gps, identifi

Review: App ottima, con il Bluethoot Low Energy non consuma nulla. How many people are willing to keep bluetooth and location coming?

Author: Simone Lombardo
Review: App incompatibile con versioni android antecedenti alla 6, ho provato a installare l'applicazione su uno smartphone con android 5.1, ma non viene trovato sul play store, ho provato attraverso il sito dell'app stessa e compare il messaggio che l'app non è compatibile con il dispositivo in questione. Come mai un'app che deve essere utilizzata per la prevenzione e la salvaguardia della salute dei cittadini e che dovrebbe essere usata da tutti non è stata prevista per l'utilizzo su dispositivi meno recenti? Spero che questo problema possa essere risolto il prima possibile.
Title Review: App incompatible with android versions prior to 6  I tried to install the application on a smartphone with android 5.1  but it is not found on the play store  I tried through the app site itself and the message appears that the app is not compatible with the device in question. Why is an app that must be used for the prevention and protection of the health of citizens and that should be used by everyone not intended for use on older devices? Hope this problem can be solved as soon as possible.
content: App incompatible with android versions prior to    I tried to install the application on a smartphone with android      but it is not found on the play store  I tried through the app site itself and the message appears that the app is not compatible with the device in question  Why is an app that must be used for the prevention and protection of the health of citizens and that should be used by everyone not intended for use on older devices  Hope this problem can be solved as soon as possible

Title Review: The application is simple and not very invasive  I think it would have been appropriate to insert a 'Home' box in order to automatically disable bluetooth for all those cases in which you are in a house  residence or other  for a long time. so that the warning to reactivate the bluetooth is not always visible.

Author: Andrea Passeri
Review: Per ora funziona bene, anche se (per fortuna) non ho avuto modo di verificarne l'efficacia con una persona a rischio. Oltre però a qualche miglioria suggerita anche da altri (come uno storico delle notifiche), suggerirei anche di ridurre le notifiche che avvertono che l'app non è attiva: in casa, quando il bluetooth è disattivato, sono abbastanza inutili.. Magari si può scegliere quali notifiche ricevere dalle impostazioni.
Title Review: For now it works well  although (luckily) I have not had the opportunity to verify its effectiveness with a person at risk. However  in addition to some improvements also suggested by others (such as a notification history)  I would also suggest reducing the notifications that warn that the app is not active: at home  when the bluetooth is deactivated  they are quite useless .. Maybe you can choose which notifications to receive from the settings.
content: For now it works well  although  luckily  I have not had the opportunity to verify its effectiveness with a person at risk  However  in addition to some improvements also suggested by others  such as a notification history   I would also suggest reducing the notifications that warn that the app is not active  at home  when the bluetooth is deactivated  they are quite useless    Maybe you can choose which notifications to receive from the settings

Author: Vittorio Cecchetti
Review: Un'app che non serve a niente, se non a farti stare in pensiero. Per rispettare la privacy di non si sa cosa, dato che ogni app social geolocalizza e memorizza i tuoi spostamenti, hanno fatto una cosa inutile. Non ti dice nulla: chi cosa come dove quando perché. Né ti mette in contatto con l'asl di competenza per avere un tampone e visite regolari. Serve solo a loro, per farti autochiudere in casa cosí che non si debbano preoccupare di te. Scaricata sul telefono di riserva che rimane a casa.
Title Review: An app that is useless  if not to make you worry. To respect the privacy of no one knows what  given that every social app geolocates and stores your movements  they have done a useless thing. It tells you nothing: who what how where when why. Nor does it put you in contact with the local health authority to have a swab and regular visits. It's just for them to lock you up in the house so they don't have to worry about you. Downloaded to the spare phone that stays at home.
content: An app that is useless  if not to make you worry  To respect the privacy of no one knows what  given that every social app geolocates and stores your movements  they have done a useless thing  It tells you nothing  who what how where when why  Nor does it put you in contact with the local health authority to have a swab and regular visits  It s just for them to lock you up in the house so they don t have to worry about you  Downloaded to the spare phone that stays at home

Review: Modifico il mio giudizio di 1 stella perché oggi ho riprovato ad attivarla (senza aver modificato nulla) e funziona... L'importante é che funzioni, x la privacy mi fido di Immuni, ma zero assoluto di Google, é l'unica app scaricata sul tablet e ne avrei fatto volentieri a meno se non per l'utilitá ed il senso civico. Detesto Android IOS e tutti i sistemi proprietari, se tutti li boicotassero... pia illusione...
Title Review: I change my rating of 1 star because today I tried to activate it again (without having changed anything) and it works ... Bah! we hope it is reliable but this behavior puts me in doubt. The important thing is that it works  for privacy I trust Immuni  but absolute zero from Google  it is the only app downloaded on the tablet and I would have gladly done without it if not for the usefulness and the civic sense. I hate Android IOS and all proprietary systems  if everyone boycotted them ... pious illusion ...
content: I change my rating of   star because today I tried to activate it again  without having changed anything  and it works     Bah  we hope it is reliable but this behavior puts me in doubt  The important thing is that it works  for privacy I trust Immuni  but absolute zero from Google  it is the only app downloaded on the tablet and I would have gladly done without it if not for the usefulness and the civic sense  I hate Android IOS and all proprietary systems  if everyone boycotted them     pious illusion

Author: Vittorio Brunale
Review: Richiede attivo GPS e bluetooth. Con il solo bluetooth appare avviso che indica 'il servizio non è attivo'. Voglio avere senso civico ed installarla, ma non è possibile avere un'app che attiva tutte le connessioni possibili e consuma tantissima batteria. Se non mi uccide il covid lo deve fare l'indice di SAR? Disinstallata dopo tre giorni per impossibilità oggettiva di continuare ad usarla. Inoltre se si stacca bt e GPS, riattivandoli solo quando si esce, il servizio non riparte in automatico.
Title Review: Requires active GPS and bluetooth. With bluetooth alone  a warning appears indicating 'the service is not active'. I want to have civic sense and install it  but it is not possible to have an app that activates all possible connections and consumes a lot of battery. If the covid doesn't kill me  must the SAR index do it? Uninstalled after three days due to the objective inability to continue using it. Furthermore  if you disconnect the BT and GPS  reactivating them only when you leave  the service does not restart automatically.
content: Requires active GPS and bluetooth  With bluetooth alone  a warning appears indicating  the service is not active   I want to have civic sense and install it  but it is not possible to have an app that activates all possible connections and consumes a lot of battery  If the covid doesn t kill me  must the SAR index do it  Uninstalled after three days due to the objective inability to continue using it  Furthermore  if you disconnect the BT and GPS  reactivating them only when you leave  the service does not restart automatically

Ho dovuto cercare in diversi articoli sul web prima di capire sta cosa, dato che non è specificato da nessuna parte, quindi si rischia che persone meno pazienti, che non capiscono esattamente come me la disinstallino pensando che non funziona.
Title Review: You should explain both in the app and in the playstore information that the data upload / code authorization  what must be done with the help of an authorized health worker  should only be done in case of positive virus. Author: Barbara Rinaldi
Review: Considero questa app un' ottima iniziativa se funzionasse. Peccato non si possa scaricare su tutti gli smartphone se non su quelli con sistema operativo recente. Sarebbe importante che questa app fosse scaricata soprattutto dagli anziani che sono piú a rischio Covid. Ma gli anziani spesso non hanno smartphone recenti. Chi l' ha predisposta avrebbe dovuto tenerte conto. Per cui do solo una stella perchè una app con una simile limitazione è inutile.
Title Review: I consider this app a great initiative if it works. Too bad it cannot be downloaded on all smartphones except those with a recent operating system. It would be important that this app was downloaded especially by the elderly who are most at risk of Covid. But seniors often don't have recent smartphones. Whoever prepared it should have taken them into account. So I only give one star because an app with such a limitation is useless.
content: I consider this app a great initiative if it works  Too bad it cannot be downloaded on all smartphones except those with a recent operating system  It would be important that this app was downloaded especially by the elderly who are most at risk of Covid  But seniors often don t have recent smartphones  Whoever prepared it should have taken them into account  So I only give one star because an app with such a limitation is useless

Title Review: I would have preferred the app to work with gps instead of bluetooth. We should truly understand what "privacy" is in 2020 and perhaps sometimes take a step back.

Author: Alessandro Fagnani
Review: È una tutela in più per la nostra salute, il che la rende già un must have. La privacy è garantita, sicuramente più di app come Facebook, faceapp, instagram o whatsapp, però quelli li usa chiunque. Il consumo aggiuntivo di batteria è misero, considerando che molti hanno uno smartwatch già di default hanno il bluetooth sempre attivo, quindi non cambia nulla. Quanto sarebbe bello sapere se siamo stati a contatto con un portatore Covid, se tutti facciamo il nostro dovere ciò è possibile.
Title Review: It is an extra protection for our health  which already makes it a must have. Privacy is guaranteed  certainly more than apps like Facebook  faceapp  instagram or whatsapp  but anyone uses those. The additional battery consumption is meager  considering that many have a smartwatch already by default they have bluetooth always on  so nothing changes. How nice it would be to know if we have been in contact with a Covid carrier  if we all do our duty this is possible.
content: It is an extra protection for our health  which already makes it a must have  Privacy is guaranteed  certainly more than apps like Facebook  faceapp  instagram or whatsapp  but anyone uses those  The additional battery consumption is meager  considering that many have a smartwatch already by default they have bluetooth always on  so nothing changes  How nice it would be to know if we have been in contact with a Covid carrier  if we all do our duty this is possible

Allo stato attuale l'App è inutile.
Title Review: The app generates contacts even outside the fees (<2 meters and> 15 minutes)  generates contacts even when you have not had contact with anyone  no one knows how to behave once a notification is received (even if clearly incorrect)  health professionals  those most exposed  will be studded with notifications and will have to manually skim those received based on the working hours performed in which it is assumed they were wearing PPE. At present the App is useless.
content: The app generates contacts even outside the fees     meters and     minutes   generates contacts even when you have not had contact with anyone  no one knows how to behave once a notification is received  even if clearly incorrect   health professionals  those most exposed  will be studded with notifications and will have to manually skim those received based on the working hours performed in which it is assumed they were wearing PPE  At present the App is useless

Spero che molti Italiani facciano altrettanto e non si fermino alla comprensibile ma infondata paura per la propria privacy.
Title Review: I am very aware and attentive to my privacy. It really seems to me just the usual waste of public money.

Author: Luca Bechedire
Review: Un applauso a Bending Spoons che ha creato Immuni gratuitamente. Difficile fare di meglio. Sono molto contento che il codice sia open source e disponibile sotto licenza AGPL v.3. L'app in sé funziona bene e fa uso della tecnologia Bluetooth LE, quindi è molto efficiente dal punto di vista energetico. Peraltro l'app è ben ottimizzata in quanto a memory footprint e consumo in background. Ottimo lavoro, consiglio di scaricarla, è una causa importante.
Title Review: A round of applause to Bending Spoons who created Immuni for free. Difficult to do better. I am very happy that the code is open source and available under the AGPL v.3 license. The app itself works well and makes use of Bluetooth LE technology  so it's very energy efficient. Moreover  the app is well optimized in terms of memory footprint and background consumption. Great job  I recommend downloading it  it's an important cause.
content: A round of applause to Bending Spoons who created Immuni for free  Difficult to do better  I am very happy that the code is open source and available under the AGPL v   license  The app itself works well and makes use of Bluetooth LE technology  so it s very energy efficient  Moreover  the app is well optimized in terms of memory footprint and background consumption  Great job  I recommend downloading it  it s an important cause

Author: Jonas Kneissl
Review: Warum man bei dieser App nicht auf die Redaktion unserer Nachbarländer Österreich, Deutschland, Schweiz bzgl. Bedenken eines Datenschutzproblems hören sollte: Der Quellcode der App ist öffentlich und somit für jeden einsehbar. Warum sollten die Entwickler der App, dann das Risiko eingehen, Sicherheitslücken absichtlich zu ignorieren, wenn diese jeder Informatik Student im öffentlichen Quellcode ausfindig machen kann.
Title Review: Why you shouldn't listen to the editors of our neighboring countries Austria  Germany  Switzerland regarding concerns about a data protection problem with this app: The source code of the app is public and can therefore be viewed by everyone. Why should the developers of the app take the risk of deliberately ignoring security vulnerabilities when any computer science student can find them in the public source code?
content: Why you shouldn t listen to the editors of our neighboring countries Austria  Germany  Switzerland regarding concerns about a data protection problem with this app  The source code of the app is public and can therefore be viewed by everyone  Why should the developers of the app take the risk of deliberately ignoring security vulnerabilities when any computer science student can find them in the public source code
issue: Age, Domain_Specific, Emotional, Language, Location, Privacy
syn: student, concern, countri, germani, countri, austria, switzerland, data, secur, protect, secur, comput, student

Author: Franco Fausti
Review: Chi è l'operatore sanitario da contattare e come e quando? Perché nelle faq non c'è nulla sul primo messaggio che arriva dopo aver installato l'app, sotto la voce "caricamento dati" con un codice da comunicare. Forse era la prima domanda da farsi e a cui rispondere. Avrei anche preferito una recensione anonima. Spero di ricevere in tempi brevi una risposta.
Title Review: Who is the healthcare provider to contact and how and when? Because in the faq there is nothing about the first message that arrives after installing the app  under the heading "data upload" with a code to communicate. Perhaps it was the first question to ask and to answer. I would also have preferred an anonymous review. I hope to receive an answer in a short time.
content: Who is the healthcare provider to contact and how and when  Because in the faq there is nothing about the first message that arrives after installing the app  under the heading  data upload  with a code to communicate  Perhaps it was the first question to ask and to answer  I would also have preferred an anonymous review  I hope to receive an answer in a short time

Author: Alessia Schembri
Review: Ho sentito un parere esperto che ha spiegato il funzionamento a tutela della privacy, quindi l'ho scaricata immediatamente. Un suggerimento: creare uno storico dettagliato delle notifiche. Oggi mi è arrivata la prima notifica in cui era segnalato che non ero entrata in contatto con persone positive e cliccando sopra, c'era solo giorno e ora dell'ultimo controllo e alcune informazioni sull'app, ma non era riportato il testo della notifica. Se non avessi letto bene sarei nel panico più assoluto.
Title Review: I heard an expert opinion explaining how privacy works  so I downloaded it immediately. Tip: Create a detailed notification history. Today I received the first notification in which it was reported that I had not been in contact with positive people and by clicking on it  there was only the day and time of the last check and some information about the app  but the notification text was not shown . If I hadn't read that right I would be in absolute panic.
content: I heard an expert opinion explaining how privacy works  so I downloaded it immediately  Tip  Create a detailed notification history  Today I received the first notification in which it was reported that I had not been in contact with positive people and by clicking on it  there was only the day and time of the last check and some information about the app  but the notification text was not shown   If I hadn t read that right I would be in absolute panic

Review: Non funziona. Mi da errore "notifiche di esposizione non attivate" Rettifico. Disinstallate e reinstallate con Bluetooth e GPS disattivati. L'applicazione si installa ma dopo poco riemerge lo stesso problema. Bisogna spegnere bt e GPS e riattivare. Al momento quindi l'applicazione è inutilizzabile perché si sgancia dopo pochi secondi.
Title Review: Does not work. Gives me error "Exposure notifications not activated" Correction. Uninstall and reinstall with Bluetooth and GPS turned off. The application installs but after a while the same problem re-emerges. You have to turn off the BT and GPS and reactivate. At the moment the application is therefore unusable because it is released after a few seconds.
content: Does not work  Gives me error  Exposure notifications not activated  Correction  Uninstall and reinstall with Bluetooth and GPS turned off  The application installs but after a while the same problem re emerges  You have to turn off the BT and GPS and reactivate  At the moment the application is therefore unusable because it is released after a few seconds

Title Review: Very useful app  it works well and does not compromise battery life  it is very discreet and does not show conflict with other software. As for the privacy aspect  you can be more than comfortable  just think that there are some social networks that invade you more and use personal  sensitive and geolocation data  without any authorization and / or fictitious consent from us.

Author: Alessandro Fiorentino
Review: Potrebbe essere utile. Ma la positività al CoV 2 necessita di un'organizzazione territoriale che un Italia non c'è. Senza contare che la decisione di condividere la propria positività è lasciata alla buona voglia dell'individuo e, considerando che la maggior parte delle persone se ne frega delle disposizioni in merito al contenimento dell'epidemia, potrebbe addirittura essere un'app controproducente, perché finirebbe per dare una falsa sicurezza. Ovvero una sicurezza basata su dati errati...
Title Review: It might be useful. But the positivity to CoV 2 requires a territorial organization that an Italy does not exist. Not to mention that the decision to share one's positivity is left to the good will of the individual and  considering that most people don't give a damn about the provisions regarding the containment of the epidemic  it could even be a counterproductive app  because it would end. to give false security. That is  security based on incorrect data ...
content: It might be useful  But the positivity to CoV   requires a territorial organization that an Italy does not exist  Not to mention that the decision to share one s positivity is left to the good will of the individual and  considering that most people don t give a damn about the provisions regarding the containment of the epidemic  it could even be a counterproductive app  because it would end  to give false security  That is  security based on incorrect data

Author: Alberto Fabris
Review: Mah! Per funzionare ti chiede di abilitare bluetooth e che non è necessario il GPS.In realtà attiva sia bluetooth che GPS. Se disattivi il GPS e lasci solo BT ti dice che Immuni NON E' attiva. Quindi il GPS è necessario contrariamente a quello che viene detto e ripetuto durante l'installazione. Detto questo l'app è doverosa , 2 stelle in meno per la poca trasparenza
Title Review: Mah! To work it asks you to enable bluetooth and that you don't need GPS  it actually activates both bluetooth and GPS. If you turn off GPS and leave BT alone it tells you that Immuni IS NOT active. So GPS is needed contrary to what is said and repeated during installation. That said the app is a must  2 stars less due to the lack of transparency
content: Mah  To work it asks you to enable bluetooth and that you don t need GPS  it actually activates both bluetooth and GPS  If you turn off GPS and leave BT alone it tells you that Immuni IS NOT active  So GPS is needed contrary to what is said and repeated during installation  That said the app is a must    stars less due to the lack of transparency

Review: Ho scaricato l'app ieri, a livello di funzionalità è semplice, a parte pochi dati non chiede nulla. Come già scritto, l'app purtroppo non è fruibile da tutti, e questa è una grave lacuna. L'altra questione che mi lascia perplessa è il Bluetooth sempre attivo: non è rischioso a livello di sicurezza informatica? Infine purtroppo le persone che hanno potuto fare il tampone sono poche e gestite male, quindi secondo me le regole migliori da seguire sono mascherina, distanza e soprattutto BUON SENSO
Title Review: I downloaded the app yesterday  in terms of functionality it is simple  apart from a few data it does not ask for anything. As already written  the app is unfortunately not usable by everyone  and this is a serious shortcoming. The other question that puzzles me is Bluetooth always on: isn't it risky in terms of computer security? Finally  unfortunately  the people who have been able to swab are few and poorly managed  so in my opinion the best rules to follow are mask  distance and above all COMMON SENSE
content: I downloaded the app yesterday  in terms of functionality it is simple  apart from a few data it does not ask for anything  As already written  the app is unfortunately not usable by everyone  and this is a serious shortcoming  The other question that puzzles me is Bluetooth always on  isn t it risky in terms of computer security  Finally  unfortunately  the people who have been able to swab are few and poorly managed  so in my opinion the best rules to follow are mask  distance and above all COMMON SENSE

Review: Attivata prima di uscire per una passeggiata, GPS e bluetooth accesi, rientro dopo neanche un'ora e controllo l'app che risulta non attiva. Bisogna per forza tenere Dati, GPS e bluetooth accesi, contemporaneamente, per avere il servizio sotto controllo e addio batteria.
Title Review: Activated before going out for a walk  GPS and bluetooth on  return after less than an hour and check the app that is not active. Very disappointing first use I must say  how is it possible that it does not remain active even for an hour in a row? How do you plan to use it for whole days if it doesn't last the time of a walk? It is necessary to keep Data  GPS and bluetooth turned on at the same time  to have the service under control and goodbye to the battery.

Author: Gabriele Gatti
Review: Credo sia un dovere civico installare l'app e francamente anche una tracciatura anonima GPS consentirebbe di focalizzare analisi su luoghi pubblici più a rischio di altri i caso di presenze di inconsapevoli portatori di Sars-Cov-2 . Più saremo ad averla installata e prima riusciremo a controllare la diffusione del virus, ovviamente a supporto dell'attività sanitaria che resta fondamentale (ps ... e grazie a tutto il personale sanitario coinvolto)
Title Review: I believe it is a civic duty to install the app and frankly also an anonymous GPS tracking would allow you to focus analysis on public places more at risk than others in the case of the presence of unwitting Sars-Cov-2 carriers. The more we have installed it  the sooner we will be able to control the spread of the virus  obviously in support of the healthcare activity that remains fundamental (ps ... and thanks to all the healthcare personnel involved)

Author: Angelo Palmeri
Review: Premessa: cinque stelle per sostenere lo sforzo; gli darei quattro stelle, in realtà. L'app si installa e configura molto facilmente. Le spiegazioni sono semplici e chiare, apprezzo lo sforzo di farle davvero comprensibili a tutti. Apprezzo anche l'insistenza nello spiegare che l'app non registra la posizione, non la condivide, non la vende [quasi da pazzi essere costretti a scriverlo ma tant'è]. Spero in tanti la scarichino: è sicura e la prima: la Germania la lancerà solo settimana prossima.
Title Review: Premise: five stars to support the effort; I would give it four stars  actually. The app is very easy to install and configure. The explanations are simple and clear  I appreciate the effort to make them really understandable to everyone. I also appreciate the insistence in explaining that the app does not record the location  does not share it  does not sell it [almost crazy to be forced to write it but so be it]. I hope many will download it: it is safe and the first: Germany will launch it only next week.
content: Premise  five stars to support the effort  I would give it four stars  actually  The app is very easy to install and configure  The explanations are simple and clear  I appreciate the effort to make them really understandable to everyone  I also appreciate the insistence in explaining that the app does not record the location  does not share it  does not sell it  almost crazy to be forced to write it but so be it   I hope many will download it  it is safe and the first  Germany will launch it only next week

Author: Simone Rolando
Review: Graficamente impeccabile e ben realizzata. Purtroppo su Oppo e OnePlus, però, va in conflitto con il sistema di gestione del risparmio energetico. Nonostante l'app sia bloccata in RAM e sia abilità all'avvio automatico spesso viene visualizzata la notifica di servizio non attivo e l'app smette di funzionare. Talvolta, cercando di aprirla in questo stato, genera un Force Close.
Title Review: Graphically flawless and well crafted. Unfortunately on Oppo and OnePlus  however  it conflicts with the energy saving management system. Despite the app being stuck in RAM and being able to auto-start  the service not active notification is often displayed and the app stops working. Sometimes  trying to open it in this state  it generates a Force Close.
content: Graphically flawless and well crafted  Unfortunately on Oppo and OnePlus  however  it conflicts with the energy saving management system  Despite the app being stuck in RAM and being able to auto start  the service not active notification is often displayed and the app stops working  Sometimes  trying to open it in this state  it generates a Force Close

Congratulations to the app programmers! But disgust for the retarded government.

Author: Giulia Testa

Capisco che l'ignoranza tecnologica in Italia è alta, ma per una volta, dico almeno una, mettete da parte il vostro timore sui complotti e fate una cosa buona per la collettività.
Title Review: The controversy surrounding the privacy of this app makes me smile. I would bet that some of those who complain meanwhile have sold their souls to Facebook by posting daily photos of their underage offspring. I understand that technological ignorance in Italy is high  but for once  I say at least one  put aside your fear of conspiracies and do a good thing for the community.

Author: Giulio Degli Esposti
Review: Avevo forti dubbi sulla tenuta della batteria con il Bluetooth perennemente acceso, ma ora che ho scoperto che necessita anche del GPS sono certo che dopo 2 h in giro avrò il telefono scarico. A questo punto qualsiasi contatto sospetto verrà ignorato. Forse non c'è alternativa.... Ma in questo modo tra chi non installa per principio, chi non ha lo smartphone (anziani e bambini), chi dimentica di attivare Bluetooth e GPS e chi ha il Cell spento o scarico penso l'utilità sia pressoché nulla.
Title Review: I had strong doubts about the tightness of the battery with the Bluetooth permanently on  but now that I have discovered that it also needs the GPS I am sure that after 2 hours around I will have the phone empty. At this point any suspicious contacts will be ignored. Perhaps there is no alternative .... But in this way  among those who do not install on principle  those who do not have a smartphone (elderly and children)  those who forget to activate Bluetooth and GPS and those who have their Cell off or empty I think the utility is almost nil.
content: I had strong doubts about the tightness of the battery with the Bluetooth permanently on  but now that I have discovered that it also needs the GPS I am sure that after   hours around I will have the phone empty  At this point any suspicious contacts will be ignored  Perhaps there is no alternative      But in this way  among those who do not install on principle  those who do not have a smartphone  elderly and children   those who forget to activate Bluetooth and GPS and those who have their Cell off or empty I think the utility is almost nil

Author: Oschpile Muggn
Review: Sehr gut, endlich läuft sie. Auch wenn die App selbst dessen Daten nicht nutzt, aber dass Ortungsdienste aktiviert sein müssen ist schon ein arges Manko: Google hätte diesen Umstand mit dem Api Update beseitigen sollen, dies würde Datenschutzbedenken bei den potentiellen Usern verringern (andere App nutzen die Ortungsdienste dann ja auch - nicht jeder traut sich tief ins System, um dagegen vorzugehen). Und ein sich leerender Akku wird sehr wahrscheinlich ein Deaktivieren der App bewirken...
Title Review: Very good  finally it works. Even if the app itself does not use its data  but the fact that location services have to be activated is a serious shortcoming: Google should have eliminated this fact with the Api update  this would reduce data protection concerns among potential users (other apps then also use the location services - not everyone dares to go deep into the system to take action against it). And a draining battery will most likely deactivate the app ...
content: Very good  finally it works  Even if the app itself does not use its data  but the fact that location services have to be activated is a serious shortcoming  Google should have eliminated this fact with the Api update  this would reduce data protection concerns among potential users  other apps then also use the location services   not everyone dares to go deep into the system to take action against it   And a draining battery will most likely deactivate the app
syn: concern, data, locat, protect, servic, servic, reduc, locat

Author: Stefano Tomasi

Complimenti a chi ha avuto il coraggio di cambiare direzione.
Title Review: The specifications of the first version did not convince me in the least and  in that version  I would never have downloaded it but this  in which privacy is guaranteed (obviously total security is not even conceivable but it comes close)  the code is public and open and since I am not a person who sees ghosts everywhere and spends his days chasing imaginary monsters  he is absolutely to be downloaded for our safety. Congratulations to those who had the courage to change direction.
content: The specifications of the first version did not convince me in the least and  in that version  I would never have downloaded it but this  in which privacy is guaranteed  obviously total security is not even conceivable but it comes close   the code is public and open and since I am not a person who sees ghosts everywhere and spends his days chasing imaginary monsters  he is absolutely to be downloaded for our safety  Congratulations to those who had the courage to change direction

Someone should remember to plug it into the socket to activate the neurons of logic and common sense as well. The homepage is the same for everyone but no screeshot. Ridiculous

Author: Who
Review: Una delle poche app governative ben fatte, la grafica è carina, l'app abbastanza intuitiva e ottima dal punto di vista della privacy. Gli unici difetti sono l'incompatibilità con le versioni più vecchie di Android 6 e la necessità di attivare il GPS (per il bluetooth eh, non pensate che vi spiino dato che l'app non ha accesso ad alcuna autorizzazione) su alcuni modelli ma non è colpa della Bending Spoon quanto di Google.
Title Review: One of the few well-made government apps  the graphics are nice  the app quite intuitive and great from a privacy point of view. The only flaws are the incompatibility with older versions of Android 6 and the need to activate the GPS (for bluetooth eh  don't think they will spy on you since the app does not have access to any authorization) on some models but not it's Bending Spoon's fault as much as Google's.
content: One of the few well made government apps  the graphics are nice  the app quite intuitive and great from a privacy point of view  The only flaws are the incompatibility with older versions of Android   and the need to activate the GPS  for bluetooth eh  don t think they will spy on you since the app does not have access to any authorization  on some models but not it s Bending Spoon s fault as much as Google s

Sarebbe utile invece se si potesse inserire il proprio stato di salute giorno per giorno in modo da valutare se sei a rischio oppure no.

It would be useful instead if you could enter your state of health day by day in order to assess whether you are at risk or not.

Title Review: For all those who wonder why the localization must remain on: it is due to the structure of the Android system in which both the position and the Bluetooth say to be inside the same package for this reason when deactivated the immune position does not work  NOT BECAUSE IT USES THE POSITION BUT BECAUSE IN ANDROID BLUETOOTH (the only thing that uses immune) AND LOCATION ARE "CONNECTED". App done well  MAXIMUM PRIVACY PROTECTION  simple with an excellent initial explanation

Not everyone uses it: having to keep it active for Immuni is a must  but I don't like it at all).

Author: Francesca Convertini
Review: Garantisce la privacy a 360° basta scaricarla ed installarla e non bisogna fare altro. Non siamo noi a comunicare il nostro stato di salute alla app ma lo comunicano gli ospedali e le Asl nel caso in cui un soggetto contagiato dovesse risultare positivo al tampone, quindi ottimo. Zero pensieri per il singolo, si occupano le autorità per la gestione ed è molto importante per la collettività. Ogni tanto bisogna entrare per verificare che è attiva, è una specie di antivirus per noi esseri umani.
Title Review: It guarantees 360 ° privacy just download and install it and nothing else needs to be done. We are not the ones who communicate our state of health to the app but the hospitals and local health authorities communicate it in the event that an infected subject should test positive for the swab  therefore excellent. Zero thoughts for the individual  the authorities deal with the management and it is very important for the community. Every now and then you have to enter to verify that it is active  it is a kind of antivirus for us human beings.

Author: Marco Cambon
Review: molto semplice da installare, qualità della grafica e interfaccia ottime come per le altre app di questi sviluppatori. La spiegazione tecnica della logica di tracciamento tramite lo scambio codici è molto chiara e per quanto riguarda la privacy la app non ha accesso a nessun dato sensibile. lo si può vedere dalla finestra delle proprietà della app una volta installata. se la app non può nemmeno leggere l'IMEI del telefono credo sia vero che non possa identificarci.
Title Review: very easy to install  graphics quality and interface excellent as for the other apps of these developers. The technical explanation of the tracking logic through the code exchange is very clear and as far as privacy is concerned  the app does not have access to any sensitive data. you can see it from the app properties window once installed. if the app can't even read the phone's IMEI I think it's true that it can't identify us.
content: very easy to install  graphics quality and interface excellent as for the other apps of these developers  The technical explanation of the tracking logic through the code exchange is very clear and as far as privacy is concerned  the app does not have access to any sensitive data  you can see it from the app properties window once installed  if the app can t even read the phone s IMEI I think it s true that it can t identify us

Author: Demetrio Ferro
Review: Glad this came up but I hardly doubt it will be effective due to high energy consumption. It's a pity that gps service has to be active at all times. Battery life can't last long with location on, despite we go around and interact the whole day. One is forced to keep turning it on/off, which is clearly not what a smartphone app like this is supposed to offer. I'd ask to consider providing a widget tool that shows status so that at least one hopefully reminds to keep it on when needed.

One is forced to keep turning it on/off  which is clearly not what a smartphone app like this is supposed to offer. I'd ask to consider providing a widget tool that shows status so that at least one hopefully reminds to keep it on when needed.
content: Glad this came up but I hardly doubt it will be effective due to high energy consumption  It s a pity that gps service has to be active at all times  Battery life can t last long with location on  despite we go around and interact the whole day  One is forced to keep turning it on off  which is clearly not what a smartphone app like this is supposed to offer  I d ask to consider providing a widget tool that shows status so that at least one hopefully reminds to keep it on when needed

Title Review: At the beginning it is indicated that the tracking of the position is not foreseen and in fact the GPS was not required. But for a few days  probably after an update  the mandatory activation of the GPS has been requested. Because?

Author: doctrinehigh
Review: Perché serve il gps? Se lo scopo è la trasmissione dati bluetooth? poi sapete quanta batteria consuma la posizione attiva.E perché devo riattivare l'app ogni giorno?Dovrebbe essere meno invadente, sia nella privacy che nel consumo, e dovrebbe evitare che il sistema uccida il processo continuamente causando continue richieste di riattivazione. Inoltre rendetela disponibile quanto prima a tutte regioni. se iniziasse una seconda ondata, cosi com'è ora non servirebbe a nulla.
Title Review: Why do you need gps? If the purpose is bluetooth data transmission? then you know how much battery the active location consumes.And why do I have to reactivate the app every day? It should be less intrusive  both in privacy and in consumption  and it should prevent the system from killing the process continuously causing constant requests for reactivation. Also make it available to all regions as soon as possible. if a second wave started  as it is now it would be of no use.
content: Why do you need gps  If the purpose is bluetooth data transmission  then you know how much battery the active location consumes And why do I have to reactivate the app every day  It should be less intrusive  both in privacy and in consumption  and it should prevent the system from killing the process continuously causing constant requests for reactivation  Also make it available to all regions as soon as possible  if a second wave started  as it is now it would be of no use
syn: region, data, locat, privaci, gps, locat

Author: Luca S.
Review: Per tutti quelli che si lamentano della geolocalizzazione: È Android che obbliga ad attivare la geolocalizzazione con l'attivazione del Bluetooth perché ad esempio può essere usato per la navigazione indoor dove il GPS non prende. L'applicazione non ha i permessi di accedere al GPS quindi, anche se attivo, non può ricevere le informazioni relative alla posizione. È inutile che vi lamentate con l'app, contattate Google e chiedete di modificare Android.
Title Review: For all those who complain about geolocation: It is Android that forces you to activate geolocation with the activation of Bluetooth because for example it can be used for indoor navigation where the GPS does not take. The application does not have permission to access the GPS so  even if active  it cannot receive information relating to the position. It is useless for you to complain to the app  contact Google and ask to modify Android.
content: For all those who complain about geolocation  It is Android that forces you to activate geolocation with the activation of Bluetooth because for example it can be used for indoor navigation where the GPS does not take  The application does not have permission to access the GPS so  even if active  it cannot receive information relating to the position  It is useless for you to complain to the app  contact Google and ask to modify Android

Author: Agostino Perri
Review: Ottima app. Si può considerare un promemoria sulle cose da fare per arginare il rischio di contagio da Covid-19, ed una sentinella attiva sui contatti avuti. Il tutto preservando la privacy dell'utente. Impeccabile. Secondo me però, ogni tanto si potrebbe ricevere qualche avviso (magari notizie inerenti il coronavirus) in modo anche da indirizzare l'utente sul posto dove visualizzare le notifiche (quelle importanti). Si tratta comunque, di un piccolo dettaglio per un app molto preziosa.
Title Review: Great app. It can be considered a reminder on what to do to stem the risk of contagion from Covid-19  and an active sentinel on the contacts made. All while preserving the user's privacy. Impeccable. In my opinion  however  from time to time you could receive some alerts (perhaps news related to the coronavirus) in order also to direct the user to the place where to view the notifications (the important ones). However  this is a small detail for a very valuable app.
content: Great app  It can be considered a reminder on what to do to stem the risk of contagion from Covid     and an active sentinel on the contacts made  All while preserving the user s privacy  Impeccable  In my opinion  however  from time to time you could receive some alerts  perhaps news related to the coronavirus  in order also to direct the user to the place where to view the notifications  the important ones   However  this is a small detail for a very valuable app

Complimenti per la semplicità dell' applicazione, Vi auguro buon lavoro ed altri progressi di programmazioni e porgo distinti saluti.
Title Review: I downloaded the Immuni App for civic duty and I want to trust that my privacy is respected and that my most personal data will not be compromised. I live in the Molise region where fortunately few cases of positive Covid 19 have been recorded. I reserve the right to send you further comments after having tested and verified everything. Congratulations on the simplicity of the application  I wish you good work and other programming progress and best regards.

Author: * Oiz *
Review: Un'app che in Italia non ha alcuna utilità, sia per come sono stati (e sono tuttora) gestiti i tamponi e sia per l'obbligatorietà d'uso della stessa, di cui magari i servizi sanitari terranno conto ignorandola a loro volta. Mi fa solo piacere per il team di sviluppo, che merita per qualità di quest'app.
Title Review: An app that has no use in Italy  both for how the tampons have been (and still are) managed and for the mandatory use of the same  which perhaps the health services will take into account by ignoring it in turn. I'm just happy for the development team  who deserve it for the quality of this app.

Non posso dire con certezza che il codice randomico assegnatomi sia sempre lo stesso. Inotre se utilizzo il telefono in thetering sovente il pc perde il wi-fi costringendomi a disabilitare il Bluetooth.
Title Review: I put five stars on trust but in the period that I activated the app (June 6) I have now lost count of all the times I had to reinitialize the app by declaring; after following the guided procedure  region and province of residence. I can't say for sure that the random code assigned to me is always the same. In addition  if I use the phone in thetering often the pc loses the wi-fi forcing me to disable the Bluetooth.
content: I put five stars on trust but in the period that I activated the app  June    I have now lost count of all the times I had to reinitialize the app by declaring  after following the guided procedure  region and province of residence  I can t say for sure that the random code assigned to me is always the same  In addition  if I use the phone in thetering often the pc loses the wi fi forcing me to disable the Bluetooth

Author: Alessandro Suppi
Review: Bah, non mi "attacco" alla privacy, perché diamo davvero il consenso ad ogni minima applicazione, ma la mia domanda è, che uso ha come app? Se non si ha Bluetooth o posizione attiva non serve a nulla, i dati non sono obbligatori o altro, quindi chi la scarica non sempre mette dati se sia contagioso o meno... Quindi ad oggi l'uso di questa app quale sarebbe?!?!
Title Review: Well  I don't "attack" privacy  because we really give consent to every little application  but my question is  what use does it have as an app? If you do not have Bluetooth or an active position  it is useless  the data is not mandatory or anything else  so those who download it do not always put data whether it is contagious or not ... So today what would the use of this app be ?! ?!

Author: Paolo Paolocs

Questo non è un buon incentivo a usare l'app. Per quanto riguarda la praticità nell'uso, sarebbe utile che l'icona cambiasse a seconda se ho Immuni attiva o disattiva
Title Review: Geolocation is mandatory even if the data is not stored  however the other apps on the phone that may be used by us users once in a while and to which we occasionally grant access to the GPS position  with Immuni active will use the data of our geolocation all day ... content: Geolocation is mandatory even if the data is not stored  however the other apps on the phone that may be used by us users once in a while and to which we occasionally grant access to the GPS position  with Immuni active will use the data of our geolocation all day     This is not a good incentive to use the app  As for convenience in use  it would be useful if the icon changed depending on whether I have Immuni on or off

Diventa poco utile se molti non la utilizzano. Scarichiamola tutti per limitare la possibilità di nuove chiusure
Title Review: The App works correctly. I consider it very useful  indeed  indispensable after the reopening. Unfortunately  something related to health leaves too many freedom of use to people in the name of a privacy that we ourselves usually do not consider using so many apps to which we grant all the permissions and make a fuss because it comes from the government even if it is managed anonymously. It becomes of little use if many don't use it. Let's download it all to limit the possibility of new closures

Author: Fabio Rosa
Review: La frase"chi risulta positivo decide se condividere o meno i codici dei telefoni con cui è entrato in contatto" è la più grossa stupidata che cervello umano potesse generare. Se l'app è stata creata per tutelare la salute ed avvisare immediatamente chi è stato contagiato, la comunicazione dovrebbe essere automatica, non a discrezione di qualcuno. Eliminate dall'app questa possibilità, deve essere automatico, altrimenti non serve a nulla questa app.
Title Review: The phrase "who is positive decides whether or not to share the codes of the phones with which he came into contact" is the biggest stupid thing that the human brain could generate. If the app was created to protect health and immediately notify those who have been infected  the communication should be automatic  not at someone's discretion. Eliminate this possibility from the app  it must be automatic  otherwise this app is useless.
content: The phrase  who is positive decides whether or not to share the codes of the phones with which he came into contact  is the biggest stupid thing that the human brain could generate  If the app was created to protect health and immediately notify those who have been infected  the communication should be automatic  not at someone s discretion  Eliminate this possibility from the app  it must be automatic  otherwise this app is useless

Per esempio a me piacerebbe molto avere il numero di contatti memorizzati dal mio dispositivo. Così da avere un esempio di efficacia della App!!
