Author: Luca Rastrelli
Review: Ogni tanto ti manda una notifica per segnalarti che il servizio non è attivo. Ci sta, ma sei obbligato ad aprire l'app e poi richiuderla per togliere la notifica. Questo ovviamente è un problema minore, quello più grande è che distrugge la batteria anche quando non è attivo. Sono passato da 6 ore e mezza di schermo acceso a 4 ore dopo l'installazione. Appena l'ho disinstallata il consumo di batteria è tornato nella norma.
Title Review: Every now and then it sends you a notification to let you know that the service is not active. There is  but you are forced to open the app and then close it to remove the notification. This of course is a minor problem  the bigger one being that it destroys the battery even when it's not active. I went from 6 and a half hours of screen on to 4 hours after installation. As soon as I uninstalled it  the battery consumption returned to normal.
content: Every now and then it sends you a notification to let you know that the service is not active  There is  but you are forced to open the app and then close it to remove the notification  This of course is a minor problem  the bigger one being that it destroys the battery even when it s not active  I went from   and a half hours of screen on to   hours after installation  As soon as I uninstalled it  the battery consumption returned to normal

Author: Ilario
Review: Affinché funzioni correttamente bisogna attivare il permesso globale di accesso alla posizione. Risultato: tutte le app possono accedere alla posizione a meno di impostarle manualmente una ad una; Google ha accesso alla tua posizione; col GPS acceso la batteria si scarica subito. Dare di default l'accesso alla posizione solo a Immuni, sfruttando esclusivamente le celle telefoniche per la posizione, troppo complicato?
Title Review: For this to work correctly  the global access permission to the location must be activated. Result: all apps can access the location unless you manually set them one by one; Google has access to your location; with the GPS on  the battery runs out immediately. To give access to the location by default only to Immuni  using only the cell phones for the location  too complicated?
content: For this to work correctly  the global access permission to the location must be activated  Result  all apps can access the location unless you manually set them one by one  Google has access to your location  with the GPS on  the battery runs out immediately  To give access to the location by default only to Immuni  using only the cell phones for the location  too complicated

Author: Danilo
Review: Immuni richiede bluetooth (BT) attivo per poter svolgere il proprio servizio. Questa potrebbe essere una vera manna per malintenzionati: in rete e' pieno di articoli riguardo bluetooth e sicurezza. Alcuni forse saranno anche delle bufale ma se alcune societa' di antivirus (kaspersky per citarne una) concordano su questo fatto, forse tenere BT sempre acceso, sopratutto in luoghi pubblici e affollati (come richiesto da Immuni) forse non e' una buona pratica per la cybersecurity.
Title Review: Immuni requires active bluetooth (BT) in order to perform its service. This could be a real boon for bad guys: on the net it is full of articles about bluetooth and security. Some may even be hoaxes but if some antivirus companies (kaspersky to name one) agree on this fact  maybe keeping BT on all the time  especially in public and crowded places (as requested by Immuni) maybe it is not a good practice for cybersecurity.
content: Immuni requires active bluetooth  BT  in order to perform its service  This could be a real boon for bad guys  on the net it is full of articles about bluetooth and security  Some may even be hoaxes but if some antivirus companies  kaspersky to name one  agree on this fact  maybe keeping BT on all the time  especially in public and crowded places  as requested by Immuni  maybe it is not a good practice for cybersecurity
syn: secur, secur, perform, servic, servic, order

Author: Vincenzo Caravaglio
Review: Facilissima da installare e, credo molto utile. Dopo qualche tentennamento iniziale, dal 8 Giugno funziona perfettamente. Speriamo che siano in molti ad installarla, ma vedo molto scetticismo per ciò che riguarda la privacy. C'è gente che preferisce morire in assoluta solitudine in un letto di ospedale anziché rischiare problemi con la privacy senza sapere che oramai la rete, immuni o no, sa tutto di ogniuno di noi. Veramente ridicolo.
Title Review: Very easy to install and  I think very useful. After some initial hesitation  from 8 June it works perfectly. Hopefully many will install it  but I see a lot of skepticism when it comes to privacy. There are people who prefer to die in absolute solitude in a hospital bed rather than risk problems with privacy without knowing that now the network  immune or not  knows everything about each of us. Really ridiculous.
content: Very easy to install and  I think very useful  After some initial hesitation  from   June it works perfectly  Hopefully many will install it  but I see a lot of skepticism when it comes to privacy  There are people who prefer to die in absolute solitude in a hospital bed rather than risk problems with privacy without knowing that now the network  immune or not  knows everything about each of us  Really ridiculous

Author: Cosentino Maria Pia
Review: L'app dovrebbe risultare compatibile con TUTTI i vari modelli di smartphone e non solo con i più moderni, vista la sua importanza. Inoltre l'accensione combinata di posizione e bluethoot sovraccarica il sistema e la batteria si scarica molto velocemente: questo è un ulteriore fattore che ti scoraggia dall'installarla/attivarla quando devi rimanere fuori casa per molte ore, senza la possibilità di ricaricare il cellulare. Va senza dubbio migliorata.
Title Review: The app should be compatible with ALL the various smartphone models and not only with the most modern ones  given its importance. In addition  the combined position and bluethoot ignition overloads the system and the battery drains very quickly: this is an additional factor that discourages you from installing / activating it when you have to stay away from home for many hours  without the possibility of recharging the mobile phone. It must undoubtedly be improved.
content: The app should be compatible with ALL the various smartphone models and not only with the most modern ones  given its importance  In addition  the combined position and bluethoot ignition overloads the system and the battery drains very quickly  this is an additional factor that discourages you from installing   activating it when you have to stay away from home for many hours  without the possibility of recharging the mobile phone  It must undoubtedly be improved

Author: renzo briano
Review: Bene la verifica delle eventuali responsabilità penali sul caso Lombardia, però sarebbe necessaria analoga inchiesta nei riguardi di tutti coloro che hanno negato la pandemia, che hanno continuato a comunicare anche in TV che le mascherine non servono, che il virus non è più infettivo, e così via. Tali deliranti ed estremamente dannosi comportamenti hanno indotto molti cittadini a non rispettare il dettato, le disposizioni imposte dalle Autorità, tali fatti dovrebbero configurarsi reati penali.
Title Review: The verification of any criminal responsibility in the Lombardy case is well  however  a similar investigation would be necessary with regard to all those who denied the pandemic  who continued to communicate on TV that the masks are not needed  that the virus is no longer infectious  and etc. These delusional and extremely harmful behaviors have led many citizens to not respect the dictation  the provisions imposed by the Authorities  such facts should be considered criminal offenses.
content: The verification of any criminal responsibility in the Lombardy case is well  however  a similar investigation would be necessary with regard to all those who denied the pandemic  who continued to communicate on TV that the masks are not needed  that the virus is no longer infectious  and etc  These delusional and extremely harmful behaviors have led many citizens to not respect the dictation  the provisions imposed by the Authorities  such facts should be considered criminal offenses

Author: Luisa Andreis
Review: Fondamentale! Per il tracciamento dei contatti un app di questo tipo é fondamentale ed é necessario che la scarichi più gente possibile. Smettiamola di raccontare fandonie sulla privacy e sui dati personali. Non traccia posizione geografica e non necessita di ALCUN dato personale. Comunque il codice é aperto, chiunque abbia dei dubbi può consultarlo e se non sono state sollevate polemiche è perché non infrange nessuna legge sulla privacy. Per favore, scaricatela e installata! È importante!
Title Review: Basic! For contact tracking an app of this type is essential and it is necessary that as many people download it as possible. Let's stop talking about privacy and personal data. It does not track geographic position and does not require ANY personal data. However the code is open  anyone with doubts can consult it and if no controversy has been raised it is because it does not infringe any privacy law. Please download and install it! It's important!
content: Basic  For contact tracking an app of this type is essential and it is necessary that as many people download it as possible  Let s stop talking about privacy and personal data  It does not track geographic position and does not require ANY personal data  However the code is open  anyone with doubts can consult it and if no controversy has been raised it is because it does not infringe any privacy law  Please download and install it  It s important

Author: Francesco Zappasodi
Review: Che questa App rimane in esecuzione in background avevo dei dubbi, ma ora più che mai ho avuto una conferma. La app rimane in nella cake in background come processo ma dopo un certo tempo questo processo non è più presente e dunque non è più in esecuzione, in oltre se immuni viene rimossa dalle schede di App usate di recente, il processo in background viene terminato, va da sé capire che più App usi e più facilmente il processo in background di immuni venga terminato.
Title Review: That this App remains running in the background I had doubts  but now more than ever I have had a confirmation. The app remains in the cake in the background as a process but after a certain time this process is no longer present and therefore is no longer running  in addition if immune is removed from the recently used App tabs  the background process is terminated  it goes without saying that the more apps you use  the easier it is for immuni's background process to be terminated.
content: That this App remains running in the background I had doubts  but now more than ever I have had a confirmation  The app remains in the cake in the background as a process but after a certain time this process is no longer present and therefore is no longer running  in addition if immune is removed from the recently used App tabs  the background process is terminated  it goes without saying that the more apps you use  the easier it is for immuni s background process to be terminated

Title Review: Privacy is a very subtle and subjective concept ... it is violated only when there is something that bothers us and not necessarily the application itself  but the fact of supporting the motivation. Author: Stefano Costa

Author: Ciro Pasquale Lenti
Review: A parte la grafica gradevole dobbiamo giudicare soprattutto se il fine per cui è stata creata è raggiunto. Non mi sembra. Chi è positivo dovrebbe stare a casa in isolamento per cui non dovrei incontrarlo per strada ammesso che lo abbia dichiarato all'operatore! Sono in accordo con chi dice che in questo caso il bene comune dovrebbe prevalere sulla privacy di ognuno di noi e le autorità dovrebbero imporre (come il lockdown) la registrazione dei dati. Gli ideatori ci dovrebbero togliere i dubbi
Title Review: Apart from the pleasant graphics  we have to judge above all if the purpose for which it was created is achieved. I do not think. Those who are positive should stay at home in isolation so I shouldn't meet them on the street if they have declared it to the operator! I agree with those who say that in this case the common good should prevail over the privacy of each of us and the authorities should impose (like the lockdown) the recording of data. The creators should remove our doubts
content: Apart from the pleasant graphics  we have to judge above all if the purpose for which it was created is achieved  I do not think  Those who are positive should stay at home in isolation so I shouldn t meet them on the street if they have declared it to the operator  I agree with those who say that in this case the common good should prevail over the privacy of each of us and the authorities should impose  like the lockdown  the recording of data  The creators should remove our doubts
syn: data, privaci, author, judg, record, remov, creator, author, impos

Review: L'app richiede bluetooth, ma senza GPS il servizio non è attivabile. Non ditemi che la colpa è di Google, o siete in grado di usare solo bluetooth o l'applicazione sarà un FIASCO enorme. Possibile che tutte le task force mobilitate dal governo non riescano a fare generare una applicazione davvero fruibile da TUTTI senza il dubbio che terze parti si approprino di dati così riservati?
Title Review: The app requires bluetooth  but without GPS the service cannot be activated. Don't tell me Google is to blame  or you are only able to use bluetooth or the application will be a huge FIASCO. Is it possible that all the task forces mobilized by the government fail to generate an application that is truly usable by EVERYONE without the doubt that third parties are appropriating such confidential data?

Author: Caterina Simona Pastore

Usiamo tantissime app tutti i giorni, questa probabilmente è l'unica davvero importante al momento.
Title Review: After the problems found on my Huawei mate 20 lite  I installed it again yesterday. The app works great and stays active even in the background. I think an interesting job has been done to ensure functionality while respecting personal privacy. In fact  the app does not access personal information. We use tons of apps every day  this is probably the only one that's really important at the moment.

Author: Mario Fato
Review: Consultando le autorizzazioni richieste dall'app nelle impostazioni del telefono è evidente che non chiede permessi di accesso ai dati. Ma perché l'obbligo di attivare il GPS? La risposta testuale dello sviluppatore: "Nelle impostazioni di sistema, il bluetooth sta sotto le impostazioni di localizzazione. Quindi la localizzazione deve essere attiva per far funzionare il bluetooth". Chi usa e conosce gli smartphone sa benissimo che è un'affermazione falsa! Perché mentire? DISINSTALLATA!!
Title Review: Looking at the permissions requested by the app in the phone settings it is evident that it does not ask for data access permissions. But why the obligation to activate the GPS? The developer's text response: "In system settings  bluetooth is under location settings. So location must be turned on for bluetooth to work." Those who use and know smartphones know very well that this is a false statement! Why lie? Uninstalled !!
content: Looking at the permissions requested by the app in the phone settings it is evident that it does not ask for data access permissions  But why the obligation to activate the GPS  The developer s text response   In system settings  bluetooth is under location settings  So location must be turned on for bluetooth to work   Those who use and know smartphones know very well that this is a false statement  Why lie  Uninstalled

Author: Marco Capponi
Review: Non si riesce a capire se funzioni o meno, bisognerebbe aggiungere un grafico giornaliero dell'attivazione per capire se il telefono la gestisce bene o se la disattiva per il risparmio batteria. Sarebbero utili anche delle statistiche (chiaramente semplificate per la privacy) tipo quanti codici si sono ricevuti al giorno, o ancora meglio quanti contatti "a rischio" si sono avuti, così si sa se l'app funziona e ci si regola sul proprio "stile di vita sociale"
Title Review: It is not possible to understand if it works or not  we should add a daily chart of the activation to understand if the phone manages it well or if it deactivates it for battery saving. Statistics (clearly simplified for privacy) would also be useful  such as how many codes you received per day  or even better how many "at risk" contacts you had  so you know if the app works and you can adjust to your "style" of social life "
content: It is not possible to understand if it works or not  we should add a daily chart of the activation to understand if the phone manages it well or if it deactivates it for battery saving  Statistics  clearly simplified for privacy  would also be useful  such as how many codes you received per day  or even better how many  at risk  contacts you had  so you know if the app works and you can adjust to your  style  of social life

Inoltre chi non la installa non può praticamente muoversi da casa.

Title Review: With my Huawei p20 lite  to install it I had to disable bluetooth ("exposure notifications not activated"). It also does not remain active in the background and to reactivate the service you must deactivate the bluetooth ... 12/06/2020 now it seems to work and remains active also in the background ✌🏻
content: With my Huawei p   lite  to install it I had to disable bluetooth   exposure notifications not activated    It also does not remain active in the background and to reactivate the service you must deactivate the bluetooth                now it seems to work and remains active also in the background

Author: Elisa Andreini
Review: Risolto il problema! Si disattivava appena andava in background su honor 10 lite (android emui 10 aggiornato): dopo essere andato in background, il servizio risultava non più attivo e provando a riattivarlo diceva "notifiche di esposizione non attivate" anche se le notifiche risultano on, disattivando posizione e bluetooth e rientrando nell'applicazione si poteva riattivare il servizio (che però ritornava a disattivarsi appena il telefono va in background)
Title Review: The problem is solved! It was deactivated as soon as it went in the background on honor 10 lite (android emui 10 updated): after going in the background  the service was no longer active and trying to reactivate it said "exposure notifications not activated" even if the notifications are on  deactivating the position and bluetooth and returning to the application you could reactivate the service (which however returned to deactivate as soon as the phone goes in the background)
content: The problem is solved  It was deactivated as soon as it went in the background on honor    lite  android emui    updated   after going in the background  the service was no longer active and trying to reactivate it said  exposure notifications not activated  even if the notifications are on  deactivating the position and bluetooth and returning to the application you could reactivate the service  which however returned to deactivate as soon as the phone goes in the background

Author: Stefano Zennaro
Review: Ottima app, semplice da usare e rispettosa della privacy. Però dovrebbe essere resa obbligatoria a tutti per essere pienamente efficace, se la installerà solamente il 60% deglibitaliani, come prevedono, traccerà solamente il 36% dei contatti. Senplicemente ridicola la legge sulla privacy che non ci tutela dalle mille app che abbiamo sul cellulare e che invece è una barriera nel rendere obbligatoria una app indispensabile alla salute pubblica ed a salvare vite umane. Andrebbe modificata.
Title Review: Great app  simple to use and respectful of privacy. However  it should be made mandatory for everyone to be fully effective  if only 60% of Italians install it  as they predict  only 36% of contacts will trace it. Simply ridiculous is the privacy law which does not protect us from the thousand apps we have on our mobile phones and which instead is a barrier in making an essential app mandatory for public health and saving lives. It should be modified.
content: Great app  simple to use and respectful of privacy  However  it should be made mandatory for everyone to be fully effective  if only     of Italians install it  as they predict  only     of contacts will trace it  Simply ridiculous is the privacy law which does not protect us from the thousand apps we have on our mobile phones and which instead is a barrier in making an essential app mandatory for public health and saving lives  It should be modified

Review: Ottima applicazione la consiglio
Title Review: Excellent application I recommend it
content: Excellent application I recommend it

Author: Ranieri Mileo
Review: Di per sé l'idea mi pare buona e quindi molto utile. ho messo solo 2 stelle xké l'app si disattiva da sola e più volte al giorno. Quindi va controllata molto spesso altrimenti non serve assolutamente a nulla..... Ho scritto della cosa allo sviluppatore ma ho ricevuto la risposta in automatico con scritto: un uso scorretto dell'app può essere pericoloso...... Insomma, le solite cose all'italiana. Aspetto ancora un po' poi credo la disistallerò! In questo modo da solo una falsa sicurezza......
Title Review: In itself the idea seems good and therefore very useful. I only put 2 stars because the app deactivates itself and several times a day. So it must be checked very often otherwise it is absolutely useless ..... I wrote about the thing to the developer but I received the answer automatically with the written: incorrect use of the app can be dangerous ...... In short  the usual Italian things. I wait a little longer then I think I will uninstall it! In this way it gives only a false security ...
content: In itself the idea seems good and therefore very useful  I only put   stars because the app deactivates itself and several times a day  So it must be checked very often otherwise it is absolutely useless       I wrote about the thing to the developer but I received the answer automatically with the written  incorrect use of the app can be dangerous        In short  the usual Italian things  I wait a little longer then I think I will uninstall it  In this way it gives only a false security

Author: Ruben Della Bella
Review: Che il bluetooth sia obbligatorio lo sapevo già, ma che addirittura per rendere il servizio attivo richieda il GPS è strano. Se non acconsento all'attivazione del gps il servizio risulta non in funzione.
Title Review: I already knew that bluetooth is mandatory  but that even to make the service active it requires GPS is strange. If I do not consent to the activation of the GPS  the service is not in operation.
content: I already knew that bluetooth is mandatory  but that even to make the service active it requires GPS is strange  If I do not consent to the activation of the GPS  the service is not in operation

Author: Sky Zen
Review: Google Play Services non é ancora pronto. Che pena. Ma avete pagato anche qualcuno per partorire sta app?
Title Review: Google Play Services is not ready yet. Such a pity. But have you also paid someone to give birth to this app?
content: Google Play Services is not ready yet  Such a pity  But have you also paid someone to give birth to this app

Author: Aleandro Bracci
Review: Come app non sarebbe male, anzi sarebbe molto utile se rinunciando tutti ad un po' di privacy potessimo avere informazioni reali su chi ci sta attorno. Il solo fatto che comunicare la propria positività sia facoltativo e volontario rende vano l'utilizzo di questo strumento o comunque molto vago. Non ho problemi a rinunciare a parte della mia privacy ed in cambio avrei con me uno strumento valido e immediato che mi avviserebbe dei rischi che sto correndo in un luogo chiuso.
Title Review: As an app it would not be bad  indeed it would be very useful if by giving up all a little privacy we could have real information about those around us. The mere fact that communicating one's positivity is optional and voluntary makes the use of this tool vain or very vague. I have no problems giving up part of my privacy and in return I would have with me a valid and immediate tool that would warn me of the risks I am running in a closed place.
content: As an app it would not be bad  indeed it would be very useful if by giving up all a little privacy we could have real information about those around us  The mere fact that communicating one s positivity is optional and voluntary makes the use of this tool vain or very vague  I have no problems giving up part of my privacy and in return I would have with me a valid and immediate tool that would warn me of the risks I am running in a closed place

Author: Massimiliano Lanzi
Review: Tre stelle per grafica e impegno. Trovo però queste precauzioni per la salvaguardia dell'anonimato e dei propri dati decisamente ridicola, come ridicola è la volontarietà dell'installazione dell'applicazione e in caso di positività della comunicazione dei dati. Siamo veramente alla stupidaggine collettiva avallata dalle altrettanto stupide persone responsabili delle istituzioni.
Title Review: Three stars for graphics and commitment. However  I find these precautions for the safeguarding of anonymity and personal data very ridiculous  just as ridiculous is the voluntary nature of installing the application and in case of positive data communication. We are truly the collective stupidity endorsed by the equally stupid responsible people of the institutions.
content: Three stars for graphics and commitment  However  I find these precautions for the safeguarding of anonymity and personal data very ridiculous  just as ridiculous is the voluntary nature of installing the application and in case of positive data communication  We are truly the collective stupidity endorsed by the equally stupid responsible people of the institutions

Review: Funziona solo su base volontaria. Se il contagiato di sua spontanea iniziativa non comunica l'identificativo all'operatore sanitario, l'app non rileva il pericolo di contagio
Title Review: It only works on a voluntary basis. If the infected person on his own initiative does not communicate the identification to the health worker  the app does not detect the risk of contagion
content: It only works on a voluntary basis  If the infected person on his own initiative does not communicate the identification to the health worker  the app does not detect the risk of contagion

Title Review: Who is the healthcare provider to communicate the code to?

Author: Luigi Leopardi
Review: Disinstallata immediatamente, non per problemi di privacy, ma perché non ho nessuna intenzione di limitare la durata delle batterie mantenendo attiva inutilmente la geolocalizzatore. Quando eleminerete questo problema prenderò nuovamente in considerazione l'utilizzo dell'applicazione
Title Review: Uninstalled immediately  not for privacy concerns  but because I have no intention of limiting the battery life by unnecessarily keeping the geolocation active. When you eliminate this problem  I will consider using the application again
content: Uninstalled immediately  not for privacy concerns  but because I have no intention of limiting the battery life by unnecessarily keeping the geolocation active  When you eliminate this problem  I will consider using the application again

Author: Claudia Giorgini
Review: Ho al momento pochissimi elementi x esprimere un giudizio. Ma 2 aspetti critici da menzionare sono: è possibile che avere sempre attivi Bluetooth e localizzatore generi la possibilità di ricevere spam via Sms? Perché a me è capitato! E poi tenere queste 2 funzioni sempre accese comporta un consumo eccessivo della batteria.
Title Review: At the moment I have very few elements to express an opinion. But 2 critical aspects to mention are: is it possible that having Bluetooth and locator always active generates the possibility of receiving spam via SMS? Because it happened to me! And then keeping these 2 functions always on leads to excessive consumption of the battery.
content: At the moment I have very few elements to express an opinion  But   critical aspects to mention are  is it possible that having Bluetooth and locator always active generates the possibility of receiving spam via SMS  Because it happened to me  And then keeping these   functions always on leads to excessive consumption of the battery

Author: Roberto Casciaro
Review: Applicazione semplice da utilizzare, sorgenti aperti e disponibili, peccato che Android forzi l'accensione del GPS per avere le notifiche, questo non accade con altri sistemi operativi. Il giudizio rimane immutato perché non lo posso migliorare, la uso ormai da una settimana e non ha avuto impatti negativi sul consumo energetico e sul traffico dati al momento le attese sembrano mantenute. Bravi 🖒
Title Review: Simple application to use  open and available sources  too bad that Android forces the GPS to turn on to get notifications  this does not happen with other operating systems. The judgment remains unchanged because I cannot improve it  I have been using it for a week now and it has not had a negative impact on energy consumption and data traffic. At the moment the expectations seem to be maintained. Well done 🖒
content: Simple application to use  open and available sources  too bad that Android forces the GPS to turn on to get notifications  this does not happen with other operating systems  The judgment remains unchanged because I cannot improve it  I have been using it for a week now and it has not had a negative impact on energy consumption and data traffic  At the moment the expectations seem to be maintained  Well done

Author: Ernesto Manfrin
Review: Sono in una regione diversa da dove mi trovo attualmente e risiedo spesso. Ho da poco installato l'applicazione. Quale regione devo indicare? Quella dove ho la residenza o il luogo dove mi trovo?
Title Review: I am in a different region from where I am currently and I often reside. I have recently installed the application. Which region should I indicate? The one where I have my residence or the place where I am?
content: I am in a different region from where I am currently and I often reside  I have recently installed the application  Which region should I indicate  The one where I have my residence or the place where I am

Author: Matteo Silvestro
Review: Apprezzo moltissimo il lavoro fatto per questa app, con un'attenzione maniacale a preservare la privacy personale e il codice completamente open source. La tecnologia utilizzata è anche piuttosto intrigante nella sua semplicità. Ora siamo noi a dover fare la nostra parte, installando quest'app (estremamente poco invasiva).
Title Review: I really appreciate the work done on this app  with an obsessive focus on preserving personal privacy and completely open source code. The technology used is also quite intriguing in its simplicity. Now we have to do our part by installing this app (extremely non-invasive).
content: I really appreciate the work done on this app  with an obsessive focus on preserving personal privacy and completely open source code  The technology used is also quite intriguing in its simplicity  Now we have to do our part by installing this app  extremely non invasive

Author: Maria Oriolo
Review: Non ho trovato difficoltà in questa app...è facile e non traccia nulla di personale, non capisco le polemiche sulla privacy in quanto non richiede di accedere a nulla di personale, solo la provincia di appartenenza. Spero che la scaricano in tanti altrimenti sarà inutile!
Title Review: I have not found any difficulty in this app ... it is easy and does not track anything personal  I do not understand the controversy about privacy as it does not require you to access anything personal  only the province of belonging. I hope that many people download it otherwise it will be useless!
content: I have not found any difficulty in this app     it is easy and does not track anything personal  I do not understand the controversy about privacy as it does not require you to access anything personal  only the province of belonging  I hope that many people download it otherwise it will be useless

Review: App ben fatta, sviluppata bene e in tempi celeri. Grafica carina e intuitiva. Sarebbe da ottimizzare l'utilizzo della batteria e la condivisione dati con gli altri dispositivi!
Title Review: Well done app  well developed and quickly. Nice and intuitive graphics. Battery usage and data sharing with other devices should be optimized!
content: Well done app  well developed and quickly  Nice and intuitive graphics  Battery usage and data sharing with other devices should be optimized

Author: Michele Fattori
Review: Dopo l'ultima recensione negativa, devo fare una rettifica poiché le ultime versioni hanno risolto i problemi che avvenivano sui terminali Huawei ed ora l'app rimane sempre attiva. Resta ancora poco chiaro su come uno dovrebbe comportarsi per segnalare che è positivo: l'app genera un codice da fornire poi all'operatore sanitario ma non si capisce come quest'ultimo dovrebbe essere contattato (112? Numero verde?...)
Title Review: After the last negative review  I have to make a correction since the latest versions have solved the problems that occurred on Huawei terminals and now the app is always active. It is still unclear how one should behave to signal that it is positive: the app generates a code to be provided to the healthcare provider but it is not clear how the latter should be contacted (112? Toll-free number? ...)
content: After the last negative review  I have to make a correction since the latest versions have solved the problems that occurred on Huawei terminals and now the app is always active  It is still unclear how one should behave to signal that it is positive  the app generates a code to be provided to the healthcare provider but it is not clear how the latter should be contacted       Toll free number

Title Review: A small suggestion: you could insert a sort of reward system through which  by keeping the application activated  you can unlock the objectives and levels  in order to encourage the use by the little ones.
content: A small suggestion  you could insert a sort of reward system through which  by keeping the application activated  you can unlock the objectives and levels  in order to encourage the use by the little ones

Title Review: I had no problem installing it  much less I will have to use it since it is in my and others' interest. As for privacy  it is now constantly violated for the most disparate reasons  from which we cannot defend ourselves  so the problem does not arise.
content: I had no problem installing it  much less I will have to use it since it is in my and others  interest  As for privacy  it is now constantly violated for the most disparate reasons  from which we cannot defend ourselves  so the problem does not arise

Title Review: I would like to know who is the health worker to whom to communicate the code to enter the data
content: I would like to know who is the health worker to whom to communicate the code to enter the data

Author: Stefan Plank
Review: Inwieweit die App zur Eindämmung beiträgt, sei mal dahingestellt. Die Zuverlässigkeit nimmt sicher mit der Anzahl der Benutzer zu. Die Idee ist nicht schlecht und hier sieht man auch klar den Vorteil von Open Source Software gegenüber proprietären Blackboxen (Büchsen der Pandora?). Der Quellcode ist offen und kann von jedem/er eingesehen werden, womit die Datensammelwütigen entlarvt würden. Aus (gerechtfertigten) Privacygründen, sicherlich eine gute Realisierung. Brav.
Title Review: To what extent the app will contribute to containment remains to be seen. The reliability certainly increases with the number of users. The idea is not bad and here you can clearly see the advantage of open source software over proprietary black boxes (Pandora's boxes?). The source code is open and can be viewed by anyone  which would expose the data collector. For (justified) privacy reasons  certainly a good implementation. Well-behaved.
content: To what extent the app will contribute to containment remains to be seen  The reliability certainly increases with the number of users  The idea is not bad and here you can clearly see the advantage of open source software over proprietary black boxes  Pandora s boxes    The source code is open and can be viewed by anyone  which would expose the data collector  For  justified  privacy reasons  certainly a good implementation  Well behaved

Author: Emilio Massari
Review: Bene, adesso funziona e spero che in tanti la usino tuttavia, avrei preferito sapere in tempo reale se nelle mie immediate vicinanze ci fosse una persona contagiata, non capisco la corsa alla privacy in emergenze simili e Cmq a prescindere non la condivido. Chi non ha nulla da nascondere non teme niente, così nella vita privata che pubblica. Grazie di cuore agli sviluppatori. Saluti
Title Review: Well  now it works and I hope that many use it however  I would have preferred to know in real time if there was an infected person in my immediate vicinity  I do not understand the rush to privacy in similar emergencies and anyway I do not agree with it. Those who have nothing to hide fear nothing  both in private and public life. Heartfelt thanks to the developers. Regards
content: Well  now it works and I hope that many use it however  I would have preferred to know in real time if there was an infected person in my immediate vicinity  I do not understand the rush to privacy in similar emergencies and anyway I do not agree with it  Those who have nothing to hide fear nothing  both in private and public life  Heartfelt thanks to the developers  Regards

Alcuni dicono che è tutta una bufala, ma non è vero! Immuni è un'app progettata per la nostra tutela, la tutela degli italiani! E quando lo stato dice la verità io gli credo!!!!
Title Review: I had downloaded it  but I uninstalled it because they said it violates privacy  but that's absolutely not true! The Prime Minister Conte also said it. Some say it's all a hoax  but that's not true! Immuni is an app designed for our protection  the protection of Italians! And when the state tells the truth I believe it !!!!
content: I had downloaded it  but I uninstalled it because they said it violates privacy  but that s absolutely not true  The Prime Minister Conte also said it  Some say it s all a hoax  but that s not true  Immuni is an app designed for our protection  the protection of Italians  And when the state tells the truth I believe it

Author: Lello Anto
Review: Mi pare di aver capito che se scopro di essere positivo POSSO decidere di condividere tale informazione in modo da tutelare le persone che ho "incrociato". È quel "posso" che vanifica tutto. Credevo che i codici fossero trasmessi in automatico s chi di competenza. Io immagino anche che qualche asintomatico preferisca tacere per evitare ulteriori reclusioni.
Title Review: I seem to have understood that if I discover that I am positive I CAN decide to share this information in order to protect the people I "met". It is that "I can" that frustrates everything. I believed that the codes were transmitted automatically to whoever was responsible. I also imagine that some asymptomatics prefer to keep quiet to avoid further imprisonment.
content: I seem to have understood that if I discover that I am positive I CAN decide to share this information in order to protect the people I  met   It is that  I can  that frustrates everything  I believed that the codes were transmitted automatically to whoever was responsible  I also imagine that some asymptomatics prefer to keep quiet to avoid further imprisonment

Author: L_Innominato
Review: L'app di per sé è bella da vedere. È open source, cosa direi fondamentale per un app di questo genere. Non ti spia, altra cosa necessaria. Ha qualche problemino di instabilità ogni tanto, ma è trascurabile. L'elefante nella stanza è il problema con i telefoni del cà di Huawei che, essendo dei bidoni, ovviamente dovevano avere dei problemi con l'app. Per fortuna non è un problema mio, ma vista la spropositata quantità di quei telefoni spazzatura in Italia, è un problema serio per l'app
Title Review: The app itself is beautiful to look at. It is open source  which I would say is fundamental for an app of this kind. He does not spy on you  another necessary thing. It has a few problems with instability every now and then  but it is negligible. The elephant in the room is the problem with Huawei's ca phones which  being bins  obviously had to have problems with the app. Thankfully it's not my problem  but given the disproportionate amount of those junk phones in Italy  it's a serious problem for the app.
content: The app itself is beautiful to look at  It is open source  which I would say is fundamental for an app of this kind  He does not spy on you  another necessary thing  It has a few problems with instability every now and then  but it is negligible  The elephant in the room is the problem with Huawei s ca phones which  being bins  obviously had to have problems with the app  Thankfully it s not my problem  but given the disproportionate amount of those junk phones in Italy  it s a serious problem for the app

Author: sued

Author: Lorenzo Rossi
Review: App funzionante e ben realizzata, complimenti agli sviluppatori! Mi dispiace solo che siano state sollevate così tante polemiche inutili e del tutto infondate su questo progetto. Invito tutti a informarsi sul funzionamento dell'app (è tutto open source, trovate i repositories su github), per capire che è sicura e la privacy è davvero tutelata. Non capisco neanche chi sostiene che l'app sia inutile: se pure dovesse rivelarsi inutile, che ci costa scaricarla e provarci almeno?
Title Review: App working and well done  congratulations to the developers! I am only sorry that so many unnecessary and totally unfounded controversies have been raised about this project. I invite everyone to inquire about the functioning of the app (it's all open source  find the repositories on github)  to understand that it is safe and privacy is really protected. I don't even understand those who claim that the app is useless: even if it turns out to be useless  what will it cost us to download it and at least try?
content: App working and well done  congratulations to the developers  I am only sorry that so many unnecessary and totally unfounded controversies have been raised about this project  I invite everyone to inquire about the functioning of the app  it s all open source  find the repositories on github   to understand that it is safe and privacy is really protected  I don t even understand those who claim that the app is useless  even if it turns out to be useless  what will it cost us to download it and at least try

Title Review: To work it requires the GPS always active  this leads to 2 negative effects: first of all the really excessive battery consumption and then the possibility of the other apps (to which the permissions have been granted) to be able to geolocate the device ... what is it for advertise respect for privacy a lot if the app forces you to keep active a service through which others collect the data of my movements?

Encouraging serological and swabs when the alarm is triggered can help their spread.

Title Review: However  since the app is very wasteful of battery (mainly for GPS) it is obvious that users have to turn it off several times. It would therefore be very useful to have a top stable notification reminding you when the service is active  so as not to forget to reactivate it.

Riattiva Immuni" come l'app non stesse funzionando in background
Title Review: UPDATE: solved problems on Huawei The app is light and intuitive. PROBLEMS: during the first use  to "enable the notifications of exposure to covid-19" you must  inexplicably  turn off the bluetooth and do "Allow" on the app; another problem is that by closing the app and reopening it  the message "Service not active. Reactivate Immuni" appears as the app was not running in the background
content: UPDATE  solved problems on Huawei The app is light and intuitive  PROBLEMS  during the first use  to  enable the notifications of exposure to covid     you must  inexplicably  turn off the bluetooth and do  Allow  on the app  another problem is that by closing the app and reopening it  the message  Service not active  Reactivate Immuni  appears as the app was not running in the background

Author: Marco Busca
Review: La app è leggera, intuitiva e abbastanza semplice. Problemi di privacy non ce ne sono quindi tutti quelli che hanno fatto terrorismo psicologico si dovrebbero vergognare. Al momento la app è inutile ma in futuro sarà importante. Quello che si dovrebbe migliorare è che chi è positivo al tampone debba obbligatoriamente scaricare la app e la asl della sua regione immettere i dati della positività tutto in modo da garantire la privacy. Voto vero: 3 stelle ma ho dato 5 stelle per aumentare il voto.
Title Review: The app is light  intuitive and quite simple. There are no privacy problems so all those who have made psychological terrorism should be ashamed. At the moment the app is useless but in the future it will be important. What should be improved is that those who are positive to the swab must necessarily download the app and the ASL of their region enter the data of the positivity all in order to ensure privacy. True rating: 3 stars but I gave 5 stars to increase the rating.
content: The app is light  intuitive and quite simple  There are no privacy problems so all those who have made psychological terrorism should be ashamed  At the moment the app is useless but in the future it will be important  What should be improved is that those who are positive to the swab must necessarily download the app and the ASL of their region enter the data of the positivity all in order to ensure privacy  True rating    stars but I gave   stars to increase the rating
syn: region, data, privaci, enter, import, order

Author: Pasquale Sofi
Review: Lunedì mattina prendo atto del codice e cerco di comunicarlo all'operatore sanitario. All'ospedale di Pescara nessuno sa niente e nel pomeriggio il mio medico curante cade dalle nuvole. Però comunica il codice del momento alla ASL. Mi preoccupa la scritta in rosso e da quel momento cerco la conferma dell'operazione che al momento non è mai arrivata e rimango in attesa di una chiamata per un tampone richiesto da subito.
Title Review: On Monday morning I take note of the code and try to communicate it to the health worker. At the Pescara hospital nobody knows anything and in the afternoon my doctor falls from the clouds. But communicate the code of the moment to the ASL. I am worried about the writing in red and from that moment on I look for the confirmation of the operation that at the moment has never arrived and I am waiting for a call for a tampon requested immediately.
content: On Monday morning I take note of the code and try to communicate it to the health worker  At the Pescara hospital nobody knows anything and in the afternoon my doctor falls from the clouds  But communicate the code of the moment to the ASL  I am worried about the writing in red and from that moment on I look for the confirmation of the operation that at the moment has never arrived and I am waiting for a call for a tampon requested immediately

Teniamoci pure stretta stretta la nostra privacy, ma così non può funzionare. Inutile. Il nostro è un paese fantastico per certi versi, ma se per una volta c'è bisogno di più coraggio per il bene comune, magari a discapito della privacy.. 👎🏻
Title Review: Unfortunately  as it is  it is a useless app  too conditioned by the choices of individuals: you can decide whether to download it or not  you can decide whether or not to give consent to notifications  if you keep the Bluetooth deactivated it cannot work ... and so on. Let's keep our privacy tight  but that can't work. Needless. Ours is a fantastic country in some ways  but if for once more courage is needed for the common good  perhaps at the expense of privacy .. 👎🏻
content: Unfortunately  as it is  it is a useless app  too conditioned by the choices of individuals  you can decide whether to download it or not  you can decide whether or not to give consent to notifications  if you keep the Bluetooth deactivated it cannot work     and so on  Let s keep our privacy tight  but that can t work  Needless  Ours is a fantastic country in some ways  but if for once more courage is needed for the common good  perhaps at the expense of privacy

In short  download it! 💪🏼

Author: Lorenzo Gramaglia
Review: Questa applicazione, a parer mio, serve solamente a rubare dati personali alle persone che la scaricano per poi venderli sul mercato nero. Questa app non è stata sviluppata dal ministero della salute stesso, ma da alcune aziende private. E quindi, alla fine, cosa ne sarà dei nostri dati in mano a questi privati? Non c'è un senso logico, perché una app del genere non può sapere così a caso se uno è positivo o no.
Title Review: This application  in my opinion  only serves to steal personal data from people who download it and then sell it on the black market. This app was not developed by the ministry of health itself  but by some private companies. And so  in the end  what will become of our data in the hands of these individuals? There is no logical sense  because such an app cannot know so randomly whether one is positive or not.

Very good at publishing the source on GitHub  even better in execution mode. As a developer  I can't help but say "Hats off" after taking a look at the code. There is no excuse not to install it  unless there are conspiratorial biases fueled by a certain political environment that speaks for itself. Luckily they would like our "good".

Review: L'installazione risulta facile e veloce, così in un attimo si può godere di una "protezione" aggiuntiva nel caso si venisse a contatto con potenziali infetti (che si spera abbiano anch'essi l'applicazione installata e funzionante). Ovviamente, avere questa applicazione non esclude il rispetto delle norme per il contenimento della diffusione del virus.
Title Review: Installation is quick and easy  so in a moment you can enjoy additional "protection" in case you come into contact with potential infected (who hopefully also have the application installed and running). Obviously  having this application does not exclude compliance with the rules for containing the spread of the virus.

Author: Marco Qu
Review: Avevo fortissimi dubbi in merito, ma mi sono dovuto ricredere. Ho letto tutto il codice, opensource leggibile da chiunque, per vedere eventuali chiamate fatte ai server: dal punto di vista della privacy è fatta benissimo. Addirittura non fa fare screenshot per evitare che qualsiasi dato sensibile vengo divulgato. Ottimo design. L'uso del GPS è dovuto strettamente a come funziona Android per far funzionare a dovere il bluetooth. Nessuno vi traccia nessuno sa dove andate e cosa fate.
Title Review: I had very strong doubts about it  but I had to change my mind. I read all the code  opensource readable by anyone  to see any calls made to the servers: from the point of view of privacy it is done very well. It even does not take screenshots to prevent any sensitive data from being disclosed. Great design. The use of GPS is strictly due to how Android works to make bluetooth work properly. Nobody tracks you nobody knows where you go and what you do.
content: I had very strong doubts about it  but I had to change my mind  I read all the code  opensource readable by anyone  to see any calls made to the servers  from the point of view of privacy it is done very well  It even does not take screenshots to prevent any sensitive data from being disclosed  Great design  The use of GPS is strictly due to how Android works to make bluetooth work properly  Nobody tracks you nobody knows where you go and what you do

Author: Antonio Triolo
Review: L'applicazione in sé non è male ma... Direi che c'è qualcosa di strano: dite che non tracciate i miei movimenti, ma allora perché se disattivo il GPS mi dice "riattiva immuni"?? 😅 Se non geolocalizzate la persona allora per cosa vi serve? Poi anche la batteria si consumerà più in fretta. Già siamo tracciati giornalmente tra social e cose varie, ci manca anche questo. Ecco perché le mie due stelle, credo che la cancellerò.
Title Review: The application itself is not bad but ... I would say that there is something strange: you say that you do not track my movements  but then why if I deactivate the GPS it tells me "reactivate immune"? 😅 If you don't geolocate the person then what do you need it for? Then the battery will also wear out faster. We are already tracked daily between social networks and various things  we also miss this. That's why my two stars  I think I'll delete it
content: The application itself is not bad but     I would say that there is something strange  you say that you do not track my movements  but then why if I deactivate the GPS it tells me  reactivate immune     If you don t geolocate the person then what do you need it for  Then the battery will also wear out faster  We are already tracked daily between social networks and various things  we also miss this  That s why my two stars  I think I ll delete it

Author: Nicola Vighi
Review: Installata appena rilasciata, trovo veramente difficile capire se sia in funzione oppure no. Pur avendo dato tutti i permessi richiesti circa l'auto avvio e l'ottimizzazione della batteria, quando la consulto vedo che ci mette sempre un po' di tempo prima di avviarsi, ingenerando il dubbio che non fosse attiva. Visto che il mio contapassi si avvia sempre autonomamente e rimane attivo anche dopo le normali operazioni di pulizia, non si potrebbe farla funzionare in maniera analoga? Oltre a ciò, non ritenete possa essere utili mettere un'iconcina nella barra notifiche (come tante altre applicazioni) in modo da sapere sempre con un colpo d'occhio se l'app è attiva o meno? Grazie
Title Review: Installed as soon as it was released  I find it really difficult to understand whether it is working or not. Although I have given all the required permissions regarding auto start and battery optimization  when I consult it I see that it always takes some time to start up  creating the doubt that it was not active. Since my pedometer always starts up autonomously and remains active even after normal cleaning operations  couldn't it be made to work in the same way? In addition to this  don't you think it would be useful to put a small icon in the notification bar (like many other applications) so that you always know at a glance if the app is active or not? Thank you
content: Installed as soon as it was released  I find it really difficult to understand whether it is working or not  Although I have given all the required permissions regarding auto start and battery optimization  when I consult it I see that it always takes some time to start up  creating the doubt that it was not active  Since my pedometer always starts up autonomously and remains active even after normal cleaning operations  couldn t it be made to work in the same way  In addition to this  don t you think it would be useful to put a small icon in the notification bar  like many other applications  so that you always know at a glance if the app is active or not  Thank you

Non essendo obbligatorio il suo utilizzo, chi risulterebbe positivo al virus, potrebbe non usarla o disattiverebbe il servizio. D'altro canto chi potrebbe dargli torto, si vedrebbe violata la privacy, verrebbe allontanato dai servizi più comuni e dalla gente verrebbe additato come un appestato.. con il seguente impoverimento emotivo e salutare. Non é la soluzione giusta. Troppo tempo per l'uso di massa confidando nell'onestà.

It is not the right solution. Too much time for mass use relying on honesty.

Author: Andrea Cavallaro

Author: Angela Sclaunich
Review: Intuitiva e fatta molto bene, considerando la volontarietà , dell'individuo nello scaricare questa app e nell'inserimento dati se una persona risulta positiva al Covid. Credo che alla fine sia anche utile come monitoraggio e ai fini statistici. Metto 3 stelle perché senza l'uso della geolocalizzazione (consuma notevolmente la batteria) il modello Hawuei, con il solo Bluetooth non funziona. Magari si potesse risolvere questo problema, ma credo non sia di facile risoluzioneQuindi vedrò nel tempo.
Title Review: Intuitive and very well done  considering the voluntariness of the individual in downloading this app and entering data if a person tests positive for Covid. I believe that in the end it is also useful for monitoring and statistical purposes. I put 3 stars because without the use of geolocation (it consumes the battery considerably) the Hawuei model does not work with only Bluetooth. Maybe we could solve this problem  but I think it's not easy to solve So I'll see over time.
content: Intuitive and very well done  considering the voluntariness of the individual in downloading this app and entering data if a person tests positive for Covid  I believe that in the end it is also useful for monitoring and statistical purposes  I put   stars because without the use of geolocation  it consumes the battery considerably  the Hawuei model does not work with only Bluetooth  Maybe we could solve this problem  but I think it s not easy to solve So I ll see over time

Un "grazie" é il minimo che questi ragazzi si meritano. E l' app funziona benissimo, ottimo lavoro!
Title Review: For all those who complain: the developers have worked hard in the previous months and with no personal gain (other than advertising) to help our country get up and return to our lives with some extra security. A "thank you" is the least these guys deserve. And the app works great  great job!
content: For all those who complain  the developers have worked hard in the previous months and with no personal gain  other than advertising  to help our country get up and return to our lives with some extra security  A  thank you  is the least these guys deserve  And the app works great  great job

Title Review: App  arrived even late  installed immediately. In serious cases of pandemics  privacy could also be temporarily set aside  as long as it is aimed at protecting public health. We are already heavily controlled. It had to be made obligatory! So it's worth little.

Author: Filo Campa
Review: RESOLVED so 4 ★ When I switch from Immuni to another app (leaving: Immuni open, bluetooh and location on) and return to Immuni, it says me service inactive. If I try to reactivate it I get this message: GPlay Services isn't ready yet, error code 39501. For reactivate Immuni I have to turn off bluetooth and location, from Immuni re-enable notification (so bluetooth and location return on by Immuni). Until I will switch to another app and this cycle restart again [Oneplus 1 Lineage 16.0-Android 9]
Title Review: RESOLVED so 4 ★ When I switch from Immuni to another app (leaving: Immuni open  bluetooh and location on) and return to Immuni  it says me service inactive. For reactivate Immuni I have to turn off bluetooth and location  from Immuni re-enable notification (so bluetooth and location return on by Immuni). Until I will switch to another app and this cycle restart again [Oneplus 1 Lineage 16.0-Android 9]

Author: Antonio Di Landro
Review: Per farla funzionare sul mio Huawey ho dovuto leggere i suggerimenti di altri utenti!!! Occorre lasciare disattivato il Bluetooth quando si configura, se no da sempre messaggio di errore sulle notifiche. Questo non è normale. Queste info devono risiedere nell'app. Vediamo come funziona. Dopo il primo aggiornamento adesso non si scollega più. Spero che anche tutto il resto funzioni adesso bene.
Title Review: To make it work on my Huawey I had to read the suggestions of other users !!! You must leave Bluetooth disabled when configuring  otherwise it always has an error message on notifications. This is not normal. This info must reside in the app. Let's see how it works. After the first update  it no longer disconnects. Hope everything else works fine now too.
content: To make it work on my Huawey I had to read the suggestions of other users     You must leave Bluetooth disabled when configuring  otherwise it always has an error message on notifications  This is not normal  This info must reside in the app  Let s see how it works  After the first update  it no longer disconnects  Hope everything else works fine now too

Title Review: The application would be more usable if it warned in real time of a contact and understand the functionality of having been in contact with a positive  if you are positive you should not be in contact with the public but in isolation  and this scares a positive around what does it do to us.

Author: AleGaming Italy
Review: Non trovo molto utile un app che facilmente si può aggirare o disattivare, molti non hanno ancora capito che l'unico modo per vedere e proteggere chi non sia contagiato è fare il tampone a tutti.. solo così sapremo chi davvero può contagiare gli altri, in questo modo con app riduciamo soltanto la vita della batteria. Se uno è positivo non esce di casa punto. Se risulta positivo dopo essere stato a contattato con altri facciamo il tampone a tutti e risolto prima ancora. Che vergogna..
Title Review: I do not find an app very useful that can easily be bypassed or deactivated  many have not yet understood that the only way to see and protect those who are not infected is to swab everyone .. only in this way we will know who really can infect others  in this way with the app we only reduce the battery life. If one is positive  he does not leave the house. If it is positive after being in contact with others we swab everyone and solved it beforehand. What a shame..

I had given a negative review for this but Immuni is not to blame.

Author: Federico Bartoccioni
Review: MANCATA RICHIESTA DI UTILIZZO DELLA GEOLOCALIZZAZIONE E MAL PROGETTATA. Se si disattiva la geolocalizzazione, l'app smette di funzionare. Altre app (sicuramente non gestite dal governo), chiedono il permesso per usare la posizione. Se lo scambio del codice è via bluetooth, a cosa serve la geolocalizzazione??? Ho appreso che per avere un riscontro positivo è necessario essere a meno di 2 metri e per un periodo di tempo di almeno 15 minuti. Per essere contagiati basta uno starnuto... App INUTILE.
Title Review: NO REQUEST FOR USE OF THE GEOLOCALIZATION AND BADLY DESIGNED. If you disable geolocation  the app stops working. Other apps (definitely not government-run) ask for permission to use the location. If the code exchange is via bluetooth  what is the geolocation for ??? I have learned that to have a positive feedback it is necessary to be within 2 meters and for a period of time of at least 15 minutes. A sneeze is enough to be infected ... USELESS app.
content: NO REQUEST FOR USE OF THE GEOLOCALIZATION AND BADLY DESIGNED  If you disable geolocation  the app stops working  Other apps  definitely not government run  ask for permission to use the location  If the code exchange is via bluetooth  what is the geolocation for     I have learned that to have a positive feedback it is necessary to be within   meters and for a period of time of at least    minutes  A sneeze is enough to be infected     USELESS app

E con la caterva di app che ciascuno si è scaricato sul proprio cellulare, è al limite del ridicolo stare a sofisticare su questa app, che comunque funziona e bene pure.
Title Review: To understand how it works just read. Any criticism I have read so far is based only on hearsay and "in my opinion"  usually expressed by the boiler technician who speaks of epidemics or the epidemiologist who speaks of air conditioners. And with the multitude of apps that everyone has downloaded on their mobile phone  it is almost ridiculous to be sophisticated about this app  which still works and works well as well.

Author: Zander Flyarty
Review: L'app si avvia e configura correttamente su Samsung A20, ma non resta in background e non visualizza una notifica fissa per controllarne lo stato. Per coloro che hanno paura della privacy GPS, basta controllare le autorizzazioni per app, si vedrà che non richiede il permesso per uso della geolocalizzazione, ma non è chiaro come mai l'app monitori lo stato del GPS(solo quello), presumo che possa essere utilizzato in caso di match positivo con bluetooth. Bah, vedremo se ha una qualche utilità!
Title Review: The app starts and configures correctly on Samsung A20  but it doesn't stay in the background and doesn't display a fixed notification to check its status. For those who are afraid of GPS privacy  just check the permissions per app  you will see that it does not require permission for use of geolocation  but it is not clear why the app monitors the status of the GPS (only that)  I assume it can be used in case of positive match with bluetooth. Bah  we'll see if it has any use!
content: The app starts and configures correctly on Samsung A    but it doesn t stay in the background and doesn t display a fixed notification to check its status  For those who are afraid of GPS privacy  just check the permissions per app  you will see that it does not require permission for use of geolocation  but it is not clear why the app monitors the status of the GPS  only that   I assume it can be used in case of positive match with bluetooth  Bah  we ll see if it has any use

Author: Chiara Storsillo
Review: Penso sia utile ma da migliorare, dato che non c'è una notifica immediata quando l'applicazione non è attiva, ad esempio se il bluetooth fosse spento. Un upgrade potrebbe essere fornire una prenotazione automatica per un tampone contemporaneamente alla ricezione di una notifica di esposizione al covid. In questo modo se fossi a rischio potrei subito verificarlo.
Title Review: I think it is useful but to improve  since there is no immediate notification when the application is not active  for example if the bluetooth is turned off. An upgrade could be providing an automatic reservation for a tampon at the same time as receiving a covid exposure notification. That way if I were at risk I could check it out right away.
content: I think it is useful but to improve  since there is no immediate notification when the application is not active  for example if the bluetooth is turned off  An upgrade could be providing an automatic reservation for a tampon at the same time as receiving a covid exposure notification  That way if I were at risk I could check it out right away

Author: Valentina Triggiani
Review: Avevo scaricato l'applicazione il giorno che è stata rilasciata, ma possedendo un dispositivo Huawei dell'anno scorso (ancora dotato ovviamente di play service) avevo riscontrato il problema della mancanza della voce notifiche di esposizione al covid 19 nelle impostazioni di sicurezza di Google. Stasera ho aperto per caso Immuni e ho notato che funzionava. Dopo aver controllato la voce notifiche di esposizione confermo che ora è presente, non so dire di preciso da quanto, ma ora funziona tutto!
Title Review: I had downloaded the application the day it was released  but having a Huawei device from last year (obviously still equipped with play service) I had encountered the problem of the lack of the voice notifications of exposure to covid 19 in the Google security settings. I accidentally opened Immuni tonight and noticed it worked. After checking the exposure notifications item I confirm that it is now present  I can't say exactly how long  but now everything works!
content: I had downloaded the application the day it was released  but having a Huawei device from last year  obviously still equipped with play service  I had encountered the problem of the lack of the voice notifications of exposure to covid    in the Google security settings  I accidentally opened Immuni tonight and noticed it worked  After checking the exposure notifications item I confirm that it is now present  I can t say exactly how long  but now everything works

Author: Michael Carosella
Review: Fatta bene, semplice ed intuitiva ma il fatto che debba per forza avere il GPS acceso non mi va giù. Non per privacy (so che l'app non acquisisce la posizione), ma per la batteria!! - 3% in 10 minuti su un telefono di fascia alta con 6 mesi di vita. Poi, mi spiace dirlo, ma il fatto che la comunicazione dell'eventuale positività al virus sia "opzionale" e lasciata al senso civico (come la mascherina e la distanza sociale) mi dice che purtroppo non servirà quasi a nulla. Peccato.
Title Review: Done well  simple and intuitive but the fact that it must necessarily have the GPS on does not go down well with me. Not for privacy (I know the app doesn't acquire location)  but for the battery !! - 3% in 10 minutes on a high-end phone with 6 months of life. Then  I'm sorry to say  but the fact that the communication of any positivity to the virus is "optional" and left to the civic sense (such as the mask and social distance) tells me that unfortunately it will not help almost anything. Sin.
content: Done well  simple and intuitive but the fact that it must necessarily have the GPS on does not go down well with me  Not for privacy  I know the app doesn t acquire location   but for the battery         in    minutes on a high end phone with   months of life  Then  I m sorry to say  but the fact that the communication of any positivity to the virus is  optional  and left to the civic sense  such as the mask and social distance  tells me that unfortunately it will not help almost anything  Sin

Author: Luca Corradini
Review: Pensata bene e sviluppata bene. A livello di privacy meglio non si poteva fare. Peccato però che per utilizzarla devo tenere il GPS acceso, anche se l'app non condividerà la posizione, ma tutte le altre app si e questo io non lo voglio. Anche la batteria ne risente con il GPS sempre acceso. Se Google continuerà ad obbligate il GPS per usare anche il bluetooth non la userò. Peccato un vero peccato.
Title Review: Well thought out and well developed. In terms of privacy  we couldn't do better. Too bad  however  that to use it I have to keep the GPS on  even if the app will not share the position  but all the other apps do and I don't want this. Even the battery suffers with the GPS always on. If Google continues to force the GPS to use bluetooth too  I will not use it. Too bad a real pity.
content: Well thought out and well developed  In terms of privacy  we couldn t do better  Too bad  however  that to use it I have to keep the GPS on  even if the app will not share the position  but all the other apps do and I don t want this  Even the battery suffers with the GPS always on  If Google continues to force the GPS to use bluetooth too  I will not use it  Too bad a real pity

Author: antonio c
Review: Spero venga scaricata e attivata da più persone così da contribuire ad un ritorno alla normalità. Per quelli che tengono alla privacy (e magari hanno dieci applicazioni che queste si accedono a numero e rubrica...) credo che non esista applicazione più discreta di questa. Non richiede nessun permesso eccetto l'attivazione del Bluetooth - il GPS si attiva di conseguenza ma è intrinseco al sistema Android. Impatto sulla batteria irrisorio. Consigliata.
Title Review: I hope it will be downloaded and activated by more people so as to contribute to a return to normalcy. For those who care about privacy (and maybe have ten applications that these are accessed by number and address book ...) I believe that there is no more discreet application than this. It does not require any permission except to activate Bluetooth - GPS activates accordingly but is intrinsic to the Android system. Impact on the battery negligible. Recommended.
content: I hope it will be downloaded and activated by more people so as to contribute to a return to normalcy  For those who care about privacy  and maybe have ten applications that these are accessed by number and address book      I believe that there is no more discreet application than this  It does not require any permission except to activate Bluetooth   GPS activates accordingly but is intrinsic to the Android system  Impact on the battery negligible  Recommended

Author: Valentino R.
Review: Quando attivo le notifiche mi si attiva il Bluetooth. Subito dopo esser passato ad altra applicazione il Bluetooth com'è giusto resta attivo. Apprna riapro l'app immuni questa mi notifica che il "Servizio non è attivo". Per riattivarlo, prima devo disattivare il Bluetooth e poi procedere con la funzione interna all'app. Dispositivo Honor 7 (Huawei like). ........ Al secondo bugfix il mio dispositivo non era più compatibile. Con l'ultimo aggiornamento anche con i dispositivi vecchi funzion bene!
Title Review: When I activate notifications  Bluetooth is activated. Immediately after switching to another application the Bluetooth as is right remains active. Apprna reopen the app immune this notifies me that the "Service is not active". To reactivate it  first I have to deactivate the Bluetooth and then proceed with the internal function of the app. Honor 7 device (Huawei like). ........ At the second bugfix my device was no longer compatible. With the latest update even with old devices it works fine!
content: When I activate notifications  Bluetooth is activated  Immediately after switching to another application the Bluetooth as is right remains active  Apprna reopen the app immune this notifies me that the  Service is not active   To reactivate it  first I have to deactivate the Bluetooth and then proceed with the internal function of the app  Honor   device  Huawei like            At the second bugfix my device was no longer compatible  With the latest update even with old devices it works fine

Author: Francesca Onnis
Review: Ho un Huawei P20 lite, l'app si disattivava dopo pochi minuti in background. Ieri sera sono riuscita ad aggiornare il sistema operativo ed ora funziona senza problemi. App semplice ed intuitiva, utile per tutti. La tutela della privacy è garantita. Scaricarla ed utilizzarla è un gesto di responsabilità importante che, di fatto, non ha prezzo.

Author: Ugo Cozzi
Review: Molto semplice e intuitiva nei pochi passaggi necessari alla messa in funzione. Una volta fatta la prima configurazione non è più necessario alcun intervento da parte dell'utente e l'app gira in background rimanendo attiva come indicato dalla stessa. Impatto praticamente nullo sulle prestazioni dello smartphone e sul consumo della batteria, almeno per tutti gli utenti abituati a tenere il BT sempre attivo! Per essere sicuri che il tutto funzioni correttamente, oltre a mantenere il BT sempre attivo come esplicitamente richiesto durante la prima configurazione, suggerisco di riavviare lo smartphone subito dopo l'installazione e verificare che il servizio risulti sempre attivo, a quel punto si è certi che l'app sia in grado di avviarsi ed attivarsi correttamente.
Title Review: Very simple and intuitive in the few steps required for commissioning. Once the first configuration has been made  no user intervention is required anymore and the app runs in the background  remaining active as indicated by it. Virtually no impact on smartphone performance and battery consumption  at least for all users accustomed to keeping BT always on! To be sure that everything works correctly  in addition to keeping the BT always active as explicitly requested during the first configuration  I suggest restarting the smartphone immediately after installation and checking that the service is always active  at which point you are sure that the app is able to start and activate correctly.
content: Very simple and intuitive in the few steps required for commissioning  Once the first configuration has been made  no user intervention is required anymore and the app runs in the background  remaining active as indicated by it  Virtually no impact on smartphone performance and battery consumption  at least for all users accustomed to keeping BT always on  To be sure that everything works correctly  in addition to keeping the BT always active as explicitly requested during the first configuration  I suggest restarting the smartphone immediately after installation and checking that the service is always active  at which point you are sure that the app is able to start and activate correctly

Author: Pawel Skalka
Review: Non funziona su Huawei FIG-LX1 ("P Smart"). Versione Android 9, versione EMUI 9.1.0.175. Aperta l'applicazione, per poter attivare i servizi di notifica è necessario prima spegnere bluetooth e posizione GPS, in modo che sia l'applicazione a forzarne l'avvio. Una volta che si passa ad un'altra applicazione o che si spegne il display, quando si ricontrolla lo stato dell'applicazione Immuni, questa dice che i servizi di notifica non sono attivi. In pratica l'applicazione riesce a funzionare solamente se la si mantiene sempre attiva con il display acceso. Distinstallata, riproverò a installarla più avanti nella speranza che il bug venga risolto.
Title Review: It does not work on Huawei FIG-LX1 ("P Smart"). Android version 9  EMUI version 9.1.0.175. Once the application is open  in order to activate the notification services  you must first turn off bluetooth and GPS position  so that the application will force them to start. Once you switch to another application or turn off the display  when you double check the status of the Immuni application  it says that the notification services are not active. In practice  the application can only work if it is always kept active with the display on. Uninstalled  I will try to install it again later in the hope that the bug will be fixed.
content: It does not work on Huawei FIG LX    P Smart    Android version    EMUI version            Once the application is open  in order to activate the notification services  you must first turn off bluetooth and GPS position  so that the application will force them to start  Once you switch to another application or turn off the display  when you double check the status of the Immuni application  it says that the notification services are not active  In practice  the application can only work if it is always kept active with the display on  Uninstalled  I will try to install it again later in the hope that the bug will be fixed
syn: gps, servic, servic, display, applic, order
