Author: A40 SM
Review: Non si può disabilitare il gps per cui è obbligatorio rendere sempre noti gli spostamenti a Google Play Service. Ciò non corrisponde alle caratteristiche nella descrizione dell'app, dove viene detto che usa solo il bluetooth senza chiarire ciò. Ho verificato però che non scarica la batteria in background ma a schermo acceso il gps è sempre attivo e agganciato. Non si può installare su telefoni più vecchi, come S4, per cui Immuni può diventare inutile dato che tantissimi non potranno usarla.
Title Review: You cannot disable the GPS so it is mandatory to always make your movements known to Google Play Service. This does not match the features in the app description  where it says it only uses bluetooth without making this clear. However  I verified that it does not drain the battery in the background but with the screen on the gps is always active and hooked. It cannot be installed on older phones  such as S4  so Immuni can become useless as so many won't be able to use it.
content: You cannot disable the GPS so it is mandatory to always make your movements known to Google Play Service  This does not match the features in the app description  where it says it only uses bluetooth without making this clear  However  I verified that it does not drain the battery in the background but with the screen on the gps is always active and hooked  It cannot be installed on older phones  such as S   so Immuni can become useless as so many won t be able to use it

Author: Simone Biagini
Review: Tutto ok. A chi non resta attiva, invece di dare la colpa all'app imparate a conoscere ciò che usate. Andate su impostazioni > app > immuni > batteria > ottimizzazione batteria Disattivate l'ottimizzazione batteria. In alcuni smartphone (sopratutto i cinesi) ci sono anche altre app di gestione di mem e batt e l'ottimizzazione non basta, serve qualcosa in più. Per chi ha l'errore 39501, mancano le api di tracciamento di google, probabile che siano da aggiornare i google play services.
Title Review: All right. For those who don't stay active  instead of blaming the app  learn about what you use. Go to settings> apps> immune> battery> battery optimization Turn off battery optimization. In some smartphones (especially the Chinese) there are also other mem and batt management apps and optimization is not enough  you need something more. For those with error 39501  google tracking api are missing  google play services are likely to be updated.
content: All right  For those who don t stay active  instead of blaming the app  learn about what you use  Go to settings  apps  immune  battery  battery optimization Turn off battery optimization  In some smartphones  especially the Chinese  there are also other mem and batt management apps and optimization is not enough  you need something more  For those with error        google tracking api are missing  google play services are likely to be updated
syn: chines, track, servic, servic, manag, manag, optim

Review: L'app ci voleva. Punto. Chi scrive che "peccato che non si può installare su vecchi smartphone" evidentemente non sa che i problemi di sicurezza su vecchi sistemi operativi rende impossibile l'applicabilità. Che non tutti possano avere cellulari recenti è fuori discussione ma giudicare negativamente un app per questo ce ne passa.... L'app è sempre attiva, non devi ricordarti di lanciarla perché a livello di sistema operativo è il cellulare stesso che fa tutto (ma solo se è un sistema recente)
Title Review: The app wanted us. Point. Who writes that "it is a pity that it cannot be installed on old smartphones" obviously does not know that the security problems on old operating systems make applicability impossible. That not everyone can have recent cell phones is out of the question but negatively judging an app for this passes ... The app is always active  you don't have to remember to launch it because at the operating system level it is the cell phone itself that does everything ( but only if it is a recent system)
content: The app wanted us  Point  Who writes that  it is a pity that it cannot be installed on old smartphones  obviously does not know that the security problems on old operating systems make applicability impossible  That not everyone can have recent cell phones is out of the question but negatively judging an app for this passes     The app is always active  you don t have to remember to launch it because at the operating system level it is the cell phone itself that does everything   but only if it is a recent system

Conservati dal pubblico ed eliminati tra qualche mese, avrei auspicato un approccio piú diretto, visto che ogni giorno ed in altri modi si cedono i propri dati ai fini commerciali e senza termine!
Title Review: Clear and simple. The only perplexity is related to an excessive protection of privacy which makes the protection mechanism cumbersome in case of exposure to possible contagion. Author: Podz
Review: Si installa e configura in 10 secondi, giusto il tempo di impostare regione e provincia di appartenenza, poi lavora in background senza bisogno di aprirla ogni volta che serve. Per quel poco che l'app deve fare il funzionamento è semplice e intuitivo, e all'interno c'è in più una ricca quantità di spiegazioni ben organizzate su ogni aspetto, per fare luce su eventuali dubbi. Ricordo ai più scettici che il codice sorgente è pubblico e la privacy garantita al 100%. Al primo avvio viene richiesto il permesso per attivare la localizzazione; questo solo perché Android richiede un unico permesso per Bluetooth LE e altri servizi di localizzazione che si basano su dati gps (NON utilizzati da questa app). Per ora non ci sono bug da segnalare. Il consumo della batteria con bluetooth attivato rimane pressoché invariato.
Title Review: It is installed and configured in 10 seconds  just long enough to set the region and province of belonging  then works in the background without having to open it every time you need. For what little the app has to do  the operation is simple and intuitive  and inside there is a rich amount of well-organized explanations on every aspect  to shed light on any doubts. I remind the most skeptical that the source code is public and 100% privacy guaranteed. At the first start  permission is requested to activate the localization; this is only because Android requires a single permission for Bluetooth LE and other location services that rely on gps data (NOT used by this app). For now  there are no bugs to report. Battery consumption with bluetooth activated remains virtually unchanged.
content: It is installed and configured in    seconds  just long enough to set the region and province of belonging  then works in the background without having to open it every time you need  For what little the app has to do  the operation is simple and intuitive  and inside there is a rich amount of well organized explanations on every aspect  to shed light on any doubts  I remind the most skeptical that the source code is public and      privacy guaranteed  At the first start  permission is requested to activate the localization  this is only because Android requires a single permission for Bluetooth LE and other location services that rely on gps data  NOT used by this app   For now  there are no bugs to report  Battery consumption with bluetooth activated remains virtually unchanged
syn: local, region, provinc, data, locat, privaci, gps, servic, servic, locat

Title Review: it is written everywhere that the app needs only the bluetooth connection to work. however  if I leave bluetooth on and gps off  the app tells me that the service is not active; to make it active again I have to enable the gps. Author: Nadia Caronte
Review: Utilissima e ben fatta. Valida anche a livello di privacy. Purtroppo temo si basi troppo sull'onestà degli utilizzatori. Se so di essere positivo e ometto di comunicare il mio codice all'operatore sanitario, mando a monte l'utilità dell'app. Mi auguro che gli operatori sanitari che riscontrano le positività abbiano anche a disposizione i mezzi per obbligare i soggetti positivi a dichiararsi tramite l'app. Diversamente è tutto vano.
Title Review: Very useful and well done. Also valid in terms of privacy. Unfortunately  I fear it relies too much on the honesty of the users. If I know I'm positive and fail to communicate my code to the healthcare provider  I will mess up the usefulness of the app. I hope that healthcare professionals who find positivity also have the means to force positive subjects to declare themselves via the app. Otherwise it is all in vain.
content: Very useful and well done  Also valid in terms of privacy  Unfortunately  I fear it relies too much on the honesty of the users  If I know I m positive and fail to communicate my code to the healthcare provider  I will mess up the usefulness of the app  I hope that healthcare professionals who find positivity also have the means to force positive subjects to declare themselves via the app  Otherwise it is all in vain

Author: Mauro Di Domenico
Review: Scrivo per chi è abituato a spegnere il GPS e vorrebbe continuare a farlo. Si può fare. L'applicazione usa solo il bluetooth per funzionare, ma questo richiede la geolocalizzazione attiva (non il GPS). Lasciare la geolocalizzazione attiva permette alle applicazioni che ne hanno il permesso di usare il GPS quando vogliono (Google, Maps, fotocamera, social network, ecc..). La chiave è disattivare i permessi di geolocalizzazione delle singole applicazioni, e riattivarle quando si desidera.
Title Review: I write for those who are used to turning off the GPS and would like to continue doing so. It can be done. The app only uses bluetooth to work  but this requires active geolocation (not GPS). Leaving geolocation active allows applications that have permission to use GPS whenever they want (Google  Maps  camera  social network  etc. ..). The key is to disable the geolocation permissions of individual applications  and reactivate them when you want.
content: I write for those who are used to turning off the GPS and would like to continue doing so  It can be done  The app only uses bluetooth to work  but this requires active geolocation  not GPS   Leaving geolocation active allows applications that have permission to use GPS whenever they want  Google  Maps  camera  social network  etc       The key is to disable the geolocation permissions of individual applications  and reactivate them when you want

La app devi avviarla manualmente ad ogni riaccensione dello smartphone, quando cerchi di uscire se convalidi l'uscita non va in background ma si chiude!?! Altra chicca, pretende il GPS sempre attivo! Perché?!? Non ho ancora potuto testare se poi lasciata in background funzioni davvero.... In ogni caso è sostanzialmente inutilizzabile... quanto soldi è costata questa porcheria inutile ai contribuenti italiani?
Title Review: The mountain gave birth to the mouse! The app you have to start it manually every time the smartphone is turned on again  when you try to exit if you validate the exit it does not go in the background but closes!?! Another gem  the GPS is always active! Because?!? I have not yet been able to test if then left in the background it really works .... In any case it is basically unusable ... how much money has this useless filth cost to Italian taxpayers?

Author: Leonardo Rossi Fiorentini
Review: Ma con tutte le chat in cui la gente fa vedere faccia e posteriore, si inoltra ogni tipo di foto e si vede a che distanza sta da un altro utente, perché per una cosa così importante hanno concepito una app tanto mal strutturata? Più importante far vedere chiaramente le chiappe che evitare la terapia intensiva? Un modo strano di intendere la privacy e la politica.
Title Review: But with all the chats where people show their faces and backs  forward all kinds of photos and see how far away they are from another user  why did they conceive such a poorly structured app for such an important thing? More important to show your butt clearly than to avoid intensive care? A strange way of understanding privacy and politics.
content: But with all the chats where people show their faces and backs  forward all kinds of photos and see how far away they are from another user  why did they conceive such a poorly structured app for such an important thing  More important to show your butt clearly than to avoid intensive care  A strange way of understanding privacy and politics

content: If I have not had a swab or a serological test  how does the app know if I am positive and in that case communicate it to those around me  And if I have the cel without data why I only use the wifi it communicates in any case  Many doubts

Author: Giovanni Crivellaro
Review: App semplice e intuitiva, non richiede nessuno sforzo e in più spiega in modo facile e chiaro come funziona. L'app crea un codice ogni due tre giorni che se si incrocia con un altro telefono registra l'incontro. Se sei positivo lo comunichi all'app così se incontri qualcuno, lui viene allertato. Ovviamente non identifica la posizione né il telefono! Io ho un huawei P30 pro e la batteria non ne ha risentito per nulla perché sono abituato ad avere connessione Bluetooth per cuffie e smart watch.
Title Review: Simple and intuitive app  it requires no effort and in addition it explains in an easy and clear way how it works. The app creates a code every two or three days that if it crosses with another phone records the meeting. If you are positive you communicate it to the app so if you meet someone  they will be alerted. Obviously it does not identify the location or the phone! I have a huawei P30 pro and the battery has not suffered at all because I am used to having a Bluetooth connection for headphones and smart watches.
content: Simple and intuitive app  it requires no effort and in addition it explains in an easy and clear way how it works  The app creates a code every two or three days that if it crosses with another phone records the meeting  If you are positive you communicate it to the app so if you meet someone  they will be alerted  Obviously it does not identify the location or the phone  I have a huawei P   pro and the battery has not suffered at all because I am used to having a Bluetooth connection for headphones and smart watches

Review: le funzionalità dell'app sono limitatissime per soddisfare il "bisogno di privacy" del popolo italiano. Io non capisco perchè non sia stata pevisto il tracciamento GPS, la scansione dei QR Code o qualsisi altra tecnica di tracciamento più avanzata; poteva essere inserita come funzionalità attivabile solo a richiesta... L'app NON usa il GPS ma solo i Location Permissions per usare il BluetoothLE

The app does NOT use GPS but only Location Permissions to use BluetoothLE

Title Review: Fundamental app ... does not ask for anything: does not ask for name  does not ask for e-mails or private information ... generates a code that always changes and alerts you if the code of another device is associated with an infected individual ... very simple and absolutely safe (also because it does not use geolocation and you do not enter any data)

Author: Umberto Fracassi
Review: "Andrà tutto bene"... quando funzionerà. Al di là della questione del test su base regionale (sono nel Lazio), resta il fatto che Immuni non attiva le notifiche di esposizione; alla pagina del setup "Abilita le notifiche..." il clic sortisce uno sconfortante "Notifiche di esposizione non attivate" (Bluetooth attivo, Honor 7) e quindi non si può neanche ultimare l'attivazione... EDIT: piccola riflessione sul fatto che Immuni richieda Android 6.0, che non funzioni su Huawei etc: tutte le difficoltà sono comprensibili e non dubito che gli sviluppatori abbiano dovuto compiere delle scelte ma... anche la squadra che comandava da Houston il rientro dell'Apollo 13 doveva compiere delle scelte (un po' più drammatiche, com'è noto, ed era 50 anni fa) ma... ha fatto in modo da riuscire a rispettare tutte le necessità, perché erano tutte irrinunciabili. Mutatis mutandis, se per un'app pensata per uno scopo così importante si rinuncia ad un pezzo certamente non insignificante del parco terminali, non solo si limita potenzialmente la già traballante diffusione attesa ma, soprattutto, si rinuncia a trovare una soluzione. Una soluzione che sul piano ingegneristico deve ovviamente esserci (come farebbero altre app di altre piattaforme, altrimenti?) e, se non c'è, va congegnata. E' una questione quasi più filosofica che tecnologica: se ci si deve fermare a patch di sistemi operativi o similia, allora perché sperare di poter tracciare le eventuali positività al SARS-CoV-2?
Title Review: "It will be okay" ... when it works. Beyond the question of testing on a regional basis (I am in Lazio)  the fact remains that Immuni does not activate the notifications of exposure; to the setup page "Enable notifications ..." the click produces a disheartening "Exposure notifications not activated" (Bluetooth active  Honor 7) and therefore you cannot even complete the activation ... EDIT: small reflection on the fact that Immuni requires Android 6.0  that it does not work on Huawei etc: all the difficulties are understandable and I do not doubt that the developers had to make choices but ... also the team that commanded the return of Apollo 13 from Houston had to make choices (a little more dramatic  as you know  and it was 50 years ago) but ... he managed to meet all the needs  because they were all indispensable. Mutatis mutandis  if for an app designed for such an important purpose you give up a certainly not insignificant piece of the terminal park  not only is the already shaky spread expected potentially limited but  above all  you give up on finding a solution. A solution that on the engineering level must obviously be there (as would other apps on other platforms  otherwise?) And  if not  it must be devised. It is a question almost more philosophical than technological: if we have to stop at patches of operating systems or the like  then why hope to be able to trace any positivity to SARS-CoV-2?
content: It will be okay      when it works  Beyond the question of testing on a regional basis  I am in Lazio   the fact remains that Immuni does not activate the notifications of exposure  to the setup page  Enable notifications      the click produces a disheartening  Exposure notifications not activated   Bluetooth active  Honor    and therefore you cannot even complete the activation     EDIT  small reflection on the fact that Immuni requires Android      that it does not work on Huawei etc  all the difficulties are understandable and I do not doubt that the developers had to make choices but     also the team that commanded the return of Apollo    from Houston had to make choices  a little more dramatic  as you know  and it was    years ago  but     he managed to meet all the needs  because they were all indispensable  Mutatis mutandis  if for an app designed for such an important purpose you give up a certainly not insignificant piece of the terminal park  not only is the already shaky spread expected potentially limited but  above all  you give up on finding a solution  A solution that on the engineering level must obviously be there  as would other apps on other platforms  otherwise   And  if not  it must be devised  It is a question almost more philosophical than technological  if we have to stop at patches of operating systems or the like  then why hope to be able to trace any positivity to SARS CoV
syn: region, command, manag, command, manag, philosoph, import, engin, level

Author: Francesco Napoli
Review: Per quelli che si preoccupano per la richiesta di geolocalizzazione, sappiate che è tutto normale. Android gestisce il permesso di "tracciare col bluetooth" e quelle del GPS sotto la stessa autorizzazione, quindi va richiesta e non c'è niente di strano e niente di losco. La geolocalizzazione non verrà usata, non fatevi ingannare da qualche scemo su facebook
Title Review: For those who worry about the geolocation request  know that everything is normal. Android manages the permission to "track with bluetooth" and those of the GPS under the same authorization  so it must be requested and there is nothing strange and nothing shady. The geolocation will not be used  don't be fooled by some fool on facebook
content: For those who worry about the geolocation request  know that everything is normal  Android manages the permission to  track with bluetooth  and those of the GPS under the same authorization  so it must be requested and there is nothing strange and nothing shady  The geolocation will not be used  don t be fooled by some fool on facebook

Author: Matteo Andrea Morando
Review: App molto intuitiva, l'importante è mantenere attivo il bluetooth. Vengono spiegate con chiarezza tutte le regole sulla privacy, non raccoglie i tuoi dati personali né i tuoi spostamenti, verifica solo se sei stato in contatto con un malato (che deve avere scaricato l'app) e ti avverte. È importante che venga scaricata da più persone possibili perché sia utile, perciò dico a tutti: scaricatela per ridurre al minimo i contagi!!!
Title Review: Very intuitive app  the important thing is to keep bluetooth active. All the privacy rules are clearly explained  it does not collect your personal data or your movements  it only checks if you have been in contact with a sick person (who must have downloaded the app) and warns you. It is important that it is downloaded by as many people as possible for it to be useful  so I say to everyone: download it to minimize infections !!!
content: Very intuitive app  the important thing is to keep bluetooth active  All the privacy rules are clearly explained  it does not collect your personal data or your movements  it only checks if you have been in contact with a sick person  who must have downloaded the app  and warns you  It is important that it is downloaded by as many people as possible for it to be useful  so I say to everyone  download it to minimize infections

Title Review: I can understand who does 2 hours around  for a walk  but who is working on the public for 6-8 hours  kills the battery with the GPS always on. What is the point if the app doesn't use it so much? It needs to be improved but as a start it can go
content: I can understand who does   hours around  for a walk  but who is working on the public for     hours  kills the battery with the GPS always on  What is the point if the app doesn t use it so much  It needs to be improved but as a start it can go

Review: L'app NON É ANCORA ATTIVA ma é meraviglioso come le persona facciano valutazioni, positive o negative, sul nulla. Sarà attiva fra 2 settimane, ora in prova su talune regioni. Si si basa sul buon senso e senso civico dei cittadini, siamo in democrazia e ogni imposizione verrebbe vista con dietrologie politiche. Quindi, invece che giudicare, facciamo ciò che si può.
Title Review: The app IS NOT ACTIVE YET but it is wonderful how people make evaluations  positive or negative  on nothing. It will be active in 2 weeks  now on trial in some regions. It is based on the common sense and civic sense of citizens  we are in a democracy and any imposition would be seen with political conspiracies. So instead of judging  let's do what we can.

Author: Filippo P.
Review: Funziona ed è molto semplice. Le perplessità sono sul senso di realizzarla se poi non può funzionare con le versioni vecchie di android e con molti modelli Huawei. Come si può pretendere che raggiunga una diffusione del 60 per cento degli italiani? Una app che funziona, ma che non è utile per propri limiti è, di fatto, una app fallimentare. Se certi aspetti fossero stati chiariti prima, non sarebbe mai nata in questo modo.
Title Review: It works and it's very simple. The perplexities are about the sense of making it if it cannot work with the old versions of Android and with many Huawei models. How can it be expected to reach a circulation of 60% of Italians? An app that works but is not useful for its limitations is  in fact  a bankruptcy app. If certain aspects had been clarified before  it would never have been born this way.
content: It works and it s very simple  The perplexities are about the sense of making it if it cannot work with the old versions of Android and with many Huawei models  How can it be expected to reach a circulation of     of Italians  An app that works but is not useful for its limitations is  in fact  a bankruptcy app  If certain aspects had been clarified before  it would never have been born this way

Author: Andrea Agate
Review: Minimalista, rapida, efficace. Penso davvero che si sia sollevato in polverone per nulla...sul mio telefono funziona perfettamente, sono solo curioso di vedere il consumo della batteria in background. Per il resto, se contribuisce a velocizzare il ritorno alla normalità, scaricatela! I dati sono cifrati e non c'è alcun elemento sensibile condiviso, quindi non vedo di cosa si possa avere paura nello scaricarla, non bisogna nemmeno inserire altro dato se non provincia di residenza, stop.
Title Review: Minimalist  fast  effective. I really think it raised in fuss for nothing ... on my phone it works perfectly  just curious to see the battery drain in the background. For the rest  if it helps speed up the return to normal  download it! The data is encrypted and there is no shared sensitive element  so I don't see what you can be afraid of when downloading it  you don't even have to enter any data other than the province of residence  stop.
content: Minimalist  fast  effective  I really think it raised in fuss for nothing     on my phone it works perfectly  just curious to see the battery drain in the background  For the rest  if it helps speed up the return to normal  download it  The data is encrypted and there is no shared sensitive element  so I don t see what you can be afraid of when downloading it  you don t even have to enter any data other than the province of residence  stop
syn: curious, provinc, data, enter, sensit, normal

Title Review: Excellent app  clear in graphics  easy to configure  consumes little battery  installation should be encouraged  since it will only work if many people install it  and it should also be possible to receive an e-mail notice of having come. in contact with a positive virus  this is because an elderly parent may not understand the warning  instead the child could activate by entering his e-mail address in the parent's app to also receive the warning
content: Excellent app  clear in graphics  easy to configure  consumes little battery  installation should be encouraged  since it will only work if many people install it  and it should also be possible to receive an e mail notice of having come  in contact with a positive virus  this is because an elderly parent may not understand the warning  instead the child could activate by entering his e mail address in the parent s app to also receive the warning

Author: Daniele Lanzarone
Review: APP di pubblica utilita' che a mio avviso dovrebbe essere obbligatoria senza se e senza ma. Penoso chi da una stella perche' teme per la sua privacy senza aver letto ne' capito come funziona. Do 3 stelle per l'ingiustificabile ritardo con cui lo Stato ha iniziato le operazioni di contact tracing e per non aver organizzato una campagna pubblicitaria massiva sull'utilizzo della APP. Del resto la comunicazione del Governo e' stata purtroppo insufficiente in molte occasioni, poca chiarezza.
Title Review: Public utility APP which in my opinion should be mandatory with no ifs and buts. Painful who gives a star because he fears for his privacy without having read or understood how it works. I give 3 stars for the unjustifiable delay with which the State started contact tracing operations and for not having organized a massive advertising campaign on the use of the APP. After all  the communication of the Government was unfortunately insufficient on many occasions  lack of clarity.
content: Public utility APP which in my opinion should be mandatory with no ifs and buts  Painful who gives a star because he fears for his privacy without having read or understood how it works  I give   stars for the unjustifiable delay with which the State started contact tracing operations and for not having organized a massive advertising campaign on the use of the APP  After all  the communication of the Government was unfortunately insufficient on many occasions  lack of clarity

Author: Claudio Scoccimarro
Review: Se si esce dall'applicazione, al successivo rientro l'app ti segnala un warning di inattività. Se provi a riattivare l'app tramite opportuno pulsante ti torna un errore 39501. L' unico modo per bypassare l'errore è disattivare il bluetooth a mano e ripremere il pulsante per l'attivazione. A questo punto credo che l'app funzioni correttamente solo se la si lascia aperta, ma questo è improponibile. Cellulare samsung j7 2016.
Title Review: If you exit the application  the next time you come back the app will notify you of an inactivity warning. If you try to reactivate the app via the appropriate button you will get an error 39501. The only way to bypass the error is to deactivate the bluetooth manually and press the activation button again. At this point I believe that the app works correctly only if you leave it open  but this is not possible. Mobile samsung j7 2016.
content: If you exit the application  the next time you come back the app will notify you of an inactivity warning  If you try to reactivate the app via the appropriate button you will get an error        The only way to bypass the error is to deactivate the bluetooth manually and press the activation button again  At this point I believe that the app works correctly only if you leave it open  but this is not possible  Mobile samsung j

È importante che la scarichiamo tutti perché sia efficace... Tutte le storie sulla privacy sono boiate (se ci tenete alla vostra privacy allora iniziate smettendo di fare acquisti online e di usare i social media perché vi tracciano da lì)
Title Review: Guys  the app only works if you have Bluetooth and location turned on! If your phone doesn't let you download it  you need to update your phone's operating system ... It's important that we all download it for it to be effective ... All privacy stories are bullshit (if you care about your privacy then start by stopping shopping online and using social media because they track you from there)
content: Guys  the app only works if you have Bluetooth and location turned on  If your phone doesn t let you download it  you need to update your phone s operating system     It s important that we all download it for it to be effective     All privacy stories are bullshit  if you care about your privacy then start by stopping shopping online and using social media because they track you from there

Then do as you like  but I warned you. 😬

Author: Virginia Giovannini
Review: Interfaccia semplice, privacy più che tutelata. Credo sia importantissima sia per chi usa i mezzi pubblici, sia per chi lavora in ambienti di affollati, ma anche banalmente per chi va in un centro commerciale. Speriamo che la popolazione aderisca, purtroppo gli italiani devono essere educati al senso civico.
Title Review: Simple interface  more than protected privacy. I think it is very important both for those who use public transport and for those who work in crowded environments  but also trivially for those who go to a shopping center. We hope that the population will join  unfortunately the Italians must be educated to a civic sense.
content: Simple interface  more than protected privacy  I think it is very important both for those who use public transport and for those who work in crowded environments  but also trivially for those who go to a shopping center  We hope that the population will join  unfortunately the Italians must be educated to a civic sense

Author: Gianfranco Pantillo
Review: Sicuramente sviluppata per dare un buon servizio, purtroppo se pochi la utilizzano, quei pochi (sovente) si dimenticano di attivare Bluetooth e Gps, per tanto si abbassa ulteriormente il numero dei cellulari attivi. Da non trascurare poi il consumo elevato della batteria con i due protocolli di trasmissione collegati. Per funzionare bene dovrebbe: 1) essere utilizzarla tutti, 2) gestire in automatico l'attivazione del bluetooth e del gps. Grazie e buona giornata. Gianfranco da Torino
Title Review: Surely developed to give a good service  unfortunately if few use it  those few (often) forget to activate Bluetooth and Gps  so the number of active mobile phones is further reduced. The high battery consumption with the two connected transmission protocols should not be overlooked. To work well it should: 1) be used by all  2) automatically manage the activation of bluetooth and gps. Thank you and good day. Gianfranco from Turin
content: Surely developed to give a good service  unfortunately if few use it  those few  often  forget to activate Bluetooth and Gps  so the number of active mobile phones is further reduced  The high battery consumption with the two connected transmission protocols should not be overlooked  To work well it should     be used by all     automatically manage the activation of bluetooth and gps  Thank you and good day  Gianfranco from Turin
syn: gps, servic, servic, reduc, manag, manag

Author: Cristian Ronzio
Review: l'app funziona bene ed oltre ad essere utile offre un buon livello di privacy. Il codice sorgente è pubblico e chiunque può controllarlo per verificare quali dati usa, come vengono trasmessi e dove. App come Facebook o Google Maps raccolgono molti più dati personali di questa, suggerisco di usare la tecnologia per scopi utili alla comunità e non solo per passare il tempo. Bravi tutti gli sviluppatori!
Title Review: the app works well and besides being useful it offers a good level of privacy. The source code is public and anyone can check it to see what data it uses  how it is transmitted and where. Apps like Facebook or Google Maps collect a lot more personal data than this  I suggest using the technology for community purposes and not just to pass the time. Well done all the developers!
content: the app works well and besides being useful it offers a good level of privacy  The source code is public and anyone can check it to see what data it uses  how it is transmitted and where  Apps like Facebook or Google Maps collect a lot more personal data than this  I suggest using the technology for community purposes and not just to pass the time  Well done all the developers

Author: Sara Besana
Review: Con Android è obbligatorio lasciare in ON posizione e bluetooth sempre anche in casa e di notte, la batteria si scarica. Se si tenta di disattivare la posizione, l'applicazione si disattiva e alla riattivazione della posizione è necessario riattivare l'applicazione che però cambia numero identificativo. Bisognerebbe capire se così facendo si invalidato tutti i dati raccolti. L'applicazione non offre nessun feedback sul suo funzionamento, non è partecipativa, nessun dato statistico è fornito.
Title Review: With Android it is mandatory to leave the position and bluetooth always in ON  even at home and at night  the battery runs out. If you try to deactivate the position  the application is deactivated and upon reactivation of the position it is necessary to reactivate the application but it changes the identification number. It should be understood if doing so invalidated all the data collected. The application does not offer any feedback on its operation  it is not participatory  no statistical data is provided.
content: With Android it is mandatory to leave the position and bluetooth always in ON  even at home and at night  the battery runs out  If you try to deactivate the position  the application is deactivated and upon reactivation of the position it is necessary to reactivate the application but it changes the identification number  It should be understood if doing so invalidated all the data collected  The application does not offer any feedback on its operation  it is not participatory  no statistical data is provided

Author: Faby Rizzo
Review: Ho installato Immuni sul mio Samsung J6, requisiti di sistema tutti presenti. Nonostante il servizio risulti attivo, quando esco dall'app e rientro mi compare il messaggio "riattiva immuni", per farlo devo però prima disattivare bluetooth e gps e poi acconsentire alla abilitazione. È evidente, però, che così non c'è continuità di funzionamento. Mi spiace perchè risiedo in Puglia e volevo contribuire al testing da subito. Spero il problema sia risolvibile e che ci venga anche detto come.
Title Review: I have Immuni installed on my Samsung J6  all system requirements are present. Although the service is active  when I exit the app and return I get the message "reactivate immune"  but to do so I must first deactivate bluetooth and gps and then consent to the enabling. It is evident  however  that there is no continuity of operation. I'm sorry because I live in Puglia and I wanted to contribute to testing right away. I hope the problem is solvable and that we are also told how.
content: I have Immuni installed on my Samsung J   all system requirements are present  Although the service is active  when I exit the app and return I get the message  reactivate immune   but to do so I must first deactivate bluetooth and gps and then consent to the enabling  It is evident  however  that there is no continuity of operation  I m sorry because I live in Puglia and I wanted to contribute to testing right away  I hope the problem is solvable and that we are also told how

Author: Andrea Curci
Review: Dalla documentazione tecnica pubblicata su GitHub (disponibile in inglese anche per i meno esperti) sembra proprio che le logiche sulle quali è strutturato il funzionamento di questa app siano adatte a tutelare la privacy di ciascun utente. Nutro qualche timore circa l'affidabilità del segnale Bluetooth, dato che questo potrebbe essere ostruito da qualsiasi oggetto (ivi compresi i corpi umani). Ad ogni modo pare un'app fatta bene, e non la solita schifezza parastatale che mi sarei aspettato.
Title Review: From the technical documentation published on GitHub (available in English even for the less experienced) it seems that the logic on which the functioning of this app is structured are suitable for protecting the privacy of each user. I have some concerns about the reliability of the Bluetooth signal  as it could be obstructed by any object (including human bodies). In any case  it seems an app done well  and not the usual parastate crap that I would have expected.
content: From the technical documentation published on GitHub  available in English even for the less experienced  it seems that the logic on which the functioning of this app is structured are suitable for protecting the privacy of each user  I have some concerns about the reliability of the Bluetooth signal  as it could be obstructed by any object  including human bodies   In any case  it seems an app done well  and not the usual parastate crap that I would have expected
syn: concern, english, technic, privaci, protect, structur, signal

Author: Doriano Passalacqua
Review: Reputo fondamentale la sua utilità, seppur prometta che non Necessita di GPS :falso. Dopo 4 mesi di totale assenza di chiamate call center perché tutte in black list, già dopo dieci minuti dall'attivazione e per altre 8 volte in una sola giornata ho ricevuto chiamate da call center...sarà un caso ma se c'è un nesso è da vergognarsi del fatto che un app che ha una funzione vitale per il paese conceda i tuoi dati a questi sciacalli.Disinstallo e mi affido al buonsenso e indicazioni del dpcm.
Title Review: I consider its usefulness to be fundamental  even if it promises that it does not need GPS: false. After 4 months of total absence of call center calls because they are all blacklisted  already after ten minutes from activation and for another 8 times in a single day I received calls from the call center ... it will be a coincidence but if there is a nexus is to be ashamed of the fact that an app that has a vital function for the country gives your data to these jackals. I uninstall and I rely on common sense and indications of the dpcm.
content: I consider its usefulness to be fundamental  even if it promises that it does not need GPS  false  After   months of total absence of call center calls because they are all blacklisted  already after ten minutes from activation and for another   times in a single day I received calls from the call center     it will be a coincidence but if there is a nexus is to be ashamed of the fact that an app that has a vital function for the country gives your data to these jackals  I uninstall and I rely on common sense and indications of the dpcm

Author: Ettore Mazza
Review: Leggo un sacco di commenti con 1 stella scritti da dementi che non hanno letto le istruzioni e si lamentano. Piccolo riassunto: 1) Google decide su quali telefoni funziona e su quali no, non ci si può fare nulla. Mettetevi l'anima in pace e non recensite a cavolo!. 2) Non raccoglie le informazioni sulla posizione (purtroppo), ma è necessario che il GPS sia attivo ? E' perchè lo ha deciso Google quando ha definito le modalità di accesso al Bluetooth LE (per motivi che qui è lungo spiegare) 3) Tenere acceso BT e GPS non riduce la durata della batteria del vostro telefono a 10 minuti, se nessuna applicazione poi li usa. Sulle versioni di Android più moderne è possibile, per ogni applicazione, concedere o rifiutare l'accesso alla posizione. 4) sui device Huawei senza le GAPPS (gli ultimi usciti che non siano riedizioni) non funziona. E' colpa di Trump, il problema lo può risolvere solo lui. 5) Se siete preoccupati che il governo tracci i vostri spostamenti vi suggerisco di buttare nel primo cestino il device che avete in mano (anche se siete così intelligenti da spegnere il GPS). 6) dopo averla attivata (se vi compare la scritta: "Servizio Attivo") non c'è null'altro da fare, non dovete mandare nessun codice a nessuno. Il codice che si trova nelle impostazioni lo dovete dare al medico dopo che avete fatto il tampone e vi ha detto che siete positivi (se vi troverete in questa situazione). 7) Per quelli che non capiscono come possa funzionare visto che loro non sanno se hanno il virus... mi spiace, non riesco a trovare le parole adatte per spiegarvelo, credo di non conoscerle! Tanto non capireste. Speriamo solo che veniate contagiati... cosi almeno il medico ve lo spiega. 8) Se sul vostro telefono siete costretti a riaprirla ogni volta che la mandate in background, spegnete il BT, Spegnete il tel. etc... sappiate che non funziona così "by design" è al massimo un bug sul vostro telefono. Sul mio non devo fare nulla. 8) Quando avete comprato il cell, avete detto 16GB mi bastano ? oppure Questo costa meno ed è praticamente uguale a quell'altro che costa di più ? Oppure che mi importa se la marca è sconosciuta, a me va bene così non pago per queste trovate di marketing ? Ora l'app non vi funziona ? Non c'è un aggiornamento disponibile per il vostro cell ? Ecco ora sapete a cosa sarebbero serviti quei soldi in più! Spero vi ammaliate e guariate, così potrete diventare (ev)angelist! 9) L'app è in test in alcune regioni, ma questo solo al fine di segnalare se siete positivi, per tutti l'app già funziona per il tracciamento dei contatti, quindi: potete installarla e vi deve apparire la schermata di "Servzio Attivo". Se non vi appare avete un problema che non dipende dalla regione in cui siete. Infine veniamo agli appunti 10) Le cause di errore dovrebbero essere più chiare: se la versione di android o del Play service non è sufficiente un bell'avviso così l'utente si mette l'anima in pace. 11) L'utente non legge nulla, prima di arrivare al codice... un bel tasto: "Premere solo se siete positivi al Tampone"
Title Review: I read a lot of 1 star comments written by demented people who have not read the instructions and complain. Small summary: 1) Google decides on which phones it works and which not  nothing can be done about it. Put your soul in peace and don't review a cabbage !. 2) Doesn't collect location information (unfortunately)  but does GPS need to be active? It is because Google decided it when it defined how to access Bluetooth LE (for reasons that are long to explain here) 3) Keeping BT and GPS on does not reduce the battery life of your phone to 10 minutes  if no application then uses them. On the most modern Android versions it is possible  for each application  to grant or deny access to the location. 4) on Huawei devices without GAPPS (the latest ones that are not re-editions) it does not work. It is Trump's fault  only he can solve the problem. 5) If you are worried that the government is tracking your movements  I suggest you throw the device in your hand in the first bin (even if you are smart enough to turn off the GPS). 6) after having activated it (if you see the message: "Active Service") there is nothing else to do  you must not send any code to anyone. The code found in the settings is to be given to the doctor after you have swabbed and told you that you are positive (if you find yourself in this situation). 7) For those who don't understand how it works since they don't know if they have the virus ... I'm sorry  I can't find the right words to explain it to you  I don't think I know them! You wouldn't understand anyway. Let's just hope you get infected ... so at least the doctor explains it to you. 8) If on your phone you are forced to reopen it every time you send it in the background  turn off the BT  Turn off the tel. etc ... know that it doesn't work so "by design" is at most a bug on your phone. I don't have to do anything on mine. 8) When you bought the cell  did you say 16GB is enough for me? or Does this cost less and is practically the same as the other that costs more? Or do I care if the brand is unknown  that's okay with me so I don't pay for these marketing stunts? Now the app doesn't work for you? Isn't there an update available for your cell? Here now you know what that extra money would have been for! I hope you get sick and healed  so you can become (ev) angelist! 9) The app is being tested in some regions  but this only in order to report if you are positive  for all the app already works for contact tracking  so: you can install it and the "Active Service" screen must appear. ". If it does not appear  you have a problem that does not depend on the region you are in. Finally we come to notes 10) The causes of error should be clearer: if the version of android or the Play service is not enough  a nice notice so the user puts his soul in peace. 11) The user does not read anything  before reaching the code ... a nice button: "Press only if you are positive to the Swab"
content: I read a lot of   star comments written by demented people who have not read the instructions and complain  Small summary     Google decides on which phones it works and which not  nothing can be done about it  Put your soul in peace and don t review a cabbage       Doesn t collect location information  unfortunately   but does GPS need to be active  It is because Google decided it when it defined how to access Bluetooth LE  for reasons that are long to explain here     Keeping BT and GPS on does not reduce the battery life of your phone to    minutes  if no application then uses them  On the most modern Android versions it is possible  for each application  to grant or deny access to the location     on Huawei devices without GAPPS  the latest ones that are not re editions  it does not work  It is Trump s fault  only he can solve the problem     If you are worried that the government is tracking your movements  I suggest you throw the device in your hand in the first bin  even if you are smart enough to turn off the GPS      after having activated it  if you see the message   Active Service   there is nothing else to do  you must not send any code to anyone  The code found in the settings is to be given to the doctor after you have swabbed and told you that you are positive  if you find yourself in this situation      For those who don t understand how it works since they don t know if they have the virus     I m sorry  I can t find the right words to explain it to you  I don t think I know them  You wouldn t understand anyway  Let s just hope you get infected     so at least the doctor explains it to you     If on your phone you are forced to reopen it every time you send it in the background  turn off the BT  Turn off the tel  etc     know that it doesn t work so  by design  is at most a bug on your phone  I don t have to do anything on mine     When you bought the cell  did you say   GB is enough for me  or Does this cost less and is practically the same as the other that costs more  Or do I care if the brand is unknown  that s okay with me so I don t pay for these marketing stunts  Now the app doesn t work for you  Isn t there an update available for your cell  Here now you know what that extra money would have been for  I hope you get sick and healed  so you can become  ev  angelist     The app is being tested in some regions  but this only in order to report if you are positive  for all the app already works for contact tracking  so  you can install it and the  Active Service  screen must appear     If it does not appear  you have a problem that does not depend on the region you are in  Finally we come to notes     The causes of error should be clearer  if the version of android or the Play service is not enough  a nice notice so the user puts his soul in peace      The user does not read anything  before reaching the code     a nice button   Press only if you are positive to the Swab

Author: Lorenzo Putignano
Review: Ottima app! Hanno risolto tutte le criticità che sono state individuate all'inizio. Ricordo a tutti che l'app NON TRACCIA la vostra posizione ma lavora scambiando dei codici tramite bluetooth. Questo vuol dire che non avviene ALCUN monitoraggio degli spostamenti degli utenti, e non c'è modo di ricondurre i codici alle persone
Title Review: Great app! They have solved all the critical issues that were identified at the beginning. I remind everyone that the app DOES NOT TRACK your position but works by exchanging codes via bluetooth. This means that there is NO monitoring of user movements  and there is no way to trace the codes back to people.
content: Great app  They have solved all the critical issues that were identified at the beginning  I remind everyone that the app DOES NOT TRACK your position but works by exchanging codes via bluetooth  This means that there is NO monitoring of user movements  and there is no way to trace the codes back to people

Author: Gabriele Gargiulo
Review: Per la quinta stella consiglierei 2 funzionalità aggiuntive. 1. Possibilità di verificare in un determinato istante il numero di dispositivi rilevati (se sono vicino ad una persona vorrei sapere se ha attivo il servizio o meno). 2. Essendo l'applicazione silente, se disattivo il bluetooth l'app dovrebbe ricordarmelo. Potrebbe dare la possibilità di registrare una zona intorno a me (ad esempio casa) e inviare una notifica nel momento in cui lascio questa zona. Penso che queste funzionalità non violino alcun diritto alla privacy.
Title Review: For the fifth star I would recommend 2 additional features. 1. Ability to check the number of devices detected at a given moment (if I am close to a person I would like to know if the service is active or not). 2. Since the application is silent  if I turn off bluetooth the app should remind me. It could give the possibility to register an area around me (for example home) and send a notification when I leave this area. I think these features don't violate any privacy rights.
content: For the fifth star I would recommend   additional features     Ability to check the number of devices detected at a given moment  if I am close to a person I would like to know if the service is active or not      Since the application is silent  if I turn off bluetooth the app should remind me  It could give the possibility to register an area around me  for example home  and send a notification when I leave this area  I think these features don t violate any privacy rights

Author: Alessandro Spirito
Review: La privacy è salva ma non credo serva a granché. Avrebbe un senso se tutti vi caricassero dati corretti, se tutti, tramite un codice ed in anonimato, dichiarassero la loro positività presente, pregressa, le loro abitudini sociali, insomma il proprio grado di esposizione in modo da elaborare un indice di rischio quantificabile. Non protegge nulla, non ci rende "immuni" e non fa caricare dati di alcun tipo.
Title Review: Privacy is safe but I don't think it is of much use. It would make sense if everyone uploaded correct data to it  if everyone  through a code and anonymously  declared their present  past positivity  their social habits  in short  their degree of exposure in order to develop a quantifiable risk index. It does not protect anything  it does not make us "immune" and it does not load data of any kind.
content: Privacy is safe but I don t think it is of much use  It would make sense if everyone uploaded correct data to it  if everyone  through a code and anonymously  declared their present  past positivity  their social habits  in short  their degree of exposure in order to develop a quantifiable risk index  It does not protect anything  it does not make us  immune  and it does not load data of any kind

Review: Io la renderei obbligatoria... Ok la privacy, ma fino a quando non va a ledere lo spazio altrui. E dal momento che tu, persona comune, anche contagiata, te ne freghi del prossimo e te ne vai bellamente in giro senza mascherina e ti asembri, allora perdi il tuo diritto alla privacy. In ogni caso, l'app comunica tramite ID casuali non collegati alla persona, nessun problema. Purtroppo oltre al bluetooth serve avere sempre acceso il GPS... non so.
Title Review: I would make it mandatory ... Ok privacy  but until it affects the space of others. And since you  an ordinary person  even infected  do not care about your neighbor and go around beautifully without a mask and look like you  then you lose your right to privacy. In any case  the app communicates via random IDs not linked to the person  no problem. Unfortunately  in addition to bluetooth you need to always have the GPS on ... I don't know.

Author: Giuseppe Capozzo
Review: L'app credo sia molto utile, ma va risolto qualche problema. L'installazione è stata semplice. All'avvio mi ha fatto selezionare Regione e Provincia ma, al momento di dare il consenso all'abilitazione delle notifiche, veniva fuori il messaggio: "notifiche di esposizione non attiva" . Avevo gps e bluetooth attivati, ma non andava avanti. Solo dopo aver letto alcune recensioni ho scoperto che, al momento di dare il consenso, il bluetooth doveva essere spento e che era l'applicazione ad attivarlo! Credo che una cosa del genere vada segnalata nelle istruzioni, giusto per non far impazzire chi sta facendo l'installazione. Inoltre l'app, ogni volta che lo schermo si disattiva, non resta in background e, alla riaccensione, bisogna riattivarla con la stessa procedura, ossia tornando a spegnere il bluetooth. Tutto questo, nonostante io sia in una delle regioni in cui l'app è attiva!
Title Review: I think the app is very useful  but some problems need to be solved. Setup was straightforward. When I started it made me select Region and Province but  when I gave my consent to enable notifications  the message came out: "notifications of exposure not active". I had gps and bluetooth activated  but it didn't go on. Only after reading some reviews did I discover that  when giving consent  the bluetooth had to be turned off and that it was the application that activated it! I believe that such a thing should be noted in the instructions  just so as not to drive the installer crazy. In addition  the app  every time the screen is deactivated  does not remain in the background and  when it is turned on again  it must be reactivated with the same procedure  i.e. by returning to turn off the bluetooth. All this  despite being in one of the regions where the app is active!
content: I think the app is very useful  but some problems need to be solved  Setup was straightforward  When I started it made me select Region and Province but  when I gave my consent to enable notifications  the message came out   notifications of exposure not active   I had gps and bluetooth activated  but it didn t go on  Only after reading some reviews did I discover that  when giving consent  the bluetooth had to be turned off and that it was the application that activated it  I believe that such a thing should be noted in the instructions  just so as not to drive the installer crazy  In addition  the app  every time the screen is deactivated  does not remain in the background and  when it is turned on again  it must be reactivated with the same procedure  i e  by returning to turn off the bluetooth  All this  despite being in one of the regions where the app is active

Review: Funzionava, poi dopo un reset del cellulare e conseguente ripristino da backup (ho provato anche con reinstallazione) si ferma all'attivazione notifiche, dicendo che Play Services è aggiornato ma non ancora pronto. In impostazioni Google alla voce Servizi appare un "Notifiche relative all'esposizione al COVID-19 - su 1/app" (con slash) che cliccato porta a una schermata bianca, come se fosse "orfano". Xiaomi Redmo Note 8T
Title Review: It worked  then after a reset of the phone and subsequent restore from backup (I also tried with reinstallation) it stops activating notifications  saying that Play Services is updated but not ready yet. In Google settings under Services appears a "Notifications relating to exposure to COVID-19 - on 1 / app" (with slash) which when clicked leads to a white screen  as if it were "orphan". Xiaomi Redmo Note 8T
content: It worked  then after a reset of the phone and subsequent restore from backup  I also tried with reinstallation  it stops activating notifications  saying that Play Services is updated but not ready yet  In Google settings under Services appears a  Notifications relating to exposure to COVID      on     app   with slash  which when clicked leads to a white screen  as if it were  orphan   Xiaomi Redmo Note  T

Author: cristina felappi
Review: Non ho ancora capito l utilità di questa app se uno sa di essere positivo non deve uscire di casa e di sicuro se vuole uscire di casa non si inserisce nell app come positivo per cui sono un po perplessa .......
Title Review: I have not yet understood the usefulness of this app if one knows that he is positive he must not leave the house and for sure if he wants to leave the house it does not enter the app as positive so I am a bit perplexed .......
content: I have not yet understood the usefulness of this app if one knows that he is positive he must not leave the house and for sure if he wants to leave the house it does not enter the app as positive so I am a bit perplexed

Author: Michael pietro Sironi
Review: Hanno modificato un immagine normale (padre al pc, madre con in braccio il figlio) solo perché estremisti/femministe pensavano fosse lesivo della dignità della donna. Dice tutto sulla serietà dell'app.
Title Review: They changed a normal image (father on the PC  mother holding her son) only because extremists / feminists thought it was harmful to the dignity of women. It says it all about the seriousness of the app.
content: They changed a normal image  father on the PC  mother holding her son  only because extremists   feminists thought it was harmful to the dignity of women  It says it all about the seriousness of the app

Author: David Malandrin
Review: Interfaccia molto intuitiva e semplice, quasi troppo. Sarebbe a mio avviso utile la possibilità di disattivare l'app senza dover necessariamente disattivare il bluetooth, con un pulsante dedicato (anche "nascosto" nel menù impostazioni). Per molti utenti può essere disorientante non trovare la possibilità di "spegnerla". Sembra consumare abbastanza batteria (almeno sul mio Asus Zenfone Max M2, Android 9). In Veneto non è attivo il tracciamento, quindi non posso valutare la funzione specifica.
Title Review: Very intuitive and simple interface  almost too much. In my opinion it would be useful to be able to deactivate the app without necessarily having to deactivate the bluetooth  with a dedicated button (also "hidden" in the settings menu). For many users it can be confusing not to find the option to "turn it off". It seems to drain enough battery (at least on my Asus Zenfone Max M2  Android 9). Tracking is not active in Veneto  so I cannot evaluate the specific function.
content: Very intuitive and simple interface  almost too much  In my opinion it would be useful to be able to deactivate the app without necessarily having to deactivate the bluetooth  with a dedicated button  also  hidden  in the settings menu   For many users it can be confusing not to find the option to  turn it off   It seems to drain enough battery  at least on my Asus Zenfone Max M   Android     Tracking is not active in Veneto  so I cannot evaluate the specific function

Author: luca soncin
Review: App scaricata solo per poter commentare e poi verrà subito disinstallata. Il punto centrale non è sulla privacy ma è che non serve assolutamente a nulla . I dati inseriti non hanno nessun tipo di valore in quanto non sono stati fatti tamponi quindi uno potrebbe essere positivo e non saperlo essendo asintomatico . Quindi di cosa stiamo parlando ? È una vergogna che venga definita una app per il tracciamento del virus quando è tutto il contrario .Invito gli sviluppatori a confutare tale teoria .
Title Review: App downloaded only to be able to comment and then it will be uninstalled immediately. The focus is not on privacy but it is absolutely useless. The data entered does not have any kind of value as no swabs have been made so one could be positive and not know it being asymptomatic. So what are we talking about? It's a shame that it's called a virus tracking app when it's the other way around. I urge developers to disprove that theory.
content: App downloaded only to be able to comment and then it will be uninstalled immediately  The focus is not on privacy but it is absolutely useless  The data entered does not have any kind of value as no swabs have been made so one could be positive and not know it being asymptomatic  So what are we talking about  It s a shame that it s called a virus tracking app when it s the other way around  I urge developers to disprove that theory
syn: data, track, privaci, focus, enter, comment

Author: Alberto Falzoni
Review: Dopo il can-can della Laura Boldrini, della Paola Concia ecc. e il cambio di immagine sul sito -prima era rappresentata in una finestra una donna con in braccio un bambino e in un altra finestra un uomo che lavorava al PC, ora è il contrario) l'app è solo occasione di propaganda antifamiliarista. La lascio a loro e disinstallo (tra l'altro è pensata male, praticamente inutile).
Title Review: After the can-can of Laura Boldrini  Paola Concia etc. and the change of image on the site - first it was represented in one window a woman holding a child and in another window a man working on the PC  now it's the other way around) the app is just an occasion for anti-family propaganda. I leave it to them and uninstall (among other things it is badly thought out  practically useless).
content: After the can can of Laura Boldrini  Paola Concia etc  and the change of image on the site   first it was represented in one window a woman holding a child and in another window a man working on the PC  now it s the other way around  the app is just an occasion for anti family propaganda  I leave it to them and uninstall  among other things it is badly thought out  practically useless

Author: Oscar Boscaro
Review: Sono OTTIMISTA su questa applicazione. Se fosse ampliata sulla configurazione di ogni cellulare, se uno possiede altre forme di monitoraggio, sarebbe molto più utile. Me ne frego della privacy, con la salute non si scherza. Esempio: uno usa anche l'app. Health con un dispositivo da polso che monitora l'ossigenazione del sangue, i battiti cardiaci, il respiro e il sonno... associata con app. IMMUNI sarebbe perfetta e performante, avresti il tuo stato di salute sempre sotto controllo... Pensateci!
Title Review: I am OPTIMIST about this application. If it were expanded on the configuration of each mobile  if one has other forms of monitoring  it would be much more useful. I don't care about privacy  you can't mess with health. Example: one also uses the app. Health with a wrist device that monitors blood oxygenation  heart rate  breathing and sleep ... associated with app. IMMUNI would be perfect and performing  you would have your health always under control ... Think about it!
content: I am OPTIMIST about this application  If it were expanded on the configuration of each mobile  if one has other forms of monitoring  it would be much more useful  I don t care about privacy  you can t mess with health  Example  one also uses the app  Health with a wrist device that monitors blood oxygenation  heart rate  breathing and sleep     associated with app  IMMUNI would be perfect and performing  you would have your health always under control     Think about it

Author: Michele Cotroneo
Review: Facciamo chiarezza: l'app non traccia la posizione (GPS o rete cellulare), non raccoglie informazioni personali e non le condivide con soggetti terzi al di fuori di quelli autorizzati al trattamento dei dati. Su alcuni Smartphone non è compatibile per motivi tecnologici quindi non facciamo confusione o gettiamo fango sull'operato del team che ha lavorato sodo per raggiungere questo risultato in così poco tempo.
Title Review: Let's be clear: the app does not track the position (GPS or cellular network)  does not collect personal information and does not share it with third parties other than those authorized to process the data. On some Smartphones it is not compatible for technological reasons so we do not confuse or throw mud on the work of the team that worked hard to achieve this in such a short time.
content: Let s be clear  the app does not track the position  GPS or cellular network   does not collect personal information and does not share it with third parties other than those authorized to process the data  On some Smartphones it is not compatible for technological reasons so we do not confuse or throw mud on the work of the team that worked hard to achieve this in such a short time

Review: Dico subito che questa app (dato che la sua efficacia è legata ad una sua ampia diffusione) doveva nascere con uno strumento facile-facile da implementare: un bottone con la scritta "condividi" (per facilitare il passaparola. Teste di vitello)
Title Review: I immediately say that this app (given that its effectiveness is linked to its wide diffusion) had to be born with an easy-to-implement tool: a button with the word "share" (to facilitate word of mouth. Veal heads)
content: I immediately say that this app  given that its effectiveness is linked to its wide diffusion  had to be born with an easy to implement tool  a button with the word  share   to facilitate word of mouth  Veal heads

Author: Angela Giannoccaro
Review: Facile da installare, nessun problema in background. Quando sono in casa disattivo GPS e bluetooth, disattivando l'app. Riattivo il tutto quando esco. Perplessità: la tutela di una presunta inesistente privacy ha reso tutto anche troppo facoltativo, quindi aleatorio - bisognava che le segnalazioni fossero automatiche...e poi, bisogna renderla accessibile anche a cellulari meno moderni, altrimenti sarà troppo poco diffusa
Title Review: Easy to install  no background issues. When I am at home I turn off GPS and bluetooth  by deactivating the app. I reactivate everything when I go out. Perplexity: the protection of an allegedly non-existent privacy has made everything too optional  therefore uncertain - the reports had to be automatic ... and then  it must also be made accessible to less modern mobile phones  otherwise it will be too little widespread
content: Easy to install  no background issues  When I am at home I turn off GPS and bluetooth  by deactivating the app  I reactivate everything when I go out  Perplexity  the protection of an allegedly non existent privacy has made everything too optional  therefore uncertain   the reports had to be automatic     and then  it must also be made accessible to less modern mobile phones  otherwise it will be too little widespread

Title Review: I would like to use it  but I should always keep the GPS on. Ok the app does not collect location data  but in the meantime all the other apps I have on my phone do and I normally have the gps off for this reason. They could make it possible to use only bluetooth

La digitalizzazione passa anche attraverso interfacce semplici, funzionali e belle come questa. Ringrazio i ragazzi di Bending Spoons per il loro contributo, e il governo per aver impiegato menti giovani nella realizzazione di questa app. Continuate così.
Title Review: Generally I do not comment  but I take this opportunity to express my appreciation of the direction taken by the government. Digitization also passes through simple  functional and beautiful interfaces like this one. I thank the guys at Bending Spoons for their contribution  and the government for employing young minds in the making of this app. Keep it up.

Review: l'app l'ho installata ieri 3 giugno, adesso mi compare "aggiorna" e c'è scritto che l'aggiornamento è del 1 giugno. Quindi qualcosa qui è falzo. L'attivazione delle notifiche si disattiva e non è più possibile riattivarla, nemmeno reinstallando l'applicazione. Leggo ora che è in betatesting. Specificarlo dall'app? Specificare anche in fase di attivazione, che leggete la posizione (nessuno si preoccupi, la posizione è comunque sempre conosciuta anche senza app e a gps spento)
Title Review: I installed the app yesterday June 3  now I get "update" and it says that the update is June 1. So something here is falzo. Notification activation is deactivated and can no longer be reactivated  not even by reinstalling the application. I read now that it is in betatesting. Specify it from the app? Also specify during the activation phase that you read the position (no one worries  the position is always known even without the app and with the gps off)

Review: Confermo quanto detto da altri. Pur non comparendo tra le app che necessitano di autorizzazione all'uso dei servizi di localizzazione, se la localizzazione è disattivata l'app non funziona. Per funzionare la localizzazione deve essere ON, almeno del tipo 'a basso consumo' (wifi, rete cellulare, bluetooth). Ma non era stato detto che non usava la localizzazione? Inoltre, localizzazione accesa significa maggior consumo di batteria, anche se a basso consumo. Mah...
Title Review: I confirm what others have said. Although it does not appear among the apps that need permission to use the location services  if the location is disabled the app does not work. To work  the localization must be ON  at least of the 'low consumption' type (wifi  cellular network  bluetooth). But wasn't it said he didn't use localization? In addition  localization on means greater battery consumption  even if at low consumption. Mah ...

Author: Emanuele Prato

Author: Massimo Nevi
Review: L'uso dell'app dipende da troppi fattori, il principale il fatto che debba essere avviata e non va in autoesecuzione e che non ereditiin maniera permanente l'uso di BT e GPS che sono necessari per il corretto funzionamento. Inoltre non può dipendere dall'utente per la notifica dell'infezione.
Title Review: The use of the app depends on too many factors  the main one being that it must be started and does not go into self-execution and that it does not permanently inherit the use of BT and GPS which are necessary for proper operation. It also cannot depend on the user for notification of the infection.

Author: Davide Corona
Review: Davvero non chiede alcun premesso se non quello di usare le nuove api google per il covid che servono per capire quando siamo vicini a un altro che sta usando immuni. Non chiede nulla di più che la provincia. Da precisare che si può registrare dal medico se si è positivi (sezione caricamento dati) per adesso solo in alcune regioni, ma quando caricheranno i dati sapremo subito se siamo entrati in contatto con un positivo negli ultimi 14 giorni quindi è utile utilizzarla anche adesso.
Title Review: It really does not ask for any premise other than to use the new google bees for the covid that are used to understand when we are close to another who is using immune. He asks for nothing more than the province. It should be noted that you can register with the doctor if you are positive (data upload section) for now only in some regions  but when they upload the data we will know immediately if we have come into contact with a positive in the last 14 days so it is useful to use it even now.
content: It really does not ask for any premise other than to use the new google bees for the covid that are used to understand when we are close to another who is using immune  He asks for nothing more than the province  It should be noted that you can register with the doctor if you are positive  data upload section  for now only in some regions  but when they upload the data we will know immediately if we have come into contact with a positive in the last    days so it is useful to use it even now

Author: Andrea Esposito
Review: Lascio 5 stelle non per l'app in sé, ma per fare capire l'importanza del suo utilizzo. É un DOVERE MORALE DI TUTTI scaricarla, comunicare tempestivamente il codice anonimo in caso di positività ed abilitare il Bluetooth affinché funzioni correttamente. Facciamolo per noi, per i nostri cari e per tutta l'Italia. Se qualcuno polemizza riguardo la privacy, il test per capire quale tipo di melanzana sei, o in che modo morirai, lo sta aspettando su Facebook...
Title Review: I leave 5 stars not for the app itself  but to make people understand the importance of its use. It is EVERYONE'S MORAL DUTY to download it  promptly communicate the anonymous code in case of positivity and enable Bluetooth to work correctly. Let's do it for us  for our loved ones and for all of Italy. If someone is polemic about privacy  the test to figure out what kind of eggplant you are  or how you will die  is waiting on Facebook ...
content: I leave   stars not for the app itself  but to make people understand the importance of its use  It is EVERYONE S MORAL DUTY to download it  promptly communicate the anonymous code in case of positivity and enable Bluetooth to work correctly  Let s do it for us  for our loved ones and for all of Italy  If someone is polemic about privacy  the test to figure out what kind of eggplant you are  or how you will die  is waiting on Facebook

Author: Andrea Rossetti
Review: NON INSTALLATELA. Il problema non è se l'app funzioni o no dal punto di vista tecnico. I problemi sono due (i) non importa se i dati sono anonimi, una grande quantità di dati anonimi è sufficiente per creare profili sanitari dei cittadini (ii) il garante del trattamento dei dati personali non ha dato il suo parere positivo, ha anzi indicato una ventina di modifiche da effettuare.
Title Review: DO NOT INSTALL IT. The problem is not whether the app works or not from a technical point of view. The problems are two (i) it does not matter if the data is anonymous  a large amount of anonymous data is sufficient to create health profiles of citizens (ii) the guarantor of the processing of personal data has not given his positive opinion  indeed he has indicated about twenty changes to be made.
content: DO NOT INSTALL IT  The problem is not whether the app works or not from a technical point of view  The problems are two  i  it does not matter if the data is anonymous  a large amount of anonymous data is sufficient to create health profiles of citizens  ii  the guarantor of the processing of personal data has not given his positive opinion  indeed he has indicated about twenty changes to be made

Anzi é l'app che mi ha detto di costi dire bene il mio cellulare e mi ha comunicato il mio codice sanitaro. Eccellente!!!
Title Review: A useful smart App that truly respects privacy. Unlike the others  it did not ask me for personal data  nor for the GPS activation authorization  nor to access content and photos of my cell. Indeed  it is the app that told me how much it costs to say my mobile phone and communicated my health code to me. Excellent!!!
content: A useful smart App that truly respects privacy  Unlike the others  it did not ask me for personal data  nor for the GPS activation authorization  nor to access content and photos of my cell  Indeed  it is the app that told me how much it costs to say my mobile phone and communicated my health code to me  Excellent

Author: Giuseppe Angelino
Review: L'app in se ha una grafica chiara ed intuitiva, utilizza le nuove API Google ma...credo sarà poco utile. Si perché si presuppone che per segnalarti chi è stato esposto al covid, queste persone debbano volontariamente aver comunicato la cosa attraverso la procedura descritta dall'app. Considerato l'ignoranza che c'è in giro, dubito che TUTTI i contagiati/esposti si prendano la briga di farlo. Sembra brutto dirlo, ma sarebbe dovuta essere obbligatoria per essere efficiente ed efficace.
Title Review: The app itself has clear and intuitive graphics  uses the new Google API but ... I think it will be of little use. Yes  because it is assumed that in order to report who has been exposed to the covid  these people must have voluntarily communicated the thing through the procedure described by the app. Given the ignorance around  I doubt ALL infected / exposed will bother to do so. It sounds bad to say  but it should have been mandatory to be efficient and effective.
content: The app itself has clear and intuitive graphics  uses the new Google API but     I think it will be of little use  Yes  because it is assumed that in order to report who has been exposed to the covid  these people must have voluntarily communicated the thing through the procedure described by the app  Given the ignorance around  I doubt ALL infected   exposed will bother to do so  It sounds bad to say  but it should have been mandatory to be efficient and effective
