Author: Account Famiglia
Review: Installazione facile. Funziona senza GPS. Chiede Regione e Provincia, poi se si vuole attivare il servizio, che consiste nel ricevere una notifica personale e riservata, solo se lo si richiede esplicitamente, nel caso che il sistema abbia registrato che si è stati vicino a persone che sono risultate positive alle autorità. A quel punto sta all'utente decidere cosa fare. Approvata dal Garante della Privacy. Nessuno può identificarti con questa app e non possono obbligarti a stare in 40ena.
Title Review: Easy installation. Works without GPS. Asks Region and Province  then if you want to activate the service  which consists of receiving a personal and confidential notification  only if you explicitly request it  in the event that the system has registered that you have been close to people who have tested positive for the authorities . At that point it is up to the user to decide what to do. Approved by the Privacy Guarantor. Nobody can identify you with this app and they can't force you to stay in 40ena.
content: Easy installation  Works without GPS  Asks Region and Province  then if you want to activate the service  which consists of receiving a personal and confidential notification  only if you explicitly request it  in the event that the system has registered that you have been close to people who have tested positive for the authorities   At that point it is up to the user to decide what to do  Approved by the Privacy Guarantor  Nobody can identify you with this app and they can t force you to stay in   ena

Author: MJ Andry
Review: Non comprendo come possa tutelare effettivamente da un possibile contagio se non è obbligatorio registrare le proprie generalità. Se ho un contatto con qualcuno che è malato mi avvisa dicendo che sono entrato in contatto con un possibile contagio, ma non dice né quando nè chi. Inoltre se si risulta positivi ai test, caricare i codici dei dispositivi con i quali si è entrati a contatto non dovrebbe essere una scelta ma automatico ed obbligatorio. Sviluppate queste funzioni l'app avrebbe senso.
Title Review: I do not understand how it can actually protect against a possible contagion if it is not mandatory to register your personal details. If I have contact with someone who is sick  he warns me by saying that I have come into contact with a possible infection  but he does not say when or who. Furthermore  if you test positive  uploading the codes of the devices you came into contact with should not be a choice but automatic and mandatory. Develop these functions the app would make sense.
content: I do not understand how it can actually protect against a possible contagion if it is not mandatory to register your personal details  If I have contact with someone who is sick  he warns me by saying that I have come into contact with a possible infection  but he does not say when or who  Furthermore  if you test positive  uploading the codes of the devices you came into contact with should not be a choice but automatic and mandatory  Develop these functions the app would make sense

Author: Riccardo Valzania
Review: Ero convintissimo, ma è una delusione su tutti i fronti. Il nodo principale è che non basta attivare il Bluetooth, ma anche il GPS. In questo modo tutte le app installate potranno rilevare la propria posizione e queste non sono del ministero della sanità. Questo è sufficiente per disinstallarla. Perché senza GPS non fa niente! Poi ci sono altri difetti minori come la funzione "Caricamento dati" non spiegata nel tutorial introduttivo e che chiede l'intervento di un operatore sanitario?!
Title Review: I was very convinced  but it is a disappointment on all fronts. The main point is that it is not enough to activate Bluetooth  but also GPS. In this way  all installed apps will be able to detect their position and these are not of the ministry of health. This is enough to uninstall it. Because without GPS it does nothing! Then there are other minor flaws such as the "Upload data" function not explained in the introductory tutorial and which requires the intervention of a healthcare professional ?!
content: I was very convinced  but it is a disappointment on all fronts  The main point is that it is not enough to activate Bluetooth  but also GPS  In this way  all installed apps will be able to detect their position and these are not of the ministry of health  This is enough to uninstall it  Because without GPS it does nothing  Then there are other minor flaws such as the  Upload data  function not explained in the introductory tutorial and which requires the intervention of a healthcare professional

Title Review: I don't know if a problem with my phone and its version of Android  but every time I activate the app it no longer locks me automatically with the power key  it only locks after manually clicking on the lock icon. I tried to double check all the settings and it always reports me the power key as a lock command. When I uninstall the app  the phone automatically locks itself again with the power key. For the rest  excellent app

Author: Prometeus War
Review: App essenziale. Pochi passaggi e sei attivo. Penso sia più sicuro di qualsiasi social, nessuno sa chi sei, e ogni ora si generano diversi codici criptati, quindi il tuo nome nessuno lo sa. Chi è reticente dovrebbe abbandonare gli smartphone perché si è tracciati continuamente. Quando si tratta di salute dovremmo fare tutti uno sforzo ed abbattere certi taboo, o meglio ancora informarsi meglio
Title Review: Essential app. A few steps and you are active. I think it is safer than any social network  nobody knows who you are  and every hour different encrypted codes are generated  so nobody knows your name. Those who are reticent should abandon smartphones because they are continuously tracked. When it comes to health  we should all make an effort and break down certain taboos  or better yet  get more information
content: Essential app  A few steps and you are active  I think it is safer than any social network  nobody knows who you are  and every hour different encrypted codes are generated  so nobody knows your name  Those who are reticent should abandon smartphones because they are continuously tracked  When it comes to health  we should all make an effort and break down certain taboos  or better yet  get more information

Author: Antonello Tropeano
Review: Sempre la cosa all' italiana, doveva far parte del sistema operativo di ogni smartphone e collegata ad internet indipendentemente dalla volontà dell' utente di attivarla e dosattivarla, visto che parliamo di una cosa seria. E se era mortale al 100% e colpiva qualsia essere umano? Tanto Google sa in qualsiasi momento dove ci troviamo e dove andiamo, i nostri operatori tramite le celle ci seguono passo passo e noi per la nostra vita ci preoccupiamo della privacy
Title Review: Always the Italian thing  it had to be part of the operating system of each smartphone and connected to the internet regardless of the user's will to activate and deactivate it  since we are talking about a serious matter. What if it was 100% deadly and it affected any human being? So much Google knows at any time where we are and where we are going  our operators follow us step by step through the cells and we care about privacy for our life

Author: Michele Zannolfi
Review: Ritengo che i miei dati li abbiano tutte le tesserine dei vari supermercati, distributori, teatri, distributori on line, eccetera. Ho scelto di comunicarli anche al Ministero della Salute giacché hanno di già tutti i miei ingressi ospedalieri e sono registrati e disponibili. A questo punto gioco a mio favore scegliendo questa applicazione nella speranza che sia efficace e che possa salvare la mia vita e quella delle persone che incontrerò. Grazie e buon lavoro.
Title Review: I believe that my data have all the cards of the various supermarkets  distributors  theaters  online distributors  etc. I have also chosen to communicate them to the Ministry of Health as they already have all my hospital entrances and are registered and available. At this point I play in my favor by choosing this application in the hope that it will be effective and that it can save my life and that of the people I meet. Thanks and good job.
content: I believe that my data have all the cards of the various supermarkets  distributors  theaters  online distributors  etc  I have also chosen to communicate them to the Ministry of Health as they already have all my hospital entrances and are registered and available  At this point I play in my favor by choosing this application in the hope that it will be effective and that it can save my life and that of the people I meet  Thanks and good job

Author: Francesco
Review: Ha praticamente accesso a tutti i caxzi del tuo telefono. Ma abbastanza preoccupante è il consenso all'app a modificare le impostazioni di stand by del telefono, di stabilire a suo piacimento connessioni bluetooth ai dispositivi accoppiati e a quelli remoti e, non ultimo , la tracciatura della posizione sia con GPS e con le connessioni Wifi .
Title Review: It has access to practically all the cables on your phone. But quite worrying is the consent of the app to change the phone's standby settings  to establish bluetooth connections to paired and remote devices at will and  last but not least  the tracking of the position both with GPS and with Wifi connections.
content: It has access to practically all the cables on your phone  But quite worrying is the consent of the app to change the phone s standby settings  to establish bluetooth connections to paired and remote devices at will and  last but not least  the tracking of the position both with GPS and with Wifi connections

Author: Pasquale Bifulco
Review: Dovremmo essere disposti a scaricare "immuni" con la stessa disinvoltura che abbiamo quando ci registriamo su qualsiasi sito, quando ci facciamo fidelizzare per stupide raccolte punti, quando accettiamo di essere profilati da Aziende di tutto il pianeta. In tal caso...non presteremo il fianco a stupide caciare sulla privacy. Per una volta senza rinunciare a nulla del nostro privato a tutela della salute di tutti. Per una volta un'Impresa che opera per il bene comune. Eccellenti Bending Spoons.
Title Review: We should be willing to download "immune" with the same ease that we have when we register on any site  when we get loyalty for stupid points collections  when we accept to be profiled by companies from all over the planet. In that case ... we will not lend our side to stupid shit about privacy. For once without giving up anything from our private sector to protect everyone's health. For once a company that works for the common good. Excellent Bending Spoons.
content: We should be willing to download  immune  with the same ease that we have when we register on any site  when we get loyalty for stupid points collections  when we accept to be profiled by companies from all over the planet  In that case     we will not lend our side to stupid shit about privacy  For once without giving up anything from our private sector to protect everyone s health  For once a company that works for the common good  Excellent Bending Spoons

Author: Vito Recchia
Review: Con l'app chiusa, se viene disattivato il bluetooth e poi riattivato (o, il che è lo stesso, se viene attivata la modalità offline e poi riattivata), il servizio dell'app si disattiva e per farlo riattivare bisogna disattivare il bluetooth e consentire all'app stessa di riattivarlo. Quindi al momento solo 3 stelle.
Title Review: With the app closed  if bluetooth is deactivated and then reactivated (or  which is the same  if offline mode is activated and then reactivated)  the app service is deactivated and to make it reactivate you must deactivate the bluetooth and allow the app itself to reactivate it. So at the moment only 3 stars.
content: With the app closed  if bluetooth is deactivated and then reactivated  or  which is the same  if offline mode is activated and then reactivated   the app service is deactivated and to make it reactivate you must deactivate the bluetooth and allow the app itself to reactivate it  So at the moment only   stars

Author: Bb W
Review: Consiglio a tutti di installarla. Facciamolo per l'Italia, al di là del credo politico. Cerchiamo di essere collaborativi, senza trovare scuse del tipo "ho paura per la mia privacy".. Vi ricordo che i motori di ricerca che utilizziamo possiedono già molte più informazioni di noi rispetto a quelle che raccoglierà questa app. Smettiamola di lamentarci che in Italia tutto va male, è ora di essere costruttivi e fare qualcosa per la comunità: installare e consigliare di farlo è anche altruista
Title Review: I recommend everyone to install it. Let's do it for Italy  beyond the political creed. We try to be collaborative  without making excuses like "I'm afraid for my privacy" .. I remind you that the search engines we use already have much more information than us than what this app will collect. Let's stop complaining that in Italy everything is wrong  it's time to be constructive and do something for the community: installing and advising to do so is also altruistic
content: I recommend everyone to install it  Let s do it for Italy  beyond the political creed  We try to be collaborative  without making excuses like  I m afraid for my privacy     I remind you that the search engines we use already have much more information than us than what this app will collect  Let s stop complaining that in Italy everything is wrong  it s time to be constructive and do something for the community  installing and advising to do so is also altruistic

Author: Mauro Martini
Review: Per Matteo V. Fortarezza. Si vede che ti sei documentato su tutto in questo periodo .. al punto che ancora non hai compreso la differenza tra tracciamento attraverso identificazione di celle e attraverso bluetooth. E ammesso ci fosse pure una per così dire invasione di privacy ( cosa che attraverso bluetooth non esiste, per cui informati meglio ), dovresti magare abbandonare l'ipocrisia e pensare che magari in questa fattispecie è necessario.LASCIA SPAZIO A CONSIDERAZIONI PIU' SENSATE E ACUTE!
Title Review: For Matteo V. Fortarezza. We see that you have documented everything in this period .. to the point that you still have not understood the difference between tracking through cell identification and through bluetooth. And if there was even an invasion of privacy  so to speak (something that does not exist through bluetooth  so get better informed)  you should abandon the hypocrisy and think that perhaps in this case it is necessary. ACUTE!
content: For Matteo V  Fortarezza  We see that you have documented everything in this period    to the point that you still have not understood the difference between tracking through cell identification and through bluetooth  And if there was even an invasion of privacy  so to speak  something that does not exist through bluetooth  so get better informed   you should abandon the hypocrisy and think that perhaps in this case it is necessary  ACUTE

Review: Ho scaricato l'app e attivato tutto ciò che bisognava attivare ed apparentemente era subito entrata in funzione. A fine giornata ho casualmente controllato e mi compare il messaggio: Servizio non attivo - Riattiva Immuni. Pur cliccando su quel bottone però non riesco a riattivarla. Se devo installarla per tenerla inattiva quasi quasi la disinstallo. Sono residente in Emilia-Romagna.
Title Review: I downloaded the app and activated everything that needed to be activated and apparently it immediately started working. At the end of the day I randomly checked and I get the message: Service not active - Reactivate Immune. While clicking on that button  however  I cannot reactivate it. If I have to install it to keep it inactive I almost uninstall it. I am a resident of Emilia-Romagna.

Author: Tommaso Pretaro
Review: Premessa sposato con 2 figli minori. Vado al ristorante e sono obbligato a lasciare i nomi e cognomi dei presenti, compresi i minori, con indirizzo e recapito telefonico. Poi su questa app mi viene chiesto che se sono eventualmente positivo o se sono entrato in contatto con un positivo che ha l'app installata di inviare, volontariamente e senza nessun obbligo, il codice di essere stato contagiato. Se questa è per la privacy, l'app è inutile.
Title Review: Foreword married with 2 minor children. I go to the restaurant and I am obliged to leave the names and surnames of those present  including minors  with their address and telephone number. Then on this app I am asked that if I am possibly positive or if I have come into contact with a positive who has the app installed to send  voluntarily and without any obligation  the code of having been infected. If this is for privacy  the app is useless.
content: Foreword married with   minor children  I go to the restaurant and I am obliged to leave the names and surnames of those present  including minors  with their address and telephone number  Then on this app I am asked that if I am possibly positive or if I have come into contact with a positive who has the app installed to send  voluntarily and without any obligation  the code of having been infected  If this is for privacy  the app is useless

Author: Fabien Molinatto
Review: OTTIMA APP, se stai leggendo questa recensione e pensi che OMmIoDiO Ci rUba Le iNForMaZiOnI PeRSonAli, svegliati, google lo fa da sempre ma non hai mai detto niente, quest'app non ti chiede nient'altro che la provincia in cui abiti, e pensa un po', lo fa per il bene di tutti. Naturalmente se pensi che il covid sia un' INveNZIoNE DeI PoTErI FOrTi CauSaTO DaL 5G, forse dovresti preoccuparti più della tua ignoranza che dei tuoi dati personali, cosi, per dire.
Title Review: GREAT APP  if you are reading this review and you think that OMmIoDiO Ci roUba Le iNForMaZiOnI PeRSonAli  wake up  google has always done it but you never said anything  this app asks you for nothing but the province you live in  and thinks a little bit  it does it for the good of all. Of course  if you think covid is a 5G POWER INVENTION  maybe you should worry more about your ignorance than your personal data  so to speak.

Author: Riccardo Sanarica
Review: L'applicazione forse ci mette poco tempo ad individuare il contagio sempre che quest'ultimo abbia installato l'applicazione immuni ma di quanto tempo ha bisogno l'app. in modalità Bluetooth per poter individuare il pericolo? c'è un range di tempo? Se ho incontrato per una frazione di secondo la persona infetta, che probabilità ho di aver contratto il virus con un lasso di tempo così basso e se è il caso di aumentarne il tempo di esposizione per non creare panico inutilmente?
Title Review: The application perhaps takes little time to identify the infection as long as the latter has installed the immune application but how long does the app need. in Bluetooth mode to be able to identify the danger? is there a time range? If I have met the infected person for a fraction of a second  what are the chances of having contracted the virus with such a short period of time and if it is necessary to increase the exposure time so as not to unnecessarily panic?
content: The application perhaps takes little time to identify the infection as long as the latter has installed the immune application but how long does the app need  in Bluetooth mode to be able to identify the danger  is there a time range  If I have met the infected person for a fraction of a second  what are the chances of having contracted the virus with such a short period of time and if it is necessary to increase the exposure time so as not to unnecessarily panic

Author: Alessandro F.
Review: Considerando la media generale delle app italiane , almeno l'interfaccia è curata e molto scorrevole, vedremo se effettivamente segnalerà nel caso ci trovassimo vicini ad un postivo. Una piccola nota sulla privacy tanto discussa dai complottisti...Vi dico che sicuramente è più sicura quest' app che il vostro profilo su un qualsiasi social dove ovviamente inserite tutti i dati personali compresa anche la via nei casi più completi, se ritenete questa un problema per la privacy, siete malati.
Title Review: Considering the general average of the Italian apps  at least the interface is accurate and very smooth  we will see if it will actually report if we are close to a postive. A small note on privacy much discussed by conspiracy theorists ... I tell you that this app is certainly safer than your profile on any social network where obviously you enter all personal data including the way in the most complete cases  if you consider this a privacy issue  you are sick.
content: Considering the general average of the Italian apps  at least the interface is accurate and very smooth  we will see if it will actually report if we are close to a postive  A small note on privacy much discussed by conspiracy theorists     I tell you that this app is certainly safer than your profile on any social network where obviously you enter all personal data including the way in the most complete cases  if you consider this a privacy issue  you are sick

Author: Domenico Nilo Mazza
Review: Non ritengo opportuno che l'app richieda comunque di abilitare la geolocalizzazione: non se ne comprende il motivo. Se anche "immuni" non traccia, lascia aperta la possibilità alle altre app di tracciare. Insieme all'immagine scelta per rappresentare la famiglia ed i suoi ruoli, rappresenta un doppio inciampo. Peccato
Title Review: I do not think it appropriate that the app still requires to enable geolocation: we do not understand why. If even "immune" does not track  it leaves the possibility for other apps to track. Together with the image chosen to represent the family and its roles  it represents a double stumbling block. Sin
content: I do not think it appropriate that the app still requires to enable geolocation  we do not understand why  If even  immune  does not track  it leaves the possibility for other apps to track  Together with the image chosen to represent the family and its roles  it represents a double stumbling block  Sin

Author: Alessia Bocchio
Review: Anche nel mio caso Immuni non funziona. Scaricata corretamente, al primo utilizzo l'ho configurata e sembrava andasse tutto bene ma l'app non continua a lavorare in background. Ogni volta che riapro l'app mi dice che il servizio non è attivo e se cerco di riattivarlo mi dice che le notifiche di esposizione non sono attive. Nel mio caso non si può nemmeno dare la colpa a Trump perchè il mio telefono non è cinese: è un fairphone (olandese).
Title Review: Even in my case Immuni doesn't work. Downloaded correctly  on first use I configured it and everything seemed to be fine but the app does not continue to work in the background. Every time I reopen the app it tells me that the service is not active and if I try to reactivate it it tells me that the exposure notifications are not active. In my case you can't even blame Trump because my phone isn't Chinese: it's a (Dutch) fairphone.
content: Even in my case Immuni doesn t work  Downloaded correctly  on first use I configured it and everything seemed to be fine but the app does not continue to work in the background  Every time I reopen the app it tells me that the service is not active and if I try to reactivate it it tells me that the exposure notifications are not active  In my case you can t even blame Trump because my phone isn t Chinese  it s a  Dutch  fairphone

Author: Un utente Google
Review: Pensavo bastasse tenere attivo solo il bluetooth e invece deve funzionare anche il gps e non mi piace. Tenere attivo anche il gps, vuole dire ridurre di molto la durata della batteria. Per il resto è da testare. E' da verificare se funziona veramente all'avvicinarsi di una persona con covid-19 (speriamo di no)

The rest is to be tested. It is to be verified if it really works when a person with covid-19 approaches (hopefully not)

Author: CLAMS Alba
Review: Qualcosa non quadra. Tante belle parole ma non vedo il perché di dover tenere acceso il GPS per rilevare dispositivi Bluetooth nelle vicinanze, anzi... il Bluetooth sui cellulari esiste da prima del GPS ed ha sempre funzionato senza. Non vedo il perché di dover tener attivo un localizzatore geografico satellitare (che consuma molto la batteria) SE l'applicazione (come dice) non traccia la posizione, ma solo la vicinanza dei cellulari tramite il Bluetooth. Mah mah mah... C'è qualcosa da rivedere
Title Review: Something is wrong. Many nice words but I don't see why I have to keep the GPS turned on to detect Bluetooth devices nearby  on the contrary ... Bluetooth on mobile phones existed before GPS and has always worked without it. I do not see the reason of having to keep active a satellite geographic locator (which consumes a lot of battery) IF the application (as it says) does not track the position  but only the proximity of mobile phones via Bluetooth. Mah mah mah ... There is something to review
content: Something is wrong  Many nice words but I don t see why I have to keep the GPS turned on to detect Bluetooth devices nearby  on the contrary     Bluetooth on mobile phones existed before GPS and has always worked without it  I do not see the reason of having to keep active a satellite geographic locator  which consumes a lot of battery  IF the application  as it says  does not track the position  but only the proximity of mobile phones via Bluetooth  Mah mah mah     There is something to review
syn: locat, track, gps, locat, geograph, applic

Author: Michele Buttarelli
Review: L'app è fatta bene per carità, nulla da dire. Il problema è che questa stupida ossessione per la privacy di noi italiani (che denota una certa coda di paglia) costringe l'app stessa ad esser potenzialmente inutile, visto che se risultassi infetto potrei tranquillamente decidere di non comunicare all'app il mio stato di salute, rendendo il tracciamento pressoché inutile. Ma d'altronde siamo un paese arretrato sotto molti punti di vista
Title Review: The app is well done for charity  nothing to say. The problem is that this stupid obsession with the privacy of us Italians (which denotes a certain straw tail) forces the app itself to be potentially useless  since if I were infected I could easily decide not to communicate my status to the app. health  making tracking almost useless. But on the other hand  we are a backward country from many points of view
content: The app is well done for charity  nothing to say  The problem is that this stupid obsession with the privacy of us Italians  which denotes a certain straw tail  forces the app itself to be potentially useless  since if I were infected I could easily decide not to communicate my status to the app  health  making tracking almost useless  But on the other hand  we are a backward country from many points of view
syn: countri, italian, countri, track, privaci, communic

Author: Flavio Franceschini
Review: Per attivare le notifiche di esposizione occorre disattivare il bluetooth: consiglio di scriverlo nel messaggio di errore. Dopo pochi secondi, se si riapre l'app che era ancora in background, il servizio risulta non attivo. Bisogna nuovamente disattivare il bluetooth e consentire le notifiche, e così via all'infinito. Quindi l'app funziona solo per pochi secondi. Così è inutile.
Title Review: To activate the notifications of exposure it is necessary to deactivate the bluetooth: I recommend writing it in the error message. After a few seconds  if you reopen the app that was still in the background  the service is not active. You have to turn off bluetooth again and allow notifications  and so on indefinitely. So the app only works for a few seconds. So it is useless.
content: To activate the notifications of exposure it is necessary to deactivate the bluetooth  I recommend writing it in the error message  After a few seconds  if you reopen the app that was still in the background  the service is not active  You have to turn off bluetooth again and allow notifications  and so on indefinitely  So the app only works for a few seconds  So it is useless

Author: Cristina Maria Romano

CONSIGLIATISSIMA! PS: I peggiori complottisti hanno facebook: quest'app è decisamente non invasiva a confronto!
Title Review: Very easy to use app. No personal data is requested but only the region and province of residence. The only technology required for operation is bluetooth and it is well explained that  although Immuni does not monitor movements and does not have access to the position  active localization is required for exposure notifications. Highly recommended! PS: The worst conspirators have facebook: this app is definitely non-invasive in comparison!

Author: matteo boni
Review: L'app mi sembra ben fatta sia a livello di layout e usabilità, sia per il protocollo di rilevazione e notifica sottostante (DP-3T). Sono però rimasto molto perplesso quando ho scoperto che, nonostante non sia condiviso nessun fatto ad esso relativo, il GPS deve restare sempre attivato affinché il meccanismi di tracciamento sia attivo. La tutela della privacy viene così demandata alla presenza di altre app che utilizzano il GPS e inoltre restano aperto problemi di consumo della batteria.
Title Review: The app seems to me well done both in terms of layout and usability  and for the underlying detection and notification protocol (DP-3T). However  I was very perplexed when I discovered that  although no facts related to it are shared  the GPS must always remain activated for the tracking mechanisms to be active. The protection of privacy is thus delegated to the presence of other apps that use GPS and also battery consumption problems remain open.
content: The app seems to me well done both in terms of layout and usability  and for the underlying detection and notification protocol  DP  T   However  I was very perplexed when I discovered that  although no facts related to it are shared  the GPS must always remain activated for the tracking mechanisms to be active  The protection of privacy is thus delegated to the presence of other apps that use GPS and also battery consumption problems remain open

Author: Francesco Bonifazi
Review: Ottima interfaccia grafica, semplice utilizzo, buon tutorial al primo avvio con spiegazioni utili al funzionamento, buono il meccanismo per garantire l'anonimato e la privacy. Unica pecca, ma credo inevitabile, l'utilizzo continuo del Bluetooth, anche se viene spiegato che si utilizza il Bluetooth Low Energy, nuova tecnologia wireless a basso consumo energetico e quindi anche ridotte radiazioni.
Title Review: Excellent graphical interface  easy to use  good tutorial at the first start with useful explanations for operation  good mechanism to ensure anonymity and privacy. The only flaw  but I believe inevitable  the continuous use of Bluetooth  even if it is explained that Bluetooth Low Energy is used  a new wireless technology with low energy consumption and therefore also reduced radiation.
content: Excellent graphical interface  easy to use  good tutorial at the first start with useful explanations for operation  good mechanism to ensure anonymity and privacy  The only flaw  but I believe inevitable  the continuous use of Bluetooth  even if it is explained that Bluetooth Low Energy is used  a new wireless technology with low energy consumption and therefore also reduced radiation

Author: Filippo Poletti
Review: Per ora sembra un'ottima app, semplice e chiara. Purtroppo la tutela della privacy limita l'utilità dell'app lasciando all'utente la possibilità di segnalare il proprio contagio o meno, ma non è certo colpa degli sviluppatori. Per i fenomeni che mettono 1 stella perché non funziona, vorrei sottolineare che fino a che la propria regione non lo permetterà di fatto non entrerà in funzione. Quindi prima di dare aria alla bocca e denigrare l'immagine dell'app senza motivo è bene informarsi.
Title Review: For now it looks like a great app  simple and clear. Unfortunately  the protection of privacy limits the usefulness of the app leaving the user the possibility to report their infection or not  but it is certainly not the fault of the developers. For the phenomena that put 1 star because it does not work  I would like to emphasize that until your region does not allow it in fact it will not come into operation. So before you air your mouth and denigrate the image of the app for no reason  it is good to inquire.
content: For now it looks like a great app  simple and clear  Unfortunately  the protection of privacy limits the usefulness of the app leaving the user the possibility to report their infection or not  but it is certainly not the fault of the developers  For the phenomena that put   star because it does not work  I would like to emphasize that until your region does not allow it in fact it will not come into operation  So before you air your mouth and denigrate the image of the app for no reason  it is good to inquire

Review: Unico appunto, cos'è il caricamento dati? Come fa l'app a sapere che sono malato se non glielo dico e come fa a segnalare la mia malattia agli altri se non lo sa? Author: Giuseppe Iuso
Review: Su Samsung note 9 funziona bene. Leggo molti che si lamentano della loro privacy, ma che comunque usano Facebook, Google Maps, app Google che tracciano i propri spostamenti; usano app e giochi che richiedono la posizione e la attivano tranquillamente, usano tutti i social e la messaggistica... mah, ho seri dubbi che tutto ciò, insieme ai cookies traccianti, non riguardi la nostra privacy. App ben fatta, speriamo che torni utile.
Title Review: On Samsung note 9 it works fine. I read many who complain about their privacy  but who still use Facebook  Google Maps  Google apps that track their movements; they use apps and games that require location and activate it quietly  they use all social networks and messaging ... well  I have serious doubts that all this  together with tracking cookies  does not affect our privacy. Well done app  we hope it comes in handy.
content: On Samsung note   it works fine  I read many who complain about their privacy  but who still use Facebook  Google Maps  Google apps that track their movements  they use apps and games that require location and activate it quietly  they use all social networks and messaging     well  I have serious doubts that all this  together with tracking cookies  does not affect our privacy  Well done app  we hope it comes in handy

Author: Claudio Bosco
Review: La premessa è che lo smartphone non è tracciabile. L'applicazione richiede che il GPS sia sempre attivo. Qualcosa non quadra. L'utente è anonimo, ma gli viene inviato un messaggio in caso abbia incrociato un altro utente contagiato che teoricamente abbia inserito questo dato nella sua applicazione. Ambedue tramite il numero di smartphone possono essere identificati. Qualcosa non quadra. L'applicazione può essere utile, ma la verità ditela, non occorre prenderci in giro.
Title Review: The premise is that the smartphone is not traceable. The application requires that the GPS is always active. Something is wrong. The user is anonymous  but a message is sent to him in case he has crossed paths with another infected user who has theoretically entered this data in his application. Both can be identified by the smartphone number. Something is wrong. The application can be useful  but tell the truth  there is no need to make fun of us.
content: The premise is that the smartphone is not traceable  The application requires that the GPS is always active  Something is wrong  The user is anonymous  but a message is sent to him in case he has crossed paths with another infected user who has theoretically entered this data in his application  Both can be identified by the smartphone number  Something is wrong  The application can be useful  but tell the truth  there is no need to make fun of us

Author: Filippo Brugnone
Review: Scrivo questa recensione per rispondere a coloro i quali hanno dato 1 stessa perché appare il messaggio "notifiche di esposizione non attive". Il messaggio appare non perché l'app non funzioni, ma semplicemente perché, in questo momento, è in test in 4 regioni italiane, Abruzzo, Liguria, Marche e Puglia, pertanto se si è residenti in altre regioni, al momento, non può essere utilizzata. Potrà essere utilizzata nelle prossime settimane, terminata la fase di beta testing.
Title Review: I am writing this review to respond to those who have given 1 itself because the message "inactive exposure notifications" appears. The message appears not because the app does not work  but simply because  at this moment  it is being tested in 4 Italian regions  Abruzzo  Liguria  Marche and Puglia  so if you are resident in other regions  at the moment  it cannot be used. It can be used in the coming weeks  once the beta testing phase is over.
content: I am writing this review to respond to those who have given   itself because the message  inactive exposure notifications  appears  The message appears not because the app does not work  but simply because  at this moment  it is being tested in   Italian regions  Abruzzo  Liguria  Marche and Puglia  so if you are resident in other regions  at the moment  it cannot be used  It can be used in the coming weeks  once the beta testing phase is over

Author: Lorenzo Tiseni
Review: C'è un problema fondamentale e cioè il fatto che la app non funziona in background. Se la attivo e poi lascio 5 minuti il telefono con l'app in background il servizio si disattiva. Tale cosa è molto problematica perché per il corretto funzionamento dell'app dovrei andare in giro con il telefono sempre acceso con l'app in primo piano come se fosse un contatore geiger. È una buona idea la app ma se questo bug non viene fixato avremo che il tracciamento app sarà irrealizzabile. Ho un honor 9 lite
Title Review: There is a fundamental problem and that is the fact that the app doesn't run in the background. If I activate it and then leave the phone with the app in the background for 5 minutes  the service is deactivated. This is very problematic because for the proper functioning of the app I would have to walk around with the phone always on with the app in the foreground as if it were a geiger counter. The app is a good idea but if this bug is not fixed we will have that the app tracking will be impossible. I have an honor 9 lite
content: There is a fundamental problem and that is the fact that the app doesn t run in the background  If I activate it and then leave the phone with the app in the background for   minutes  the service is deactivated  This is very problematic because for the proper functioning of the app I would have to walk around with the phone always on with the app in the foreground as if it were a geiger counter  The app is a good idea but if this bug is not fixed we will have that the app tracking will be impossible  I have an honor   lite

Author: Roberto Bortolotti
Review: Appena installato l'app. Ho letto le istruzioni, pensavo che si dovessero inviare dei dati quotidianamente, invece no. Trovo che sia una iniziativa molto importante, non viola la privacy ma soprattutto ci indica se siamo venuti in contatto con uno o più soggetti positivi. Non capisco però come mai nella sperimentazione non rientri la regione Lombardia che ha avuto da sola la metà dei decessi nazionali, ma si inizi a testare dall'8 in via ufficiale in Liguria, Abruzzo, Marche e Puglia...
Title Review: Just installed the app. I read the instructions  I thought you should send data daily  but no. I find it a very important initiative  it does not violate privacy but above all it shows us if we have come into contact with one or more positive subjects. However  I do not understand why the Lombardy region does not fall into the experimentation  which alone has had half of the national deaths  but begins to test officially from the 8th in Liguria  Abruzzo  Marche and Puglia ...
content: Just installed the app  I read the instructions  I thought you should send data daily  but no  I find it a very important initiative  it does not violate privacy but above all it shows us if we have come into contact with one or more positive subjects  However  I do not understand why the Lombardy region does not fall into the experimentation  which alone has had half of the national deaths  but begins to test officially from the  th in Liguria  Abruzzo  Marche and Puglia

content: Despite having location services turned on  the app refuses to work on my huawei   honor  x  It s as if he can t get the rights to the GPS  It doesn t work on my wife s cell phone in the same way  and what s worse  it doesn t even say why  Maybe it needs to update the OS  but there are no updates available for our phones

Author: Mattia Stighezza
Review: Per ora nessun problema, l'applicazione funziona con il bluetooth ma non scarica la batteria più di prima. Non richiede dati personali ma solamente la provincia e non traccia il GPS quindi nessun rischio per la privacy anche per i più scettici. I dispositivi tramite bluetooth si scambiano un codice anonimo, se uno di questi codici è associato a un positivo (inserito da un operatore sanitario) viene solo notificato il contatto in modo anonimo.
Title Review: For now no problem  the application works with bluetooth but does not drain the battery more than before. It does not require personal data but only the province and does not track the GPS so no privacy risk even for the most skeptical. The devices via bluetooth exchange an anonymous code  if one of these codes is associated with a positive (entered by a healthcare professional) the contact is only notified anonymously.
content: For now no problem  the application works with bluetooth but does not drain the battery more than before  It does not require personal data but only the province and does not track the GPS so no privacy risk even for the most skeptical  The devices via bluetooth exchange an anonymous code  if one of these codes is associated with a positive  entered by a healthcare professional  the contact is only notified anonymously

Author: luca radicioni
Review: L'app è ben fatta e semplice da usare, ma c'è un problema gigantesco . Ovvero l'ultilizzo del GPS è essenziale per l'attivazione del servizio. Inizialmente viene scritto che l'app utilizza solo il bluetooth (cosa che risulta non vera), ma il limite è che nessuno va in giro con il gps attivato, se non una minima parte degli utenti. La necessità del Gps rende l'app inutile a mio parera.
Title Review: The app is well made and simple to use  but there is a huge problem. That is  the use of GPS is essential for activating the service. Initially it is written that the app only uses bluetooth (which is not true)  but the limit is that no one goes around with the GPS activated  if not a small part of the users. The need for GPS makes the app useless in my opinion.
content: The app is well made and simple to use  but there is a huge problem  That is  the use of GPS is essential for activating the service  Initially it is written that the app only uses bluetooth  which is not true   but the limit is that no one goes around with the GPS activated  if not a small part of the users  The need for GPS makes the app useless in my opinion

Author: Mauro Geromella
Review: Per ora pare funzionare: "Servizio attivo". Però non capisco perché l'app non richieda di disattivare l'opzione ottimizzazione batteria: non si corre il rischio che il sistema Android la disattivi periodicamente? Comunque, così com'è impostato il funzionamento il paventato rischio privacy è inesistente visto che il tracciamento GPS è solo a livello di sistema per confermare la provincia. Se poi uno è convinto di essere "spiato" dallo Stato può sempre indossare un cappello in carta stagnola...
Title Review: For now it seems to work: "Active service". But I don't understand why the app doesn't ask you to deactivate the battery optimization option: isn't there a risk that the Android system will deactivate it periodically? However  as the operation is set up  the feared privacy risk is non-existent since GPS tracking is only at system level to confirm the province. And if one is convinced that he is "spied" by the state  he can always wear a tinfoil hat ...
content: For now it seems to work   Active service   But I don t understand why the app doesn t ask you to deactivate the battery optimization option  isn t there a risk that the Android system will deactivate it periodically  However  as the operation is set up  the feared privacy risk is non existent since GPS tracking is only at system level to confirm the province  And if one is convinced that he is  spied  by the state  he can always wear a tinfoil hat
syn: fear, provinc, track, privaci, spi, gps, servic, servic, optim, level, spi

Author: Daniele Balestreri
Review: App appena installata, un semplice mezzo per contenere un epidemia mondiale. Non ti chiede dati personali durante l'iscrizione (cosa che invece i vari social chiedono "facebook/Instagram/Twitter). Una volta installata e impostato la regione e provincia di residenza non si deve fare più nulla, l'app ci assegna un numero identificativo fine a se stesso per darci un minimo di identità in caso di necessità. Non installarla è sintomo di ignoranza e disinformazione.
Title Review: Newly installed app  a simple means to contain a worldwide epidemic. It does not ask you for personal data during registration (which instead the various social networks ask for "facebook / Instagram / Twitter). Once you have installed and set the region and province of residence you do not have to do anything more  the app assigns us a number identification as an end in itself to give us a minimum of identity in case of need Not installing it is a symptom of ignorance and disinformation.
content: Newly installed app  a simple means to contain a worldwide epidemic  It does not ask you for personal data during registration  which instead the various social networks ask for  facebook   Instagram   Twitter   Once you have installed and set the region and province of residence you do not have to do anything more  the app assigns us a number identification as an end in itself to give us a minimum of identity in case of need Not installing it is a symptom of ignorance and disinformation

Author: Alessandro Fornari
Review: Il gameplay non è proprio quello che mi aspettavo, per 3 mesi non si è fatto quasi nulla, era solo una preoccupazione e un insieme di numeri, anche troppo ripetitivo come gioco, mi immaginavo il virus una cosa più stile zombie o "io sono leggenda", oltre a questo gli abitanti dei villaggi sono scontrosi, non seguono le regole e continuano ad uscire, nonostante tutto però la grafica è accurata e il paesaggio molto vasto, 3 stelle direi che sono un'ottimo compromesso
Title Review: The gameplay is not quite what I expected  for 3 months almost nothing was done  it was just a worry and a set of numbers  too repetitive as a game  I imagined the virus a more zombie-like thing or "I am legend "  in addition to this the villagers are grumpy  they don't follow the rules and keep going out  despite everything  however the graphics are accurate and the landscape is very vast  3 stars I would say are a good compromise
content: The gameplay is not quite what I expected  for   months almost nothing was done  it was just a worry and a set of numbers  too repetitive as a game  I imagined the virus a more zombie like thing or  I am legend    in addition to this the villagers are grumpy  they don t follow the rules and keep going out  despite everything  however the graphics are accurate and the landscape is very vast    stars I would say are a good compromise

Author: Alessio Ferraioli
Review: *LEGGETE QUELLO CHE STO PER SCRIVERE* App fatta davvero bene a mio avviso, tutela la privacy in maniera davvero estrema, però con un grossissimo MA (spero sia solo un bug): In pratica sì non ti chiede i tuoi dati personali ecc ecc ma ho notato che dal momento che lo attivi automaticamente si attiva il GPS senza un reale consenso dell'utente e se lo si disattiva l'app smette di funzionare e ti richiede di essere riattivato, riattivando a sua volta il GPS! Spero sia un bug ma a molti può dar noia.
Title Review: * READ WHAT I'M ABOUT TO WRITE * App done really well in my opinion  it protects privacy in a very extreme way  but with a very big BUT (I hope it's just a bug): In practice  yes it does not ask you for your personal data etc. etc. but I noticed that since you activate it automatically  the GPS is activated without real user consent and if you deactivate it the app stops working and asks you to be reactivated  reactivating the GPS in turn! I hope it's a bug but it can annoy many.
content: READ WHAT I M ABOUT TO WRITE   App done really well in my opinion  it protects privacy in a very extreme way  but with a very big BUT  I hope it s just a bug   In practice  yes it does not ask you for your personal data etc  etc  but I noticed that since you activate it automatically  the GPS is activated without real user consent and if you deactivate it the app stops working and asks you to be reactivated  reactivating the GPS in turn  I hope it s a bug but it can annoy many

Author: Giorgio 95
Review: Interfaccia gradevole, progettata in maniera semplice e chiara. Open-source, con codice sorgente lato client e server disponibile a tutti. Rispettosa della privacy, con dati non traccianti, anonimi e criptati su server italiani solo per un breve periodo. Quando qualcosa è fatto bene va detto, quindi complimenti! Installarla è una dimostrazione di responsabilità oltre che di senso civico, dalla quale ne potremo giovare tutti.
Title Review: Pleasant interface  designed in a simple and clear way. Open-source  with client and server side source code available to everyone. Respectful of privacy  with non-tracking  anonymous and encrypted data on Italian servers only for a short period. When something is done right it must be said  so congratulations! Installing it is a demonstration of responsibility as well as civic sense  from which we can all benefit.
content: Pleasant interface  designed in a simple and clear way  Open source  with client and server side source code available to everyone  Respectful of privacy  with non tracking  anonymous and encrypted data on Italian servers only for a short period  When something is done right it must be said  so congratulations  Installing it is a demonstration of responsibility as well as civic sense  from which we can all benefit

Author: Roberto Pichierri
Review: L'app presenta dei bug. Uno su tutti è la comunicazione con la funzione Bluetooth. Avviata l'app, viene richiesta l'attivazione del Bluetooth. A Bluetooth attivato, riaprendo l'app, appare l'avviso "servizio non attivo" e finché non si disattiva e riattiva il Bluetooth, l'app non funziona. Appena metti il telefono in standby, il problema si ripresenta
Title Review: The app has bugs. One above all is the communication with the Bluetooth function. Once the app is started  the Bluetooth activation is required. With Bluetooth activated  when you reopen the app  the warning "service not active" appears and until you deactivate and reactivate Bluetooth  the app does not work. As soon as you put the phone on standby  the problem returns
content: The app has bugs  One above all is the communication with the Bluetooth function  Once the app is started  the Bluetooth activation is required  With Bluetooth activated  when you reopen the app  the warning  service not active  appears and until you deactivate and reactivate Bluetooth  the app does not work  As soon as you put the phone on standby  the problem returns

Author: Kira Bubble
Review: Ci sono contraddizioni con le indicazioni date dalla APP Immuni e quello che poi è la realtà. Prima viene detto che non serve la geolocalizzazione, ma poi quando installi Immuni ti rendi conto che il servizio e l'Applicazione non è attiva se non attivi la geolocalizzazione con GPS. Mettetevi d'accordo se funziona solo con Bluetooth o se deve esserci anche il GPS attivo. Perchè io non ho nessuna intenzione di tenere sempre il GPS attivo. Già siamo bombardati da radiazioni, rete WI-FI, ecc.
Title Review: There are contradictions with the indications given by the Immune APP and what is the reality. First it is said that geolocation is not needed  but then when you install Immuni you realize that the service and the Application are not active if you do not activate the geolocation with GPS. Agree if it only works with Bluetooth or if GPS must also be active. Because I have no intention of always keeping the GPS active. We are already bombarded with radiation  WI-FI network  etc.
content: There are contradictions with the indications given by the Immune APP and what is the reality  First it is said that geolocation is not needed  but then when you install Immuni you realize that the service and the Application are not active if you do not activate the geolocation with GPS  Agree if it only works with Bluetooth or if GPS must also be active  Because I have no intention of always keeping the GPS active  We are already bombarded with radiation  WI FI network  etc

Author: Alessandro Monticelli
Review: Dispositivo: Xiaomi Mi 9 SE. L'app funziona correttamente, non mi si é mai disattivato il servizio in automatico, e il consumo della batteria é abbastanza ridotto, o almeno per me che il bluetooth e il GPS lo tengo sempre attivo. Su Huawei sembra avere qualche criticità. Per essere la v. 1.0.0 va più che bene. Continuo a non capire chi si preoccupa piùdi essere "tracciati" Che di morire da solo in un letto di ospedale. 3 stelle perché é solo la prima versione, si può migliorare.
Title Review: Device: Xiaomi Mi 9 SE. The app works correctly  the service has never been deactivated automatically  and the battery consumption is quite low  or at least for me that I always keep bluetooth and GPS active. On Huawei it seems to have some critical issues. To be the v. 1.0.0 is just fine. I still don't understand who cares more about being tracked than dying alone in a hospital bed. 3 stars because it is only the first version  it can be improved.
content: Device  Xiaomi Mi   SE  The app works correctly  the service has never been deactivated automatically  and the battery consumption is quite low  or at least for me that I always keep bluetooth and GPS active  On Huawei it seems to have some critical issues  To be the v        is just fine  I still don t understand who cares more about being tracked than dying alone in a hospital bed    stars because it is only the first version  it can be improved

Author: Diego De Gasperis
Review: L'app doveva essere programmata diversi mesi fa, con all'obbligo di quarantena per chiunque venisse dalla Cina e alla misura reale, e non su campione statisticamente rappresentativo, della mortalità su tutto il territorio nazionale. Le zone rosse dove erano necessarie sono state rese effettive solo dopo averle dichiarate a mezzo stampa, incentivando la diffusione del virus su tutto il territorio nazionale. Il lock down e la riapertura non hanno seguito nessun criterio di proporzionalità locale
Title Review: The app had to be programmed several months ago  with the obligation of quarantine for anyone coming from China and the real measure  and not on a statistically representative sample  of mortality throughout the national territory. The red areas where they were needed were made effective only after having been declared in the press  encouraging the spread of the virus throughout the national territory. The lock down and reopening did not follow any local proportionality criteria
content: The app had to be programmed several months ago  with the obligation of quarantine for anyone coming from China and the real measure  and not on a statistically representative sample  of mortality throughout the national territory  The red areas where they were needed were made effective only after having been declared in the press  encouraging the spread of the virus throughout the national territory  The lock down and reopening did not follow any local proportionality criteria
syn: local, china, area, territori, measur, follow

Author: Zaccaria Zancan
Review: L'applicazione funziona bene, è fluida e semplice alla portata di tutti. Viene spiegato come funziona e richiede sia il Bluetooth 5 (BLE) sia la geolocalizzazione, per la quale ti chiedono i permessi per utilizzarla. Badare bene che comunque dicono che non vengono registrati dati su questa. E a me (pixel 3a) hanno chiesto sia l'autorizzazione per il Bluetooth che per il GPS visto che vedevo che in altre recensioni leggevo era diverso. Di certo è una delle app più sicure sullo store per privacy.
Title Review: The application works well  it is fluid and simple for everyone. It explains how it works and requires both Bluetooth 5 (BLE) and geolocation  for which they ask you for permissions to use it. However  they say that no data is recorded on this. And to me (pixel 3a) they asked for both the authorization for the Bluetooth and for the GPS since I saw that in other reviews I read it was different. It is certainly one of the safest apps on the store for privacy.
content: The application works well  it is fluid and simple for everyone  It explains how it works and requires both Bluetooth    BLE  and geolocation  for which they ask you for permissions to use it  However  they say that no data is recorded on this  And to me  pixel  a  they asked for both the authorization for the Bluetooth and for the GPS since I saw that in other reviews I read it was different  It is certainly one of the safest apps on the store for privacy
syn: data, privaci, gps, author, record, author, applic

Author: Matteo Cappello
Review: L'applicazione funziona perfettamente sul mio Samsung S8+. Ai cervelloni che commentano che serve il servizio di geo localizzazione nonostante l'App non debba utilizzare il GPS, sapete leggere? E' scritto chiaro e tondo nella procedura di configurazione che serve come permesso di sistema per il funzionamento del Bluetooth (è un permesso richiesto dal sistema Android), questo non significa che utilizzi i dati del GPS e se non siete convinti il codice sorgente è su GitHub, potete leggervelo per togliervi qualsiasi dubbio.
Title Review: The application works perfectly on my Samsung S8 +. Can you read to the brains who comment that the geo-localization service is needed even though the App does not have to use GPS? It is clearly written in the configuration procedure that serves as a system permission for the operation of Bluetooth (it is a permission required by the Android system)  this does not mean that it uses the GPS data and if you are not convinced the source code is on GitHub  you can read it to remove any doubts.
content: The application works perfectly on my Samsung S     Can you read to the brains who comment that the geo localization service is needed even though the App does not have to use GPS  It is clearly written in the configuration procedure that serves as a system permission for the operation of Bluetooth  it is a permission required by the Android system   this does not mean that it uses the GPS data and if you are not convinced the source code is on GitHub  you can read it to remove any doubts
syn: local, geo, data, gps, servic, servic, remov, comment, applic

Author: Tommaso LATTARULO
Review: Problemi relativi all'attivazione del bluetooth. Con il Bluetooth attivato l'app dice che le auyorizzazioni non sono consentite. Ho dovuto disattivare il bluetooth, andare avanti con la configurazione, l'app ha rilevato che il bluetooth era spento, quindi ho autorizzato ad attivare il bluetooth e solo allora ho potuto terminare la configurazione dell'app.
Title Review: Problems related to bluetooth activation. With Bluetooth activated the app says that auyorizations are not allowed. I had to deactivate the bluetooth  go ahead with the configuration  the app detected that the bluetooth was off  so I authorized to activate the bluetooth and only then could I finish the app configuration.
content: Problems related to bluetooth activation  With Bluetooth activated the app says that auyorizations are not allowed  I had to deactivate the bluetooth  go ahead with the configuration  the app detected that the bluetooth was off  so I authorized to activate the bluetooth and only then could I finish the app configuration

Author: Vincenzo Bini
Review: Non si attiva la localizzazione... Honor Emui 9.1.0 Aggiorno la recensione dopo aver fatto qualche ricerca sulle varie community. Se non riuscite a configurare la App, provate a disattivare sia il bluetooth che la geolocalizzzazione e poi reinstallate Immuni. A quel punto sarà lei a chiedervi il consenso per riattivarli e la configurazione viene completata correttamente. 🤞🏻 Quanto al funzionamento... vedremo!
Title Review: The localization is not activated ... Honor Emui 9.1.0 I update the review after doing some research on the various communities. If you are unable to configure the App  try to disable both bluetooth and geolocation and then reinstall Immuni. At that point it will be she who will ask your consent to reactivate them and the configuration is completed correctly. 🤞🏻 As for the operation ... we'll see!
content: The localization is not activated     Honor Emui       I update the review after doing some research on the various communities  If you are unable to configure the App  try to disable both bluetooth and geolocation and then reinstall Immuni  At that point it will be she who will ask your consent to reactivate them and the configuration is completed correctly     As for the operation     we ll see

Author: matteo onate
Review: Molto bene, vedo che l'app é stata fatta bene, riuscendo a mantenere la privacy senza problemi. Secondo me sarebbe meglio specificare quali dati verranno cancellati entro il 30 dicembre, perchè é importante fare capire che siano solo dati riguardanti l'epidemia e il numero di contagi in una specifica regione o provincia. Noi utenti risulteremo solo che un numerino in piú nell'istogramma dei conteggi distribuito sulla nazione. Essendo un utente Huawei, confido in una pronta risoluzione del bug.
Title Review: Very well  I see that the app has been done well  managing to maintain privacy without problems. In my opinion it would be better to specify which data will be deleted by December 30th  because it is important to make it clear that they are only data concerning the epidemic and the number of infections in a specific region or province. We users will only show that one more number in the histogram of the counts distributed over the country. Being a Huawei user  I am confident in a prompt resolution of the bug.
content: Very well  I see that the app has been done well  managing to maintain privacy without problems  In my opinion it would be better to specify which data will be deleted by December   th  because it is important to make it clear that they are only data concerning the epidemic and the number of infections in a specific region or province  We users will only show that one more number in the histogram of the counts distributed over the country  Being a Huawei user  I am confident in a prompt resolution of the bug
syn: concern, countri, countri, region, provinc, data, privaci, manag, manag, import

Author: Matteo Colosio
Review: Sembra fatta molto bene, adesso bisogna vedere il funzionamento. Per chi non lo sapesse, su Android la geolocalizzazione del dispositivo deve essere attiva per poter rilevare i dispositivi Bluetooth nelle vicinanze, ma per le notifiche di esposizione al COVID-19 non viene usata la posizione del dispositivo. (Scritto anche nelle impostazioni, poi basta guardare le autorizzazioni richieste dall'app, tra cui non la geolocalizzazione non c'è)
Title Review: It looks very good  now we need to see how it works. For the uninitiated  on Android the device's geolocation must be active in order to detect nearby Bluetooth devices  but the location of the device is not used for COVID-19 exposure notifications. (Also written in the settings  then just look at the permissions required by the app  including no geolocation is not there)
content: It looks very good  now we need to see how it works  For the uninitiated  on Android the device s geolocation must be active in order to detect nearby Bluetooth devices  but the location of the device is not used for COVID    exposure notifications   Also written in the settings  then just look at the permissions required by the app  including no geolocation is not there

Author: Andrea T
Review: Applicazione totalmente anonima e che garantisce il massimo rispetto della privacy. Non registra né gli spostamenti né i luoghi d'incontro. Memorizza unicamente dei codici anonimi corrispondenti agli smartphone con cui entriamo in contatto tramite Bluetooth. La segnalazione di una nostra eventuale positività è volontaria, e permette a chi ha installato l'applicazione di sapere se rientra nella lista dei nostri codici tracciati.
Title Review: Totally anonymous application that guarantees maximum respect for privacy. It does not record either the movements or the meeting places. It only stores anonymous codes corresponding to smartphones with which we come into contact via Bluetooth. The reporting of our possible positivity is voluntary  and allows those who installed the application to know if it falls within the list of our tracked codes.
content: Totally anonymous application that guarantees maximum respect for privacy  It does not record either the movements or the meeting places  It only stores anonymous codes corresponding to smartphones with which we come into contact via Bluetooth  The reporting of our possible positivity is voluntary  and allows those who installed the application to know if it falls within the list of our tracked codes

Title Review: When it closes it leaves the bluetooth open and this is not good. It asks for the location and if you move  what do you do to change settings? Then there is the problem of privacy. Singular problem. The app runs on Android which by its very nature devours all kinds of information  every day even to know the price of cat treats we provide news of all kinds and so what is the sense of anonymity in a field  that of collective health  in the which more data you have the better?

Author: Alessandro Mantovi
Review: Per tutti quelli che dicono che l'app ti rintraccia sono tutti idioti. Appena installata l'app ti dà un codice. Non ti chiede nient'altro che regione e provincia. Ovviamente bisogna tenere la geolocalizzazione attiva. Almeno se vuoi che l'app funzioni, se vuoi tenerla per bellezza non attivarla. Altra cosa, quando due telefoni si incontrano avvinene il cosiddetto "scambio dei codici" cioè che i due telefoni si scambiano i codici. Nel caso ti viene scritto se quel codice è positivo o negativo
Title Review: For anyone who says the app tracks you they are all idiots. As soon as you install the app it gives you a code. He asks you for nothing more than region and province. Obviously you have to keep the geolocation active. At least if you want the app to work  if you want to keep it for beauty  don't activate it. Another thing  when two phones meet  the so-called "code exchange" occurs  that is  the two phones exchange codes. In case you are told if that code is positive or negative

Si richiede pertanto di rilasciare un aggiornamento dell'App, che possa funzionare SENZA LA NECESSITÀ DI AVERE IL SERVIZIO DI GEOLOCALIZZAZIONE ATTIVO.
Title Review: It was always declared to the national press services that the App worked only with Bluetooth technology. This statement is not true  as to be operational the App requires the activation on the device  as well as the Bluetooth connection  also of the geolocation service. It is therefore required to release an update of the App  which can work WITHOUT THE NEED TO HAVE THE GEOLOCALIZATION SERVICE ACTIVE.

Author: Giovanni Lo Faro
Review: Impossibile da usare con il mio Honor 7. Bisogna avere il Bluetooth spento (poi lo attiva l'app e permette di procedere) Ma è impossibile, perché l'app si disattiva tutte le volte che va in standby (anche se l'app è esclusa dal risparmio batteria) e ogni volta che riattivo lo schermo devo riattivare l'app, togliendo il Bluetooth e riconfermando la condivisione dei dati. Fino a quando non si risolve questo problema non potrò utilizzarla
Title Review: Impossible to use with my Honor 7. You must have the Bluetooth turned off (then the app activates it and allows you to proceed) But it is impossible  because the app is deactivated every time it goes into standby (even if the app is excluded from battery saver) and every time I reactivate the screen I have to reactivate the app  removing Bluetooth and reconfirming data sharing. Until this problem is solved I will not be able to use it
content: Impossible to use with my Honor    You must have the Bluetooth turned off  then the app activates it and allows you to proceed  But it is impossible  because the app is deactivated every time it goes into standby  even if the app is excluded from battery saver  and every time I reactivate the screen I have to reactivate the app  removing Bluetooth and reconfirming data sharing  Until this problem is solved I will not be able to use it

Title Review: Geolocation always active? No thanks. It would not be a problem except that the geolocation would also become available to all the other system services and authorized apps  but which we would like to activate only when necessary. 2 stars because I know it's an Android problem and not the App (it's not a problem on iOS)

Review: Confermo quanto segnalato da altri utenti. Con huawei p20 lite la app in background si disattiva. Inoltre Per attivare il servizio è necessario disabilitare il bt e attivare il servizio autorizzando l'accensione del bt tramite app. Se il bt è già acceso, la app non si attiva.
Title Review: I confirm what other users have reported. With huawei p20 lite the background app turns off. Furthermore  to activate the service it is necessary to disable the BT and activate the service by authorizing the ignition of the BT via the app. If the bt is already on  the app does not activate.

Author: Riccardo Mioli
Review: App necessaria. Purtroppo Google/Android ne uccide l'usabilità forzando la necessità di avere il GPS attivo (che non sarebbe altrimenti richiesto per il tracciamento). Il problema in questo caso non è tanto la privacy quanto la batteria che con GPS (e BT) attivo è destinata ad essere drenata. Peccato, speriamo possa essere risolto con futuri aggiornamenti.
Title Review: App required. Unfortunately Google / Android kills its usability by forcing the need to have GPS active (which would otherwise not be required for tracking). The problem in this case is not so much privacy as the battery that with GPS (and BT) active is destined to be drained. Too bad  we hope it can be fixed with future updates.
content: App required  Unfortunately Google   Android kills its usability by forcing the need to have GPS active  which would otherwise not be required for tracking   The problem in this case is not so much privacy as the battery that with GPS  and BT  active is destined to be drained  Too bad  we hope it can be fixed with future updates

Occorre disabilitare bluetooth e GPS, rifare la procedura, ma appena si usa il cellulare per un altro motivo si riblocca daccapo. Non rimane attiva quindi in background, credo sia un problema di incompatibilità tra il brand Huawei e il Service Store Google
Title Review: On all Huawei after the first successful installation  just go to the gallery  or address book  or other app and it blocks asking for notifications permissions that cannot be activated. It is necessary to disable bluetooth and GPS  repeat the procedure  but as soon as you use the mobile phone for another reason it locks again. Therefore it does not remain active in the background  I believe it is an incompatibility problem between the Huawei brand and the Google Service Store

Author: Roberto Ferretti
Review: Non usa la posizione ma non funziona senza avere la localizzazione attiva quindi, gps attivo e tracciatura di altre app, vedi google, map e altro. Il consumo batteria aumenta. Il ranging con solo bluetooth sembrava una bella idea ma va disaccoppiato dalla localizzazione. Non conosco poi a che distanza massima tra dispositivi registra un contatto. Non vorrei essere alarmato per essere stato a 20m da un contagiato ignoto chissá dove. Una survey anonima funzionerebbe meglio (vedi modello Israele).
Title Review: It does not use the location but it does not work without having the localization active therefore  active gps and tracking of other apps  see google  map and more. Battery consumption increases. Ranging with bluetooth only seemed like a nice idea but it needs to be decoupled from localization. I also don't know at what maximum distance between devices a contact records. I would not like to be alarmed for having been 20m away from an unknown infected person who knows where. An anonymous survey would work better (see Israel model).
content: It does not use the location but it does not work without having the localization active therefore  active gps and tracking of other apps  see google  map and more  Battery consumption increases  Ranging with bluetooth only seemed like a nice idea but it needs to be decoupled from localization  I also don t know at what maximum distance between devices a contact records  I would not like to be alarmed for having been   m away from an unknown infected person who knows where  An anonymous survey would work better  see Israel model
syn: local, israel, locat, track, gps, record, locat, model

Abbiamo tanto criticato la Cina in questi ultimi mesi, che però ha saputo reagire in modo repentino. Noi no...come al solito si parla un sacco ma nel concreto arriviamo sempre ultimi. Tanto varrebbe realizzare un app per tracciare la spagnola.
Title Review: You can download it for a couple of days. As always  we in Italy move at the speed of light. We have criticized China so much in recent months  but it has been able to react quickly. We don't ... as usual we talk a lot but in practice we always come last. We might as well create an app to track the Spanish.
content: You can download it for a couple of days  As always  we in Italy move at the speed of light  We have criticized China so much in recent months  but it has been able to react quickly  We don t     as usual we talk a lot but in practice we always come last  We might as well create an app to track the Spanish

Author: 山田太郎
Review: Per ora uno strumento quasi inutile senza una diffusione uniforme, senza smartphone o anche solo con banali problemi di bluetooth. Si deve avere la fortuna di incontrare, tra molti potenziali infetti, quello zelante e sufficientemente informatizzato. Circostanza tutto sommato plausibile per me ma improbabile per una gran parte della popolazione a rischio (specie al di sopra di una certa età). Temo specchio per le allodole.
Title Review: For now  an almost useless tool without uniform diffusion  without a smartphone or even with just banal bluetooth problems. One must be lucky enough to meet  among many potential infected  the zealous and sufficiently computerized one. All in all plausible for me but unlikely for a large part of the population at risk (especially above a certain age). I fear mirror for the larks.
content: For now  an almost useless tool without uniform diffusion  without a smartphone or even with just banal bluetooth problems  One must be lucky enough to meet  among many potential infected  the zealous and sufficiently computerized one  All in all plausible for me but unlikely for a large part of the population at risk  especially above a certain age   I fear mirror for the larks

To have the service active again on the Immuni app I have to disable the bluetooth service and then reactivate it.

Author: Fra Ped
Review: Suggerimento per gli sviluppatori (e per gli utenti): molti smartphone hanno customizzazioni del sistema operativo che vanno a killare i processi in background (tra cui, a quanto si evince anche dai commenti, pure quest'app) che così, in tal modo, non funzionano. Sarebbe opportuno inserire nella home dell'app dei collegamenti che rimandano a tutorial per rimuovere quest'app dall'elenco di quelle che vengono "killate", cosa possibile dalle impostazioni del telefono (es. Xiaomi, Huawei ecc).
Title Review: Tip for developers (and users): many smartphones have customizations of the operating system that kill background processes (including  as can also be seen from the comments  this app too) which  in this way  do not work. It would be advisable to insert links in the app home that refer to tutorials to remove this app from the list of those that are "killed"  which is possible from the phone settings (eg. Xiaomi  Huawei  etc.).
content: Tip for developers  and users   many smartphones have customizations of the operating system that kill background processes  including  as can also be seen from the comments  this app too  which  in this way  do not work  It would be advisable to insert links in the app home that refer to tutorials to remove this app from the list of those that are  killed   which is possible from the phone settings  eg  Xiaomi  Huawei  etc

Author: Carlo Mancuso
Review: Semplice e facile da configurare. Ti spiega come funziona. Richiede poche conferme: attiva bluetooth, ok. Poi PRETENDE di attivare il gps, che consuma batteria. Dico di no e allora ti avverte "SERVIZIO NON ATTIVO". Credo di aver fatto qualcosa di sbagliato e verifico, ma...invece sei obbligato ad attivare il GPS. PESSIMA SCELTA. Così io non la uso. Gli sviluppatori sono dei geni, ma che dovrebbero cambiare lavoro. Se non aggiornano la cancello e credo nessuno usa il gps
Title Review: Simple and easy to set up. It explains how it works. It requires few confirmations: activate bluetooth  ok. Then CLAIMS to activate the GPS  which consumes battery. I say no and then it warns you "SERVICE NOT ACTIVE". I think I did something wrong and I check  but ... instead you are obliged to activate the GPS. BAD CHOICE. So I don't use it. Developers are geniuses  but they should change jobs. If they don't update the gate and I believe no one uses the gps
content: Simple and easy to set up  It explains how it works  It requires few confirmations  activate bluetooth  ok  Then CLAIMS to activate the GPS  which consumes battery  I say no and then it warns you  SERVICE NOT ACTIVE   I think I did something wrong and I check  but     instead you are obliged to activate the GPS  BAD CHOICE  So I don t use it  Developers are geniuses  but they should change jobs  If they don t update the gate and I believe no one uses the gps
