Author: Mirko Marchetto
Review: Una cosa mi ha subito dato fastidio: “La geolocalizzazione del dispositivo deve essere attiva per poter rilevare i dispositivi Bluetooth nelle vicinanze, anche se per le notifiche di esposizione da Covid-19 non viene usata la posizione del dispositivo”.ok per la privacy ma mi secca molto avere il gps sempre attivo, consuma batteria! E poi avevano fatto molta pubblicità sul fatto che non ci sarebbe stato l'uso del GPS ed ora escono così.
Title Review: One thing immediately bothered me: "The geolocation of the device must be active to be able to detect Bluetooth devices in the vicinity  even if the location of the device is not used for the exposure notifications from Covid-19". Ok for privacy but It annoys me a lot to have the GPS always active  it consumes battery! And then they had a lot of publicity that there would be no use of GPS and now they come out like that.
content: One thing immediately bothered me   The geolocation of the device must be active to be able to detect Bluetooth devices in the vicinity  even if the location of the device is not used for the exposure notifications from Covid      Ok for privacy but It annoys me a lot to have the GPS always active  it consumes battery  And then they had a lot of publicity that there would be no use of GPS and now they come out like that

Author: Enrico Bertuccio
Review: L' app è chiara e ben organizzata. Non capisco perché la geolocalizzazione non sia considerata neanche come opzione. Sarebbe utilissima per identificare i falsi contatti e circoscrivere tempestivamente i nuovi focolai. Accettiamo la geolocalizzazione anche per cose futili come farci portare una pizza o usando una social app; non condivido quindi tanta esitazione per tutelare la privacy a scapito della sicurezza. La sicurezza è superiore a qualsiasi privacy.
Title Review: The app is clear and well organized. I don't understand why geolocation is not even considered as an option. It would be very useful for identifying false contacts and timely circumscribing new outbreaks. We also accept geolocation for trivial things like having a pizza brought to us or using a social app; I therefore do not share much hesitation to protect privacy at the expense of security. Security is greater than any privacy.
content: The app is clear and well organized  I don t understand why geolocation is not even considered as an option  It would be very useful for identifying false contacts and timely circumscribing new outbreaks  We also accept geolocation for trivial things like having a pizza brought to us or using a social app  I therefore do not share much hesitation to protect privacy at the expense of security  Security is greater than any privacy
syn: expens, secur, privaci, protect, secur, identifi

I also warn for the most passionate that there is the total lack of scassa m ** chia advertising that by 2020 should be present in all freetoplay games.

Author: Corona Non Perdona
Review: Grafica bellissima, rispetta anche troppo la privacy perché chi diventa infetto può decidere o no di contattarlo al server. È tutto in locale e non spreca batteria. Davvero soddisfatto. Chi critica la privacy è un depensante perché richiede meno permessi dell'applicazione del blocco note o della sveglia, quindi (se lo siete) disinstallate tutti i social, rimuovete tutti i vostri account e andate a vivere in un bunker.
Title Review: Beautiful graphics  it also respects privacy too much because those who become infected may decide or not to contact them on the server. It's all locally and doesn't waste battery. Really satisfied. Those who criticize privacy are a detractor because they require fewer permissions than the notepad or alarm clock  so (if you are) uninstall all social networks  remove all your accounts and go live in a bunker.
content: Beautiful graphics  it also respects privacy too much because those who become infected may decide or not to contact them on the server  It s all locally and doesn t waste battery  Really satisfied  Those who criticize privacy are a detractor because they require fewer permissions than the notepad or alarm clock  so  if you are  uninstall all social networks  remove all your accounts and go live in a bunker
syn: local, privaci, remov, critic, network, account

Author: Alessandro Mattacchini
Review: Ma che scherziamo? GPS sempre attivo? Alla faccia della privacy. Il problema non è tanto Immuni che dice che non utilizzerà i dati di posizione quanto tutte le altre app a partire da Google che con i dati di posizione ci fanno di tutto. Sarò padrone di attivare il gps solo quando mi serve a me e non agli altri? Senza parlare della durata della batteria.... ma usa usare il bluetooth normale che tanto tutti lo tengono acceso per cuffie, vivavoce auto non era più semplice?
Title Review: What are we kidding? GPS always on? So much for privacy. The problem is not so much Immuni which says it will not use location data as all other apps starting with Google that do everything with location data. Will I be the master of activating the GPS only when I need it to myself and not to others? Not to mention the battery life .... but use the normal bluetooth that everyone keeps it turned on for headphones  wasn't the car speakerphone simpler?
content: What are we kidding  GPS always on  So much for privacy  The problem is not so much Immuni which says it will not use location data as all other apps starting with Google that do everything with location data  Will I be the master of activating the GPS only when I need it to myself and not to others  Not to mention the battery life      but use the normal bluetooth that everyone keeps it turned on for headphones  wasn t the car speakerphone simpler
syn: kid, kid, data, locat, privaci, gps, locat, normal

IN QUESTO MODO NON POSSO USARE L'APP
Title Review: I have an Honor Play. Emui 9.1.0. When I install the app  everything is ok. As soon as I put the app in the background and come back  despite not touching Bluetooth and GPS  it tells me the app is not active. If I click reactivate immune  the message 'Exposure notifications not activated' appears. Is the problem play services? It is updated to the latest version available for my device. IN THIS WAY I CANNOT USE THE APP
content: I have an Honor Play  Emui        When I install the app  everything is ok  As soon as I put the app in the background and come back  despite not touching Bluetooth and GPS  it tells me the app is not active  If I click reactivate immune  the message  Exposure notifications not activated  appears  Is the problem play services  It is updated to the latest version available for my device  IN THIS WAY I CANNOT USE THE APP

Author: Enzo
Review: Così non va bene. Se si chiude l app non viene mantenuta in memoria, basta chiuderla inavvertitamente per renderla inutilizzabile. Inoltre se si riapre con BT attivo non riesce ad attivarsi. Si deve disattivare il BT e solo dopo si riesce ad attivare. Incontrato il problema sono riuscito a risolverlo, ma non tutti hanno le capacità, e basta comunque chiuderla inavvertitamente per vanificare tutto.
Title Review: This is not good. If you close the app it is not kept in memory  just close it inadvertently to make it unusable. Furthermore  if you reopen with BT active  it fails to activate. You must deactivate the BT and only then can you activate it. Having encountered the problem  I managed to solve it  but not everyone has the skills  and it is enough to inadvertently close it to frustrate everything.
content: This is not good  If you close the app it is not kept in memory  just close it inadvertently to make it unusable  Furthermore  if you reopen with BT active  it fails to activate  You must deactivate the BT and only then can you activate it  Having encountered the problem  I managed to solve it  but not everyone has the skills  and it is enough to inadvertently close it to frustrate everything

Ho usato il telefono molto meno del solito, e ho il 30% di batteria in meno di quando nel faccio un uso più sostenuto! App sicuramente importante, ma se il telefono mi si spegne perché la batteria é finita, diventa inutile l'app ed anche il telefono. Trovate una soluzione al più presto altrimenti non credo che farà successo...purtoppo!
Title Review: After 12 hours I uninstalled it as it consumes a lot more battery due to the mandatory geolocation activation. I have used the phone much less than usual  and I have 30% less battery than when I do more sustained use! Definitely an important app  but if my phone turns off because the battery runs out  the app and the phone are useless. Find a solution as soon as possible otherwise I don't think it will be successful ... unfortunately!

Author: Matteo Maio
Review: Gente si lamenta del tracciamento e magari vendono i propri dati a Facebook, cliccano su banner dove promettono regali e soldi o già tracciati dalla Apple. Non state ad ascoltare questi dinosauri tecnologici. Con bluetooth e posizione attivi ho fatto Pistoia-Firenze in bicicletta, al mio arrivo l'applicazione non era attiva per qualche motivo. L'ho dovuta riattivare molte volte. Risolvete in qualche modo per favore.
Title Review: People complain about the tracking and maybe sell their data to Facebook  click on banners promising gifts and money or already tracked by Apple. Don't listen to these technological dinosaurs. With bluetooth and position active I made Pistoia-Florence by bike  when I arrived the application was not active for some reason. I had to reactivate it many times. Resolve somehow please.
content: People complain about the tracking and maybe sell their data to Facebook  click on banners promising gifts and money or already tracked by Apple  Don t listen to these technological dinosaurs  With bluetooth and position active I made Pistoia Florence by bike  when I arrived the application was not active for some reason  I had to reactivate it many times  Resolve somehow please

Author: Max Milano
Review: Su Huawei p20 lite per funzionare deve essere sempre in background senza chiuderla altrimenti bisogna ridare ogni volta l'autorizzazione. Naturalmente ho già cambiato l'opzione di risparmio energetico per non farla chiudere ma ciò non accade. Perché ha bisogno della posizione per funzionare? Io normalmente non attivo la posizione, perché dovrei usarla unicamente per questa app che, teoricamente, non dovrebbe avere bisogno di questo dato? Così sinceramente non la uso.
Title Review: On Huawei p20 lite to work it must always be in the background without closing it otherwise you have to give the authorization again every time. Of course I have already changed the energy saving option to keep it from closing but that doesn't happen. Why does it need the position to work? I don't normally activate the position  why should I use it only for this app which  theoretically  shouldn't need this data? So I honestly don't use it.
content: On Huawei p   lite to work it must always be in the background without closing it otherwise you have to give the authorization again every time  Of course I have already changed the energy saving option to keep it from closing but that doesn t happen  Why does it need the position to work  I don t normally activate the position  why should I use it only for this app which  theoretically  shouldn t need this data  So I honestly don t use it

Author: Davide Corradini
Review: Attenzione alla privacy. Il servizio di Immuni tiene attiva la posizione. Secondo la privacy policy nessun dato sulla posizione viene inviato ai server di Immuni. Tuttavia, avendo la posizione sempre attiva, Google/Android può raccogliere senza problemi i dati sulla nostra posizione. Quindi sì, Immuni non raccoglie i nostri dati sulla posizione, ma i nostri dati non sono al sicuro perché è Google a farlo. Chi invece tiene sempre la posizione attiva a prescindere (male!!), non deve preoccuparsi.
Title Review: Attention to privacy. The Immuni service keeps the position active. According to the privacy policy  no location data is sent to Immuni's servers. However  having the location always active  Google / Android can collect data on our location without problems. So yes  Immuni doesn't collect our location data  but our data isn't safe because Google does it. Those who always keep the active position regardless (bad !!)  need not worry.
content: Attention to privacy  The Immuni service keeps the position active  According to the privacy policy  no location data is sent to Immuni s servers  However  having the location always active  Google   Android can collect data on our location without problems  So yes  Immuni doesn t collect our location data  but our data isn t safe because Google does it  Those who always keep the active position regardless  bad      need not worry
syn: worri, data, locat, privaci, servic, servic, locat

Only note: perhaps it would have been better to view the status in the notification bar so you can always be sure that the app is active.
content: Unfortunately I was unable to fully test the app as I am not in a region where the experimentation started  In any case  excellent application  simple  intuitive and graphically very well done  Only note  perhaps it would have been better to view the status in the notification bar so you can always be sure that the app is active

Spero che tutti possano installarlo e procedere correttamente all'iter.
Title Review: No problems detected. Obviously the issue of always-on Bluetooth is bad for the battery. I hope everyone can install it and proceed correctly with the process.

Author: Niklas Andersson
Review: Immuni non si è installato.Non si è installato sul mio Huawei P30 Lite con Android 10. L'errore che mi dà è che la geolocalizzazione deve essere attivata a livello di sistema. Penso che lo sia. la utilizzo sempre, perfino per condividere la mia posizione in tempo reale con la mia famiglia. Ma se riscontra un problema durante l'installazione dovrebbe aiutare noi utenti a sistemarlo. Almeno darci qualche indicazione su come aggiustare questi problemi. Se fosse stato un gioco o qualcosa del genere, avrei potuto accettare che fosse costruito male, ma quest'app dovrebbe essere per il bene di tutti!!! Gli sviluppatori della Bending Spoons hanno finora fatto un lavoro pessimo. Spero che qualcuno con più competenze riesca a aggiustarlo in un futuro molto prossimo.
Title Review: Immuni did not install. It did not install on my Huawei P30 Lite running Android 10. The error it gives me is that geolocation must be enabled at the system level. I think it is. I always use it  even to share my location in real time with my family. But if it encounters a problem during installation it should help us users to fix it. At least give us some guidance on how to fix these problems. If it was a game or something  I could have accepted that it was badly built  but this app should be for everyone's good !!! The developers at Bending Spoons have done a very bad job so far. I hope someone with more skills will be able to fix it in the very near future.
content: Immuni did not install  It did not install on my Huawei P   Lite running Android     The error it gives me is that geolocation must be enabled at the system level  I think it is  I always use it  even to share my location in real time with my family  But if it encounters a problem during installation it should help us users to fix it  At least give us some guidance on how to fix these problems  If it was a game or something  I could have accepted that it was badly built  but this app should be for everyone s good     The developers at Bending Spoons have done a very bad job so far  I hope someone with more skills will be able to fix it in the very near future

Title Review: I deactivated battery optimization for the app and allowed it to start in the background when the phone was turned on (I recommend putting a guide about it in the app). Despite this it would seem that the app does not start in the background when the phone is turned on until I manually open it. In fact  it does not appear either among the apps in the background or in the running services
content: I deactivated battery optimization for the app and allowed it to start in the background when the phone was turned on  I recommend putting a guide about it in the app   Despite this it would seem that the app does not start in the background when the phone is turned on until I manually open it  In fact  it does not appear either among the apps in the background or in the running services

content: The application works correctly by doing what it was designed for  sifting through the source code  open source  NO intentions are harmful to privacy  Even if it will not be      effective  it can certainly be a useful tool in contrasting covid     but to be such it is important that as many people as possible download it

Author: Tagghy Cat
Review: Interessante strumento, ma totalmente inutile da solo. Solo se unito a tampone/esami che attestano la positività o meno dal virus può avere efficacia. Allora che vengano effettuati test gratuiti su larga scala, e non solo a pagamento (non tutti hanno la possibilità di farlo).
Title Review: Interesting tool  but totally useless on its own. Only if combined with a swab / tests that certify the positivity or not of the virus can it be effective. So that free large-scale tests are carried out  and not just for a fee (not everyone has the opportunity to do so).

Author: Giuseppe Tumolo
Review: APP PESSIMA! NON RIESCO AD INSTALLARE APP: mi esce il messaggio "Notifiche di esposizione non attivate" e non va avanti per concludere l'installazione-prima configurazione. RISOLTO: basta disattivare GPS e Bluetooth per poi continuare la configurazione. Sembra che per funzionare abbia bisogno della geolocalizzazione attiva che non usa, facendo sprecare energia inutilmente. Come hanno rilevato altri, se in standby si disattiva da sola. Per questo 1*.
Title Review: AWFUL APP! I CANNOT INSTALL APP: I get the message "Exposure notifications not activated" and it does not go on to conclude the installation-first configuration. FIXED: Just disable GPS and Bluetooth and then continue the setup. It seems to need the active geolocation it doesn't use to work  wasting energy unnecessarily. As others have noted  if in standby it switches itself off. For this 1 *.
content: AWFUL APP  I CANNOT INSTALL APP  I get the message  Exposure notifications not activated  and it does not go on to conclude the installation first configuration  FIXED  Just disable GPS and Bluetooth and then continue the setup  It seems to need the active geolocation it doesn t use to work  wasting energy unnecessarily  As others have noted  if in standby it switches itself off  For this

Author: Jacopo Paoli
Review: Al momento non funziona ancora (risiedo nel Lazio) ma sul mio Note 8 si è installata senza problemi. La app sembra essere molto ben fatta e spero davvero che la scarichino tutti, in modo ma avere un controllo preciso dei contagi. A chi è preoccupato della privacy, ma che non si è mai preoccupato di mettere mano alle impostazioni della privacy sul telefono, dico che possono stare tranquillissimi perché Google già sa tutto di loro
Title Review: At the moment it doesn't work yet (I live in Lazio) but on my Note 8 it installed without problems. The app seems to be very well done and I really hope that everyone downloads it  in order to have precise control of the infections. To those who are concerned about privacy  but who have never bothered to put their hands on the privacy settings on their phone  I say that they can rest easy because Google already knows everything about them.
content: At the moment it doesn t work yet  I live in Lazio  but on my Note   it installed without problems  The app seems to be very well done and I really hope that everyone downloads it  in order to have precise control of the infections  To those who are concerned about privacy  but who have never bothered to put their hands on the privacy settings on their phone  I say that they can rest easy because Google already knows everything about them

Author: Maurizio Marabotti
Review: App fatta benissimo. Alla fine non c'è da preoccuparsi per la privacy perché non traccia la posizione e non raccoglie dati personali (ma solo statistici come sesso e provincia). Il consumo di batteria è ridotto al minimo e l'utilizzo del bluetooth (che ormai abbiamo sempre acceso tra macchina e dispositivi elettronici come orologi, cuffie, impianti audio...) è una scelta azzeccata. Complimenti agli sviluppatori.
Title Review: App done very well. In the end there is no need to worry about privacy because it does not track the location and does not collect personal data (but only statistics such as gender and province). Battery consumption is reduced to a minimum and the use of bluetooth (which by now we have always switched on between the machine and electronic devices such as watches  headphones  audio systems ...) is a good choice. Kudos to the developers.
content: App done very well  In the end there is no need to worry about privacy because it does not track the location and does not collect personal data  but only statistics such as gender and province   Battery consumption is reduced to a minimum and the use of bluetooth  which by now we have always switched on between the machine and electronic devices such as watches  headphones  audio systems      is a good choice  Kudos to the developers
syn: gender, worri, provinc, data, locat, track, privaci, reduc, locat

Author: Marco Fadda
Review: A coloro che hanno dato una valutazione di 1 stella: ora dite "bisogna tenere traccia degli utenti" e poi direte (indignati) "ma quest'applicazione tiene traccia dei miei dati personali!". Dite "non funziona sul mio telefono!" E poi avete 12 telefoni per giocare a Candy crush e se l'app funziona ma è costata 40.000€ per supportare anche il vostro smartphone cinese da 12$ + spedizione direte: "È costata troppo! Soldi pubblici!". Ma basta, basta per piacere... Tanto non vi andrà bene nulla.
Title Review: To those who gave a 1 star rating: now you say "you need to keep track of users" and then you will say (indignantly) "but this application keeps track of my personal data!". Say "it doesn't work on my phone!" And then you have 12 phones to play Candy Crush and if the app works but it cost € 40 000 to also support your $ 12 + shipping Chinese smartphone you will say: "It cost too much! Public money!". But enough  enough to please ... Anyway  nothing will suit you.
content: To those who gave a   star rating  now you say  you need to keep track of users  and then you will say  indignantly   but this application keeps track of my personal data    Say  it doesn t work on my phone   And then you have    phones to play Candy Crush and if the app works but it cost          to also support your        shipping Chinese smartphone you will say   It cost too much  Public money    But enough  enough to please     Anyway  nothing will suit you

Author: Anastasia Orazzini
Review: Non ha molto senso questa applicazione, se uno non acconsente puoi anche stare vicino ad uno positivo che semplicemente non lo vuole dire. Inoltre se tengo il Bluetooth e il gps spento (cosa che fanno praticamente tutti visto che consumano batteria) non ha comunque una funzione quindi veramente non capisco il senso. Doveva essere progettata meglio, se devo tenere un app (che mi prende memoria) che mi dica quali sono le regole da seguire e poco più allora non ha veramente senso.
Title Review: This application does not make much sense  if one does not consent you can also be close to a positive one who simply does not want to say it. Furthermore  if I keep the Bluetooth and the GPS off (which practically everyone does since they consume battery) it still does not have a function so I really don't understand the meaning. It had to be better designed  if I have to keep an app (which takes my memory) that tells me what are the rules to follow and little more then it doesn't really make sense.

Author: Daniele Carretta
Review: L'app è bella e spiega bene il principio di funzionamento, peccato però che per funzionare non solo richieda il bluetooth sempre acceso (come è sempre stato detto e come è giusto che sia), ma pure la geolocalizzazione! Ma siete fuori di testa?!? A parte i problemi di batteria del tenere il GPS sempre acceso, sta menata del bluetooth era nata proprio come soluzione per tutelare la privacy degli utenti e ora mi venite a chiedere la posizione? Semplicemente terribile.
Title Review: The app is beautiful and explains the operating principle well  but it is a pity that to work it not only requires bluetooth always on (as it has always been said and as it should be)  but also geolocation! Are you out of your mind?!? Apart from the battery problems of keeping the GPS always on  sta menata of bluetooth was born just as a solution to protect the privacy of users and now you come to ask me for the location? Simply terrible.
content: The app is beautiful and explains the operating principle well  but it is a pity that to work it not only requires bluetooth always on  as it has always been said and as it should be   but also geolocation  Are you out of your mind    Apart from the battery problems of keeping the GPS always on  sta menata of bluetooth was born just as a solution to protect the privacy of users and now you come to ask me for the location  Simply terrible

Author: millesoluzioni
Review: App installata... recensita... e rimossa! Ottima l'idea, ottimo tutto... ma chi la usa? Se non è obbligatorio installare l'app per tutti non vedo dove sta la sicurezza. Calcolare la percentuale di precisione non sarà difficile, contiamo gli utenti Android, iOS ecc... e se superiamo i cittadini regolari in Italia, abbiamo un margine di errore di tutto rispetto. Basta un soggetto infetto per innescare una pandemia, speriamo che non sia immuni la tecnologia che ci deve salvare 😂
Title Review: App installed ... reviewed ... and removed! Great idea  great everything ... but who uses it? If it is not mandatory to install the app for everyone  I don't see where the security is. Calculating the accuracy percentage will not be difficult  we count the Android  iOS users etc ... and if we exceed the regular citizens in Italy  we have a respectable margin of error. An infected person is enough to trigger a pandemic  we hope that the technology that must save us is not immune 😂
content: App installed     reviewed     and removed  Great idea  great everything     but who uses it  If it is not mandatory to install the app for everyone  I don t see where the security is  Calculating the accuracy percentage will not be difficult  we count the Android  iOS users etc     and if we exceed the regular citizens in Italy  we have a respectable margin of error  An infected person is enough to trigger a pandemic  we hope that the technology that must save us is not immune

Author: Ale Ottobre

L'unico difetto, a mio avviso, è sul criterio di funzionamento: è a discrezione personale scegliere se far sapere agli altri la propria positività (sempre in modo anonimo). Dovrebbe avvenire in automatico per la tutela della salute pubblica.
Title Review: I just downloaded the app and besides having very simple and beautiful graphics  the explanations are clear and presented in the right way. The only flaw  in my opinion  is on the functioning criterion: it is at personal discretion to choose whether to let others know your positivity (always anonymously). It should take place automatically for the protection of public health.

In pratica se vieni a contatto con persone risultate positive al covid ti avvisa solo(e non ti traccia).
Title Review: Very useful app for knowing the contagion status of those around you. Works with Bluetooth. The app uses little data which means that the app works in passive and inactive (tracking) mode. In practice  if you come into contact with people who tested positive for the covid  it only warns you (and does not track you).
content: Very useful app for knowing the contagion status of those around you  Works with Bluetooth  The app uses little data which means that the app works in passive and inactive  tracking  mode  In practice  if you come into contact with people who tested positive for the covid  it only warns you  and does not track you

Author: thomas agostinelli
Review: App ben pensata per la tutela della privacy, il codice personale è associato al telefono in quanto macchina quindi non ad un numero o un nome.. La pecca sta nella possibilità di scelta nel comunicare il proprio codice. Non essendo possibile risalire all'identità della persona la segnalazione del codice da parte di un operatore sanitario, soggetto quindi obbligato a segreto professionale, dovrebbe essere obbligatoria altrimenti cade l'utilità dell'app.
Title Review: App well designed for the protection of privacy  the personal code is associated with the phone as a machine and therefore not with a number or a name .. The flaw lies in the possibility of choosing in communicating your code. Since it is not possible to trace the identity of the person  the reporting of the code by a health worker  therefore subject to professional secrecy  should be mandatory otherwise the usefulness of the app will be lost.
content: App well designed for the protection of privacy  the personal code is associated with the phone as a machine and therefore not with a number or a name    The flaw lies in the possibility of choosing in communicating your code  Since it is not possible to trace the identity of the person  the reporting of the code by a health worker  therefore subject to professional secrecy  should be mandatory otherwise the usefulness of the app will be lost

Author: Francalberto Bizzetti
Review: Installatela tutti. Le preoccupazioni sulla privacy non sono giustificate. Le sole preoccupazioni sulla privacy che potrebbero avere un senso sono quelle che derivano dall'uso di Whatsapp, di Facebook e di molti altri programmi incredibilmente invasivi e gestiti da Società/Stati stranieri. O dalle applicazioni di Google e/o Apple che, preinstallate sul vostro smartphone, sanno tutto ciò che fate, quando, dove e con chi lo fate. Immuni invece non ha nessuna di queste implicazioni.
Title Review: Everyone install it. Privacy concerns are not justified. The only privacy concerns that could make sense are those that arise from the use of Whatsapp  Facebook and many other incredibly invasive programs run by foreign companies / states. Or from the Google and / or Apple applications that  pre-installed on your smartphone  know everything you do  when  where and with whom you do it. Immuni on the other hand has none of these implications.
content: Everyone install it  Privacy concerns are not justified  The only privacy concerns that could make sense are those that arise from the use of Whatsapp  Facebook and many other incredibly invasive programs run by foreign companies   states  Or from the Google and   or Apple applications that  pre installed on your smartphone  know everything you do  when  where and with whom you do it  Immuni on the other hand has none of these implications

Author: Davide Cerlini
Review: Positiva per i contatti Covid-19, ma negativa per la necessità di attivare il GPS: ho diverse applicazioni che usano il Bluetooth, però nessuna mi obbliga ad attivare o tenere attivo la posizione tramite GPS per individuare altri dispositivi Bluetooth. E non è vero quindi che Android lo richieda obbligatoriamente per far funzionare adeguatamente il Bluetooth. Localizzazione tramite Bluetooth sì, ma tramite GPS no. Inoltre aumenta senza utilità il consumo di batteria.
Title Review: Positive for Covid-19 contacts  but negative for the need to activate GPS: I have several applications that use Bluetooth  but none of them oblige me to activate or keep the position active via GPS to identify other Bluetooth devices. And it is therefore not true that Android necessarily requires it to make Bluetooth work properly. Tracking via Bluetooth yes  but via GPS no. It also increases battery consumption unnecessarily.
content: Positive for Covid    contacts  but negative for the need to activate GPS  I have several applications that use Bluetooth  but none of them oblige me to activate or keep the position active via GPS to identify other Bluetooth devices  And it is therefore not true that Android necessarily requires it to make Bluetooth work properly  Tracking via Bluetooth yes  but via GPS no  It also increases battery consumption unnecessarily

Author: Giuliano Prati
Review: Sviluppare un'app è un'attività complessa che la maggior parte delle persone non comprendere. Farlo in condizioni di pressione mediatica è sicuramente un'impresa titanica. E chi dice che non serve perchè arriva tardi parla a vanvera. Qualche feedback: * ottima UX e UI in linea con gli stili attuali, * onboarding a step chiaro * non potendo gestire il blocco dell'"uccisione dell'app" da parte del SO si suggerisce all'utente di rilanciare l'app ogni tanto per verificarne lo stato. Corretto. Sarebbe carino un sistema statistico per l'utente che permettesse di sapere a quanti ID ci si è agganciati nell'arco di tempo del monitoraggio. I dati sono in locale e anonimi, non ci si esporrebbe a particolari rischio.
Title Review: Developing an app is a complex activity that most people don't understand. Doing so in conditions of media pressure is certainly a titanic undertaking. And those who say that it is not needed because it arrives late is talking nonsense. Some feedback: * excellent UX and UI in line with current styles  * clear step onboarding * not being able to manage the blocking of the "killing of the app" by the OS  we suggest the user to relaunch the app every now and then to check its status. Correct. It would be nice to have a statistical system for the user that would allow you to know how many IDs you have connected to over the period of monitoring. The data is local and anonymous  there would be no particular risk.
content: Developing an app is a complex activity that most people don t understand  Doing so in conditions of media pressure is certainly a titanic undertaking  And those who say that it is not needed because it arrives late is talking nonsense  Some feedback    excellent UX and UI in line with current styles    clear step onboarding   not being able to manage the blocking of the  killing of the app  by the OS  we suggest the user to relaunch the app every now and then to check its status  Correct  It would be nice to have a statistical system for the user that would allow you to know how many IDs you have connected to over the period of monitoring  The data is local and anonymous  there would be no particular risk
syn: pressur, local, data, manag, manag, undertak

Author: Stefano Albano
Review: Si specifica più e più volte che l'app non utilizzerà il tracciamento GPS per il suo normale funzionamento ma se non si abilita la geolocalizzazione il servizio rimane inattivo. Non comprendo inoltre il perché della dichiarazione della provincia di provenienza al primo avvio dell'app. Davvero una grande idea, app bella nel design e grafica ma, sviluppata in tempi troppo lunghi e sfruttando tecnologie non utili ai fini del servizio. Gestione della privacy e mediatica dell'app pessima.
Title Review: It is specified over and over again that the app will not use GPS tracking for its normal operation but if geolocation is not enabled  the service remains inactive. I also do not understand the reason for the declaration of the province of origin at the first start of the app. Really a great idea  beautiful app in design and graphics  but developed in too long a time and using technologies that are not useful for the purposes of the service. Poor app privacy and media management.
content: It is specified over and over again that the app will not use GPS tracking for its normal operation but if geolocation is not enabled  the service remains inactive  I also do not understand the reason for the declaration of the province of origin at the first start of the app  Really a great idea  beautiful app in design and graphics  but developed in too long a time and using technologies that are not useful for the purposes of the service  Poor app privacy and media management

Author: Giampaolo Silvestri
Review: Posso accettare che l'ultimo gioco non sia compatibile con i telefoni un po vecchi, ma a mio parere tutti i telefoni dall'iphone 4 in poi hanno le caratteristiche per poter far girare immuni (gps blutoth). Per paura degli stupidi complottisti (che tanto troveranno cose da inventare anche su questa versione di immuni, supersicura) si è sacrificato il fatto che solo i possessori di telefoni acquistati negli ultimi due o tre anni possono istallarla. A mio parere si doveva fare uno sforzo per trovare delle soluzioni tecniche che lo rendessero possibile con una più ampia gamma di telefoni. Apple e google vendono telefoni e sviluppano solo per telefoni nuovi, ma la salute credo riguardi tutti.
Title Review: I can accept that the latest game is not compatible with older phones  but in my opinion all phones from iphone 4 onwards have the features to be able to run immune (gps blutoth). For fear of the stupid conspiracy theorists (who will find things to invent even on this version of immune  super-safe) the fact that only owners of phones purchased in the last two or three years can install it has been sacrificed. In my opinion  an effort had to be made to find technical solutions that would make this possible with a wider range of phones. Apple and google sell phones and develop only for new phones  but I think health affects everyone.
content: I can accept that the latest game is not compatible with older phones  but in my opinion all phones from iphone   onwards have the features to be able to run immune  gps blutoth   For fear of the stupid conspiracy theorists  who will find things to invent even on this version of immune  super safe  the fact that only owners of phones purchased in the last two or three years can install it has been sacrificed  In my opinion  an effort had to be made to find technical solutions that would make this possible with a wider range of phones  Apple and google sell phones and develop only for new phones  but I think health affects everyone

Author: Mirko Rapino
Review: Mod: 02 Giu 2020 Dopo un giorno di utilizzo noto che l'applicazione necessita sia di aver sempre acceso il Bluetooth che il GPS (anche se non è previsto nelle autorizzazioni, cosa assurda). Se disattivo il GPS automaticamente l'applicazione si disattiva. Chiedo un controllo sull'applicazione e chiedo di specificare negli splash screen a cosa serve il GPS ----- Ottima applicazione, visivamente bella, molto semplice e intuitiva. Ottima la sicurezza dei dati personali.
Title Review: Mod: 02 Jun 2020 After a day of use  I notice that the application needs to have both Bluetooth and GPS always turned on (even if it is not provided in the permissions  which is absurd). If I deactivate the GPS  the application will automatically deactivate. I ask for a check on the application and I ask to specify in the splash screens what the GPS is for ----- Excellent application  visually beautiful  very simple and intuitive. Excellent security of personal data.
content: Mod     Jun      After a day of use  I notice that the application needs to have both Bluetooth and GPS always turned on  even if it is not provided in the permissions  which is absurd   If I deactivate the GPS  the application will automatically deactivate  I ask for a check on the application and I ask to specify in the splash screens what the GPS is for       Excellent application  visually beautiful  very simple and intuitive  Excellent security of personal data

Author: The Ruller
Review: É un applicazione facile e intuitiva.Offre un codice univoco per ogni dispositivo permettendo così di non dover ricorrere registrazioni complicate o compromettenti per la privacy.Funziona tramite Bluetooth a basso costo energetico senza dover ricorrere a Wifi in alcun caso.Permette di rendere anonimato la propria posizione e le finalità sono semplicemente per capire se si é stati in contatto con altre persone precedentemente, a distanza anche di settimane e notificarlo se contagiate.
Title Review: It is an easy and intuitive application. It offers a unique code for each device  thus allowing you to avoid complicated or compromising registrations for privacy. It works via Bluetooth at low energy cost without having to resort to Wifi in any case. It allows you to anonymize your own position and purposes are simply to understand if you have been in contact with other people previously  even after weeks  and to notify it if you become infected.
content: It is an easy and intuitive application  It offers a unique code for each device  thus allowing you to avoid complicated or compromising registrations for privacy  It works via Bluetooth at low energy cost without having to resort to Wifi in any case  It allows you to anonymize your own position and purposes are simply to understand if you have been in contact with other people previously  even after weeks  and to notify it if you become infected

Author: Marco Giovanardi
Review: Ho installato subito l'applicazione ed il servizio, una volta date le autorizzazioni, era attivo. Poi per curiosità sono rientrato nell'app e mi trovo scritto che il servizio andava riattivato. A questo punto l'unica soluzione è stata spegnere e riaccendere il Bluetooth. Fatto ciò il servizio mi si era riattivato. Per fare una prova ho chiuso l'applicazione, l ho riaperta ed la situazione era la stessa. Spero si possa risolvere presto l'inconveniente perché la ritengo molto utile.
Title Review: I immediately installed the application and the service  once given the permissions  was active. Then out of curiosity I went back into the app and found myself writing that the service had to be reactivated. At this point the only solution was to turn Bluetooth off and on again. After that the service was reactivated. To do a test I closed the application  I reopened it and the situation was the same. I hope the problem can be resolved soon because I think it is very useful.
content: I immediately installed the application and the service  once given the permissions  was active  Then out of curiosity I went back into the app and found myself writing that the service had to be reactivated  At this point the only solution was to turn Bluetooth off and on again  After that the service was reactivated  To do a test I closed the application  I reopened it and the situation was the same  I hope the problem can be resolved soon because I think it is very useful

Author: Condivisione Foto
Review: Triste vedere l'opposizione che la valuta con una stella per fare polemica. App perfettamente funzionante su telefoni Xiaomi (non ci avrei scommesso), uno strumento in più per prevenire responsabilmente altri contagi. L'ho scaricata nel rispetto di quelle migliaia di persone che a causa del covid oggi non ci sono più, io non dimentico. Anche davanti a un'emergenza il popolo italiano resta diviso, molto triste. Basti pensare a chi ancora rifiuta di indossare la mascherina.
Title Review: Sad to see the opposition that rates it with a star to make controversy. Fully functional app on Xiaomi phones (I wouldn't have bet)  one more tool to responsibly prevent other infections. I downloaded it in respect of those thousands of people who are no longer there because of the covid  I don't forget. Even in the face of an emergency  the Italian people remain divided  very sad. Just think of those who still refuse to wear a mask.
content: Sad to see the opposition that rates it with a star to make controversy  Fully functional app on Xiaomi phones  I wouldn t have bet   one more tool to responsibly prevent other infections  I downloaded it in respect of those thousands of people who are no longer there because of the covid  I don t forget  Even in the face of an emergency  the Italian people remain divided  very sad  Just think of those who still refuse to wear a mask

Author: Alice Lampignani
Review: Rimane attiva solo se la si tiene aperta con Android.... Se la si attiva e poi si esce dall'app per aprire qualsiasi altra cosa (tipo io sono uscita e ho aperto Facebook) il servizio si disattiva e per riattivarlo bisogna spegnere il bluetooth e riattivarlo dall'app ma appena chiudi si ridisattiva.... Così non serve proprio a niente... Mica si può vivere tenendo aperta solo "Immuni"
Title Review: It remains active only if you keep it open with Android .... If you activate it and then exit the app to open anything else (like I went out and opened Facebook) the service is deactivated and to reactivate it you have to turn off the bluetooth and reactivate it from the app but as soon as you close it is deactivated .... So it's useless ... You can't live by keeping only "Immune" open
content: It remains active only if you keep it open with Android      If you activate it and then exit the app to open anything else  like I went out and opened Facebook  the service is deactivated and to reactivate it you have to turn off the bluetooth and reactivate it from the app but as soon as you close it is deactivated      So it s useless     You can t live by keeping only  Immune  open

Author: Maurizio Ori
Review: Sarebbe utile poter inviare dei suggerimenti a favore del sistema in cui opera la App. Ad esempio cose tipo: su base volontaria, uno possa attivare la geolocalizzazione... oppure fare un tampone anonimo/test sierologoco ma legato al codice app, così da avere già una fotografia iniziale dello stato degli iscritti. E, magari, avere delle postazioni sul territorio italiano, dove fare velocemente test anonimi col codice App (postazioni come si facevano una volta per incentivare le donazioni sangue)
Title Review: It would be useful to be able to send suggestions in favor of the system in which the App operates. For example things like: on a voluntary basis  one can activate geolocation ... or do an anonymous swab / serological test but linked to the app code  so as to have already an initial photograph of the status of the members. And  perhaps  to have stations on the Italian territory  where you can quickly do anonymous tests with the App code (stations as they once did to encourage blood donations)
content: It would be useful to be able to send suggestions in favor of the system in which the App operates  For example things like  on a voluntary basis  one can activate geolocation     or do an anonymous swab   serological test but linked to the app code  so as to have already an initial photograph of the status of the members  And  perhaps  to have stations on the Italian territory  where you can quickly do anonymous tests with the App code  stations as they once did to encourage blood donations

Author: Matteo Bellardi
Review: 5 sulla fiducia. Da sviluppatore SW, specificate nella sezione 'carica dati' cosa fa e a cosa serve quella funzione, così nn si capisce. Intervenite sugli ottimizzatori di batteria tipo quello di huawei, altrimenti ve la spengono in background. Il fatto che senza posizione attiva nn funzioni la app, lascia un po' stranito l'utilizzatore che dice:"ma se nn mi localizza perché vuol la posizione?";che poi dico io, avremo dato il permesso di localizzarci a 100 app, ma se lo fa questa nn va bene.
Title Review: 5 on trust. As a SW developer  specify in the 'load data' section what that function does and what it is for  so you don't understand. Take action on the battery optimizers like that of huawei  otherwise they turn it off in the background. The fact that the app does not work without active position leaves the user a little bewildered and says: "but if he doesn't locate me why does he want the position?" but if it does  this is fine.
content: on trust  As a SW developer  specify in the  load data  section what that function does and what it is for  so you don t understand  Take action on the battery optimizers like that of huawei  otherwise they turn it off in the background  The fact that the app does not work without active position leaves the user a little bewildered and says   but if he doesn t locate me why does he want the position   but if it does  this is fine
syn: data, locat, trust, section, locat, optim

Author: ANNAMARIA RENNA

I have to disable bluetooth and then do "Reactivate Immune" which reactivates the bluetooth service but as soon as the app returns to the background the problem returns.
content: Even on Galaxy J  with Android v   it doesn t stay active  When I go back to the application and try to do  Reactivate Immune  I get a message  notifications of exposure not active   I have to disable bluetooth and then do  Reactivate Immune  which reactivates the bluetooth service but as soon as the app returns to the background the problem returns

Author: orazio ippolito
Review: Per tutti coloro i quali stanno riscontrando problemi con le vecchie versioni di EMUI (Huawei), consiglio di disabilitare la gestione automatica dell'app da parte del sistema di risparmio energetico in quanto Huawei di default va a chiudere tutte quelle app che non apriamo sempre.Poi, una volta aperta l'app bisogna andare in home di sistema, spingere nuovamente il tasto home per aprire il multitasking e fare uno swipe down sull'app immuni, così non chiuderà più da sola (apparirà un lucchetto)
Title Review: For all those who are experiencing problems with old versions of EMUI (Huawei)  I recommend disabling the automatic management of the app by the energy saving system as Huawei by default closes all those apps that we do not always open. Then  once the app is open  you need to go to the home system  push the home button again to open multitasking and swipe down on the immune app  so it will no longer close by itself (a padlock will appear)
content: For all those who are experiencing problems with old versions of EMUI  Huawei   I recommend disabling the automatic management of the app by the energy saving system as Huawei by default closes all those apps that we do not always open  Then  once the app is open  you need to go to the home system  push the home button again to open multitasking and swipe down on the immune app  so it will no longer close by itself  a padlock will appear

Author: Daniele Guastamacchia
Review: È proprio pensata dal governo italiano... Un disastro!!! Intanto doveva uscire 3 mesi fa, non adesso. Poi perché il test solo in alcune regioni? Altroché mascherare i dati. Dovrebbero essere la prima cosa da condividere!! Presuppone troppe condizioni per il suo funzionamento: bluetooth attivo su entrambi i cellulari, vicinanza, comunicazione del codice ad un operatore... Ma poi se non si fa il tampone, come si fa a sapere se uno è negativo o meno? Rispecchia proprio la burocrazia italiana...
Title Review: It is just designed by the Italian government ... A disaster !!! Meanwhile it was supposed to come out 3 months ago  not now. Then why the test only in some regions? Other than masking the data. They should be the first thing to share !! It presupposes too many conditions for its operation: bluetooth active on both mobile phones  proximity  communication of the code to an operator ... But then if you don't swab  how do you know if one is negative or not? It reflects precisely the Italian bureaucracy ...
content: It is just designed by the Italian government     A disaster     Meanwhile it was supposed to come out   months ago  not now  Then why the test only in some regions  Other than masking the data  They should be the first thing to share    It presupposes too many conditions for its operation  bluetooth active on both mobile phones  proximity  communication of the code to an operator     But then if you don t swab  how do you know if one is negative or not  It reflects precisely the Italian bureaucracy

For the fifth star I wait to see if it works well.

Title Review: On Huawei P10 Lite and P20 Lite the app remains stuck on the notification authorization screen. Notifications are not allowed when  in the general settings  they are completely granted.
content: On Huawei P   Lite and P   Lite the app remains stuck on the notification authorization screen  Notifications are not allowed when  in the general settings  they are completely granted

Author: Ignazio Pollina
Review: Proteggiamoci
Title Review: protect ourselves
content: protect ourselves

Author: Lorenzo Del Soldato
Review: Avendo il codice aperto non "soffro" della paranoia del controllo dei dati. secondo me una applicazione molto utile
Title Review: Having the code open I don't "suffer" from the paranoia of data control. in my opinion a very useful application
content: Having the code open I don t  suffer  from the paranoia of data control  in my opinion a very useful application

Author: Danilo Carbonaro
Review: Istallata immediatamente non appena disponibile. L'app è facilmente fruibile e con un ottimo design. Utile il lock degli screenshot di sistema, un livello di sicurezza in più per i dati sensibili. Problemi con il meccanismo di notifiche quando l'app viene messa in background. Anche riaprendola, si deve disattivare e attivare il Bluetooth per permettere al meccanismo di notifiche di funzionare.
Title Review: Installed immediately as soon as available. The app is easy to use and with an excellent design. The lock of system screenshots is useful  an extra level of security for sensitive data. Problems with the notification mechanism when the app is put in the background. Even if you reopen it  you must turn off and on Bluetooth for the notification mechanism to work.
content: Installed immediately as soon as available  The app is easy to use and with an excellent design  The lock of system screenshots is useful  an extra level of security for sensitive data  Problems with the notification mechanism when the app is put in the background  Even if you reopen it  you must turn off and on Bluetooth for the notification mechanism to work

Author: Giuseppe Borgia
Review: Per il bene vostro, delle persone a voi care e soprattutto per il rispetto del prossimo scaricare la app. Molti non vogliono scaricare questa app per la Privacy , ma sono su Facebook o Instagram ... dovete sapere che dal giorno che avete acquistato il telefono siete tracciati, tramite le cellule telefoniche dove si aggancia il vostro smartphone si può risalire a tutti i vostri spostamenti.. Se tenete alla vostra Privacy buttate il telefono....
Title Review: For your sake  your loved ones and above all for the respect of others  download the app. Many do not want to download this app for Privacy  but they are on Facebook or Instagram ... you must know that from the day you bought the phone you are tracked  through the phone cells where your smartphone is hooked you can trace all your movements .. If you care about your privacy  throw the phone away ....
content: For your sake  your loved ones and above all for the respect of others  download the app  Many do not want to download this app for Privacy  but they are on Facebook or Instagram     you must know that from the day you bought the phone you are tracked  through the phone cells where your smartphone is hooked you can trace all your movements    If you care about your privacy  throw the phone away

Author: Marco Casari
Review: Semplice, di chiara interpretazione e visualizzazione, molto semplice l'utilizzo.
Title Review: Simple  of clear interpretation and visualization  very simple to use.
content: Simple  of clear interpretation and visualization  very simple to use

Author: Alberto Albanese
Review: In background disattiva tracciamento e per essere riattivato bisogna riattivare Bluetooth, temo questo ne renda impossibile l'utilizzo. Buono il primo avvio e le spiegazioni chiare e semplici
Title Review: In the background deactivate tracking and to be reactivated you have to reactivate Bluetooth  I'm afraid this makes it impossible to use. Good first start and clear and simple explanations
content: In the background deactivate tracking and to be reactivated you have to reactivate Bluetooth  I m afraid this makes it impossible to use  Good first start and clear and simple explanations

Author: Spiro Angeli
Review: Pur essendo grato per lo sviluppo e la gestione di questa App temo che servirà a poco in quanto il suo successo sarà determinato fondamentalmente da coloro che hanno avuto la sfortuna di conoscere il virus e coloro che sono stati a contatto con un paziente infetto, ma non hanno contratto il virus. Speriamo che mi sbagli e che invece si riveli un enorme aiuto e successo. L'App al momento devo ancora valutarla perché appena installata.
Title Review: While I am grateful for the development and management of this App I fear that it will be of little use as its success will be determined basically by those who have had the misfortune to know the virus and those who have been in contact with an infected patient  but not they contracted the virus. Let's hope I'm wrong and instead it turns out to be a huge help and success. The App at the moment I have yet to evaluate it because it has just been installed.
content: While I am grateful for the development and management of this App I fear that it will be of little use as its success will be determined basically by those who have had the misfortune to know the virus and those who have been in contact with an infected patient  but not they contracted the virus  Let s hope I m wrong and instead it turns out to be a huge help and success  The App at the moment I have yet to evaluate it because it has just been installed

Author: Stefano Oricchio
Review: Il problema è nel fatto che l'utilizzatore, se positivo al COVID-19, sceglie se condividere l'informazione presente sul cell r:elativa ai contatti: si vanifica lo scopo antifococolai.
Title Review: The problem is in the fact that the user  if positive for COVID-19  chooses whether to share the information present on the cell r: related to the contacts: the anti-focus purpose is nullified.
content: The problem is in the fact that the user  if positive for COVID     chooses whether to share the information present on the cell r  related to the contacts  the anti focus purpose is nullified

Author: Massimiliano Crivellari
Review: Non si capisce come attivarla. Spiegazioni praticamente nulle. Non consente le notifiche. Non si capisce chi bisogna contattare per attivare l'applicazione.
Title Review: It is not clear how to activate it. Virtually no explanations. It does not allow notifications. It is not clear who to contact to activate the application.
content: It is not clear how to activate it  Virtually no explanations  It does not allow notifications  It is not clear who to contact to activate the application

Review: Sullo Huawei p30 lite non funziona perché il mio dispositivo non ha aggiornato i play services relativi alle notifiche di esposizione...
Title Review: On the Huawei p30 lite it doesn't work because my device hasn't updated the play services related to the exposure notifications ...
content: On the Huawei p   lite it doesn t work because my device hasn t updated the play services related to the exposure notifications

Review: Vivo in Veneto nella provincia di Venezia,ma l'APP non và,?,non si attivano le notifiche!
Title Review: I live in Veneto in the province of Venice  but the APP doesn't work?  Notifications are not activated!
content: I live in Veneto in the province of Venice  but the APP doesn t work   Notifications are not activated

Author: marco musso
Review: Installata immediatamente come uscita sul play store. Ovviamente bisognerebbe che tutti la installassero e coloro che (purtroppo) risultassero positivi andranno ad inserire i relativi codici di positività. Purtroppo troppe persone, ho sentito che temono la tracciabilità, li rispetto per correttezza però mi chiedo cosa hanno da nascondere? Ultima riflessione....le mascherine le usiamo, il distanziamento sociale lo rispettiamo pertanto usiamo correttamente app IMMUNI, per il bene di noi tutti
Title Review: Immediately installed as an exit on the play store. Obviously  everyone should install it and those who (unfortunately) are positive will enter the relative positive codes. Unfortunately too many people  I have heard that they fear traceability  I respect them for fairness but I wonder what they have to hide? Last thought .... we use the masks  we respect social distancing therefore we use IMMUNI apps correctly  for the good of us all
content: Immediately installed as an exit on the play store  Obviously  everyone should install it and those who  unfortunately  are positive will enter the relative positive codes  Unfortunately too many people  I have heard that they fear traceability  I respect them for fairness but I wonder what they have to hide  Last thought      we use the masks  we respect social distancing therefore we use IMMUNI apps correctly  for the good of us all

Author: davide b
Review: Acconsento alle richieste dell app. Mi dice che il servizio è attivo ma, una volta uscito dall app, se rientro mi chiede di di abilitare le notifiche di esposizione e che il servizio non è attivo. Honor 10
Title Review: I agree to the app requests. It tells me that the service is active but  once I quit the app  if I return  it asks me to enable exposure notifications and that the service is not active. Honor 10
content: I agree to the app requests  It tells me that the service is active but  once I quit the app  if I return  it asks me to enable exposure notifications and that the service is not active  Honor

Review: scarica la batteria in modo importante
Title Review: discharges the battery in an important way
content: discharges the battery in an important way

Review: Installata anche se non sono in una delle regioni "test" sembra funzionare bene ed è semplice da configurare, aggiungerei una sezione statistica per visualizzare, in forma anonima e aggregata, il numero di contatti totali tracciati.
Title Review: Installed even if they are not in one of the "test" regions it seems to work well and is simple to configure  I would add a statistics section to view  in an anonymous and aggregate form  the total number of contacts tracked.
content: Installed even if they are not in one of the  test  regions it seems to work well and is simple to configure  I would add a statistics section to view  in an anonymous and aggregate form  the total number of contacts tracked

Author: Franca Pistacchio
Review: Mi dice notifiche di esposizione non attivate, anche se ho aggiornato, disattivando il bluetooth funziona ma quando la chiudo devo rifare la procedura... Poi il codice deve essere autorizzato e nn c'è verso
Title Review: It tells me exposure notifications not activated  even if I have updated  deactivating the bluetooth works but when I close it I have to redo the procedure ... Then the code must be authorized and there is no way
content: It tells me exposure notifications not activated  even if I have updated  deactivating the bluetooth works but when I close it I have to redo the procedure     Then the code must be authorized and there is no way

Author: Luca
Review: Io sono super favorevole all app, ma da sviluppatore vi dico che non potete fare una campagna pubblicitaria dicendo che non tracciamo gli spostamenti e poi se non arrivi il GPS app non funziona (xiaomi mi a1). Mi metto nei panni dell'utente medio, prende l'app e la terrà disattivata perché non vi crederà più a quello che dite! Se dovete usare solo il Bluetooth e vi servono dei permessi speciali tramite abilitazione GPS dovete scriverlo a caratteri cubitali! Altirmenti per tutti state tracciando!
Title Review: I am super in favor of the app  but as a developer I tell you that you cannot do an advertising campaign saying that we do not track the movements and then if you do not arrive the GPS app does not work (xiaomi mi a1). I put myself in the shoes of the average user  he takes the app and keeps it deactivated because he won't believe what you say anymore! If you only have to use Bluetooth and you need special permissions via GPS enable you have to write it in big letters! Altirmenti for all you are tracking!
content: I am super in favor of the app  but as a developer I tell you that you cannot do an advertising campaign saying that we do not track the movements and then if you do not arrive the GPS app does not work  xiaomi mi a    I put myself in the shoes of the average user  he takes the app and keeps it deactivated because he won t believe what you say anymore  If you only have to use Bluetooth and you need special permissions via GPS enable you have to write it in big letters  Altirmenti for all you are tracking

Author: Antonio Solida
Review: Ottima app. Se entriamo in contatto con qualcuno di positivo l'app di segnalerà il rischio di aver contratto il virus senza dirci chi ci ha infettato né dove; di tracciamento non ne va proprio. Su alcuni telefoni richiede il permesso di utilizzare la posizione necessario per accedere al Bluetooth ma non userà mai il GPS. Google, Facebook e co. Vi tracciano spudoratamente da anni vedendo le vostre abitudini.
Title Review: Great app. If we come into contact with someone positive  the app will report the risk of having contracted the virus without telling us who infected us or where; tracking just doesn't go away. On some phones it requires permission to use the location needed to access Bluetooth but will never use GPS. Google  Facebook and co. They have shamelessly tracked you for years seeing your habits.
content: Great app  If we come into contact with someone positive  the app will report the risk of having contracted the virus without telling us who infected us or where  tracking just doesn t go away  On some phones it requires permission to use the location needed to access Bluetooth but will never use GPS  Google  Facebook and co  They have shamelessly tracked you for years seeing your habits

Author: Matteo Cursio
Review: "notifiche di esposizione non attiva" questo è il messaggio che appare se seleziono "consenti". L'installazione era andata a buon fine, il servizio si era attivato, all'uscita dall'app ho selezionato si, pensando che rimanesse in background, ma così non è stato ed ora non si attiva più. Il GPS è sempre attivo, anche se non comprendo l'esigenza della posizione GPS per le notifiche. Per il resto, grafica carina, semplice e intuitiva, ma dato che non funziona, per il momento una sola stella.
Title Review: "inactive exposure notifications" this is the message that appears if I select "allow". The installation was successful  the service was activated  when I exited the app I selected yes  thinking that it remained in the background  but it did not happen and now it is no longer activated. GPS is always on  even if I don't understand the need for GPS location for notifications. For the rest  nice graphics  simple and intuitive  but since it doesn't work  for the moment only one star.
content: inactive exposure notifications  this is the message that appears if I select  allow   The installation was successful  the service was activated  when I exited the app I selected yes  thinking that it remained in the background  but it did not happen and now it is no longer activated  GPS is always on  even if I don t understand the need for GPS location for notifications  For the rest  nice graphics  simple and intuitive  but since it doesn t work  for the moment only one star

Author: Marzia Ugolini
Review: app intuitiva e fatta bene. una pecca: ho il telefono impostato in inglese per motivi di lavoro e avrei voluto cambiare la lingua della app in italiano, invece devo per forza cambiare la lingua di sistema.
Title Review: intuitive and well done app. a flaw: I have the phone set in English for work reasons and I wanted to change the language of the app to Italian  instead I have to change the system language.
content: intuitive and well done app  a flaw  I have the phone set in English for work reasons and I wanted to change the language of the app to Italian  instead I have to change the system language

Author: Andrea Carafa
Review: Leggera, non impatta negativamente sulla batteria e facile da attivare. Anche graficamente è molto bella, e spero che la scarichino in massa per poterle dare un ruolo più incisivo. Da quel che ho capito, di ottenere qualsiasi tipo di dato personale non se ne parla, quindi ottimo anche per la privacy. Poi chissà quali saranno gli sviluppi, magari oggi la usiamo per COVID19, domani potrebbe essere utile per altre malattie!
Title Review: Lightweight  does not negatively impact the battery and easy to activate. Also graphically it is very beautiful  and I hope they download it en masse to be able to give it a more incisive role. From what I understand  obtaining any type of personal data is not mentioned  therefore also excellent for privacy. Then who knows what the developments will be  maybe today we use it for COVID19  tomorrow it could be useful for other diseases!
content: Lightweight  does not negatively impact the battery and easy to activate  Also graphically it is very beautiful  and I hope they download it en masse to be able to give it a more incisive role  From what I understand  obtaining any type of personal data is not mentioned  therefore also excellent for privacy  Then who knows what the developments will be  maybe today we use it for COVID    tomorrow it could be useful for other diseases

Review: L'idea sarà pure buona, ma attiva il bluetooth, attiva la posizione e la batteria se ne va a quel paese. Poi mi sembra di aver capito che se io ce l'ho installata ma la gente intorno a me no, non serve a nulla.
Title Review: The idea will be good too  but activate the bluetooth  activate the position and the battery goes to that country. Then I seem to have understood that if I have it installed but the people around me don't  it's useless.
content: The idea will be good too  but activate the bluetooth  activate the position and the battery goes to that country  Then I seem to have understood that if I have it installed but the people around me don t  it s useless

Title Review: Great! All move forward together
content: Great  All move forward together

Author: Mauro V. Fortarezza
Review: La legge sulla privacy si dimostra sempre più un boomerang. È un enorme limite che ci siamo imposti stupidamente e masochisticamente, che rende difficile anche la gestione di una grave epidemia come questa. Deve essere drasticamente modificata, prima che faccia più danni. L'app è fatta molto bene ed è semplice da usare. A mio parere, però, non sarà mai attendibile, proprio per la tutela della privacy, perché lascia scegliere se condividere i propri codici o no.
Title Review: The privacy law is proving more and more of a boomerang. It is a huge limitation that we have stupidly and masochistically imposed on ourselves  which makes it difficult even to manage a serious epidemic like this. It needs to be drastically changed before it does more damage. The app is very well done and simple to use. In my opinion  however  it will never be reliable  precisely for the protection of privacy  because it lets you choose whether to share your codes or not.
content: The privacy law is proving more and more of a boomerang  It is a huge limitation that we have stupidly and masochistically imposed on ourselves  which makes it difficult even to manage a serious epidemic like this  It needs to be drastically changed before it does more damage  The app is very well done and simple to use  In my opinion  however  it will never be reliable  precisely for the protection of privacy  because it lets you choose whether to share your codes or not

Author: Valerio Fiori
Review: App ben fatta e curata, sia dal punto di vista grafico che dell'esperienza utente. Il tutorial iniziale illustra chiaramente il funzionamento, a tutela della privacy dell'utente. Non serve registrazione e una volta installata puoi subito dare un piccolo ma importante contributo per ridurre la diffusione dell'epidemia, semplicemente portando con te il telefono. Un servizio più che mai utile, per te e per gli altri.
Title Review: Well done and curated app  both from the graphic point of view and from the user experience. The initial tutorial clearly illustrates how it works to protect the user's privacy. No registration is required and once installed you can immediately make a small but important contribution to reduce the spread of the epidemic  simply by taking your phone with you. A service that is more useful than ever  for you and for others.
content: Well done and curated app  both from the graphic point of view and from the user experience  The initial tutorial clearly illustrates how it works to protect the user s privacy  No registration is required and once installed you can immediately make a small but important contribution to reduce the spread of the epidemic  simply by taking your phone with you  A service that is more useful than ever  for you and for others
syn: privaci, protect, servic, servic, reduc, illustr, import, curat

Author: Giuseppe Del Piero
Review: Ho installato l'app IMMUNI, la ritengo uno strumento utile e tendo a fidarmi. Trovo però non condivisibile il fatto che ci si sia sperticati nel garantire che l'app non traccia i movimenti perché usa il solo bluetooth, ma appoggiandosi a Google l'attivazione del GPS è obbligatoria per farla funzionare. Per senso di responsabilità la continuo ad usare, ma considero la cosa l'ennesimo brutto esempio di come NON si devono fare le cose.
Title Review: I have installed the IMMUNI app  I think it is a useful tool and I tend to trust it. However  I find it not acceptable that we have gone too far in ensuring that the app does not track movements because it only uses bluetooth  but relying on Google  the activation of the GPS is mandatory to make it work. Out of a sense of responsibility I continue to use it  but I consider it yet another bad example of how things should NOT be done.
content: I have installed the IMMUNI app  I think it is a useful tool and I tend to trust it  However  I find it not acceptable that we have gone too far in ensuring that the app does not track movements because it only uses bluetooth  but relying on Google  the activation of the GPS is mandatory to make it work  Out of a sense of responsibility I continue to use it  but I consider it yet another bad example of how things should NOT be done

Non credo che funzioni un gran che....sembra che app si disattiva in background....faccio parte regione pilota
Title Review: It is not clear ... if I have the Bluetooth on and I enter the app it tells me service not active. I have to turn off the Bluetooth and go back to the app. I believe that the App must always remain active. After this operation  if after a while I return to the app  it tells me the service is not active. I don't think it works that much .... it seems that app is deactivating in the background .... I'm part of the pilot region
content: It is not clear     if I have the Bluetooth on and I enter the app it tells me service not active  I have to turn off the Bluetooth and go back to the app  I believe that the App must always remain active  After this operation  if after a while I return to the app  it tells me the service is not active  I don t think it works that much      it seems that app is deactivating in the background      I m part of the pilot region

content: You need a notification when you lose the service  for example by removing the GPS or bluetooth   Otherwise you risk not having it active and not knowing it

Author: Marco Mancini
Review: App molto utile. Appena scaricata, dopo qualche minuto, è arrivato il corriere a casa e ha installato un'antenna 5G. Ora la connessione va una bomba ed anche i vicini, che la usano e vedono i nostri dati, ci ringraziano. C'era anche l'opzione con il microchip sottocutaneo e contestuale ritiro della tessera elettorale, ma per ora ho preferito rinviare. Buono il livello di radiazioni emesse, di notte riesco ad andare in bagno facendo luce da solo, senza dover sbattere il piede al comodino.
Title Review: Very useful app. As soon as it was unloaded  after a few minutes  the courier arrived at home and installed a 5G antenna. Now the connection is a blast and even the neighbors  who use it and see our data  thank us. There was also the option with the subcutaneous microchip and contextual withdrawal of the electoral card  but for now I preferred to postpone. The level of radiation emitted is good  at night I can go to the bathroom making light alone  without having to hit the bedside table.
content: Very useful app  As soon as it was unloaded  after a few minutes  the courier arrived at home and installed a  G antenna  Now the connection is a blast and even the neighbors  who use it and see our data  thank us  There was also the option with the subcutaneous microchip and contextual withdrawal of the electoral card  but for now I preferred to postpone  The level of radiation emitted is good  at night I can go to the bathroom making light alone  without having to hit the bedside table

Title Review: Unfortunately  in order to make it truly effective  personal freedom should be infringed by setting more restrictive methods as for a detainee under house arrest. Author: Raffaele Falcone
Review: Ottima app, utile e bella graficamente. Se tutti la utilizzassero saremo più tranquilli quando usciamo di casa e ci troviamo in luoghi affollati. Per quanto riguarda la privacy non la trovo invadente e anche se lo fosse, non e' la prima app che utilizziamo che monitora i nostri spostamenti. Per gli sviluppatori consiglierei di aggiungere nella sezione informazione quale è esattamente la normativa vigente nella nostra area/regione. Funziona perfettamente si Samsung galaxy A8 2018
Title Review: Excellent app  useful and graphically beautiful. If everyone uses it we will be more relaxed when we leave the house and find ourselves in crowded places. As for privacy  I don't find it intrusive and even if it were  it is not the first app we use that monitors our movements. For developers I would recommend adding in the information section what exactly is the current legislation in our area / region. It works perfectly on Samsung galaxy A8 2018
content: Excellent app  useful and graphically beautiful  If everyone uses it we will be more relaxed when we leave the house and find ourselves in crowded places  As for privacy  I don t find it intrusive and even if it were  it is not the first app we use that monitors our movements  For developers I would recommend adding in the information section what exactly is the current legislation in our area   region  It works perfectly on Samsung galaxy A
