Quando la riapro per vedere se funziona (com'è consigliato) la trovo disattivata, nonostante bluetooth e geolocalizzazione siano in funzione correttamente. Se provo a riattivarla, mi viene fuori un messaggio per cui le notifiche di esposizione sono disattivate. Devo quindi spegnere manualmente il bluetooth e riattivarlo attraverso l'applicazione. L'app riprende a funzionare ma poi, quando esco e rientro, il problema si ripete.
Title Review: I installed it without problems and activated it following the instructions. When I reopen it to see if it works (as recommended) I find it disabled  despite the fact that bluetooth and geolocation are working correctly. If I try to re-enable it  I get a message that exposure notifications are disabled. I then have to manually turn off the bluetooth and reactivate it through the application. The app starts working again but then  when I go out and back  the problem repeats itself.
content: I installed it without problems and activated it following the instructions  When I reopen it to see if it works  as recommended  I find it disabled  despite the fact that bluetooth and geolocation are working correctly  If I try to re enable it  I get a message that exposure notifications are disabled  I then have to manually turn off the bluetooth and reactivate it through the application  The app starts working again but then  when I go out and back  the problem repeats itself

Author: Lorenzo Rompianesi
Review: Il codice è pubblico, i dati restano sul dispositivo e sono anonimizzati, più di così direi che non si poteva chiedere come partenza. Non è questo il posto per giuducarne l'efficacia o meno, che dipende non solo da aspetti tecnici, che direi essere i più semplici e trasparenti da gestire, ma soprattutto da quante persone la utilizzeranno o da come il ministero della salute deciderà di promuoverla e utilizzarla. Se poi si rivelasse inutile perchè il virus svanisse, tanto meglio.
Title Review: The code is public  the data remain on the device and are anonymized  more than that I would say that you could not ask for starting. This is not the place to judge its effectiveness or not  which depends not only on technical aspects  which I would say are the simplest and most transparent to manage  but above all on how many people will use it or on how the ministry of health will decide to promote it and use it. If it turns out to be useless for the virus to vanish  so much the better.
content: The code is public  the data remain on the device and are anonymized  more than that I would say that you could not ask for starting  This is not the place to judge its effectiveness or not  which depends not only on technical aspects  which I would say are the simplest and most transparent to manage  but above all on how many people will use it or on how the ministry of health will decide to promote it and use it  If it turns out to be useless for the virus to vanish  so much the better
syn: technic, data, transpar, manag, judg, manag

Title Review: I consider it a good app  I don't understand those who complain about the alleged invasion of privacy what problems do they have? I guess those people are the same people who are registered on social networks. The only flaw of this app is that it activates the bluetooth on the smartphone exposing it to possible intrusions from third parties.

Author: Nemo Unknown
Review: Non ha la permission per la location ma attraverso l'interazione con i servizi Google la abilita comunque e richiede che sia abilitata per funzionare! Google giura che la sola abilitazione è necessaria per le richieste funzionalità bluetooth ma che i dati GPS non sono ottenuti, utilizzati e/o divulgati e naturalmente non c'è nessun motivo di dubitare di Google. Oltre a questo l''interazione col bluetooth è farragginosa come segnalato anche da altri utenti.
Title Review: It does not have the permission for the location but through the interaction with Google services it still enables it and requires it to be enabled to work! Google swears that only enabling is required for the required bluetooth functionality but that GPS data are not obtained  used and / or disclosed and of course there is no reason to doubt Google. In addition to this  the interaction with bluetooth is cumbersome as reported by other users.
content: It does not have the permission for the location but through the interaction with Google services it still enables it and requires it to be enabled to work  Google swears that only enabling is required for the required bluetooth functionality but that GPS data are not obtained  used and   or disclosed and of course there is no reason to doubt Google  In addition to this  the interaction with bluetooth is cumbersome as reported by other users

Inoltre, è sicuramente un primo passo verso app di servizi pubblici di altissimo livello.
Title Review: Excellent explanations on the operation  processing and data security. Confident that it can be a very clever method of guaranteeing the right to know the likelihood of having contracted the disease. Plus  it's definitely a first step towards world-class public service apps.

Author: Jacopo Pellegrinelli
Review: Risposte a domande che ho visto nelle recensioni. Su Huawei, l'app si disattiva in background ma non è un problema dell'app ma della gestione batteria del vostro smartphone, controllate che abbia tutti i permessi per rimanere aperta in background. Per quanto riguarda il GPS, il sistema Android necessità di questo permesso per scansionare i dispositivi vicini e scambiare i codici univoci per segnalare i possibili positivi che incontrate, non registra la vostra posizione!
Title Review: Answers to questions I've seen in reviews. On Huawei  the app deactivates in the background but it is not a problem of the app but of the battery management of your smartphone  check that it has all the permissions to remain open in the background. As for GPS  the Android system needs this permission to scan nearby devices and exchange unique codes to report possible positives you encounter  it does not record your location!
content: Answers to questions I ve seen in reviews  On Huawei  the app deactivates in the background but it is not a problem of the app but of the battery management of your smartphone  check that it has all the permissions to remain open in the background  As for GPS  the Android system needs this permission to scan nearby devices and exchange unique codes to report possible positives you encounter  it does not record your location
syn: locat, gps, manag, record, manag, locat, answer

Author: Davide Grasso
Review: Un po' di chiarezza su Immuni e il GPS: per funzionare, l'app si basa sul servizio "Notifiche di esposizione al COVID-19" integrato nei Google Play Services che, da sempre ha accesso alla geolocalizzazione. Pertanto, il servizio di Notifiche esposizione ne ha bisogno per migliorare il rilevamento dei dispositivi Bluetooth nelle vicinanze. Solo ed esclusivamente per quello. Di conseguenza, Immuni funzionerà solo se il GPS dello smartphone sarà attivo, ma in ogni caso l'app non ne ha accesso.
Title Review: A bit of clarity on Immuni and GPS: to work  the app is based on the "COVID-19 exposure notifications" service integrated in Google Play Services which has always had access to geolocation. Therefore  the Exposure Notifications service needs it to improve the detection of nearby Bluetooth devices. Only and exclusively for that. Consequently  Immuni will only work if the smartphone's GPS is active  but in any case the app does not have access to it.
content: A bit of clarity on Immuni and GPS  to work  the app is based on the  COVID    exposure notifications  service integrated in Google Play Services which has always had access to geolocation  Therefore  the Exposure Notifications service needs it to improve the detection of nearby Bluetooth devices  Only and exclusively for that  Consequently  Immuni will only work if the smartphone s GPS is active  but in any case the app does not have access to it

Author: Simone Rosati
Review: Probabilmente l'unica iniziativa ben congegnata e strutturata dell'intera emergenza Covid. Evidentemente nemmeno la compagine governativa poteva credere di essere stata vettore di qualcosa di funzionale, al punto che ha contributo affinché l'app fosse rilasciata con un mese e mezzo di ritardo e senza un'adeguata comunicazione, elemento determinate per la diffusione capillare di un simile strumento.
Title Review: Probably the only well thought out and structured initiative of the entire Covid emergency. Evidently not even the government team could believe that it was the carrier of something functional  to the point that it contributed to the app being released with a month and a half delay and without adequate communication  an element that was determined for the widespread diffusion of such a tool.

Sul samsung molto meglio ma...per abilitare il caricamento dati bisogna comunicare il codice all'operatore sanitario. Ma chi diavolo è l'operatore sanitario? Mi date un numero di telfono, o una mail? Much better on the samsung but ... to enable data upload you need to communicate the code to the healthcare provider. But who the hell is the health worker? Will you give me a phone number  or an email? At least one name! But why on earth don't you add a little button and you communicate it to the health worker? Office complication simple things.

Author: Vincenzo Cicconi Pacotvideo
Review: Finora ci siamo affidati e abbiamo applaudito il Servizio Sanitario Nazionale composto da Infermieri, Dottori, Virologi ed esperti scientifici .. ma anche Forze dell'Ordine, Farmacisti, Commesse e altre categorie in prima linea. Si parla tanto, spesso a vanvera, di essere o sentirsi "patrioti" .. ora tocca a noi, singole persone, fare la nostra parte .. essere davvero Patrioti. Scaricare "Immuni" è in fondo un piccolo contributo civico nella guerra contro il Covid-19.
Title Review: So far we have relied on and applauded the National Health Service made up of Nurses  Doctors  Virologists and scientific experts .. but also Law Enforcement  Pharmacists  Salesmen and other categories at the forefront. There is a lot of talk  often nonsense  about being or feeling "patriots" .. now it's up to us  individuals  to do our part .. to be truly Patriots. Downloading "Immuni" is basically a small civic contribution in the war against Covid-19.
content: So far we have relied on and applauded the National Health Service made up of Nurses  Doctors  Virologists and scientific experts    but also Law Enforcement  Pharmacists  Salesmen and other categories at the forefront  There is a lot of talk  often nonsense  about being or feeling  patriots     now it s up to us  individuals  to do our part    to be truly Patriots  Downloading  Immuni  is basically a small civic contribution in the war against Covid

Author: Stefano Lanari
Review: L'ho installata per pura curiosità, visto che la mia regione non rientra tra quelle pilota. L'app mi sembra di facile utilizzo, ma nelle FAQ non mi sembra d'aver letto nulla sulla necessità di lasciarla sempre in esecuzione, o se uscendo le sue funzionalità rimangono attive anche in background. Auspico che sia un successo, uscita forse in ritardo, ma esaminando sommariamente i vari repository su GitHub, alla luce anche del volume di documentazione scritta, credo che nel tempo a disposizione degli sviluppatori difficilmente si poteva fare meglio. Dovesse arrivare una seconda ondata quest'inverno, facendo gli scongiuri del caso, avremo sicuramente uno strumento in più per combattere questo virus maledetto.
Title Review: I installed it out of pure curiosity  since my region is not one of the pilot regions. The app seems easy to use  but in the FAQ I don't seem to have read anything about the need to always leave it running  or if when exiting its functions remain active even in the background. I hope it will be a success  perhaps released late  but by briefly examining the various repositories on GitHub  also in light of the volume of written documentation  I believe that in the time available to developers it was difficult to do better. Should a second wave arrive this winter  taking care of the case  we will surely have an extra tool to fight this cursed virus.
content: I installed it out of pure curiosity  since my region is not one of the pilot regions  The app seems easy to use  but in the FAQ I don t seem to have read anything about the need to always leave it running  or if when exiting its functions remain active even in the background  I hope it will be a success  perhaps released late  but by briefly examining the various repositories on GitHub  also in light of the volume of written documentation  I believe that in the time available to developers it was difficult to do better  Should a second wave arrive this winter  taking care of the case  we will surely have an extra tool to fight this cursed virus

Author: Daniele Petrarolo
Review: Per adesso ottima app. Fruibile, facile da configurare e dall'ottimo design. 4 stelle che diventeranno 5 se vengono corrette un paio di label forvianti nei pulsanti, esempio Caricamento Dati. Per chi critica la necessità di GPS gridando al complotto: questa è una specifica tecnica del tutto necessaria per lo scambio dati tra dispositivi BLE nelle vicinanze, quindi del tutto normale. Immuni inoltre dichiara che i dati di posizione non li usa. Installate.
Title Review: For now  excellent app. Usable  easy to set up and with a great design. 4 stars which will become 5 if a couple of misleading labels in the buttons are corrected  for example Data Upload. For those who criticize the need for GPS by shouting a conspiracy: this is a technical specification completely necessary for exchanging data between nearby BLE devices  therefore completely normal. Immuni further states that location data does not use them. Install.
content: For now  excellent app  Usable  easy to set up and with a great design    stars which will become   if a couple of misleading labels in the buttons are corrected  for example Data Upload  For those who criticize the need for GPS by shouting a conspiracy  this is a technical specification completely necessary for exchanging data between nearby BLE devices  therefore completely normal  Immuni further states that location data does not use them  Install

Author: Marco Quintano
Review: Da sviluppatore dico: Ottimo lavoro ! Una precisazione a chi pensa che mettendo "caricamento dati" si possa inviare la positività per sbaglio: Non funziona così, se cliccate su verifica non va perché giustamente il codice dovete comunicarlo ad un operatore sanitario che provvederà ad attivarlo, una volta inserito in database dall'operatore sanitario voi potete premere verifica e comunicare ai vostri contatti, in modo anonimo, la vostra positività.
Title Review: As a developer I say: Great job! A clarification to those who think that by putting "data loading" you can send the positivity by mistake: It does not work like this  if you click on check it does not work because rightly you have to communicate the code to a health worker who will activate it  once entered in the database by 'health worker you can press check and communicate to your contacts  anonymously  your positivity.

Author: Acca Soldier
Review: Da migliorare sotto tantissimi aspetti...il codice assegnato non è stato ancora verificato, non rimane attiva in background nonostante posizione e bluetooth si quindi se si chiude l'app, smette di comunicare l'eventuale stato di contagio. Inoltre, trovo abbastanza fragile il sistema del bluetooth troppo facilmente individuabile da dispositivi vicini e con un livello di sicurezza molto basso. App acerba con una buona idea di base ma che non può in alcun modo sostituire l'indagine sierologica
Title Review: To be improved in many respects ... the assigned code has not yet been verified  it does not remain active in the background despite position and bluetooth so if you close the app  it stops communicating any contagion status. Furthermore  I find the bluetooth system quite fragile too easily detectable by nearby devices and with a very low security level. Unripe app with a good basic idea but which cannot in any way replace the serological investigation
content: To be improved in many respects     the assigned code has not yet been verified  it does not remain active in the background despite position and bluetooth so if you close the app  it stops communicating any contagion status  Furthermore  I find the bluetooth system quite fragile too easily detectable by nearby devices and with a very low security level  Unripe app with a good basic idea but which cannot in any way replace the serological investigation

Author: Antonio Guastella
Review: Dopo mille vicessitudini, critiche e chiarimenti, ecco l'app più discussa dell'anno. Avendo seguito lo sviluppo su Git-Hub sono stato in grado di chiarire ogni mio dubbio a riguardo della sicurezza, della trasparenza e dell'effettivo funzionamento dell'app. Scaricata immediatamente con la speranza che possa essere usata da quante più persone possibili. Personalmente la consiglierò ad amici e parenti, lo faccio per proteggere me e loro.
Title Review: After a thousand vicissitudes  criticisms and clarifications  here is the most discussed app of the year. Having followed the development on Git-Hub  I was able to clarify all my doubts regarding the security  transparency and effective functioning of the app. Downloaded immediately with the hope that it can be used by as many people as possible. Personally I will recommend it to friends and family  I do it to protect me and them.
content: After a thousand vicissitudes  criticisms and clarifications  here is the most discussed app of the year  Having followed the development on Git Hub  I was able to clarify all my doubts regarding the security  transparency and effective functioning of the app  Downloaded immediately with the hope that it can be used by as many people as possible  Personally I will recommend it to friends and family  I do it to protect me and them
syn: secur, transpar, protect, secur, clarifi, critic, follow

Author: Marcello Mistre
Review: Utilizzo farraginoso. Quando attivata attiva in automatico il Bluetooth ma quando viene disattivata non lo disattiva e va disattivato manualmente. Quindi non può essere lasciata in background a meno di lasciare il BT acceso Riattivata richiede di nuovo autorizzazioni. Pericoloso chiamare "caricamento dati" la sezione per comunicare la positività: si rischia che qialcuno la attivi per sbaglio. La app non viene finora trovata dalla ricerca di Google Play ma va ricercato da qualche parte il link.
Title Review: Cumbersome use. When activated it automatically activates the Bluetooth but when it is deactivated it does not deactivate it and must be deactivated manually. So it can't be left in the background unless you leave the BT on. Wake up requires permissions again. It is dangerous to call the section "data loading" to communicate positivity: you risk that someone activates it by mistake. The app is not found by Google Play search so far but the link must be searched somewhere.
content: Cumbersome use  When activated it automatically activates the Bluetooth but when it is deactivated it does not deactivate it and must be deactivated manually  So it can t be left in the background unless you leave the BT on  Wake up requires permissions again  It is dangerous to call the section  data loading  to communicate positivity  you risk that someone activates it by mistake  The app is not found by Google Play search so far but the link must be searched somewhere

Author: Cosimo Rotunno
Review: Per adesso non posso che lasciare 5 stelle, funziona tutto a meraviglia. Ho letto recensioni di gente che chiede come mai disattivare il GPS interrompa il servizio di Immuni. Il motivo sta nel servizio di segnalazione covid di Google. Il suo funzionamento, creato insieme ad Apple, richiede l'utilizzo del GPS per rilevare i dispositivi Bluetooth nelle vicinanze, la posizione del telefono non viene condivisa con nessuno. Siete al sicuro sotto questo punto di vista :)
Title Review: For now I can only leave 5 stars  everything works wonders. I've read reviews from people asking why turning off GPS interrupts Immuni's service. The reason lies in Google's covid reporting service. Its operation  created together with Apple  requires the use of GPS to detect nearby Bluetooth devices  the location of the phone is not shared with anyone. You are safe from this point of view :)
content: For now I can only leave   stars  everything works wonders  I ve read reviews from people asking why turning off GPS interrupts Immuni s service  The reason lies in Google s covid reporting service  Its operation  created together with Apple  requires the use of GPS to detect nearby Bluetooth devices  the location of the phone is not shared with anyone  You are safe from this point of view

Author: Yuri Cinti
Review: Sinceramente non capisco il perché bisogna attivare la posizione e la spiegazione che date non mi convince per niente. Non vedo perché il bluetooth debba "dialogare" con il GPS. C'è bisogno di essere tracciati per capire se il bluetooth è vicino o lontano? Oppure serve a voi per capire su Maps dove sono avvenuti gli eventuali contatti con positivi? Poco chiara, esattamente come ci governa. Non mi fido, disinstallata.
Title Review: I honestly do not understand why the position must be activated and the explanation you give does not convince me at all. I don't see why bluetooth should "talk" with GPS. Do we need to be tracked to understand if the bluetooth is near or far? Or do you need it to understand on Maps where any contacts with positives occurred? Unclear  exactly how it governs us. I don't trust  uninstalled.
content: I honestly do not understand why the position must be activated and the explanation you give does not convince me at all  I don t see why bluetooth should  talk  with GPS  Do we need to be tracked to understand if the bluetooth is near or far  Or do you need it to understand on Maps where any contacts with positives occurred  Unclear  exactly how it governs us  I don t trust  uninstalled

Author: Leonardo Porcelli
Review: Buona app. Interfaccia intuitiva. C'e' da capire bene come funziona nello specifico la parte relativa all'acquisizione dell'indirizzo IP. Sebbene l'informativa privacy specifichi che suddetto indirizzo "Non viene conservato nell'ambito del sistema di alletra COVID-19", non capisco l'utilita' della registrazione di questo dato. Sicuramente l'informativa privacy rassicura moltissimo sulla effettiva tutela dell'utente. Sarebbe, tuttavia, utile se si specificasse meglio l'utilita', come detto sopra, della registrazione dell'indirizzo IP. Questo perche', se l'operatore telefonico tiene traccia delle assegnazioni degli indirizzi IP, sarebbe facilmente rintracciabile la persona associata.
Title Review: Good app. Intuitive interface. It is necessary to understand well how the part relating to the acquisition of the IP address works specifically. Although the privacy policy specifies that the aforementioned address is "Not stored within the alletra COVID-19 system"  I do not understand the usefulness of registering this data. Surely the privacy policy reassures a lot about the effective protection of the user. However  it would be useful if we better specify the usefulness  as mentioned above  of registering the IP address. This is because  if the telephone operator keeps track of the IP address assignments  the associated person would be easily traced.
content: Good app  Intuitive interface  It is necessary to understand well how the part relating to the acquisition of the IP address works specifically  Although the privacy policy specifies that the aforementioned address is  Not stored within the alletra COVID    system   I do not understand the usefulness of registering this data  Surely the privacy policy reassures a lot about the effective protection of the user  However  it would be useful if we better specify the usefulness  as mentioned above  of registering the IP address  This is because  if the telephone operator keeps track of the IP address assignments  the associated person would be easily traced
syn: data, track, privaci, protect, assign, address

Author: Giuseppe Storelli
Review: Finalmente un'Italia al passo con i tempi capace di produrre applicazioni ben fatte in termini di usabilità e codice. L'app è di semplice utilizzo e chiarisce perfettamente tutti i possibili dubbi in tema privacy (e non solo). Mi riprometto di aggiornare questa recensione tra qualche giorno per valutarne anche l'impatto (si presume quasi assente) sulla batteria. Per ora Bravi!
Title Review: Finally an Italy in step with the times capable of producing well-made applications in terms of usability and code. The app is easy to use and perfectly clarifies all possible doubts regarding privacy (and more). I plan to update this review in a few days to also evaluate the impact (presumably almost absent) on the battery. Well done for now!
content: Finally an Italy in step with the times capable of producing well made applications in terms of usability and code  The app is easy to use and perfectly clarifies all possible doubts regarding privacy  and more   I plan to update this review in a few days to also evaluate the impact  presumably almost absent  on the battery  Well done for now
